dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayadoṣadarśī viraktaḥ puruṣadarśanābhyāsāttacchuddhipravivekāpyāyitabuddhirguṇebhyo vyaktāvyaktadharmakebhyo virakta iti। tadvayaṁ vairāgyam। tatra yaduttaraṁ tajjñānaprasādamātram। yasyodaye sati yogī pratyuditakhyātirevaṁ manyate – prāptaṁ prāpaṇīyaṁ, kṣīṇāḥ kṣetavyāḥ kleśāḥ, chinnaḥ śliṣṭaparvā bhavasaṁkramaḥ, yasyāvicchedājjanitvā mriyate mṛtvā ca jāyata iti। jñānasyaiva parā kāṣṭhā vairāgyam। etasyaiva hi nāntarīyakaṁ kaivalyamiti ॥ 16 ॥

vivaraṇam
tacca dvividham - paraṁ cāparaṁ ca viṣayanimittabhedena । aparaṁ vyākhyātam । adhunā paramucyate-- [tatparaṁ puruṣakhyāterguṇavaitṛṣṇyam । tadi] ti vairāgyaṁ parāmṛśyate ।
[paramiti] pūrvoktavairāgyāduttarakālabhāvīti । yadi vā --tasya viṣayanimittābhyāmutkṛṣṭīnimittaviṣayatvāt , kaivalyasya vā pratyāsannataratvāt paramutkṛṣṭam ।
kiṁ nimittamasyetyāha— [puruṣakhyāte] rnimittāt । kiṁviṣayamityāha— [guṇavaitṛṣṇyamiti ।] guṇeṣu sattvādiṣuvaitṛṣṇyam । [dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayadoṣadarśīti ।] pūrvavairāgyanimittaviṣayaparāmarśanamasya viṣayanimittabhedavivekārtham । [puruṣadarśanābhyāsāt] nimittāt । [tacchuddhipravivekāpyāyitabuddhiḥ । taditi] puruṣadarśanaṁ parāmṛśyate । tasya śuddhiḥ [tacchuddhiḥ] nirṇiktakleśādimalatvam । athavā tasya puruṣasya śuddhistacchuddhiḥ । tacchuddhestadālambanadarśanaṁ pravivicyate । [tatpravivekenāpyāyitā] buddhirasya yoginaḥ ॥
guṇebhya iti viṣayapratipādanam । pūrvastu dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayabhyo('pi) viraktaḥ । eṣa tatkāraṇebhyo guṇebhya eva । [vyaktāvyaktadharmakebhyaḥ] mahadādisaṁsthitā vyaktadharmakāḥ । pradhānāvasthitā avyaktadharmakāḥ । tebhyo virakta iti । [tat dvayaṁ vairāgyaṁ] pūrvamidaṁ ca । [tatna yaduttaraṁ] puruṣadarśananimittaṁ guṇaviṣayaṁ [tajjñānaprasādaḥ mātram ।] puruṣadarśanasyaiva paraḥ praviveka iti yāvat ॥
puruṣadarśī hi heyopādeyaśūnyacitto bhavati । tadāha--- [’'prasaṁkhyāne'pyakusīdasya sarvathā vivekakhyātedharmarmagheḥ samādhiḥ'] iti ॥
[yasyodaye] yasya vairāgyasyodaye । [pratyuditakhyātiḥ] pratyutpannadarśanaḥ । [evaṁ manyate prāptaṁ prāpaṇīyam] ityādi । [etasya hi nāntarīyakaṁ kevalyaṁ] tataḥ paraṁ sādhanānapekṣatvāt ! vairāgyasya jñānaprasādamātratve jñānavairāgyayorananyatvāt tadviparītayośca rāgājñānayoranarthāntaratvameva siddham । evaṁ sati rāgo'pyavidyāyā evāvasthāntaramiti pañcaparvā avidyetyupapannaṁ bhavati ॥
nanu caivaṁ buddheraṣṭaguṇatvaṁ bādhyeta । ṣaḍguṇatvaṁ hi dhyānāvasthābhedābhyupagamāt । jñānatve'pi vairāgyasya prasannataratvābhyupagamaḥ । rāgo'pyajñānasyāvasthāntaraviśeṣaḥ ।
nanu caivaṁ sati jñānājñānayoranekāvasthābhedādaṣṭaguṇatvaṁ punarapi na prāpnoti । naiṣa doṣaḥ । phalavattvapratyanīka-tvaniyamāt । jñānāvasthācatuṣṭayasya phalavattvena bhedaniyamaḥ । tathā ajñānāvasthācatuṣṭaya pratyanīkatvenādharmadicatuṣṭayaniyama ityaṣṭaguṇatvasiddhiḥ । dharmādipratidvandvina eva hi guṇatvena niyamyate, nājñānabhedāḥ sarva eva ॥ 16 ॥
athopāyadvayena niruddhacittavṛtteḥ kathamucyate saṁprajñātaḥ samādhiriti –
vitarkavicārānandāsmitārūpānugamātsaṁprajñātaḥ ॥ 17 ॥

vitarkaścittasyā''lambane sthūla ābhogaḥ ānando hlādaḥ। sūkṣmo vicāraḥ। ekātmikā saṁvidasmitā। tatra prathamaścatuṣṭayānugataḥ samādhiḥ savitarkaḥ। dvitīyo vitarkavikalaḥ savicāraḥ। tṛtīyo vicāravikalaḥ sānandaḥ। caturthastadvikalo'smitāmātra iti। sarva ete sālambanāḥ samādhayaḥ ॥ 17 ॥

vivaraṇam
uktaṁ purastāt ' [samprajñātaḥ samādhirvitarkādyanugata ityupariṣṭāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ'] iti । so'vasaraprāpta idānīṁ lakṣyeta । [upāyadvayena niruddhavṛtteḥ] vairāgyadvayaṁ parāparatvena vyākhyātam । abhyāsasyāpi dvitvaṁ sāmarthyādavasīyate । katham ? viśiṣṭamasamprajñātasamādherabhyāsaṁ sūtreṇaiva vakṣyati--’’ [virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrvaḥ’’] iti । tena sālambanaviṣayaḥ pūrvābhyāsa iti niścīyate । vakṣyati ca - [‘tatpratiṣedhārtham ekatatvābhyāsaḥ’] iti ॥
bhāṣyakāro'pyavādīt - ‘vairāgyeṇa viṣayasrota: khilīkriyate । vivekadarśanābhyāsena kalyāṇasrota uddhāṭyate? iti । nāvocata vṛttisvarūpatiraskārameva samprajñātasamādheḥ । vṛttinirodhaprabhavatvamaniṣṭaviṣayapravṛtyuparamottara-kālabhāvitvāpekṣayā, vṛttiviṣayaviśeṣānugata eva hi saḥ ॥
tathā ca dvitīyasūtre samprajñātasya nirodho na lakṣaṇamiti vyākhyātam । ataḥ pūrvoktābhyāsavairāgyopāyadvayena [niruddhavṛtteścittasya kathamucyate] -kathaṁ lakṣaṇamucyata iti yāvat । [vitarkavicārānandāsmitārūpānugamāt samprajñātaḥ ।] anugamaśabdaḥ pratyekaṁ saṁbandhanīyaḥ । vitarkānugamādvicārānugamādānandānugamādasmitārūpānugamāditi । rūpaśabdo mātrārtho vitarkādipūrvadharmatrayavārjatakhakhyāpanārthaḥ ॥
[vitarkaścittasyālambane sthūla ābhogaḥ ।] syūla(pi)miśrībhāvaḥ prathamamālambanākāreṇa pariṇamamānasya cittasya ya ālambanavyatikaraḥ sa vitarkaḥ ॥ [sūkṣmo vicāraḥ] ābhogaḥ sūkṣma iti saṁbandhaḥ । [ānando hlādaḥ] vicāraḥ sūkṣmatara ābhogastṛtīyaḥ । sānandatā viśeṣaḥ । ' [ekarūpātmikā saṁvidasmitā] svasyāṁ prakṛtāvasmitāyāṁ samāpannasya [asmitā] pratyayamātratā ekarūpātmakatvam । tathā codāhariṣyati- tamaṇumātmānamanvavaityāsmītyetāvatsaṁjānīta iti ॥
nanu cāsmitā kleśeṣu paṭhiṣyati 'dṛgdarśanaśaktyorekātmatevāsmitā' iti । tatkathamivāsmitārūpeṇa kleśena samādhiranugamyata iti । satyamevaṁ– prakṛṣṭasvakāraṇākārāvabhāsakatvādanyaviṣayavinivṛttātmakatvāñcāsmitāyā: samādhirūpatve'pyadoṣaḥ ॥
yadi vā asmitārūpasyālambanasyāvidyātve'pi na yogipratyayasyāvidyātvam । na hi khalu paracittavividiṣāyāṁ parasyāvidyātvam । na hi khalu paracittapratyayaṁ gṛhṇan parakīyāvidyāpratyayarūpālambanadoṣeṇa svayamavidyāvān bhavati ॥
athāsamprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ kimupāyaḥ ? kiṁsvabhāvo vā ? iti yaḥ punaḥ kleśaḥ sa viparyeyaviśiṣṭa eva । yathā---ahaṁ gacchāmi kṛśo'hamiti । yogicittasya tannyagbhūte rajastamasī iti na tathā ॥
tatra pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ svakīyottarottaradharmānugataḥ । paraḥ parastu pūrvapūrvadharmavikalaḥ । yasmāccaitaddharmacatuṣṭayānugata evāyaṁ samprajñātaḥ samādhistasmādetallakṣaṇa iti lakṣaṇārthaṁ sūtram । loke'pi yo yadasādhāraṇadharmānuyātaḥ sa tallakṣaṇaḥ, yathā sāsnādilakṣaṇo gauriti ॥
asmitāmātragrahaṇānnirālambanatāmeṣāṁ samādhīnāṁ mā kaścidāśaṅkiṣṭatyāha- [sarva ete sālambanā iti ।] yaḥ punarmanyate nirvikalpatvamasmiteti--tadasat । asmitāśabdasyāhaṅkāre prasiddhatvāt । tathā cāha--asmibhāvo'smitā ॥ 17 ॥
athāsaṁprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ kimupāyaḥ kiṁsvabhāvo veti –
virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrvaḥ saṁskāraśeṣo'nyaḥ ॥ 18 ॥

sarvavṛttipratyastamaye saṁskāraśeṣo nirodhaścittasya samādhirasaṁprajñātaḥ। tasya paraṁ vairāgyamupāyaḥ। sālambano hyabhyāsastatsādhanāya na kalpata iti virāmapratyayo nirvastuka ālambanī kriyate। sa cārthaśūnyaḥ। tadabhyāsapūrvakaṁ hi cittaṁ nirālambanamabhāvaprāptamiva bhavatītyeṣa nirbījaḥ sabhādhirasaṁprajñātaḥ ॥ 18 ॥

vivaraṇam
[atha asamprajñātaḥ 'yogaścittavṛttinirodha’] ityupapāditalakṣaṇaḥ [kimupāyaḥ] kiṁsādhanaḥ kenopāyenopetya ityarthaḥ । [kiṁsvabhāvaḥ] kiṁsvarūpaḥ kimavastha iti svabhāvaviśiṣṭasādhanasaṁbandhapradarśanārthamāha- [virāmapratyayābhyāsa pūrvaḥ saṁskāraśeṣo'nyaḥ ॥]
[virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrva] ityetāvatā sādhanasambandhamācaṣṭe । [saṁskāraśeṣa] iti tu svabhāvavyākhyānam । [anya iti] anantaroktalakṣaṇāt samprajñātādavanyo'yaṁ nirbījaḥ asamprajñātaḥ ॥
anya ityubhābhyāṁ saṁbadhyate --virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrveśva saṁskāraśeṣaśca । ko'sāvubhayaviśiṣṭa ityāha- [anya iti ॥]
viramaṇaṁ virāmaḥ । virāmaśvāsau pratyayaśca virāmapratyaya: । virāmarūpatvāt sa eva pratyayo virāma ityucyate । sarvaviṣayebhyo vinivartamānasya vinivartanakāle prāgapratyayāpatteḥ pratyayarūpatvam । etadyathā-pāvakasya jvalataḥ prakṣīyamāṇendhanasya śanaiśśanairupaśāmyataḥ prāgaṅgāratāpatterjvalātmakatā ॥
tasmādvirāmarūpaḥ pratyayo [virāmapratyayaḥ] tasya [abhyāsaḥ pūrvo] mukhaṁ yasya saḥ [virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrvaḥ ।] saṁskāra eva śeṣo yasya sa [saṁskāraśeṣaḥ ।] pratyayoparame tu pratyayasaṁskāra evāvaśiṣyate । viṣayapratyayebhya uparataṁ cittaṁ saṁskāraśeṣamevetyarthaḥ । [tasya paraṁ vairāgyamupāyaḥ] tasya samādheḥ paramuttaram ॥
nanu ca paraṁ vairāgyaṁ ceti vaktavyam, abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ vṛttinirodhasyābhipretatvāt । naiṣa doṣaḥ । virāmapratyayābhyāsasya sūtropāttatvādanāśaṅkayastadabhyāsaḥ । vairāgyaṁ punaranupāttatvādāśaṅkayeta । tasmāttadeva prāpayatā na cā [caḥ] paṭhitaḥ ॥
yadyevaṁ kasmānna sūtra eva vairāgyagrahaṇaṁ kṛtam ? pūrvatra paṭhitatvāt । tatra kimarthaṁ paṭhitamiti cet--vairāgyaprasaṅgāt । pūrvavairāgyaviśeṣa evottaraṁ vairāgyamiti prasaṅgāduttaram[duktam] । pūrvasya ca vairāgyasya samprajñātaviṣaye('pi)viniyogādavaśiṣṭatya parasya sādhanatvādanyaviṣayatvācca nirbījenaiva sambandha iti na sūtre vairāgyagrahaṇaṁ kṛtam । sāmarthyaprāptaṁ tu bhāṣyakāro darśeyati ॥
“abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ tannirodha' iti hi pratipāditam । [sālambane.o hyābhyāso] viruddhatvānnirālambanasya samādheḥ [sādhanatvāya na kalpata] iti [nirvastuko'pi virāmapratyayo] nirālambanasamādhyanurūpatvā [dālambanīkriyate ।] tasmā [ttadabhyāsavairāgyopāyapūrvakaṁ cittaṁ] nirālambana [mabhāprāptamiva bhavati sa eṣa nirbījaḥ] saṁskāraśeṣasvabhāvaḥ [samādhirasamprajñāta iti ॥ 18 ॥]
sa khalvayaṁ dvividhaḥ - upāyapratyayo bhavapratyayaśca। tatropāyapratyayo yogināṁ bhavati –
bhavaprayayo videhaprakṛtilayānām ॥ 19 ॥

videhānāṁ devānāṁ bhavapratyayaḥ। te hi svasaṁskāramātropayogena cittena kaivalyapadamivānubhavantaḥ svasaṁskāravipākaṁ tathājātīyakamativāhayanti। tathā prakṛtilayāḥ sādhikāre cetasi prakṛtilīne kaivalyapadamivānubhavanti, yāvanna punarāvartate'dhikāravaśāccittamiti ॥ 19 ॥

vivaraṇam
﻿ [sa khalvayaṁ dvividhaḥ ।] saḥ nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ [upāyapratyayo bhavapratyayaśca ।] upāyena pratīyate prāpyata ityupāyapratyayo [yogināṁ bhavati ।] yadyapi videhā api yogina eva । tathāpi yamādiyogasādhanānuṣṭhāyino'bhipretāḥ । teṣāṁ śraddhāvīryādyupāyalabhyaḥ samādhiḥ ॥
videhaprakṛtilayānāṁ tu janmanaiva labhyaḥ । tehi tanutarapratibandhāvaśeṣāḥ । sa tu pratibandhāvaśeṣasteṣāṁ sakṛdāsāditapunarjanmanāṁ samādhivyāghātāya na paryāpnoti । sa tu janmapratilambhamātranimittam । (tvāt)jñānavairāgyādyanuṣṭhānakāryatvādvidehaprakṛtilayatvasya tadanuṣṭhānastutyarthaṁ sūtram । idṛśaṁ hi tadanuṣṭhānamāhātmyam । yaduta sāmarthyādivaikalyādabhīpsitaphalānavātāvapi mahanīyataraṁ videhaprakṛtilayatvaṁ prāpyate ।
videhā nāma devāḥ puryaṣṭakaśarīropabandhāḥ । [te svasaṁskāramātropabhogena] vairāgyābhyāsāhitaḥ saṁskāraśeṣastanmātropabhogena [cittena kaivalyamihānubhavanta iti ।] sattvaguṇavinirmoṁkā [ttathājātīyakaṁ svasaṁskāraparipākaṁ] kṣapayanti ॥
prakṛtilayāḥ--sādhikāre aparyavasitā[dhi]kare । yāvaddhi na kṛtā guṇapuruṣāntarakhyātiḥ, tāvadaparisamāptādhikārameva cittaṁ tasmin prakṛtilayāpanne [kaivalyamivānubhavantīti ।] pūrvavat । [yāvanna punarāvartate'dhikāravaśāt] vidyākartavyatāvaśāt tāvadanubhavanti kaivalyamiva ॥ 19 ॥
śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāpūrvaka itareṣām ॥ 20 ॥

upāyapratyayo yogināṁ bhavati। śraddhā cetasaḥ saṁprasādaḥ। sā hi jananīva kalyāṇī yoginaṁ pāti। tasya hi śraddadhānasya vivekārthino vīryamupajāyate। samupajātavīryasya smṛtirupatiṣṭhate। smṛtyupasthāne ca cittamanākulaṁ samādhīyate। samāhitacittasya prajñāviveka upāvartate। yena yathārthaṁ vastu jānāti। tadabhyāsāttattadviṣayācca vairāgyādasaṁprajñātaḥ samādhirbhavati ॥ 20 ॥

vivaraṇam
yeṣāmupāyapratyayo yogināṁ, teṣāṁ [śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāpūrvakaḥ] samādhiḥ, [śraddhā] nāmāpavargaprāptau tatsādhanaśravaṇe ca kautakaphalasaṁparka iva salilasya [cetasaḥ] [samprasādaḥ] [saṁprasattiḥ । sā hi jananīva kalyāṇī yoginaṁ pāti] rakṣatyaśubhebhyaḥ । [tasya hi vivekārthinaḥ] samyagdarśanārthino [vīryam] utsāha [upajāyate] yogasādhanānuṣṭhānaṁ prati । sañjātavīryasyāgamajñānādiviṣayā dṛḍha़tarā smṛtirupatiṣṭhate । [vivekārthina] iti sarvatrānuṣajyate ॥
dṛḍha [smṛtyupasthāne ca cittamanākulaṁ samādhīyate । samāhitacittasya] prajñāyā buddheḥ [viviktatā] sarvārthaprakāśanasāmathryam । ta(thā)t viśinaṣṭi - yena yathābhūtam ātmādi vastu jānāti iti ॥
[tadabhyāsāt] etaduktaṁ bhavati – ārmadarśanavirāmapratyayābhyāsāditi । [tadviṣayācca vairāgyā] (khyādviṣayā)t parasmādvairāgyāditi । [asamprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ] iti ॥ 20 ॥

te khalu nava yogino mṛdumadhyādhimātropāyā bhavanti। tadyathā - mṛdūpāyo madhyopāyo'dhimātropāya iti। tatra mṛdūpāyastrividhaḥ – mṛdusaṁvego madhyasaṁvegastīvrasaṁvega iti। tathā madhyopāyastathā'dhimātropāya iti। tatrādhimātropāyānāṁ –
tīvrasaṁvegānāmāsannaḥ ॥ 21 ॥
samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ca bhavatīti ॥ 21 ॥

vivaraṇam
te'pi śraddhādimādhinā nava(nupa)yogino bhavanti । taddarśayati- [tadyathā mṛdūpāyo madhyopāyo'dhimātropāya iti ।] teṣāmekaikastridhā bhidyate-tatra [mṛdūpāya iti ।] sādhanānuṣṭhānaṁ prati mandopakramo madhyopakramaḥ tī(vrasaṁvego)vropakrama iti । evamitaratrāpīti । nātra tirobhūtam(t) ॥
[॥ tatrādhimātropāyānāṁ tīvrasaṁvegānāmāsannaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ca] ॥ 21 ॥
mṛdumadhyādhimātratvāttato'pi viśeṣaḥ ॥ 22 ॥

mṛdutīvro madhyatīvro'dhimātratīvra iti। tato'pi viśeṣaḥ। tadviśeṣādapi mṛdutīvrasaṁvegasyā''sannaḥ, tato madhyatīvrasaṁvegasyā''sannataraḥ, tasmādadhimātratīvrasaṁvegasyādhimātropāyasyāpyāsannatamaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ceti ॥ 22 ॥

vivaraṇam
teṣāmapi mṛdumadhyatīvropakramatayā viśiṣyamāṇatvā [ttato'pi viśeṣaḥ] sādhanānuṣṭhānasaṁskārasya । [tadviśeṣāda] pyuttamasya [samādhilābhaḥ] pratyāsīdatitarām ॥ etadasya sūtrasya prayojanam-yogasādhanānuṣṭhānaṁ prati yoginaḥ kathamupabṛṁhitotsāhā bhaveyuriti । yathā loke drutataraṁ sīmāntaṁ pari[prati]dhāvatāmetatphale bhavatīti tadvat । athavā-mandamandetaropakramāṇāmapi yogināmabhimataphalāvāptiprakāśanādanavasanna- cetasaḥ pravarteranniti । itarathā tīvratarāyāsajanitabhītaye'vasīdeyuriti ॥ 22 ॥
kimetasmādevā''sannatamaḥ samādhirbhavati। athāsya lābhe bhavatyanyo'pi kaścidupāyo na veti –
īśvarapraṇidhānādvā ॥ 23 ॥
praṇidhānādbhaktiviśeṣādāvarjita īśvarastamanugṛhṇātyabhidhyānamātreṇa। tadabhidhyānamātrādapi yogina āsannatamaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ca bhavatīti ॥ 23 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kimetasmādevāsannataro bhavati ? atha (tasya) asya lābhe bhavatya nyo'pi kaścidupāyo] na veti । upāyāntaramastītyāha- [īśvarapraṇidhānādvā ।] īśvaraśabdārthamuttaratra vyākhyāsyati । praṇidhānamiha vyācaṣṭe- [bhaktiviśeṣādāvarjita] iti । anugrahaṁ pratyabhimukhībhāvamāpāditaḥ taṁ bhaktyātiśayayoginaṁ yoginam [abhidhyānamātreṇa] parameśvaratvādeva nirāyāsatayā satyasaṁkalpatvāt [anugṛhvāti ।] tadanugrahādapi [pratyāsannataraḥ samādhilābhaḥ phalaṁ ca] iti ॥ 23 ॥
atha pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ ko'yamīśvaro nāmeti –
kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ ॥ 24 ॥

avidyādaya kleśāḥ। kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi। tatphalaṁ vipākaḥ। tadanuguṇā vāsanā āśayāḥ। te ca manasi vartamānāḥ puruṣe vyapadiśyante, sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti। yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yoddhṛṣu vartamānaḥ svāmini vyapadiśyate। yo hyanena bhogenāparāmṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ।

vivaraṇam
[atha pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ ko'yamīśvara] iti sāṁkhyaśāsre prasiddhyabhāvādīśvarasadbhāve copapattimavaśyamanavagateśvaraviśeṣo vā pṛcchati । tatra tāvat pratijānīte- [kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ ॥]
[kleśā] iti । [avidyādayaḥ] kleśayantīti [kleśāḥ ।] tatpūrvānuṣṭhitāni [kuśalākuśalāni] karmāṇi । kuśalāni cākuśalāni [ca kuśalākuśalāni] cetyekaśeṣaḥ । kuśalākuśalānīti kuśalākuśalavimiśrāṇīti yāvat । [tatphalaṁ vipākaḥ] jātyāyurbhogalakṣaṇaḥ । ta eva kleśādaya ā nirvāṇāccherata iti kleśakarmavipākā āśayā: । yadi vā kleśādīnāṁ rāśayaḥ kleśakarmavipākāśayā: ॥
te [manasi vartamānā] manovṛtiprabhavatvāt [puruṣe vyapadiśyante ।] kasmāt ? [sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti ।] yathā rājani jayaparājayau yodheṣu vartamānāvapadiśyete tatphalaṁ rājasaṁbandhi iti ।
[yā hmanena bhogenāparāsṛṣṭa] iti ucyate । na kālavivakṣā, upalakṣaṇārthatvaṁ-na parāmṛśyate, nāpi parāmṛkṣyate, nāpi parāmṛṣṭa iti । kleśakarmavipākāśayāsaṁbandhī(ndhayegī)tyarthaḥ ॥

kaivalyaṁ prāptāstarhi santi ca bahavaḥ kevalinaḥ। te hi trīṇi bandhanāni cchittvā kaivalyaṁ prāptā īśvarasya ca tatsaṁbandho na bhūto na bhāvī। yathā muktasya pūrvā bandhakoṭiḥ prajñāyate naivamīśvarasya। yathā vā prakṛtilīnasyottarā bandhakoṭiḥ saṁbhāvyate naivamīśvarasya। sa tu sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiveśvara iti।

vivaraṇam
sūtrārthaviśuddhiṁ kurvannāha- [kaivalyaṁ prāptastarhīti ।] kleśādyaparāmarśasya kādācitkatayā'pi saṁbhavāt । [santi bahavaḥ kevalinaḥ] kiṁ tadī[te'pī]śvarā iti ? । parāmarśasyāpi saṁbhavānna ta ekāntena kleśādibhiraparāmṛṣṭāḥ । parāmarśāparāmarśī hi staḥ teṣām । īśvaratvaparāmṛṣṭa eva । na hyanavadhṛtaḥ śabdārtho lakṣaṇatvenopādeya: aparāmṛṣṭa iti । tasmādya ekāntenāparāmṛṣṭaḥ evāparāmṛṣṭa ityucyate ॥
[te hi trīṇi bandhanāni] prākṛtavaikṛtadākṣiṇāni samyagdarśanena hitvā [kaivalyaṁ prāptāḥ । īścarasya tu tatsaṁbandhaḥ] kleśādisaṁbandho na [bhūto yathā muktasya bhāvī bandha koṭi] rmuktatvopapattereva jñāyate । bandhapūrvakā hi muktiḥ । [nāpi bhāvī ।] yathā [prakṛtilīnasya ।] tasya hyanārabdhasaṁsārasya [uttarā bandhakoṭiḥ sambhāvyate ।] pravṛttasaṁsārasya cāprakṛtilīnacittasya sā(samā)dhikāratvāt pūrvottarabandhakoṭī saṁbhavataḥ । tadidaṁ sarvamatrāparāmṛṣṭa iti kālāvivakṣāpradarśanārtham । [sa tu sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiveścaraḥ ॥]
yo'sau prakṛṣṭasattvopādānādīśvarasya śāśvatika utkarṣaḥ sa kiṁ sanimitta āhosvinnirnimitta iti। tasya śāstraṁ nimittam। śāstraṁ punaḥ kiṁnimittaṁ, prakṛṣṭasattvanimittam।

vivaraṇam
tatra puruṣaviśeṣa īśvara ityuktatvāt, īśvarasya puruṣasyānaiścaryadharmatvāt, cittasya caiścaryadharmatvāt, nirātiśayaiśvaryasya ca prakṛṣṭacittasaṁbandhāpekṣatvāt prāptamevottarārthamanuvadati- [yo'sau prakṛṣṭasattvopādānādīśvarasya śāśvatika utkarṣa iti ।] nityaniratiśayasarvajñānaiśvaryaśaktisampattirutkarṣaḥ ॥
tatra pratijñāviśuddhayarthaṁ praśnapūrvamupakramate-- [sa kiṁ sanimitta ahosvinnirnimitta iti ।] nimittaśabdaḥ kāraṇaparyāyaḥ । sa kiṁ sakāraṇa āhettvinniṣkāraṇa iti । kiñcātaḥ ? yadi tāvat sakāraṇastadā sadaiveśvara ityayuktam, anityatvāt । atha niṣkāraṇaḥ, tathā cotkarṣasya kāryatvādasattvaprasaṅgaḥ । na hi niṣkāraṇaṁ kāryai dṛśyate loke ॥
atrocyate-na niṣkāraṇaḥ [śāstranimittatvāt । śāsraṁ] jñānam । śāstrasya hetutvāt । yataḥ sarvaviṣayaṁ jñānaṁ nityaṁ dravyasvabhāvasādhyasādhanavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭāspadam ॥
yadyevaṁ jñānasyānyato'dhigamapūrvatvātprāganutkarṣaḥ prāpta ityata āha- [śāstraṁ punaḥ kiṁnnimittamiti ।] yadi svābhāvikaṁ jñānaṁ, mattonmattajñānavadanutkarṣahetutvam । atha punaḥ sanimittakaṁ, nimittāt prāganutkarṣa iti manyate ॥
na tāvannirnimittam । yataḥ [prakṛṣṭasattvanimittaṁ] prakṛṣṭasattvāśrayamiti yāvat । ata eva svabhāvajñānadoṣābhāvaḥ ॥
kiñca - svābhāvikajñānatve'pi na mattādijñānavadapakarṣahetutvam । nityamuktakleśādisattvāśrayatvāt । tatra yathaiva jñānasaṁskārasmṛtiprabandhānāmanyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena bījāṅkuravadanādisaṁbandhaḥ, tathaiva śāstraprakarṣayorīśvaracetasi nityapravṛttaprabandharūpeṇa pravartamānayoranādyantaḥ saṁbandhaḥ । tatrotkarṣo jñānasya kāryemeva । jñānamapi tasya kāraṇameva ॥
anyeṣāṁ vyākhyānam-nimittaśabdaḥ pramāṇavācī । [tasya śāstraṁ nimittaṁ] pramāṇam , tena hi tadutkarṣaḥ pramīyate । śāstraṁ punaḥ kiṁpramāṇakam ? īśvaranirmalasattvapramāṇam । viśuddhasattvapraṇītatvāddhi śāstrasya prāmāṇyam ? yathā manvādīnām । tathā ca śrutiḥ-‘yakiṁcinmanurabhyavadattadbheṣajam' iti । yathā ca loke guruṇā'bhihitamiti ॥

etayoḥ śāstrotkarṣayorīśvarasattve vartamānayoranādiḥ saṁbandhaḥ। etasmādetadbhavati sadaiveśvaraḥ sadaiva mukta iti। tacca tasyaiśvaryaṁ sāmyātiśayavinirmuktam। na tāvadaiśvaryāntareṇa tadatiśayate। yadevātiśayi syāttadeva tatsyāt। tasmādyatra kāṣṭhāprāptiraiśvaryasya sa īśvara iti। na ca tatsamānamaiśvaryamasti। kasmāt, dvayostulyayorekasminyugapatkāmite'rthe navamidamastu purāṇamidamastvityekasya siddhāvitarasya prākāmyavighātādūnatvaṁ prasaktam। dvayośca tulyayoryugapatkāmitārthaprāptirnāsti। arthasya viruddhatvāt। tasmādyasya sāmyātiśayairvinirmuktamaiśvaryaṁ sa eveśvaraḥ। sa ca puruṣaviśeṣa iti ॥ 24 ॥

vivaraṇam
[etayoḥ śāsrotkarṣayoḥ] pramāṇaprameyatayā [nirādyantaḥ sambandhaḥ ॥]
nanu ca naiveśvarasatva[a]vartamānena śākheṇa tadutkarṣaḥ pramīyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । tatprabhavatvāttatra vartamānam । varta(māna)ta eva tatprabhavamapi śāsraṁ tasmin sarvajñatvādeva । loke'pi yato yatprabhavati vartate tattasmin, yathā tantvādiṣu paṭādi । tatprabhavatvamanumānāgamābhyāmavagamyate । śāstrapramāṇakaḥ utkarṣaḥ, īśvarabhramāṇakaṁ śāstramiti bhinnāśrayatvācchāsrotkarṣayornetaretarāśrayatvam ॥
nanu ca śāstrādīśvaraprāmāṇyaṁ, tatprāmāṇyācca śāstraprāmāṇyamiti syādanyonyāśrayatvam-ucyate-īśvaraprāmāṇyasyānumānena siddhatvādadoṣaḥ ॥
[etasmādetadbhavati ।] kasmāt ? īśvaraprakṛṣṭasattvāśrayayorniratiśayajñānotkarṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpe prabandhanityatayā nityatvādetadbhavati- [sa tu sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiveśvara iti ।] (ityatrāha) [tacca tasyaiścaryaṁ sāmyātiśayavimuktamiti] vakṣyamāṇapramāṇaphalam । etatsūtrapiṇḍārtho vā ॥
atiśayavimuktatāṁ vyācaṣṭe - [na tāvadaiśvaryāntareṇa tadatiśayyate ।] kutaḥ? [yadevaiśvaryāntaraṁ tadatiśayānaṁ] manyase [tadeva tat] aiśvaryaṁ mayā'bhihitam । yatraivaiśvaryantarātiśāyi bhavatyaiśvaryaṁ sa eveśvara iti yāvat । [na ca tatsamānamaiśvaryamasti ।] samānadharmaprakarṣāsaṁbhavāt ॥
na hyekasmin rājye dvayoḥ saṁbhavo rājñoḥ । ekasya vā dve rājye । tathā pratipādayati-taddvayostutyatvaṁ prasaktam । na hyekasyānyataratra prākāmyamabādhitvā anyatarasmin pravṛttirupapadyate । dvayośca yugapadekārthayorekasya prākāmyeṇa pravṛttireva nāsti । prakāmite vastuni samānaprakarṣasyārthasya viruddhatvāt ॥ yena ca samānaprakarṣatā tasya tenaiva sa bādhyate । (te ca) tava na vācā bādhanamitarasya rūpātiśayā āvṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante । sāmānyāni tvatiśayaiḥ saha vartanta iti vakṣyāmaḥ ॥
tasmādyasya sāmyātiśayaviproṣitamaiśvaryaṁ sa īśvara iti pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ siddhaḥ ॥ 24 ॥
kiṁ ca –
tatra niratiśayaṁ sarvajñabījam ॥ 25 ॥

yadidamatītānāgatapratyutpannapratyekasamuccayātīndriyagrahaṇamalpaṁ bahviti sarvajñabījametadvivardhamānaṁ yatra niratiśayaṁ sa sarvajñaḥ। asti kāṣṭhāprāptiḥ sarvajñabījasya sātiśayatvātparimāṇavaditi। yatra kāṣṭhāprāptirjñānasya su sarvajñaḥ। sa ca puruṣaviśeṣa iti।

vivaraṇam
yathāpratijñātasyeśvarasya siddhau pramāṇamupanyasyate- [tatra niratiśayaṁ sarvajñabījam । tatra] tasmin yathāpratijñātalakṣaṇa [īśvare niratiśayaṁ] bhavitumarhati । kiṁ taditi ? [yadidam] avyabhicāri pratyakṣānumānajñānam [atīta] viṣayam [anāgata] viṣayaṁ (vartamānakāla) [pratyutpanna] [viṣaya]matītādi [samuccaya] viṣayam [atīndri] yaviṣayaṁ ca । atīndriyayoratītānāgatayoḥ saṁbhavādatīndriya[grahaṇa]mityucyate ॥
taccātīndriyagrahaṇaṁ trividham-sūkṣmaviṣayaṁ vyavahitaviṣayaṁ viprakṛṣṭaviṣayañca । [alpaṁ bahniti ।] yathāprasiddha [metadvivardhamānaṁ] sātiśayatvena [sarvajñabījaṁ] yathā । dhūmavijñānamagnivijñānasya । katham ? yatra prakarṣakāṣṭhāṁ pratipadyate । jñānasya jñātrāśrayatvāt [yatre] ti jñātocyate-yasmin jñātarīti । [sa savaijñaḥ] siddhaḥ ॥
tathā śaktirapi sātiśayatvena vivardhamānā yatra kāṣṭhāṁ prāpnoti, sa sarvaśaktiḥ । tena jagannirmāṇasthāpanopasaṁhādikartṛtvasiddhiḥ । tathaiśvaryasyāpi vardhamānasya yatra kāṣṭhāprāptiḥ, sa parameśvaraḥ । tataśca aśaktyādiviparyayadoṣābhāvasiddhiḥ ॥
athāpi syāt-ajñānasyāpi vivardhamānasya svabhāvasiddhasya kāṣṭhāprāptasya tasminnīśvare siddhiriti-na-jñānāvirodhāt । na hi jñānājñānayorviruddhayorekasminnabhisaṁyogo'sti । na hi jñāne prakarṣavati tatrājñānaṁ saṁbhavati ॥
yatra hi jyotirvivardhate tatra tamo'pakṛṣyata eva । viparyayo'pīti cet- tacca na-sati jyotiṣi tamaso'nupalambhāt । vidyamānaṁ hi tamo jyotiṣā tiraskriyate, na kadācidvidyamānaṁ jyotistamasā'bhibhūyate ।
yadapi jaladharoparodhāt prāvṛṣi raveradarśanam, tadapi dṛṣṭivyavadhānamātram । na punaḥ prakāśa eva tirodhīyate tamovat । tasmānna, yatra jñānavivṛddhistatrājñānasya bhāvaḥ savitarīva tamasaḥ । nityātyantatirohitarajastame.oguṇasattvopādānāt ॥
kiñca- nājñānasyāvastuviṣayatvādvivṛddhiḥ saṁbhavati । jñānasya jñeyavastuviṣayatvādabhivṛddhayupapattiḥ । ajñānasya hi vastuviṣayatve jñānatvaprāptiḥ ॥
yaścāpi sthāvarādiṣvajñānaprakarṣa iti, nāsau prakarṣaḥ । atyantajñānābhāvāpekṣayā hi sa ucyate । ajñānasya prakarṣe hi satyajñānasahasrasya na jñānenaikena bādhaḥ syāt । tathā[dā]hi pratyajñānaṁ jñānenotpannenānekena bādhanaṁ syāt । tasmānnājñānasya prakarṣaḥ svarūpeṇa ॥
yasya hi sātiśayatvaṁ tasya kāṣṭhāpraptirdṛśyate । yathā phalādiparimāṇānāmākāśaparyantatā । tathā sarvajñabījamapi parāṁ kāṣṭhāṁ prātumarhati ॥
samastaṁ vyastaṁ ca sarvaṁ vastujātamekasya pratyakṣaṁ, jñeyatvāt, ghaṭādivat ॥
jñānāviṣayatvena puruṣārthatvāt, ghaṭādivadeva ॥
utpattimatī ca pṛthivī, sāvayavatvāt, ghaṭādivat ॥
prāṇikarmatatsādhanaphalavibhāgavideka(gadhaika)niṣpāditaṁ jagat, tadupabhogyasthānādiracanā-viśeṣavatvāta prāsādādivat ॥
anekaprāṇyupabhogavijñānavadekanirvartitā pṛthivī, anekaprāṇavadupabhogyatvāt vrīhiyavādivat ॥
anekaprayojanārthinā ekena nirmitā pṛthivī, gṛhādivadeva ॥
sarvaprāṇyāśrayo girinadīsamudāyaḥ tannivāsiparibhogayogyavijñānavadekakuśalotpāditaḥ, prakṛtahetunidarśanābhyāmeva ॥
anekaprāṇabhākprakāśādisāmarthyajñānavatā ekena nirvartitaḥ savitā, prakāśātmakatvāt pradīpādivat ॥
niyatakālamādityodayāstamayādisañcaraṇam etatprayojanajñānavadekaprayuktaṁ, pratiniyatakālatvāt, kṛṣyādivat ॥
buddhimadekeśvaraprayuktā sūryagrahacandranakṣatrādipravṛttiḥ, pravṛtterduḥkhātmakatve sati niyatasamayatvāt, dharmajñaśiṣyabhṛtyādipravṛttivat ॥
candramaso vṛddhikṣayau tithyādikālajñānavataikena prayuktau, kālaparicchedakatvāt, ghaṭikā[harā]divat । kālaparicchedajñānavataikena nirvartitaścandramā:, vṛddhikṣayayuktatvāt, ghaṭikādivadeva ॥
buddhimadekasvāmikaṁ jagat, anyonyaviruddhasaṁhatānekaprāṇināyakādhiṣṭhitabahumaṇḍalatvāt, itthaṁjātīyakaikarājyavat ॥
sarvametatsādhanasādhyavyāpārāvasthaṁ pratyakṣaṁ kasyacidekasya, avāntaravirodhānugrahavattayaikaprayojanatvāt, sāṁgrāmavastuvat ॥
saṁhatatvāt, kulālādivastuvat । saiva pratijñā ॥
yugapacca sarvaṁ pratyakṣameka(ta)sya, anekatve (tva)sakṣyanyonyasaṁbandhāt, prasiddhasambandhānekārthavat ॥
agnihotrādisādhanasādhanīye kasyacitpratyakṣe, sādhyasādhanarūpatvāt , bhujitṛptivat ॥
sarvāḥ śaktayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ, vastutvāt, ghaṭādivat ॥
a[vā]ntarapratibandhābhāve sarvaṁ vastujātaṁ nairantaryeṇa kasyacit pratyakṣaṁ, śabdādimattvena sambandhāt, drāghīyasīmiva śaṣkulīṁ bhakṣayataḥ śabdādayaḥ ॥
svatantratayā kenacidekena sarvaṁ pratyakṣata upalabhyate, jñeyatvenābhimatatvāt, nāṭyavastuvat ॥
apratibandhena kasyacit pratyakṣopalabhyaṁ sarvam, aneka(satve)tve satyanyonyasaṁbandhāt, nāṭyasaṁbandhinartakādivat ॥
saṁsārarahitaḥ sarvajñaḥ, ajñānābhāvāt, muktātmavat । kleśādirahita īśvaraḥ, apratibandhajñānatvāt, siddhayogivat ॥
etena kleśādipratibandhājñānarahitatvena cakṣurādīndriyagrāmanirapekṣasarvaviṣayajñānatvaṁ siddham । sarvārthagrahaṇasamarthasya parameśvaracittasya sarvavyāpino yugapatsarvaviṣayayogitvāt । evaṁ sati samastavastugrahaṇābhāve kāraṇābhā(vānu)vopapatiḥ ॥
nāpi mūrtimatpratibandho'pyākāśavadeva sarvaviṣayayogino'pi cittasya । viṣayānavasthānādāvirbhāvatirobhāvasmṛtisaṁkalpānavasthitatvopapattiḥ । viṣayākāratayā vṛttilābhādarkaprabhāvat ॥
na hi kleśādyāvaraṇāvacchannaṁ cittasatvam, tasyādharmādiyogāt । sarvagatasya sarvārthasyāpi satvasyādharmādipratibandhakaniruddhasvakīyapravṛttimārgatvādindriyādidvārāpekṣitvamupapadyate । yathā apavarakādyāvaraṇāvṛtaḥ pradīpastadāvaraṇagatacchidradvāreṇa bahiḥ prakāśayati । sa eva tu pradīpaḥ prabhinnāpavarakāvaraṇaḥ sannanapekṣya tattacchidramārgaṁ samantataḥ prakāśayati ॥
tathaiveśvarasatvaṁ kleśādyāvaraṇayogābhāvādasati viṣayaviśeṣānirodhikāraṇe yugapadaśeṣārthagrahaṇam । tataśca svātilaṅghanānatilaṅghanādidoṣābhāvaḥ ॥
sarvasya viṣayatvāt sarvamekeśvaraṁ jagat, paripālakāpekṣasthānādyanekavastuviśeṣatvāt, prasiddhevaṁbhūtaikarājyavat ॥
tathā, niyatasthitihetvanekopakaraṇavattvāt, anyonyābhibhavanīyaprabhūtataradurgayuktānekadeśatvāt, abhaṅguravyavasthaśarīrabhedavatvācca, pratītaivaṁvidhaikarājyavat ॥
anekakartṛbhoktṛkriyāsādhanaphalasaṁbandhaviśeṣajñānavadupadiṣṭāni varṇāśramādyanuṣṭhānāni, phalārthibhiḥ pratyavāyabhīrubhistaiścānuṣṭhīyamānatvāt, bhaiṣajyarasāyanādyanuṣṭhānavat ।
tathā tadupadeśāḥ, parārthatvāt, upadetvāt, vidvacchraddheyatvāt, upadeśādṛte manuṣyānavagamyārthatvācca, bhaiṣajyādyupadeśavat ॥
śarīrendriyāṇi sarvatatprayojanavidekanimittakāraṇābhinirvartitāni, niyatakriyāsthitihetusādhanavatvāt, prāsādagṛhadāruyantrādivat ॥
atrābhidhīyate-svābhāvikī tāvanna bhavati pṛthivyādiracanā । dṛṣṭānto naiva tatsādhanasya vidyate । kaṇṭakādīnāṁ ca taikṣṇyaṁ na svābhāvikamabhyupeyate ॥
agnyādīnāmivauṣṇyādi svabhāvo vastudharmatvāddhetoḥ pṛthivyādiracaneti cet-prāsādādiracanāyā vastudharmatvāt syādānaikāntikatvam ॥
atha svābhāvikatvāditi cet-asiddhatvam, jagadracanāyā dharmādharmaphalopabhegārthaprayuktatvābhyupagamāt । kartṛdharmādharmastitvamupariṣṭāt sādhayiṣyate ॥
tasmāt pṛthivyādiracanā svābhāvikī na bhavati, prāṇyupabhegārthatvāt , prāsādādiracanāvat । candrādipravṛtirna svābhāvikī, pravṛtitvāt, asmadādipravṛttivat ॥
asmadādipravṛtirapi svābhāvikīti cet-na-agnyuṣṇatvavānityatvaprasaṅgāt । na hyagnyuṣṇatvaṁ svābhāvikaṁ sanniyataṁ nimittamātmalābhāya kāṅkṣati dharmisattāvyatirekeṇa । kriyāphalaracanādīnāṁ tu viśiṣṭanimittākāṅkṣaṇamātmapratilambhāyati na svābhāvikatvam ॥
niyatanimittākāṅkṣaṇamapi prāsādādiracanānāṁ svabhāva iti vet— astu tathāvidhasvabhāvatvam । tathā'pi pṛthivyādiracanāyā niyatanimittākāṅkṣaṇasvabhāvatvaṁ prāsādādivadeva । tataśva nāmni vipratipatirna doṣāya, kārakāntarāpekṣatvāditi pratijñā pratirūpakāriṇī ca ॥
bhavadbhiruktani [anumānāni] lokānumāgamavirodhāt [apramāṇāni] । anumānavirodhaṁ tāvat sātiśayatvādibhyo brūmaḥ ॥
āgamavirodhaṁ ca [“yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit” “eko vaśī”] ityevamādibhyaḥ samācakṣmahe ॥
samastale.okavirodhaṁ cāpi । sarva evānārīge.opālaṁ saṁvyavaharamāṇāḥ satataṁ śivanārāyaṇādināmnā praṇihitacetasaḥ pratiṣedhatsvapi saṁbhinnabuddhiṣu akarṇīkṛtatatpratiṣedhaviṣayapallavāḥ parameśvaraṁ praṇatamūrdhānaḥ kusumāñjaliprabhṛtibhirarcayanti । phalaṁ cāpi tata eva prārthayante ॥
atha cedbrūyāt - sarvajñābhāvapratipādibhirasmadanumānairitarapratijñānāṁ virodha iti - atrocyate –
naitānyanumānāni । katham ? prathamaṁ tāvat pratijñaiva duṣṭā । yadi tāvadīśvaraśabdārthaḥ sarvajño na bhavatīti yuṣmadabhipreta īśvara ucyeta, tathā ca siddhasādhyatā syāt ॥
athāsmadabhipretaḥ, tathāpi yuṣmākamasiddhaviśeṣyatā bhavet ॥
atheśvaratvasyāsarvajñatvamucyate, tathāpi siddhaṁ sādhyate ॥
tathaivābhyupagamavirodho'pi । katham ? aiśvaryasarvajñabījatvayorvivardhamānatvāt kāṣṭhāprāpti: parimāṇavadevābhyupagamanīyā । tathā kāṣṭhāprāptaiśvaryasarvajñatvavācināvapīśvarasarvajñaśabdāveṣitavyau । kāṣṭhāpraptiśca niravadhikatvam । yathā parimāṇādīnāmātmākāśādyanantaparimāṇāntatvam । tathā cānumānābhyupagamasvavacanavirodhāḥ syuḥ ॥
kiñcānyat-kāṣṭhāprāteśvaratvasya ca śabdārthasya parityāge śabdārthavādaḥ prāpnoti । na hi śabdaḥ parityaktābhidheyaikadeśa uccaritaḥ ॥
atha parimāṇāderapi niravadhikaniṣṭhatvaṁ neṣyate-siddhāntavirodhaḥ । ātmākāśādīnāṁ hi sarvagatatvābhāve, madhyamaparimāṇatvānityatvādidoṣaprasaṅgaśca । athāpyātmanaḥ sarvatra kāryadarśanāt sarvagatatvam, tatrāpi śakunyādyātmanāṁ manuṣyagocarākāśādigatatvaṁ sāmānyato dṛṣṭādevānumānāt syāt । tathā cehāpi sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānatvaṁ kena vāryate ॥
athānumānavirodhānnāvadhāryata iti cet-ātmādīnāmapi prameyatvavastutvādibhyaḥ pṛthivyādivadityanumānavirodhodbhāvanā śakyate [kartum] vaktum । na ca tāvatā'trānumānavirodhitvam, anumānābhāvaprasaṅgāt ॥
tathā anumānābhāva iṣyata iti cet---pratyakṣe'pyanāśvāsaḥ syāt । atha niścīyamānabuddhyutpatteḥ pratyakṣapramāṇatvam, anumānasyāpi tarhi niścitabuddhisamudbhavādastu prāmāṇyam । atha dṛṣṭasambandhadhūmādiviṣayamevānumānamiti cet-tatrāpyanumānābhāva eva - anagniḥ dhūmavān predaśaḥ, pratyakṣānupalabhyamānāgnisambandhe sati pradeśatvāt, agniśūnyopalabhyamānapradeśavaditi ॥
atha pramāṇāntarasaṁvādādadṛṣṭasambandhaviṣaye'numānasyānumānatvamucyate, pratyakṣamapi pramāṇāntarasaṁvādāt pramāṇaṁ bhavet, pramāṇatvāt, anumānavadeva । apramāṇaṁ syāt । pramāṇāntarasaṁvādābhāvāt, sāmānyato dṛṣṭādivaditi । tasmānna sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya pramāṇatvaṁ niścitabuddhitvādbādhituṁ śakyam ॥
kiṁ ca – sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya mānatvamanabhyupagacchataḥ svaśarīramaraṇasambandhalakṣaṇasyānupalabdhapūrvatvāt sarpādibhyo bhayānupapattiḥ । vyādhipratīkārāya cikitsādiprayogo na ghaṭeta । maraṇaśaṅkākāraṇābhāvāt । tathā janmanopyupalambhābhāvādātmaśarīrasyājatvaṁ cintyeta । hānopādānaniyogābhāvaśca syāt ॥
tasmāt sāmānyato dṛṣṭaparimāṇatvādisātiśayatvasāmānyādīśvarajñānaniravadhikatvasiddhiḥ ॥
kiṁ cānyat-īśvarasarvajñatvasya pratiṣiddhyamānatvāt sattvābhyupagamaḥ, a(nupa)padārthasya pratiṣedhāsambhavāt । na hi kevalo neti (na) prayujyate । īśvaraḥ sarvajño na bhavatītyucyate । tatra kvacit sarvajñatvamabhyupagataṁ bhavati ॥
tadyathā-śaśasya viṣāṇaṁ nāsti, vandhyāyāḥ suto nāsti, kusumamākāśasya nāstīti kvacidvidyamānānameva viṣāṇasutakusumādīnāṁ śaśādisaṁbanvena pratiṣedhaḥ, tadvadihāpi syāt ॥
kiṁ ca-īśvaraḥ sarvajño na bhavatīti, īśvaraśabdārthasarvajñatvasambandhapratiṣedhādinā īśvarādanyasya sarvajñatvābhyupagamaḥ । sambandhināvanabhyupagamya sambandhapratiṣedho hi na śakyaḥ kartum ॥
sa eṣa yuktaḥ sambandhaḥ pratiṣidhyate, ayuktaścābhyupagamyate । tatpariśramamātram । īśvarasarvajñayoḥ prasiddhapadārthayorapratiṣedhāt । na hyanantaparimāṇamākāśaṁ na bhavatītyākāśasya prasiddhamanantaparimāṇatvaṁ pratiṣidhyāprasiddhānantaparimāṇatveṣu ghaṭādiṣu tat vyavasthāpayituṁ yuktam ॥
atha sanbandhināveveśvarasarvajñatve pratiṣidhyete, svavacanavirodhinī pratijñā syāt । īśvarasarvajñatvayorīśvarasarvajñaśabdārthatvābhyupagamāt । na bhavatyagniragniśabdārtho na bhavatīti ॥
athāprasiddhapadārthāvīśvarasarvajñaśabdau, tathā'pi tadarthapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ । aprasiddhasyārthasya prāptyabhāvāt । na hi kiṁcidaprasiddhametacchikhare meṣakuṭumbinīṁ pratiṣeddhumarhati । kiṁ ca śabdopādānānarthakyaṁ ca । aprasiddhapadārthatvāt ॥
atha prasiddhārthayorīśvarasarvajñaśabdayorniravadhikeśvarasarvajñatvābhyāmaprasiddhābhyāṁ gaganasyeva kusumaiḥ saṁbandhaḥ kaiścit kalpitaḥ, sa pratiṣidhyeta-tathā'pyabhyupetārthapratiṣedhāt svavacanavirodhinyeva pratijñā syāt । sātiśayaniratiśayānekeśvarasarvajñavyaktimatsāmānyayorīśvarasarvajñaśabdārthavenābhyupagamāt ॥
prasiddhaṁ hi loke īśvarasarvajñaśabdayorutkarṣopakarṣayuktānekavyaktiviṣayabuddhyutpādakatvam । na hi grāmādhipatirīśvara iti dvitrigrāmaviṣayādhipataya uttarottareśvarā na bhavanti । yo vā kuṭumbādhipatirīśvaro na bhavati sarvaiścāsāvarthavānīśvaraśabdaḥ ॥
tathā vaiyākaraṇaḥ sarvajña ityukte nādhikavijñānayukto na bhavati । niravadhikau sāvadhikau veśvarasarvajñāvīśvarasarvajñaśabdayorarthāvabhyupagamyeyātām । atastatpratiṣedhādabhyupagamavirodhinī pratijñā syāt, ātmākāśādīnāṁ mahattvasya mahacchabdārthatvapratiṣedhavat ॥
atheśvarasarvajñau niravadhikau na sta:, anupalabhyamānatvāt, anīśvaradvitīyaśirovadityucyeta, tathā'pi śabdārthābhyupagamādabhyupagamāvirodhinī pratijñā ॥
sātiśayatvādibhiraiśvaryasarvajñatvabījādiliṅgairniravadhikeśvarasarvajñatvayorupalabhyamānatvaniravadhikaparimāṇatvavadityasiddhiranupalabdheḥ ॥
atha aviśeṣyaiveśvaraśabdārthaḥ sarvaijño na bhavatītyucyeta vastutvādihetubhirasmadādivaditi, tadā sarvapramāṇavirodhinī pratijñā syāt । prasiddheśvaraśabdārthasya prākṛtasarvajñatvasya sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāt । yathā īśvaraśabdārthaḥ [sarvajño na bhavati] prameyatvādibhirhetubhirghaṭādivadityukte yat brūyāttadevāhaṁ vakṣyāmi ॥
iha sarvajñaśūnyaṁ jagat । kālī vā diśa ākāśaṁ vā prāṇimaddeśo vā prāṇino vā sarve sarvajñaśūnyāḥ । pramāṇāni vā sarvāṇi sarvajñāviṣayāṇi । pramātāro vā sarvajñasyāpratipattāra:, ityevaṁjātīyāsu pratijñāsu niravadhikeśvare sarvajñe vā pratiṣidhyamāne, prasiddheśvarasarvajñaśabdārthābhyupagamavirodhāḥ pratijñādoṣā vacanīyāḥ ॥
nanu ca vandhyāsuto nāstīti, tacchūnyaṁ jagat kālo veti, pratijñāyamāne yathoktapratijñādoṣaprāptirbhavet - naiṣa doṣaḥ- vandhyāsutasattālakṣaṇasya pratiṣeddhavyasya vākyārthasyeśvarasarvajñaśabdārthavadaprasiddhatvāt kevalaśabdaprāpitasannidhānabuddhimātrapratipanne padārtha [padārtha pratiṣedha] vyāpāro'stīti vandhyāsutastitvasya (vā nāstitvasya) nābhyupagamo'sti । tato nābhyupagatapratiṣedhadoṣaḥ ॥
nanu ceśvaraḥ sarvajño na bhavatītyatrāpi buddhimātraṁ prāpyamāṇaṁ pratiṣidhyate, na kacidapi prāpnuvadvastu (na) pratiṣeddhuṁ śakyate pratihastineva hastī । yadi ca nañā vastu nirākariṣyate, nañmātreṇaiśvaravādipakṣatvamapi[pakṣo'pi]nirākariṣyate, (ataḥ) tasmādihāpi buddhimātrapratiṣedha iti nābhyupagatapratiṣedhaḥ pratijñādoṣaḥ ॥
satyamevam । kiṁ tvasti viśeṣaḥ । pramāṇasiddhavastuviṣayā buddhirvastvantare kālaviśeṣe vā pratiṣidhyate vastusāmānyāt prāpnuvatī yathā ghaṭo nāstīti । kvacidvināpyarthena buddhireva śabdapratyupanītasannidhānā kalpitavastvantarā pratiṣidhyate । yathā vandhyāsutī nāstīti ॥
yatra tu pramāṇāntarasiddhasadvastupratiṣedhastatrāpi[sti]abhyupagatārthapratiṣedhadoṣaḥ । yathā īśvaraśabdārthaḥ sarvajño na bhavatīti । īśvarasarvajñaśabdayorabhivardhamāneśvarasarvajñavyaktyanugatasāmānyavacanatvena liṅgena niravadhikeśvarasarvajñasattāvadyotitvaṁ siddhameva । mahadbahusarvānantaparimāṇādiśabdavat ॥
yathaivaite mahadādiśabdāḥ prasiddhasātiśayamahadādyanugatasāmānyārthābhidhāyinaḥ santo niravadhikamahadvahusarvānantaparimāṇavyaktīnāmastitvāvadyotanaliṅgā bhavanti । mahadādisāmānyānāṁ sātiśayavyaktyanugatānāṁ niravadhikamahadādivyaktivyāpana(ravyākṣīṇa)śaktitvāt । na hi santaṁ vyāpyamarthaṁ tadvaddhyāpakaḥ sannartho na vyāpnotīti । niravadhikāttu paro vyāpyo nāstīti vyāpakasya sāmānyasya kṣayaḥ vyāpyaviṣayatvenaiva prasiddhatvāttatra । tasmāt pramāṇasiddhatvādīśvarasarvajñaśabdāthayorabhāvaṁ sādhayato'bhyupagatārthapratiṣedha eveti duṣṭā pratijñā ॥
na ceśvarasarvajñaśabdayoratadarthavamanyārthatvaṁ vā karta viktuṁ śakyate । tathā śatijñānaiśvayaṇāṁ pratipururṣa samucitānāṁ sātiśayānāṁ niravadhika tatrva ataḥ[nānunmattaḥjpratiṣeddhumutsahetetyanumānavirodhitvaṁ pratijñāyāḥ ॥
kiṁ cānyat- pari[para]kalpitasyeśvarasya pratiṣedhaṁ kurvantaḥ pratyakṣaparacittāniṣṭāḥ prāpnuvanti । paravākyāditi cenna - sātiśayatvādisarvajñasādhakaliṅgapratipādakavadaviśiṣṭatvāt paravākyasya । tādṛśavākyārthapratiṣedhe cābhyupagatapratiṣedhaḥ, pūrvavadevānumānavirodhaśca ॥
kiṁ ca - prameyatvādihetūnāmapi asiddhatvam । kutaḥ ? asmābhirniratiśayajñānaiśvaryaviśiṣṭatvasyābhyupagatatvāt । atha svayamapi tādṛśamabhyupagacchettadā । sarvajñasiddhiḥ, abhyupagatatvāt ॥
kiṁ cānyat-abhyupagatatādṛkpratiṣedhe, yathā ghaṭo ghaṭo na bhavati, vastutvāt, paṭavāditi, evamihāpi syāt ॥
kiṁ ca-niravadhikasyānabhyupagame, prameyavādīnām [a]pakṣadharmatvamāśrayāsiddhatvaṁ ca । tadabhyupagame hi kiṁ sādhyaṁ bhavet ? yo hi tṛptavantaṁ brūyāt mā'trātsīriti, kiṁ tena kṛtaṁ syāt ॥
athāpi syāt--niravadhikamīśvaramabhisandhāya tasya sarvajñatvaṁ niṣedhāmīti । naidatapi yuktam -sarvajñatvasyapi niravadhikatvāt ॥
api ca sātiśayaiśvaryasarvajñatvayorutkarṣānutkarṣaviṣayatvena vyabhicārānneśvarasarvajñaśabdamukhyābhidheyatvam । yathā mahadādayaḥ śabdā vyabhicaritamahattvādiṣu ghaṭādiṣvamukhyāḥ, nākāśādiṣu, tathaivātrāpi niratiśayamaiśvaryaṁ sarvajñatvaṁ cāvyabhicārīti sa eva mukhyaḥ śabdārthaḥ । na ca mukhyanirākaraṇaṁ sādhimānamṛcchati ॥
kiṁ ca-yathā bhavatā anumānāgamaprasiddheśvarasya prameyatvādidharmavikalpatayā sarvajñatvaṁ nirākriyate, tathaiva prameyatvādibhiracetanatvamapi ghaṭādivadeva prāpnuyāt । avirodhāt । yathā prameyatvaṁ[a]sarvajñatvena vyāptamevamacetanatvādibhirapi ॥
pratyakṣavirodha iti cet-ihāpi anumānāgamavirodhaṁ kiṁ kaṭākṣeṇāpi nekṣase ॥
nāpi ca prameyatvādidharmasāmānyena sapakṣe vipakṣe vā kiñcit । kvacidadhyāropayituṁ śakyam । vastuviṣaye sarvatra prameyatvādīnāmāstitvāt । na matimohanārthaḥ prameyatvādyupanyāsaḥ ॥ atha ātmatvāditi cet, muktātmavadajñatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādbhavadīśvarāṇām । pratyakṣādivirodha iti cet-atrāpyanumānādivirodhaḥ pūrvavadeva ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatkālayorapi īśvarasyānupalabdhāra itīdānīntaneśvarāṇāmupailabdhṛbhiranaikāntike prāṇitvādityādi । kiṁ ca atītānāgatakālayorapi sātiśayatvādiliṅgairupalabdhavanta upalapsyamānāśca prāṇinaḥ pramāṇakuśalāḥ, pramāṇakuśalatvāt, asmadādivat । atha aśarīratvādasarvajñaḥ, muktākāśādivat iti cet-na-saśarīratvāt । vyaktāvyaktaṁ hi sarvamaśarīraṁ saśarīratvādanityeśvaratvaṁ dharmādyapekṣatvādityuktatvāditi cet – na – śarīratvāt । saśarīrāśarīratvavirodha iti cet – na – muktamucyamānaikātmano'śarīratvasaśarīratvadarśanāt । tatra bhinnakālatvādavirodha iti cet-na- atrāpi bhinnakālābhyupagamāt ॥
kiṁ ca-yugapadīśvaratvādeva dvayasambhavaḥ । sakaraṇatā akaraṇatā'pi īśvaratvādeva yuktā । tathā ca śrutayaḥ- [“aśarīraṁ śarīreṣu”] iti । tathā [“yaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhan”] iti । tathā [“yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit”] ityādayaḥ ॥
śrutīnāṁ vipratiṣedhārthavādīśvarāpratyāyakatvam iti cet-na-ananyaśeṣatvāt । na hi karmaśeṣatve śrutiliṅgādīnāmanyatamadapi pramāṇamasti ॥
svādhyāyavidhiparigrahāddarśapūrṇamāsādiśeṣa iti cet-na-jyetiṣṭomādivadvidhyantarasya bhāvāt । yathaiva jyotiṣṭomādīnāṁ (prathamapraṁ,pṛthakprakaraṇādikāraṇādanyonyaśeṣaśeṣibhāvo nāsti । tathaiva [‘mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ'] ityādiviṣayatvānnāgnihotrādiśeṣatvaṁ yuktam ॥
phalābhāva iti cet-na- [“sarvāṁśca lekānāpnoti sarvāṁśca kāmānyastamātmānamanuvidya vijānāti'] ityādiphalamuddiśya vidhānāt ॥
athaivamapyupāsanāvidhiśeṣatvāt stutireveti cet-nātyantamasatā stutirasti । na hi [“vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā”] iti vāyorakṣepiṣṭhatvam । kvacidasatā'pi stutyadisambhava iti cet-na-anumānasiddhasyehopadānāt ॥
atha sarvakāryakaraṇayogādīśvarasya sarvaprāṇisukhaduḥkhādisaṁbandha iti cet-na-nimittabhedāt । dharmādinimittaḥ saṁsāriṇāṁ śarīrādisambandhaḥ । dharmādinimi(ktānāṁ)tto duḥkhādiyogaḥ । neśvarasya dharmādayaḥ । niratiśayaiśvaryādihetutvāccharīrādikāryakaraṇasaṁbandhasya । yathā grahatadāviṣṭayoḥ ॥
atha cakṣurādikaraṇatvādasmadādivat sarvānupalabdhariti cet-na- sarvaviṣayagrahaṇasamarthānāṁ pratibandhakaraṇābhāvāt । sarvagatānāṁ hi karaṇānāṁ [a]dharmādisaṁvaraṇena svaviṣayasaṅkocaḥ kriyate । yasya punarāvaraṇaṁ pratibandhaka[maṁ]- dharmādi na vidyate, tasya tadabhāvādaśeṣasvaviṣayagrahaṇāni karaṇānīti na duṣyati ॥
atha vā sarvaprāṇikaraṇaiḥ [īśvaraḥ] pṛthagātmanaḥ karaṇābhāve'pyāveśagraha iva sarvamanubhavati । na ca prāṇiśūnyo viṣayaḥ kaścidvidyate, ‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṁ tiṣṭhan’ ‘yo'psu tiṣṭhan’ ityevamādiśruterantaryāminānna īśvarasya sarveṣvavasthitatvaśravaṇāt ॥
api vā prakṛṣṭameva sa(rva)ttvaṁ nilyānatiśāyitaśaktijñāneśvaratvadharmakam, sarvagatatvādākāśavat sarvayogi, sarvārthatvātsarvaviṣayaprakāśakam, dharmādhamīdiviprayogādapratibandhaśaktikaṁ ca iti akāyānindriyatvapakṣe'pīśvarasarvajñatvasiddhiḥ ॥
cakṣurādyapekṣameva cittasya rūpādipratilambhasāmarthyamiti cet – na - aiśvaryadharmādyabhāvābhyāṁ parihṛtatvāt ॥
api ca cakṣurgrāhyasyāpi cakṣuṣā agrahaṇaṁ loke dṛśyate । cakṣurgrāhyaṁ sat sarvaṁ tamaḥ sannimīlitalocanairapi svasthāntaḥkaraṇairupalabhyate । tadeva cāndhatamasaṁ viṣphāritanayanairapyanyagatacittairnaiva gṛhyate । yathā gṛhyamāṇa evākāśe prakāśaḥ ॥
athāpi prakāśābhāvamātrameva tame na vasviti brayāt - tacca na - abhāvasya vastutirodhānasāmarthyābhāvāt ॥
atha grahaṇanimittasya prakāśasyābhāvādeva ghaṭādyagrahaṇaṁ, na vastutirodhāyakaṁ tama iti bruvīta-na-cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśakatvāt prakāśasāhāyakāpekṣānupapattiḥ । asati bhinnajātīye vastuni vastūnāṁ tirodhātṛṇi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca । mātrā prakāśakatvāccakṣuṣā prakāśyeta । na hi pradīpaḥ pradīpāntaradvaitīyakāpekṣaḥ prakāśayati ॥
kiṁ cānyat-cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśāntarasahāyatvāpekṣatāyāṁ ca niśāyāmapi tārādhipatiprakāśadvitīyena cakṣuṣā divasa iva rūpādigrahaṇaprasaṅgastirodhānasyāsati nimitte ॥
kiṁ cānyat-abhāvaścettamaḥ, candramāsu niśāyāṁ bhā(bhava)ntīṣu tamasā mandena na pravartitavyam । sarvātmanaiva hi tena vinaśanīyam । bhāsāṁ bhāvāt । bhāsāṁ tu vastutvānmandatvapāṭavādiviśeṣo ghaṭate, na(bhāvasya)abhāvasya nirviśeṣatvāt ॥
kiṁ ca-sahāyābhāvāccakṣuṣa upalabdhasāmarthyābhāvādagrahaṇamityetadapi vyabhicarati । yathā satyapi vidyullatāprakāśe tīvratare vidyullatavilāse ca kiṁ taddṛṣṭirnopalabhate । na hi vidyutaḥ sahāyake dṛṣṭacakitatvenāgrahaṇaṁ virodhābhāvādyuttam ॥
kiñca - cikitsāśāstre chāyā madhuraśītaletyucyate । na hyavastuno madhuraśītalatvam । tathā cākṣipati pathyatvam । nābhāvasya pathyāpathyatvaṁ brūyuḥ ॥
pradīpācchāyopalabdheśca । abhāvaścettamaḥ, pradīpaprabhāmaṇḍale pradīpācchāyā kathaṁ bhavet । vastutve'pi virodhādayuktamiti cet-na-viṣasarpayoriva saṁbhavāt । yathā prāṇaviyogakaramapi viṣaṁ pannagaprāṇaviyogāya na paryāpnoti, tathā pradīpatacchāyayorapi ॥
tasmādvastu tamaḥ, prakarṣāpakarṣavattvāt , prabhāvat । virodhidravyāpaneyatvācca, ghaṭavat । upalabdhṛvyavadhānakaratvācca, bhittivaditi ॥
itaśvendriyanirapekṣamapyantaḥkaraṇamindriyaviṣayagrahaṇāya samartham । pihitakarṇavivarasya ghoṣopalaṁbhāt । na ca pihitakarṇasaṁpuṭasya śrotrāntaramanumātuṁ śakyam । badhirasyāpi pihitaśrotrapuṭasya tadagrahaṇāt ॥
kiñca-pratijñājñānenāpi rūpādigrahaṇamindrayanirapekṣaṁ dṛśyate ॥
kiñcānyat-smṛteścānupapattiḥ syāt indriyanirapekṣasya cittasya sātiśayagrahaṇasāmartharye'pi । spaṣṭāśca smṛtayaḥ svāpnā rūpādiviṣayāḥ ॥
yadi cakṣurādyantaḥkaraṇābhyāṁ samanvitābhyāṁ rūpagrahaṇaṁ pūrvamapi nirvartiṣyate, svapnādāvapi samucitābhyāmeva paryagrahīṣyata । na caivamasti । sukhādigrahaṇe svātantryaṁ cittasya sarvaprasiddham ॥
tasmādālokasthānīyānīndriyāṇi cittasya, viṣayagrahaṇe svatantrasyaiva svataḥ । taduktam [“indriyapranāḍikayā’] iti । tathā śrutirapi- [‘manasā° hyeva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti’] iti ॥
athocyeta - indriyāṇāmālekāpekṣāvat antaḥkaraṇamapīndriyasāhāyakāpekṣameva grāhakamiti –tanna - vyabhicārāt । rātriñcarāṇāṁ vibhinnavyālokadvaitīyakena divasa iva rūpagrahaṇam । satyapi prakāśe na rūpasya grahaṇamulūkādibhirdine ॥
kiñca-sādhanāpekṣasya vijñānasādhanādṛte'pi tulādau । darśanamātreṇaiva suvarṇādiparimāṇajñānaṁ dṛśyate ॥
atha cedbrūyādānarthakyaṁ cakṣurādīnāmiti-sa vaktavyaḥ-tulādivadevānyatrārthavattvamindriyāṇāmiti । yathaiva tulādiviṣayavaimatyaprakarṣāt puruṣasya vināpi tulādisādhanena darśanamātrādeva kanakadivastuparicchedakauśalaṁ, tathaivāntaḥkaraṇasyānapekṣitacakṣurādisāhāyakasyāpi vaimatyaprakarṣādrūpādigrahaṇasāmarthyaṁ na vihanyate ॥
nāpi hyanekanirvartanīyaṁ kriyājātamekena nābhinirvartyate । dṛśyante ca bahubhiruttotyamānaṁ śilādikamadvitīyā hastipuruṣādayaḥ keciduttolayantaḥ ॥
tathaivendriyasahāyenānyeṣāmanta:karaṇena gṛhyumāṇā rūpādayaḥ parameśvaracittasatvenānākalita(vakarṇita)cakṣurādiparispandena kevalenaiva gṛhyante । kāṣṭhāgatatvādvematyaśakyaiśvaryaprakarṣasya ॥
saṁsāriṇāṁ tato nikṛṣṭatvādavidyādimalenaiśvaryaśaktijñānādīnāmindriyasahakāritvāpekṣitvamanta: karaṇasya । śilādisamuttolana iva hīnabalānām ॥
ye(ṣāṁ) punaḥ saṁsāriṇa eva santa īśvarībhavanti buddharṣabhādayaḥ, teṣāṁ niratiśayaśaktijñānaiśvaryanupapattiḥ । kālaparicchedyatvāt । abhyupagacchanti ca taddarśanaślāghinaḥ kālaparicchedanīyake teṣām ॥
nāsmadīśvarasya kālaparicchedyatā । tatkālaistadādyakālaiśva buddhādibhiraparijñātaiśvaryādisātiśayatvādiliṅgairanumeya evāsau । nāmuṣmin kāla utpanna utpadyata utpatsyamāna iti tridhā kaiścidanumīyate । niratiśayatvavirodhī hi tathā[dā]syāt ॥
tasmāt buddhādīnāṁ siddhyapekṣatvāt, pūrvabuddhānāṁ kālādhikyaprāpteruttarakālabuddhasyāpi na niratiśaktyaiśvaryajñānatvaṁ viruddham । atha tutyaśaktijñānaiśvaryāṇāmeva teṣāṁ samānarājyarājānāmivāsamānakālatvamiti brūyāt, tathāpi buddhāntarakālasya vyāptyabhilāṣavighātānniratiśayaiśvaryādyabhāvaḥ ॥
abhilaṣati hi kaścit buddhāntaraṁ vaśīkartum , tadviṣayaṁ ca vyāptum । aniyatatvādicchāyāḥ । buddhāntarāvaśīkaraṇe ca sarvavaśitvaṁ hī(nī)yeta ॥
atha ceducyeta, buddhāntarasyānanugrāhyatvādrāgādyabhāvācca tadviṣayavyāptāvanabhilāṣa iti-atrocyate-yathaiva prāptabuddhatvasya kaṁcitkālamavasthānamabhilāṣapūrvakam, tathā buddhāntarakālāvasthānābhilāṣeṇāvaśyaṁ bhavitavyam ॥
anugrāhyaprāṇyantarabhāvācca kālāntarāvasthānābhilāṣeṇa yukta bhavitum । na ca bhaviṣyatā buddhena sarve prāṇabhṛto'nugrahīṣyante ॥
buddhatvasya ca duḥkhādyātmakatve'pi prāṇyanugrahārthatvādbuddhasthiteḥ kālāntarāvasthānecchayā bhavitavyameva । siddheśca prāgavidyādiparāmaśat, buddhasvarūpasya ca duḥkhaśūnyādyātmakatvasya tairabhyupetatvāt, buddharṣabhādyanyatīrthakaraṇāt[karāt]niratiśayaśaktijñānaiścaryānupapattiḥ ॥
kālānavacchedātu naite doṣā asmadīśvare kramante । śaktijñānaiśvaryāṇāṁ tu niravadhikatvānumānāt sātiśayatvānavasthitatvādidoṣaḥ nātmākāśādīnāmivātiśaṅkanīyaḥ ॥

sāmānyamātropasaṁhāre ca kṛtopakṣayamanumānaṁ na viśeṣapratipattau samarthamiti। tasya saṁjñādiviśeṣapratipattirāgamataḥ paryanveṣyā। tasyā''tmānugrahābhāve'pi bhūtānugrahaḥ prayojanam। jñānadharmopadeśena kalpapralayamahāpralayeṣu saṁsāriṇaḥ puruṣānuddhariṣyāmīti। tathā coktam – ādividvānnirmāṇacittamadhiṣṭhāya kāruṇyādbhagavānparamarṣirāsuraye jijñāsamānāya tatraṁ provāceti ॥ 25 ॥

vivaraṇam
tathā ca darśayati - [sāmānyamātropasaṁhāre kṛtopakṣayamanumānam iti ।] niratiśayaśaktijñānaiśvaryayuktapuruṣaviśeṣasattvasāmānyamātropasaṁhāre [kṛtopakṣayaṁ] kṛta upakṣayo yasyānumānasya tatkṛtopakṣayaṁ sātiśayatvāditi । taduktamanumāne-yatra prāptistatra gatimātramiti । tasmānneśvarasaṁjñāguṇādiviśeṣāṇāṁ satāmapi pratipādane samartham । sāmānyamātropasaṁhāraparatvāt ॥
tadetaduktaṁ bhavati । yadaivaṁ satāmapi guṇānāṁ sāmānyapratipādanakṛtakṣayatvānna pratipādakamanumānam, kimaṅga punaranyantāsambhāvyamānasannidhīnāmanumeyadharmaviruddhānāmaśaktyajñānadharmādharmānaiśvaryādīnāṁ [na]tatpratyāyakamiti ॥
ata eva ca viruddhapratisādhanānupapattiḥ । sarvajñāstitvānumānavat prathamaṁ tadabhāvapratipādakānumānāpravṛtteḥ । na hyanumānasya paroktyudīkṣādharmatvamasti । na hi dhūmadarśanenāgnyanumāne vaktrantaroktirudīkṣyate ॥
na ca svayameva sarvajñāstitvaṁ nāstitvaṁ vā buddhi(prati)pūrvamāśaṅkayate । ghaṭādivat sarvajñasadbhāvasya svayamanabhyupagamāt । na hyanirdhāritaśaśisvarūpaḥ śaśe viṣāṇamasti nāstīti kaścidāśaṅkate ॥
paravākyāt pratipadyāśaṅkata iti cet-pareṇāpi kathamaprasiddheśvarasadbhāvanāśaṅkitamiti vaktavyam । atha parasya bhrāntiriti cet-na sāmānyānupalambhe bhrāntikāraṇamasti । na hi śuktikāyāṁ pikabhramaḥ kasyacidupajāyate । tasmādāha- [saṁjñādiviśeṣapratipattirāgamataḥ paryanveṣyā] iti । vedetihāsapurāṇayogadharmaśāstrādyāgamataḥ paryanveṣyā ॥
[tasyātmānugrahābhāve'pi] tasyātmārthamavāptavyābhāvāt [bhūtānāṁ] cāvidyāpaṅkanimagnānāṁ saṁsārasāgarottaraṇopāyaplavopadeśyantarasyābhāvāt [tadanugrahaḥ prayojanam । jñānadharmopadeśena] ye'nanyaśaraṇāstasmin sarvātmanā niveditātmānastān [kalpapralayamahāpralayeṣu] īśvarānugṛhītāgamajñānaviśeṣeṣvācāryeṣu pralīneṣu puna:punarjātakāruṇyāmṛtaḥ san [uddhariṣyāmīti] pravartata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ ॥
tathā [coktamādividvāniti] -ādau vidvān [ādividvān] rajastamobhyāmanabhibhūtajñāna ityarthaḥ । jñānadharmadi vā tata ādīyate ityādiḥ, ādiścāsau vidvāṁśca [adividvān nirmāṇacittaṁ] saṁkalpamātranirmitaṁ yogicittam āveśagrahavadupadeśanārtham [adhiṣṭhāya bhagavān paramarṣiḥ] paramadarśana ityarthaḥ । paramatvaṁ cāgamataḥ । darśanārthasya vā gatyarthasya vā dhātoḥ ṛṣergrahaṇam । paramarṣirīśvara eva kapilanārāyaṇādisaṁjña: [āsuraye provāceti ॥]
tasmāt pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ sarvvaprāṇibhāvakarmaphalaparisphuraṇajñānāttadanugrahakāraṇam īśvaraḥ siddhaḥ । sa prakṛṣṭasattvadhanopādānaṁ īśvaraḥ kathaṁ kartā ? kathaṁ cānugṛhṇāti ? ityevamādi na codayitavyam । [āgamataḥ paryanveṣyā] ityuktatvāt । anumānasya ca tadviṣayasyānupapattiḥ viśeṣasaṁbandhāgrahaṇāditi ॥ 25 ॥
sa eṣaḥ –
pūrveṣāmapi guruḥ kālenānavacchedāt ॥ 26 ॥
pūrve hi guravaḥ kālenāvacchidyante। yatrāvacchedārthena kālo nopāvartate sa eṣa pūrveṣāmapi guruḥ। yathā'sya sargasyā''dau prakarṣagatyā siddhastathā'tikrāntasargādiṣvapi pratyetavyaḥ ॥ 26 ॥

vivaraṇam
saḥ yathottarūpaḥ parameśvaraḥ [pūrveṣāmapi] gurūṇām abhyudayaniḥśreyasasarvasādhanasādhyasaṁbandhopadeśināṁ [guruḥ] teṣāmapi jñānopadeśasya kartetyarthaḥ । tadudbhavatvāt sarvajñānānām । yathā jvalanalavaṇajaladhisamudbhavā viṣphuliṅgalavaṇakaṇāḥ ॥
tasya cādividvattāmavocama [kālenānavacchedāditi ।] atītānāgatapratyupādīyamānatvaviśiṣṭena kālenānye guravo'vachidyante । sa tvīśvaraḥ sarvadā mukteśvaratvena tairapyasmābhirivānumeyaḥ ॥
kasmāt punastasya vastutve gurutvasāmānye ca sati nāvacchedakaḥ kāla iti cedāha - [yatrāvacchedārthaḥ kāle nopāvartata iti ।] yasminnīśvare viṣaye [avacchedārthaḥ] prasthādivat paricchedakaraḥ [nopāvartate] na paricchedakatveneśvaraṁ viṣayīkaroti sarvapariṇāmavastvavacchedakaro'pi san ॥
nanu ceśvaraprakṛṣṭasattvasya pradhānakāryatvāt, pradhānakāryasya ca kālāvacchedyatvāt, kasmāttatsattvaṁ nāvacchidyate puruṣasvarūpaṁ hi sarveṣāmeva kālānavacchedya(miti nāśaṅkanīya)mapariṇāmitvāt puruṣasya ॥
atha manyethāḥ-tantrāntaraprasiddheśvaravat sattvanirapekṣa īśvara iti tadayuktam-prakṛṣṭasattvāpādānābhyupagamāt ॥
athāpi manvīthāḥ--īśvarasattvāt pravṛttameva kāryamavacchinatti kāle neśvarasattvamiti-tadapyayuktam-vyaktasya paricchedyatvāt । vyaktaṁ ceśvarasattvam ॥
athāpyabhisandadhīthāḥ-pradhānāvasthameveśvarasattvamiti--tadanupapannam-- jñānānupapateḥ ॥
athāpi pratipadyethāḥ-satkāryābhyupagamādbījaphalavallarīkusumādivajjñānādīnāṁ pradhānāvasthā yatsattvameveti-tacca na sādhu-vyavahārayogyatvāt । sarveṣāṁ ca tathā satyanavacchedyatvaṁ jñānādisattāmātrasambandhaviśeṣāt prāpnuyāt ॥
athāpi bruvīthāḥ-vyaktatve satyapi kāryāṇāṁ kasyacit paricchedyatvaṁ kālīnaṁ kasyacinneti-tacca na-nyāyavirodhāt ॥
athāpi pratyavatiṣṭhethāḥ, īśvarasatvasya kālāparicchedyatvamāgamasiddhamiti - tacca na- avadyotakatvādagamasya ॥
athāpyācakṣīthāḥ-vidyamānasyaiva kālāparicchedyatvasyājñātasyāvadyotaka agama iti-taccāpi na -nirodhādisamanuṣṭhānanimittatvāt kālā(ja)vacchedye vaimalyādanavacchedyo vaimalyādanavacchedyaśceti viruddhaṁ syāt ॥
atrocyate-īśvarasatvavaimatyaprakarṣāpekṣatvāt kālānavacchedyatvasyādoṣaḥ ॥
yathā anyeṣāṁ gurūṇāṁ yogadharmādisamanuṣṭhānanimittatvāt kālānavacchedyo vaimatyaprakarṣaḥ, tathā na bhagavataḥ । katham? sarvadā'tyantatirobhūtarajastamastvādanapekṣitadharmādinimitte sakalārthāvadyotakaraṁ kālānavacchedyaṁ sattvasvarūpavadbhagavatsattve jñānam ॥
tathā tatkāryamapyutkarṣa: kālena nāvacchidyate । yathā cāgneruṣṇaprakāśāvagnau kālānavacchedyau, tathā bhagavatsatvasya vaimatyajñānaprakarṣāstatsattve kālānavacchedyatāmupayāntītyetadapekṣayābhihitaṁ [yatnāvacchedārtha: kālo nopāvartata] iti । na tvakāryāpekṣayā hyucyate ॥
gurutvaṁ hi nāvadhimat । tadevāha- [yathā'sya sargasyādau] jñānavaimalpa [prakarṣagatyā siddhaḥ] sargādijanmanāmanumeyatayā siddhaḥ āgamataścājñāyi, [tathā'tikrāntasargādiṣvapi] tatkālajanmanāṁ tataḥ prāktanānāmapi siddhaḥ । tathā bhaviṣyakāle'pyanumānāgamābhyāmavagamyate ॥
asya ca sūtrasyedaṁ prayojanam - yathā dṛṣṭā guravo jñānadharmādyupadeśitvādananyaśaraṇairanavaratamupāsyante, tathā bhagavānayamapi sarvagurūṇāmapi gurutvāttato'pi viśeṣeṇa nārāyaṇādināmā(dīnāma)nanyacetobhiḥ svahṛdayenāniśaṁ dhārayitavya iti ॥
yathā dṛṣṭagurava upāsanenābhimukhīkṛtāstadupāsanaparānanugṛhṇanti, tathā'yaṁ paramagururapyābhidhyānamātreṇānugrahaṁ karoti । tathā ca śrutiḥ-
[“yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau ।]
[tasyaite kathitā hyarthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ ॥ ”] iti ।
smṛtirapi -
[“matkarmakṛnmatparamo madbhaktaḥ saṅgavarjitaḥ ।]
[nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa māmeti pāṇḍava ॥ “] iti ॥ 26 ॥
tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ ॥ 27 ॥
vācya īśvaraḥ praṇavasya। kimasya saṁketakṛtaṁ vācyavācakatvamatha pradīpaprakāśavadavasthitamiti।

vivaraṇam
īśvarapraṇidhānādityuktaṁ, sa kathaṁ praṇidhātavyaḥ ? kiṁ ca tatpraṇidhānasādhanam ? yena praṇidhātā praṇidhatta iti tatpraṇidhānasādhanapratipādanārthamāha - [tasya vācakaḥ praṇava] iti । [tasya] īśvarasya yathoktalakṣaṇasya [vācakaḥ] abhidhāyakaḥ [praṇavaḥ] sāsnādimata iva gośabdaḥ ॥
prakarṣeṇa nūyate stūyate aneneti praṇavaḥ । yadi vā, praṇauti stautīśvaramiti praṇava oṅkāraḥ । praṇidhīyate cānena bhagavān praṇidhātṛbhiriti, praṇamanti vā । aneneti, praṇidhate vā tena bhagavantaṁ cetasīti, dhāño vakāropajanaṁ kṛtvā । śabdena hi parokṣāṇāmarthānāṁ manasi praṇidhānaṁ merurindra iti yathā ॥
tasya coṅkārasya vācyaḥ [īśvaraḥ ।] anvarthaṁ khalvapi nirvacanam । avateḥ rakṣaṇādyarthānmaniṣṭilopaśceti । praṇidhātṝn saṁsārādavatīti, gamayati vā । saṁsāriṇaṁ nirvāṇamiti, niratiśayaṁ vā prīṇayati, samādhyādyanugraheṇāvagamayati vā paramārthamityevamādyarthānugatam sarvathā tu nediṣṭhaṁ priyaṁ nāma bhagavataḥ ॥
tena hi manasi satataṁ praṇidhāyamānaḥ prasīdati । tathā cānekaśaḥ śrutayaḥ- [‘oṁ khaṁ brahma’ ‘omiti brahma’] ityādayaḥ । smṛtayaśca [‘oṁ tatsat’] iti । [‘oṁ viśvaṁ viṣṇuḥ'] ityādayaḥ । oṁśabdasya kṛdantaṁ yanmāntamityavyayatvādvibhaktinivṛttiḥ ।
[kimasya saṅketakṛtaṁ vācyavācakatvaṁ? atha pradīpaprakāśavadavasthitamiti ।] kiṁ cātaḥ ? । yadi tena bhagavatā anyairvā saṁvyavahārārthamasya nābhedamastviti saṁketitam, tato'sya prāgoṁśabdāvācyatvādoṁśabdena vā praṇidhātāraḥ prāṇyadhiṣata, anyena vā nāmāntareṇādhītavantastathedānīmapyastu, kimoṅkārāvaśeṣavacanena । athāpi [pradīpaprakāśavadavasthitaṁ,] tathā'pi prathamaśravaṇe'pīśvara upalabhyeta yathā prakāśena savitā ॥
kiṁ ca-saṅketo'pyanarthakaḥ sthitasambandhatvāt । athāpūrvaṁ saṅketyeta, pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅga iti manyate ॥

sthito'sya vācyasya vācakena saha saṁbandhaḥ। saṁketastvīśvarasya sthitamevārthamabhinayati। yathā'vasthitaḥ pitāputrayoḥ saṁbandhaḥ saṁketenāvadyotyate, ayamasya pitā, ayamasya putra iti। sargāntareṣvapi vācyavācakaśaktyapekṣastathaiva saṁketaḥ kriyate। saṁpratipattinityatayā nityaḥ śabdārthasaṁbandha ityāgaminaḥ pratijānate ॥ 27 ॥

vivaraṇam
atrocyate- [sthito'sya vācyasya vācakena] sambandho yadi nityaḥ śabdo yadi vā anityaḥ, saṅketastu tameva sthitaṁ sambandhamavajvalayati ॥
nanu coktaṁ-sthitaścet prathamaśravaṇe'pi taṁ pratīyuriti । ucyate-na hi pratyāyyapratyāyakasambandhaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sthito'pi sannindriyeṇa gṛhyate । yathendriyārthayoḥ । apratyakṣe hi vācyavācakaśaktī ॥
tataśca yenocyate śabdādartho'numeya iti-tadasat । sambandhāgrahaṇāt । paraprayegavyaṅgyatvācca sambandhasya । na hyanumānaṁ paraprayogamapekṣate ॥
atha brūyādanumitāt saṁbandhādarthānumānamiti । sa vaktavyaḥ kathamanumitaḥ śabdārthasambandhaḥ? iti ॥
sa cet brūyāt-kāryadarśanādarthaṁ hi pratītya paścādanuminoti tatsaṁbandham । yathā cakṣuṣā rūpamupalabhya cakṣussaṁbandhamiti । sa prativaktavyaḥ-siddhaṁ tarhi vinā'numānena śabdādeva pratipattiriti ॥
yo hi grāṣṭrapākenaiva kṛtārtha: kiṁ tasya kilośipākena । athāsakṛt prayogadarśanādgṛhyate sambandhaḥ, yathā'gnidhūmayoriti cet- na tu brūmaḥ na hi sahasreṣvapi prayogeṣu pratyakṣeṇa śavdārthayoḥ saṁbandho gṛhyate yathā'gnidhūmayorādāvapi saṁbandho gṛhyate । vākye'pyayameva ॥ tasmādavasthitameva vācyasyeśvarasya vācakena praṇavena sambandhamavadyotayati saṅketo yathā sthitaṁ pitāputrasaṁbandham । saṅketopāyāpekṣatvāt prathamaśrutānnārthaḥ pratīyate । yathā cakṣuṣa ālokābhāve ॥
nanu ca śabdānityatvapakṣe kathamanitye saṁbandhini nityaḥ saṁbandha iti । na hyanityayo rajjughaṭayoḥ saṁvandho nityaḥ syāt । ucyate-yathā pramāṇaprameyayorindriyaviṣayayośca kriyākārakāṇāṁ saṁbandhaḥ sthita evānityeṣvapi saṁbandhiṣu, tadvadatrāpi sthita evāvyabhicāreṇa saṁbandhaḥ [sargādiṣvapi vācyavācakaśaktyapekṣaḥ saṅketaḥ ।] ।
yathaiva rūpacakṣuṣorgrāhyagrāhakaśaktyapekṣayaiva sargādau sargastathehāpi [vācyavācakaśaktyapekṣayaiva saṅketaḥ kriyate ॥]
sampratipattinityatayā vṛddhaparamparayaiva gamyagamakabhāvena śabdārthayoḥ saṁpratipatirnityā nānyatheti [āgaminī] vedavādina: [pratijānate ।] sampratipattiśca śabdārthasaṁbandhasya hetustadeṣām ॥
tadetaduktaṁ bhavati-yadyāgamipakṣaḥ syādathānyapakṣaḥ, sarvathā sthita eva saṁbandhaḥ pitāputrayoriva saṅketenābhivyajyata iti ॥
vācyavācakayorasthitasaṁbandhatve tu praṇavarūpeṇābhimukhībhavatīśvara iti nāvakalpate । na hi pācyapācakasaṁbandhe na ca sthite pācakāgnyupādānaṁ pākārthaṁ kalpate । sthite tu vācyavācakasaṁbandhe bhagavadārādhanasādhanasya praṇavasyopādānamavakalpata iti tatpratipādanārthaṁ sarvaṁ bhāṣyam ॥ 27 ॥
vijñātavācyavācakatvasya yoginaḥ –
tajjapastadarthabhāvanam ॥ 28 ॥
praṇavasya japaḥ praṇavābhidheyasya ceśvarasya bhāvanam। tadasya yoginaḥ praṇavaṁ japataḥ praṇavārthaṁ ca bhāvayataścittamekāgraṁ saṁpadyate। tathā coktam –
svādhyāyādyogamāsīta yogātsvādhyāyamāmanet।
svādhyāyayogasaṁpattyā paramātmā prakāśate ॥ iti ॥ 28 ॥

vivaraṇam
evamavagatavācyavācakasaṁbandhasya yoginaḥ parameśvaraprasādanaṁ kathaṁ kriyata iti tadarthamāha- [tajjapastadarthabhāvanam] tasyeśvaravācakasya praṇavasyārdhacaturmātrasya trimātrasya vā japaḥ manasopāṁśu vā āvartanaṁ japaḥ, tadarthasya ceśvarasya praṇavena vācakena samarpitasya buddhau samāropitasya bhāvanamabhidhyānaṁ [tadarthabhāvanam ।] kartavyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ ॥
tadevamubhayaṁ kurvato yoginaḥ cittamekāgraṁ sampadyate । ekāgrasampattiṁ ca tadārādhanaphalaṁ darśayati- [tathā coktam-svādhyāyādyogamā(tiṣṭhet)sīta svādhyāyāt] praṇavajapādīśvaraṁ pratyavanatacittaḥ san [yogamāsīta ।] tadarthamīśvaraṁ dhyāyet । (rasyayat)tadarthadhyānāccāpracalitamanāḥ [svādhyāyaṁ praṇavamāmanet] manasā'bhijapet । mānaso'bhijapaḥ praśasyate dhyānasyāsannataratvāt । mā viṣayapravaṇacitto bhūditi । evaṁ [svādhyāyayogasampatyā] tadvirodhinā pratyayāntareṇānabhighātaḥ [svādhyāyayogasampattiḥ ।] tayā ca praṇavajapaparameśvaradhyānasampatyā [para ātmā] parameṣṭhī [prakāśate] yogina iti ॥ 28 ॥
kiṁ cāsya bhavati –
tataḥ pratyaktcetanādhigamo'pyantarāyābhāvaśca ॥ 29 ॥

ye tāvadantarāyā vyādhiprabhṛtayaste tāvadīśvarapraṇidhānānna bhavanti। svarūpadarśanamapyasya bhavati। yathaiveśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ prasannaḥ kevalo'nupasargastathā'yamapi buddhe pratisaṁvedī yaḥ puruṣastamadhigacchati ॥ 29 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiścāsya bhavati ?] pūrvasūtre cittamekāgraṁ sampadyata ityuktamekaṁ phalam , tadepakṣayā kiñceti cakāraḥ । kiñcānyadapyasti phalam ? āhosviccittaikāgratvameveti, tatrāha [-tataḥ pratyakcetanādhigamo'pyantarāyābhāvaśca । tataḥ] tasmādīśvarapraṇidhānāt [pratyakcetanādhigamaḥ pratyak] svabuddhiṁ [cetayata] iti [pratyakcetana] ātmā, tasya [adhigamo] yathāvatsvarūpasaṁvedanam ॥
nanu cādhigata eva pratyātmaṁ puruṣo'haṁ sukhī duḥkhī cāhamiti । evaṁ prasiddhaṁ, tataḥ kiṁ viśeṣeṇocyate iti । satyamevam-kiṁ tvaviśiṣṭo'so pratyayaścittasya vṛtyā । kiñca-sukhī duḥkhī cāhamiti sukhiduḥkhisāmānādhikaraṇyādihāhaṁpratyayasya cittavṛttiviṣayatvādavidyāpratyaya eva prasiddhiḥ ॥
kathaṁ tarhyasyādhigama ityāha- [yathaiveśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ] kleśādimalavarjitastata eva [prasannaḥ] svacchastata eva [kevalo] nistriguṇastata eva [nirupasargastā] patrayavarjitaḥ prakṛṣṭasattvapratisaṁvedī [ca tathā'yamapi] madīyaḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ prasannaḥ kevalo nirupasargo [buddheḥ pratisaṁvedītyavagacchati ॥]
yathā tatheti ca dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikanirdeśādīśvarakṣetrajñayorbheda ukto bhavati । baddhamuktopapatteśca । pradhānasya pārāthyopapatteḥ । kṣetrajñānāṁ cāta eva parasparabhedaḥ ॥
kiñcāsya bhavati ? [ye tāvadantarāyā vyādhiprabhṛtayo] vakṣyamāṇāste'pi cāsye [śvarapraṇidhānānna bhavanti ॥ 29 ॥]
atha ke'ntarāyā ye cittasya vikṣepāḥ। ke punaste kiyanto veti –
vyādhistyāna​saṁśayapramādālasyā​viratibhrāntidarśanālabdha​bhūmikatvānavasthitatvāni citavikṣepāste'ntarāyāḥ ॥ 30 ॥

navāntarāyāścittasya vikṣepāḥ। sahaite cittavṛttibhirbhavanti। eteṣāmabhāve na bhavanti pūrvoktāścittavṛttayaḥ। vyādhirdhāturasakaraṇavaiṣamyam। styānamakarmaṇyatā cittasya। saṁśaya ubhayakoṭispṛgvijñānaṁ syādidamevaṁ naivaṁ syāditi। pramādaḥ samādhisādhanānāmabhāvanam। ālasyaṁ kāyasya cittasya ca gurutvādapravṛttiḥ। aviratiścittasya viṣayasaṁprayogātmā gardhaḥ। bhrāntidarśanaṁ viparyajñānam। alabdhabhūmikatvaṁ samādhibhūmeralābhaḥ। anavasthitatvaṁ yallabdhāyāṁ bhūmau cittasyāpratiṣṭhā। samādhipratilambhe hi sati tadavasthitaṁ syāditi। ete cittavikṣepā nava yogamalā yogapratipakṣā yogāntarāyā ityabhidhīyante ॥ 30 ॥

vivaraṇam
tatra [ke te'ntarāyāḥ ? kiyanto ve] tyāha- [vyādhistyānetyādi ।] saṁkhyayā tāva [nnavāntarāyāḥ ।] svarūpeṇa ca vyādhyādayaḥ । [vyādhirdhāturasakaraṇavaiṣamyam ।] dhātavo vātapittaśleṣmāṇasteṣāṁ viṣamabhāvo vaiṣamyaṁ, tacca vātapittaśleṣmabhūyiṣṭhadravyopayogādibhyo jāyate । svayonyāgame hi dhātūnāṁ vṛddhimācakṣate ॥
rasa upayuktāhārasya pariṇāmaviśeṣaḥ । [sa] ca saptadhā, rasakāryavādrasa ityucyate rasalohitamedomāṁsāsthimajjāśuklākhyaḥ । tasya vaiṣamyaṁ vṛddhikṣayau । karaṇavaiṣamyamandhabadhiratvādi ॥
[styānamakarmaṇyatā cittasya] stimitam । [saṁśayaḥ] sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti viruddhobhayakoṭispṛkū pratyaya: ॥
[pramādaḥ samādhisādhanānāmabhāvana] maśīlanam । [ālasyaṁ kāyasya cittasya ca gurutvādapravartanam । aviratiścittasya viṣayasamprayoga] svabhāvo viṣayasamprayoganimitto vā [garddhaḥ] abhikāṅkā tṛṣṇā ॥
[bhrāntidarśanaṁ viparyayajñānaṁ] yogasādhaneṣu tanmārge vā viparītavṛttiḥ । [alabdhabhūmikatvaṁ] samādhibhūmeralābha: । bhūmayo vitarkādayaścittasya dharmaviśeṣā uktā vakṣyamāṇāśca । anavasthitāyāmapi samādhibhūmau tataḥ kathamapi pracalitasya cittasya punastatrāvasthitatvameva syāttadalābhastva [navasthitatva] mucyate ॥
[tadete navāntarāyāḥ ।] antaraṁ vivaraṁ vicchedaṁ kurvanta ayāntītyantarāyāḥ [vikṣepāḥ, pratipakṣāḥ] yogaprāpterupasargāḥ । [ete] ca [saha cittavṛttibhirbhavanti ।] cittaṁ vikṣipanti viṣayeṣviti [cittavikṣepāḥ ।] kṣipraṁ te [kṣipanti] [sahaite vṛttibhiḥ] pañcatayībhiranyonyaprayojyaprayojakabhāvena [bhavanti ।] athai [ṣāmabhāve] vyādhiprabhṛtīnāmabhāve sahāyabalābhāvā [nna bhavanti pūrvoktāḥ] pramāṇādaya [ścittavṛttayaḥ ।] tadbhāvabhāvitvātutyapratyanīkā vṛttivikṣepā ityuktaṁ bhavati ॥ 30 ॥
duḥkhadaurmanasyāṅgamejayatvaśvāsapraśvāsā vikṣepasahabhuvaḥ ॥ 31 ॥

duḥkhamādhyātmikamādhibhautikamādhidaivikaṁ ca। yenābhihatāḥ prāṇinastadapaghātāya prayatante tadduḥkham। daurmanasyamicchāvighātāccetasaḥ kṣobhaḥ। yadaṅgānyejayati kampayati tadaṅgamejayatvam। prāṇo yadbāhyaṁ vāyumācāmati sa śvāsaḥ। yatkauṣṭhyaṁ vāyuṁ niḥsārayati sa praśvāsaḥ। ete vikṣepasahabhuvo vikṣiptacittasyaite bhavanti। samāhitacittasyaive na bhavanti ॥ 31 ॥

vivaraṇam
[duḥkhaṁ yenābhihatāḥ prāṇinastadapaghātāya prayatante] ceṣṭante । tacca trividham । [ādhyātmikam,] adhi ātmanītyadhyātmam, tatra bhavamādhyātmikam । tacca śārīraṁ mānasaṁ ca । śārīraṁ dhātuvaiṣamyādinimittam । mānasamiṣṭavighātādihetukam । [ādhibhautikam] adhi bhūteṣvityadhibhūtam , tatra bhavamādhibhautikam । tacca paśumṛgādyupanipatitam । [adhidaivikamiti] adhi deveṣvityādhidevam, tatra bhavamādhidaivikam । ['adhyātmādibhyaṣṭhak'] ityupasaṁkhyānāt ṭhak । anuśatikāditvādubhayapadavṛddhiḥ । taccāpi vātavarṣādinimittam । tadekameva sannimittabhedena rajorūpaṁ bhidyate ॥
[daurmanasyamicchāvighātāccetasaḥ kṣobhaḥ] ākulībhāvaḥ sañcalanam । [yadaṅgānyejayati kampayati tadaṅgamejayatvam ।] (n tacca prāṇāyāmādyathābhyāsaprabhavaścāsārvāpi tathā samudbhavaḥ) yadbā [hyaṁ vāyumācāmati] bāhyavāyorākarṣaṇabāhulaka[vyam] niṣkramaṇamandatā ca [śvāsaḥ ।] tadviparītavyāpāraḥ [praśvāsaḥ] - [yatkauṣṭhyaṁ vāyuṁ nissārayati । ete vikṣepasahabhuva:] vikṣepai: sahaite [vikṣiptacittasyaiva bhavantī] ti vikṣepasahabhuvaḥ । [samāhitacittasyaite na bhavantī] ti yāvat । yāvadyāvaccetaḥ samādhīyate tāvattāvanna bhavantīti । [tābhyāmevābhyāsavairāgyābhyā] mupaśamayitavyāḥ । nānyaṁ pratipakṣamapekṣante ॥
abhyāsavairāgye muktvā na hi parameśvarapraṇidhāyinyaḥ[bhyaḥ]prabhāvo bhavatīti gamyate । ' [antarāyābhāvaśca'] ityukyā prāktanādapīśvarapraṇidhānādantarāyā nirudhyante ॥ 31 ॥
athaite vikṣepāḥ samādhipratipakṣāstābhyāmevābhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ niroddhavyāḥ। tatrābhyāsasya viṣayamupasaṁharannidamāha –
tatpratiṣedhārthamekatattvābhyāsaḥ ॥ 32 ॥

vikṣepapratiṣedhārthamekatattvāvalambanaṁ cittamabhyaset। yasya tu pratyarthaniyataṁ pratyayamātraṁ kṣaṇikaṁ ca cittaṁ tasya sarvameva cittamekāgraṁ nāstyeva vikṣiptam। yadi punaridaṁ sarvataḥ pratyāhṛtyaikasminnarthe samādhīyate tadā bhavatyekāgramityato na pratyarthaniyatam।

vivaraṇam
abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ tannirodha ityuktam । tatra vairāgyaviṣayaḥ pratipāditaḥ । idānīmabhyāsasya viṣayamupasaṁharannāha- [tatpratiṣedhārthamekatattvābhyāsa] iti । teṣāṁ vikṣepāṇāṁ pratiṣedhāya [tatpratiṣedhārtham ।] ekaṁ tattva [mekatattvam ।] taccaikaṁ tattvaṁ vastutvānnābhyasituṁ śakyam । na hyātmādivastūnāṁ śīlanaṁ vaktuṁ śakyate । svamāhābhāgyāvasthitāni hi tāni na cittamātrāṇi । vastūnāṁ tu cittatantratāṁ pratiṣedhayiṣyati- [‘na caikacittatantraṁ vastu’] ityādinā । tasmādetadāśaṅkamāno bhāṣyakāra āha- [ekatattvālambanaṁ cittamabhyasediti ।] sūtre'pyekatattvābhyāsa iti samāsādayamartha upātta eva ॥
nanu naikaṁ cittamavasthitamasti, yasyaikatattvāvalambanaḥ pratyaya āpadyeta । pratyayā eva cittam, te ca pratyarthaṁ niyatāḥ kṣaṇapraṇāśinaśca । pratyātmasaṁvedyaṁ ca pratyayānāmanavasthitatvam । nāpi pratyayavyatirekeṇāvasthitaṁ pratyayi cittaṁ nāmopalabhyate । yo'pyahamevāhamiti pratyayaḥ so'pi samānasantatipatitattvātsādṛśyanibandhanaḥ । yathā sa eva pradīpaḥ ta eva keśā iti ॥
tadapyāha-pratyahaṁ[prati]pratyayaṁ pratyayo bhinnaḥ, pratyayebhyo'tyantaparasparabhinnebhyo'nanyatvāt । ekaikapratyayasvarūpasadvartamānāhaṁpratyayaviṣayaḥ pratyayī bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāhaṁpratyayaviṣayāt pratyayino bhinnaḥ, bhinnapratyayaviṣayatvāt , ghaṭāt (gha) paṭa iva । yadi vā-bhinnakālatvāt, vinaṣṭabhaviṣyadghaṭābhyāṁ vartamāno ghaṭaḥ [iva] । ahaṁpratyayā vā sarve bhinnālambanāḥ, pratyayatvāt, ghaṭapaṭadiviṣayapratyayavaditi ॥
atrābhidhīyate-svaśāstravirodho'pi syādevaṁ bruvata ityāha- [kṣaṇikaṁ ca । yasya cittaṁ tasya sarvameva cittam ekāgram] vikṣepābhāvādeva [nāstyeva vikṣiptami] ti sarvacitaikāgratvādvikṣepaprāpyabhāvādvikṣepapratiṣedhāya śāsropadeśo'narthakaḥ syāt । asti ca cittaparikarmārthaṁ maitryādyupadeśaḥ । sa ca virudhyeta itthaṁdharma cittamabhyupagacchataḥ ॥
nanu ca tavāpi vṛttivṛttimatorabhedādanupapanno vikṣepa iti tatpratiṣedhopadeśānarthakyam--naiṣa doṣaḥ-vṛttavṛttimatvābhyupagamāt ॥
yadi vṛttaya eva parasparabhinnāḥ svatantrā vṛttimato'tyantabhinnā jāyeran pratyarthaniyatāśca, tata eṣa doṣaḥ syāt । na caivamabhyupeyate ॥
kathaṁ tarhi ? vṛttimadrūpeṇaikamanekārthaṁ ca tadvṛttīnāṁ viṣayabhedādavasthitaṁ ca sadasatorviparyayānabhyupagamādityevamātmapakṣe samañjasatāṁ darśayati - [yadi punaridaṁ] cittaṁ vṛttibhedenānekadhā (mmilāvayavaddhi) prasṛtaṁ sāṅkhyayogavādina iva tavāpi [sarvataḥ] sarvaibhyaḥ viṣayebhyaḥ [pratyāhṛtya] pratyānīyai [kasminnā] tmā [dyarthe samādhīyeta] sthāpyeta [tadā bhavatye] kāgraṁ puruṣaprayāsabhāvyatvārhamityarthaḥ ॥
tato yuktastatparikarmaṇe śāstropadeśaḥ । (ato na pratyakṣam) ato'smāt kāraṇāt tatparikarmaviṣayaśāstropadeśāt sāṁkhyayogavādivat kṣaṇikavādino'pi ekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ ca cittaṁ [na pratyarthaniyataṁ] (vā) paścādabhyupagamanīyam । anyathā śāsravirodhaḥ syāt ।

yo'pi sadṛśapratyayapravāhena cittamekāgraṁ manyate tasyaikāgratā yadi pravāhacittasya dharmastadaikaṁ nāsti pravāhacittaṁ kṣaṇikatvāt। atha pravāhāṁśasyaiva pratyayasya dharmaḥ, sa sarvaḥ sadṛśapratyayapravāhī vā visadṛśapratyayapravāhī vā pratyarthaniyatatvādekāgra eveti vikṣiptacittānupapattiḥ। tasmādekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ cittamiti।

vivaraṇam
[yo'pi sadṛśapratyayapravāhaṁ cittamekāgraṁ manyate] sadṛśaḥ samānaḥ pratyayapravāho yasyaikasyāṁ santatau taccittamekāgram । tadviparītam asamānapratyayapravāhaṁ vikṣiptam । tathā caikāgratā vikṣepapratiṣedhenopapadyate, tadarthopadeśaśceti kutaḥ śāstravirodha iti ॥
itara aha-na-pravāhacittasyaikasya dharmiṇo'nabhyupagamāt । [na hi pravāhacittaṁ nāmaika] matītavartamānabhaviṣyatpratyayānāṁ dharmiṇamabhyupagacchati । yadi hyabhyupagacchet parityaktaḥ svapakṣaḥ । kasmāt ? pravāhacittasyākṣaṇikatvāttadevaikaṁ nāsti, yasyaikāgratā dharmaḥ । pratyayāneva hyanyonyasaṁhatān pipīlikāpaṅktikalpānasāvabhyupagacchati ॥
athaivaṁ manyate, yadyayekaṁ nāsti tathāpi sarveṣāmeva pratyayānāṁ sadṛśapravāhāṇāmekāgratā dharmaḥ pradīpārciṣāmiva prakāśa iti-tatrāha-nāyugapatkālotpattivināśānāṁ samāhāraḥ sambhavati । dṛṣṭāntasya ca sādhyavikalatvāt । na hi bahvīnāmarciṣāmekaḥ prakāśaḥ । pratyarciṣamasya bhedāt । na cāpi prakāśasyārciṣāṁ caiko dharmo nā[mā]sti ॥
[athāpi manyate pravāhāṁśasyaiva pratyayasya] kasyacidekāgratā [dharmaḥ,] yathaikasyāṁ pipīlikāsantatāvekāpi pipīlikā lohiteti-tacca na-pūrvadoṣānuṣakteḥ । [sarvaḥ] pratyayaḥ pravāhāṁśaḥ [sadṛśavāhī visadṛśavāhī vā] pūrvavat [pratyarthaniyatatvādekāgra eveti vikṣiptacittānavalṛptiḥ । tasmādekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ ca cittama] bhyupagantavyam । yadi śāsreṇa cittaparikarmopadekṣyate ॥

yadi ca cittenaikenānanvitāḥ svabhāvabhinnāḥ pratyayā jāyerannatha kathamanyapratyayadṛṣṭasyānyaḥ smartā bhavet। anyapratyayopacitasya ca karmāśayasyānyaḥ pratyaya upabhoktā bhavet। kathaṁcitsamādhīyamānamapyetadgomayapāyasīyanyāyamākṣipati।

vivaraṇam
kiṁ ca- [yadi cittenaikenānanvitāḥ] karaṇena [svabhāvabhinnāḥ pratyayā jāyeraṁ] stadā brūhi [kathamanyapratyayadṛṣṭasyānyaḥ pratyayaḥ smartā] bhaveddevadattadṛṣṭasyeva yajñadattaḥ । [anyapratyayopacitasya vā karmāśayasyānyaḥ pratyaya] upabhoktā ॥
na hi bhaviṣyatputraḥ pitrā racitakarmāśayaphalaṁ svargadi pratyupabhuñjīta । atha brūyāt -viśiṣṭabhaviṣyatputravijñānārthaṁ vinaśyatpravṛttivijñānamālayavijñānasaṁskāra kañcanādhatte iti – naitadevam -ālayapravṛttivijñānayoratyantabhedādavastutvācca ॥
yadyālayavijñānānna tatpravṛttivijñānaṁ, tadā tadeva taditi nāmamātrabhedaḥ, tathā ca saṁskārādhānayuktatvāt smṛtyanupaklṛptiḥ । athāpyanyat-evamapyanyatpravṛttavijñānamālayavijñāne saṁskāre nādadhīta, bhinnatvāt । yathā santatyantarālayavijñāne ॥
kiṁca—yadyapi saṁskāramādhattām, tathāpi pravṛttivijñānāpāditasaṁskāramālayavijñānaṁ deśakālāntarākṣamam । tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamādvinaśyacca tāvatyeva nottaravijñānopakārāya paryāpnoti । deśakālāntaravyavahitaṁ cedupakurvīta, tadā bhinnasantānāntarajanmanāpyupakartavyam ॥
atha kālāntarāvasthāyi, tadā kṣaṇikatvahāniḥ । kṣaṇāntaraṁ cedavatiṣṭheta, dīrghakālāvasthāyitve kasya syādakṣamā ॥
athāpi pravṛttivijñānasaṁskāraviśiṣṭasyāntarālabhāvina ātmasadṛśasya bhaviṣyata ālayavijñānasya saṁskāramādhāya pūrvamālayavijñānaṁ vinaṅkṣyatīti
tacca na-saṁskārāntarābhāvāt । asti cedanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ । atha nāstyādhāra:, tatra kiṁ pravṛttivijñānasyālayavijñānakalpanayā saṁskarādhānāya । yathā ālayavijñānamutpitsiṣyamāṇasya tatkālamasataḥ ālayavijñānasya saṁskāramādhatte, tathā pravṛttivijñānamapi utpitsiṣyamāṇasya tatkālamasataḥ pravṛttivijñānasyaiva saṁskāramādhattāmanapekṣyālayavijñānam ॥
na ca vinaśyat anyasya bhāvinastatkālamavidyamānasya saṁskāramādhatte ityasya dṛṣṭānto dṛśyate । nāpi bhāvinyeva saṁskāraṁ kurvīta । pūrvaṇa bhaviṣyatsaṁskriyate, bhaviṣyati ceti viruddham । tatkālaṁ cedasadbhaviṣyatsaṁkriyate, kiṁ tulyātutyasantatikalpanena ? asaṁbandhāviśeṣāt sarvaṁ sarveṇa saṁskriyeta ॥
nāpi bhaviṣyadvinaśyatoryugapadutpattivināśāvakṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgāt । atha tulāntayoriva natyunnatī yugapatpūrvavināśottarasamutpatī syātām (na) vastuneriti cet-na-abhyupagamavirodhāt । na hi vaināśikenotpattivināśakriyāvyatirekeṇa kārakamanyadiṣyate । abhyupagame ca siddhāntāvirodhaḥ ॥
kiṁca-anyatve ca kriyākārakayoryāvatkriyotpatti karakeṇāvasthātavyaṁ, tataśca kṣaṇikatvahāniḥ । a[na]vasthāne ca kriyārthaṁ tataḥ[tasya]upādānamanarthakam ॥
kiṁ cānyat-kriyāyā eva kārakatve kārakasyāpi kriyātve kriyākārakaśabdau paryāyau syātām । tataścāṅkuro jāyate, devadatto jāyata ityaṅkuradevadattayoḥ paryāyatvaṁ syāt । tayorjanikriyāmātratvāt ॥
atha anyajanikrayā devadattaviśiṣṭā anyā cāṅkuraviśiṣṭeti cet - abhyupetaṁ tarhi viśeṣaṇaṁ kārakaṁ, na hi svarūpeṇa kiṁcidviśiṣṭaṁ syāt ॥
athocyeta, svarūpeṇaivotpattikriyā utpattikriyāntarādviśiṣṭā yathā svalakṣaṇāni rūpādīni iti -tacca na-bhāvābhāvayerekatvaprasaṅgāt । ihāṅkuro jāyate naśyatyaṅkura iti ca ya eva jāyate sa eva naśyati tatrāṅkurajananamaṅkuravināśanamiti jananaṁ vināśa ityuktaṁ bhavati । aṅkuro hi kriyaiva kārakamiti vocyeta । (citaḥ) ॥
athāpi syāt-anyai(nyasyai)vāṅkurajananakriyāyā aṅkuravināśakriyeti--tathā'pyaṅkurajananasya nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ । vināśasyānyatvādeva ॥
athāpi nāśajananavadvastu śabalamiti, tathā'pyabhāvasya śabalatvaṁ prasajyeta । katham ? kriyāvyatiriktasya kārakasyābhāve'pi nāśa eva jananavināśavān jananameva jananavināśavaditi । na hyabhāvasya śabalatvādiviśeṣo nirviśeṣatvādbhāvābhāvayoścāvirodhāt pratyakṣānumānānupapattiḥ ॥
yadapyucyate-tulāntayornāmonnāmāviti-tatra yuktā tulāntayorekakālayorvidyamānatvādanyatarasya vastvantaragauravanimittā ānatiranyatarasya cennatiḥ । iha punarbhavadbhaviṣyatkālayorvijñānayornāśotpattī tulānāmahetuvattṛtīyasya nimittāntarasyābhāvādekakālaṁ nopapadyate । vinaśyadeva vijñānamātmasadṛśaṁ janayatīti na śakyaṁ vaktum । na hi devadatto mriyamāṇa evātmasamānaṁ putraṁ janayati vināśenākṣaṇatvāt ॥
atha mṛtpiṇḍo yathā ghaṭamutpādayan vinaśyati, tadvaditi cet-tacca na-mṛdavayavānāmeva ghaṭākareṇa pariṇatatvāt । ekaiva hi mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭādibahudharmayoginī । yaścāpi bījeṣu dravyāntaravāsiteṣu vāsakadravyānuvidhāyitvaṁ vāsyadravyasyeti - tadapyakāraṇam vāsyavāsakayoravasthitatvāt । avasthitānyeva hi bījeṣvaṅkurādīni vāsyante bījavāsanena । tadanyatvāt vāsakadravyasyāpyavayavānanupraviṣṭāḥ sūkṣmā vidyanta eva । tasmādvidyamānānyevāṅkurādīni bījavāsanayā vāsyanta iti yuktam । asatāṁ śaviṣāṇādīnāmutpattyabhāvāt । asatāṁ cedutpattiḥ syādvāsyavāsakayorvinaṣṭatvādavidyamānatvāviśeṣe bāsakadravyānanuvidhāyi notpadyeta । anyadvā hastādi ॥
yadi vā, atyantāsadeva śaśaviṣāṇādyutpadyeta । ato viśiṣṭaṁ hi trayāṇāmasatvaṁ vāsite bīje । tasmādavasthitaṁ kārakaṁ bhūtabhaviṣyatkālānekavṛttiyogi cābhyupagantavyam । anyathā pratyayamātraṁ kṣaṇikaṁ cittamiti samarthyamānasya [samādhīyamānamapi] (samarthyamānamapi) [gomayapāyasīyanyāyamākṣipati ॥]
yathaiva bahubhirapi govikāratvādihetubhiḥ samīhamāne kṛtāṭopenāpi gomayaṁ pāyasīkartuṁ na śakyam, tathā kṣaṇikena cittena smaraṇādi samarthayitum ॥

kiṁ ca svātmānubhavāpahnavaścittasyānyatve prāpnoti। kathaṁ, yadahamadrākṣaṁ tatspṛśāmi yaccāsprākṣaṁ tatpaśyāmītyahamiti pratyayaḥ sarvasya pratyayasya bhede sati pratyayinyabhedenopasthitaḥ। ekapratyayaviṣayo'yamabhedātmā'hamiti pratyayaḥ kathamatyantabhinneṣu citteṣu vartamānaḥ sāmānyamekaṁ pratyayinamāśrayet। svānubhavagrāhyaścāyamabhedātmā'hamiti pratyayaḥ। na ca pratyakṣasya māhātmyaṁ pramāṇāntareṇābhibhūyate। pramāṇāntaraṁ ca pratyakṣabalenaiva vyavahāraṁ labhate। tasmādekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ ca cittam ॥ 32 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiñca-svātmānubhavāpahnavaḥ cittasyānyatve] pratyayamātratve ’nānyadṛṣṭamanusmaratīti svātmanānubhūtamapahnuvīna ॥
kiṁ tvamadrākṣīrityukto dṛṣṭavānapi nāhamadrākṣamiti buvīta । anyena hi tatpakṣe tat dṛṣṭaṁ dṛśyate । tadapahnave cānubhūtasya pratipattiḥ katham ? ‘ [yadahamadrākṣaṁ tat] ahameva [spṛśāmi’ ‘yadahamasprākṣaṁ tat] ahameva [smarāmi’] iti । saiṣā pratyayasmaraṇayorekakartṛtve sati ghaṭanāmupaḍhaukate pratipattiḥ । anyathā matsadṛśe । yadadrākṣīttatsadṛśo'haṁ taṁ spṛśāmīti smarāmīti ca syāt । [sarvasya puruṣasyāhamiti pratyayaḥ] smṛtipratyayayorekasmin kartari vartamānaḥ [pratyayabhede] paśyāmi spṛśāmi smarāmītyādipratyayabhede sati teṣāṁ ca pratyayānāmekasmin kartari [pratyayinyabhinne copasthitaḥ] pratyakṣaśca ॥
nanvekapratyayaviṣaya evānyaḥ smṛterekatve'pi karturahaṁ pratyemi smarāmyahamiti ca na bhavitavyaṁ, pratyetā smarteti śabdabhedādbheda eva । tatrāha-na-pratyakṣatvāt । tadeva darśayati-- [svānubhavagrāhyaścāyamabhedātmā ahamiti pratyayaḥ ॥]
atha pratyetā smarteti śabdabhedāt pratyayabhedāccāhampratyayasya bhinnaviṣayatvamanumāyiṣyata iti cedata aha-- [na hi pratyakṣasya māhātmyaṁ] prāmāṇyaṁ cakṣuṣo rūpa ivānumānā [dabhibhūyate] bādhyate ॥
kiṁ ca- -pratyakṣaṁ pramāṇamayamahaṁpratyayo na tat smṛtipratyayānāmekasmin kartari sāmānyena vartamānaḥ । sa cet pratyakṣapramāṇabhūto'numānenābhibhūyeta, tadānīmanumānasyāpi pramāṇatvaṁ hīyeta । tanmūlatvādanumānasya । tadetadāha- [pramāṇāntaraṁ ca pratyakṣabalenaiva prāmāṇyavyavahāraṁ labhata] iti । tena pratyakṣavirodhena anumānavirodhena ca prativādi(pādita)pramāṇapratijñādoṣo vyākhyata: ॥
atītānāgatapratyayasaṁskārādhārādananyaḥ idānīntanapratyayasaṁskārādhāraḥ, ekasantānasaṁbandhitve sati bodhātmakatvāt, ātmasvarūpādyathā ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayasaṁskārāśrayaḥ vartamānapratyayasaṁskārāśrayādananyaḥ, ekasantānasaṁbandhe sati bodhātmakatvāt, ātmana iva svarūpāt ॥
vartamānāhaṁpratyayī bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayibhyāmabhinnaḥ, ekasantānayoge sati pratyayitvāt, yathā svarūpāt ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayibhyāmananyo vartamānaḥ pratyayaḥ, ekasantānasaṁbandhe sati bodhātmakatvāt, ātmarāgasvarūpādibhya iva ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayibhyo nānyo vartamānaḥ pratyayī, ekasantānasaṁbandhitve sati bodhātmakatvāt , ātmano yathā svarūpāt ॥
bhinnasantatiṣu parasparasmṛtipratisandhānādyanupalambhādekasantāneṣu ca smṛtyādidarśanādeva siddhamekakartṛtvam । tathā sarvapramāṇebhyo garīyasā pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena । tatra na kiṁcidanumānena sādhyam । na hi kaścit karatalalāñchanadidṛkṣayā darpaṇamādatte । tathā'pi vaināśikoparacitānumānāpaśadamasahamānāḥ kecit pratyanumānāni peśalāni darśayanti । tathā cāha-- [tasmādekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ ca cittam । yasyedaṁ śāstreṇa parikarma nirdiśyata] iti-śāsropadeśasambandhitvaṁ cittasyāvasthitatve hetumupadiśati । na hi viśīryamāṇasya ghaṭasya prakṣālanaparivartanādisaṁskāraḥ kriyate ॥ 32 ॥
yasya cittasyāvasthitasyedaṁ śāstreṇa parikarma nirdiśyate tatkatham –
maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṇāṁ sukhaduḥkhapuṇyāpuṇyaviṣayāṇāṁ bhāvanātaścitaprasādanam ॥ 33 ॥

tatra sarvaprāṇiṣu sukhasaṁbhogāpanneṣu maitrīṁ bhāvayet। duḥkhiteṣu karuṇām। puṇyātmakeṣu muditām। apuṇyaśīleṣūpekṣām। evamasya bhāvayataḥ śuklo dharma upajāyate। tataśca cittaṁ prasīdati। prasannamekāgraṁ sthitipadaṁ labhate ॥ 33 ॥

vivaraṇam
kathaṁ cittaparikarma nirdiśyate ? tathaikatatvābhyāsa iti coktam , kiṁ ca tadekaṁ tattvam? yadviṣaye'bhyāsa iti । tata āha—
[maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṇāṁ sukhaḥdukhapuṇyāpuṇyaviṣayāṇāṁ bhāvanātaścittaprasādanamiti । maitrī] mitraviṣayā bhāvanā । tādṛśī sukhateṣu sukhamanumodayantīmasūyādivarjitām । tathā duḥkhiteṣu [karuṇāṁ] kṛpām anujānatī duḥkham । [puṇyātmakeṣu muditāṁ] puṇyaśīlatāmanujānatīm । [apuṇyaśīleṣu copekṣām] apuṇyaśīlavyāpāreṣūdāsīnatāṁ ca bhāvayedityanuṣajyate ॥
