sarvatraiva [masya bhāvayataḥ, śukla] iti viśuddhaḥ prāṇyupaghātādivarjanācchuklo [dharmaḥ । tataḥ] sa dharma iva jāta [ścittaṁ] prasādayati । tena [prasannaṁ cittamekāgraṁ sthitipadaṁ labhate ।] ekāgratayā samādhīyata ityarthaḥ taduktam- ‘prasannacetaso hyāśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate’ iti ॥
tatropekṣāyā akriyārūpatvāddhamīhetutve sati kimarthamihopādānam ? ucyate-upekṣānupādāne cāpuṇyaśīleṣvapi cittaṁ vyāpāraṁ yāyāt । tataśca tadvyāpāropadhānakāluṣyānmaitryādibhāvanāyā na yogyaṁ bhavati । apuṇyaśīlanimittanaimittikākāravyāpārādadharmoṁ vā mā saṁjaniṣṭeti cittasthitirevopekṣeti tasyā upādānam । cittasthitiśceha samīhitā ॥
tasmāditthaṁ samāhitacittasya maitrīkaruṇādyekatattvālambanaṁ cittaṁ śīlayataḥ prāgabhihitā antarāyā na janiṣyante ॥ 33 ॥
pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vā prāṇasya ॥ 34 ॥
kauṣṭhyasya vāyornāsikāpuṭābhyāṁ prayatnaviśeṣādvamanaṁ pracchardanaṁ, vidhāraṇaṁ prāṇāyāmastābhyāṁ vā manasaḥ sthitiṁ saṁpādayet ॥ 34 ॥

vivaraṇam
[pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vā prāṇasya । vā] śabdo maitryādibhāvanopāyāntaravikalpārthaḥ । maitryādibhāvanādyupāyānāmanyatamena yena kenacit cittasthitiḥ sampādanīyeti prakaraṇārthaḥ । anekopāyapradarśanaṁ kasyacit kvacit sukaratābhiprāyeṇa । pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vyastābhyāṁ samastābhyāṁ vā । pracchardanam [kauṣṭhyasya vāyo] rātamitorudvamanaṁ [nāsikābhyām,] na mukhena । [vidhāraṇaṁ prāṇāyāma] ātamitoreva । yadyapi pracchardanenāpi prāṇaḥ āyamyate, tathāpi bahirvṛttirna nirudhyata iti vidhāraṇaṁ prāṇāyāma iti viśeṣyate ॥ 34 ॥
viṣayavatī vā pravṛttirutpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanī ॥ 35 ॥

nāsikāgre dhārayato'sya yā divyagandhasaṁvitsā gandhapravṛttiḥ। jihvāgre rasasaṁvit। tāluni rūpasaṁvit। jihvāmadhye sparśasaṁvit। jihvāmūle śabdasaṁvidityetā vṛttaya utpannāścittaṁ sthitau nibadhnanti, saṁśayaṁ vidhamanti, samādhiprajñāyāṁ ca dvārī bhavantīti। etena candrādityagrahamaṇipradīparaśmyādiṣu pravṛttirutpannā viṣayavatyeva veditavyā। yadyapi hi tattacchāstrānumānācāryopadeśairavagatamarthatattvaṁ sadbhūtameva bhavati, eteṣāṁ yathābhūtārthapratipādanasāmarthyāt tathā'pi yāvadekadeśo'pi kaścinna svakaraṇasaṁvedyo bhavati tāvatsarvaṁ parokṣamivāpavargādiṣu sūkṣmeṣvartheṣu na dṛḍhāṁ buddhimutpādayati। tasmācchāstrānumānācāryopadeśopodbalanārthamevāvaśyaṁ kaścidarthaviśeṣaḥ pratyakṣīkartavyaḥ। tatra tadupadiṣṭārthaikadeśapratyakṣatve sati sarvaṁ sūkṣmaviṣayamapi ā'pavargācchraddhīyate। etadarthamevedaṁ cittaparikarma nirdiśyate। aniyatāsu vṛttiṣu tadviṣayāyāṁ vaśīkārasaṁjñāyāmupajātāyāṁ samarthaṁ syāttasya tasyārthasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāyeti। tathā ca sati śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhayo'syāpratibandhena bhaviṣyantīti ॥ 35 ॥

vivaraṇam
[viṣayavatī vā pravṛttirutpannā sthitinibandhinī ।] citasyeti vākyaśeṣaḥ । viṣayā gandhādayo yasyā yogapravṛttergandhādisaṁvedanalakṣaṇāyā ālambanībhūtāḥ, sa viṣayavatītyucyute ॥
[pravṛtti] rnāma yogino yogamabhyasyataḥ abhimukhībhāvaṁ pratipadyamānasya yogasya yaḥ prathamo'bhimukhībhāvaḥ pratyayakaraṇo yogānuṣṭhānaṁ pratyutsāhajanano nirmathyamānasyāgneriva dhūmasamudbhavaḥ, sā pravṛttiḥ । sā ca tādṛśī [pravṛttirutpannā] pratyayakaraṇāt praharṣayantī yogina [ścittaṁ sthitau nibadhnāti ॥]
[nāsikāgre cittaṁ dhārayato gandhasaṁvit] prahvādanakarasurabhigandhasaṁvedanaṁ nirantaratayā sammatasaṁyogamivācakṣāṇā jāyate । [sā gandhapravṛttiḥ ।] tathā । jihvādiṣu । dhārayata iti sambadhyate । [tā etāḥ pravṛttayaḥ sthitau cittaṁ nibadhnanti । saṁśayaṁ vidhamanti samādhiprajñāyāśca dvārībhavanti ॥]
[etena raśmicandrādityagrahapradīpādiṣu cittaṁ] dhārayato hṛdayapuṇḍarīke vā dhārayato vaiṣamyādraśmicandrādyākārā [pravṛttirutpannā viṣayavatītyeva veditavyā ॥]
[yadyapi śāstrānumānācāryebhyo'vagatamarthatattvaṁ tathābhūtameva] avyabhicārisvarūpameva । teṣāmanyathābhūtāpratipādakatvāt । [tathā'pi yāvadekadeśo'pi svakaraṇasaṁvedyo na bhavati] pratyakṣo na bhavati śāstrādyupadiṣṭasyārthasyaikadeśo'pi, [tāvat sarvaṁ parokṣamivāpavargādiṣu sūkṣmeṣvartheṣu na dṛḍhāṁ buddhimutpādayati । tasmācchāstrānumānācāryopodvalanārthamavaśyaṁ kaścidviśeṣa: pratyakṣīkartavyaḥ ॥]
[tatra] śāstrādyu [padiṣṭārthakadeśapratyakṣatve sati sarvaṁ sūkṣmaviṣayamapi ā apavargācchraddhīyate । etadarthamevedaṁ cittaparikarma] yadetat [‘maitrīkaruṇā’] ityādinā [‘paramāṇuparamamahattvānto'sya vaśīkāraḥ’] ityevamantena prakaraṇena yamaniyamāsanaviśiṣṭasya cittaparikarmopadiśyate ॥
tadetaduktaṁ bhavati-etatprakaraṇopadiṣṭānāmupāyānāmanyatamānuṣṭhānāt pratyakṣīkṛtaikadeśatayā vidhūta(pidhmāta)saṁśayaṁ tu ā apavargāt dṛḍhāvasthitaśraddhānādi praśāntabahirvṛtti upasthitavaśīkārasaṁjñāvairāgyaṁ [tasya tasya] tṛtīyapādopadiṣṭapariṇāmatrayāde [rarthasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāya samarthaṁ syāt] jñānavibhūtyādiprāpyarthamiti । tataścaivamarthaṁ cittaparikarmopadiśyata iti prakaraṇārthaḥ । tathā ca bhāṣyakāraḥ pradarśitavān- [‘etadarthamevedaṁ cittaparikarma’] ityevamādinā ॥ 35 ॥
viśokā vā jyotiṣmatī ॥ 36 ॥

pravṛttirutpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanītyanuvartate। hṛdayapuṇḍarīke dhārayato yā buddhisaṁvit buddhisattvaṁ hi bhāsvaramākāśakalpaṁ, tatra sthitivaiśāradyātpravṛttiḥ sūryendugrahamaṇiprabhārūpākāreṇa vikalpate। tathā'smitāyāṁ samāpannaṁ cittaṁ nistaraṅgamahodadhikalpaṁ śāntamanantamasmitāmātraṁ bhavati। yatredamuktam – “tamaṇumātramātmānamanuvidyāsmītyevaṁ tāvatsaṁprajānīte” iti। eṣā dvayī viśokā viṣayavatī, asmitāmātrā ca pravṛttirjyotiṣmatītyucyate। yayā yoginaścittaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 36 ॥

vivaraṇam
[viśokā vā jyotiṣmatī pravṛttirutpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhinīti] prakṛtamabhisaṁbadhyate । jyotiryasyāṁ vidyate pravṛttau sā [jyotiṣmatī ।] sā ca śokaṁ vyapagamayatīti [viśokā nāma ॥]
sā ca kathamupajāyata ityāha- [hṛdayapuṇḍarīke dhārayato buddhisaṁvidbhavati] svarūpasaṁvedanam । buddhisatvaṁ hi kiṁrūpamityāha- [buddhisatvaṁ hi prabhāsvaraṁ] prabhāsanaśīla [mākāśakalpaṁ] vyāpi । [yatra] yasmin buddhisattve ॥
[sthitivaiṣamyāditi ।] buddhisattvātmatāsāmyānāpattariti । hṛdayapuṇḍarīka eva dhārayata: pravṛttijyotiṣmatī [sūryendumaṇiprabhārūpākāreṇa vikalpate । tathā cāsmitāyām] ahaṅkāre [samāpannaṁ] syāt buddhisatvaṁ svarūpeṇa sāmyāpatte [rnistaraṅgamahodadhikalpaṁ śāntamanantamasmitāmātraṁ bhavati ॥]
[yatredamuktaṁ yatrā] smitāsamāpattau । taṁ etaṁ prakṛtamasmitātmānamahaṅkāram aṇu sūkṣmam [ātmānamanuvidya] prāpya [asmītvevaṁtāvatsaṁjānīta] iti । yādṛśamālambanasvarūpaṁ tāvanmātraṁ sañjānīte । ahaṅkārasvarūpeṇaiva tadānurūpyādavacchidyate, sphaṭikamaṇirivopadhānarūpeṇa । evaṁ [dvayī viśokā] pravṛtti [rviṣayavatī cāsmitāmātrā ca ।] tatra gandhasaṁvidādirāsmitāmātrāntā sarvā viśokaiva । jyetiṣmatī punargandhasaṁvidādipravṛttipañcatayādanyatra । viṣayavatī tvasmitāmātrāt prāgevetyevaṁ viṣayavibhāgaḥ । [yayā] viśokayā jyotiṣmatyā [yoginaścittaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhate ॥ 36 ॥]
vītarāgaviṣayaṁ vā cittam ॥ 37 ॥
vītarāgacittālambanoparaktaṁ vā yoginaścittaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 37 ॥

vivaraṇam
[vītarāgaviṣayaṁ vā cittaṁ] vīto rāgo yasmāta pratyayāt sa vītarāgaḥ rāgaśūnya ityarthaḥ । sa eṣa viṣaya ālambanaṁ yasya cittasya tadvītarāgaviṣayam । vītarāgaśca pratyayaḥ prasiddho loke । rāgiṇo'pi hi puruṣasya rāgakāraṇe'pi viṣaye, yaḥ strīṣu mātrādiṣu । sa eva pratyayaḥ [tameva pratyayaṁ] vītarāgaḥ [gaṁ] alambanatve nābhyasyet ; na tu tasya yo viṣayaḥ ālambanam । viṣayāṇāṁ khalatvāt । tat [vītarāgapralayālambanoparaktaṁ cittaṁ] tadvadeva vītarāgaṁ prasannataraṁ [sthitipadaṁ labhate ।] rāgādikhalīkṛtaṁ hi kṛtakhalīnamiva turaṅgamānanaṁ pracalati ॥ 37 ॥
svapnanidrājñānālambanaṁ vā ॥ 38 ॥
svapnajñānālambanaṁ vā nidrājñānālambanaṁ vā tadākāraṁ yoginaścittaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 38 ॥

vivaraṇam
[svapnanidrājñānālambanaṁ vā । svapnajñānālambanaṁ vā nidrājñānālambanaṁ vā cittaṁ tadākārameva] bhavati । evaṁsvabhāvaṁ hi cittaṁ yadālambate [tadākāraṁ bhavati ।] svapne ca śabdādiviṣayaśūnyaṁ jñānam । jñānasyāpi svabhāvo'vabhāsakatā । tatrāpi jñānasvarūpamevālambate । na tu smaryamāṇaviṣayasvarūpam । smaryamāṇenāpi viṣayeṇa khalīkāro dṛśyate । nidrājñānaṁ tu viśeṣāgrahaṇātmakamabhāvapratyayālambanaṁ śāntamanantamanubhūyamānācalanadharmakam । tataśca tadālambanaṁ saccittaṁ [sthitipadaṁ labhata iti] yuktam ॥ 38 ॥
yathābhimatadhyānādvā ॥ 39 ॥
yadevābhimataṁ tadeva dhyāyet। tatra labdhasthitikamanyatrāpi sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 39 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yathābhimatadhyānādvā । yadevābhimatamiti] cittasthityapekṣayā । cittasthiteḥ prakṛtatvāt । na tu sukhādyapekṣayā । pratiṣiddhatvācca- [“na tveva viṣayān prāpya dhārayeta kathaṁcana”] iti । [tatra labdhasthitikaṁ] karmaṇyaṁ sat [anyatra] śāstrīyeṣu [api sthitipadaṁ labhate ॥ 39 ॥]
paramāṇuparamamahattvānto'sya vaśīkāraḥ ॥ 40 ॥

sūkṣme niviśamānasya paramāṇvantaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti। sthūle niviśamānasya paramamahattvāntaṁ sthitipadaṁ cittasya। evaṁ tāmubhayīṁ koṭimanudhāvato yo'syāpratīghātaḥ sa paro vaśīkāraḥ। tadvaśīkārātparipūrṇaṁ yoginaścittaṁ na punarabhyāsakṛtaṁ parikarmāpekṣata iti ॥ 40 ॥

vivaraṇam
[paramāṇuparamamahattvānto'sya vaśīkāraḥ ।] antaśabdaḥ pratyekaṁ saṁbadhyate । [sūkṣme niviśamānasya] parimāṇe niviśamānasya yoginā saṁkṣipyamāṇasya । abhyāsakāle svalpamalpataraṁ ca krameṇālecayatparamāṇvantaṁ saṁkṣipyate । sa ca paramāṇuścittasya saṁkṣepakoṭiḥ । tena [tadantaṁ sthitipadam ॥]
[itthamubhayakoṭimanudhāvataścittasya] saṁkṣepaṁ vistāraṁ cānubhavato [yaḥ] tadvirodhinā pratyayāntareṇa [apratighātaḥ sa paro vaśīkāraḥ ।] pūrve'pi pare eva । tathā'pyasyāyaṁ viśeṣaḥ । [tadvaśīkārāt paripūrṇam] anavakhaṇḍitaṁ labdhasthitikaṁ [na punarabhyāsakṛtaṁ parikarmāpekṣata iti ।] pūrvaṁ tu kiyadapi parikamantaramapekṣante ॥
tatra saṁkṣiptā viśālā vikaraṇī ceti trayī dhāraṇā । tatrebhayakoṭisparśinī vikaraṇī । paramamahatvāntaspṛgviśālā । paramāṇvantaspṛkū saṁkṣiptā । sā ca trayyapāha sūtropāttā ॥ 40 ॥
atha labdhasthitikasya cetasaḥ kiṁsvarūpā kiṁviṣayā vā samāpattiriti, taducyate –
kṣīṇavṛtterabhijātasyeva maṇergrahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu tatsthatadañjanatā samāpattiḥ ॥ 41 ॥

kṣīṇavṛtteriti pratyastamitapratyayasyetyarthaḥ। abhijātasyeva maṇeriti dṛṣṭāntopādānam। yathā sphaṭika upāśrayabhedāttattadrūpoparakta upāśrayarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate tathā grāhyālambanoparaktaṁ cittaṁ grāhyasamāpannaṁ grāhyasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate। bhūtasūkṣmoparaktaṁ bhūtasūkṣmasamāpannaṁ bhūtasūkṣmasvarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati। tathā sthūlālambanoparaktaṁ sthūlarūpasamāpannaṁ sthūlarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati। tathā viśvabhedoparaktaṁ viśvabhedasamāpannaṁ viśvarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati।

vivaraṇam
[atha labdhasthitikasya cetasaḥ] atha uktānāmanyatamenopāyena labdhasthitikasya [kiṁsvarūpā । kiṁviṣayā vā samāpattiriti] tannididarśayiṣayedaṁ sūtraṁ pravavṛte- [kṣīṇavṛtterabhijātasyeva maṇergrahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu tatsthatadañjanatā samāpattiḥ ॥]
nanu ca samāpatterviṣayaṁ vakṣyati tṛtīyapāde ‘ [parārthāt svārthasaṁyamāt puruṣajñānam’] ityādinā । samāpattisvarūpaṁ ca saṁyamasvarūpaṁ tatkāryanirvartanenaiva setsyati । tataścānarthakamidaṁ sūtram-naiṣa doṣaḥ-pūrvoktopāyavaśīkāraṇārthavatvapradarśanārthatvāt । evaṁ hyeṣa cittavaśīkāro'rthavān, yena grahītrādyarthasamāpannaṁ cittaṁ tadābhāsaṁ bhavatīti ॥
kiñca-‘vitakadyanugamāt saṁprajñātaḥ’ ityuktam vitarkādisvarūpaṁ ceha darśayitavyam । anuktāyāṁ samāpattau vitarkādisvarūpaṁ na śakyaṁ darśayituṁ samāpattidharmā(di)vitarkādaya iti । [kṣīṇavṛtteriti pratyasta] mitabāhyapramāṇādi [pratyayasye] tyarthaḥ ॥
nanu sarva eva pratyayāḥ pratyastamitāḥ । sarvapratyastamaye hi avasitādhikāraṁ na sthūlasūkṣmādikamālambate ॥
[abhijātasyeva maṇeriti dṛṣṭāntopādānam । yathā sphaṭika upāśrayabhedāttattadrūpoparakta upāśrayākareṇa nirbhāsate । tathā grāhyālambanoparaktaṁ cittaṁ grāhyasamāpannaṁ grāhyasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate ॥]
[tathā bhūtasūkṣmoparaktaṁ] tanmātroparaktaṁ [bhūtasūkṣmasamāpannaṁ bhūtasūkṣmasvarūpāvabhāsam] avabhāsate ॥
[[tathā sthūlālambanoparaktaṁ sthūlarūpasamāpannaṁ sthūlarūpāmāsaṁ bhavati । tathā viśvabhedoparaktaṁ viśvabhedasamāpannaṁ viśvarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati ॥]

tathā grahaṇeṣvapīndriyeṣvapi draṣṭavyam। grahaṇālambanoparaktaṁ grahaṇasamāpannaṁ grahaṇasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate। tathā grahītṛpuruṣālambanoparaktaṁ grahītṛpuruṣasamāpannaṁ grahītṛpuruṣasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate। tathā muktapuruṣālambanoparaktaṁ muktapuruṣasamāpannaṁ muktapuruṣasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsata iti। tadevamabhijātamaṇikalpasya cetaso grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu puruṣendriyabhūteṣu yā tatsthatadañjanatā teṣu sthitasya tadākārāpattiḥ sā samāpattirityucyate ॥ 41 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tathā grahaṇeṣvapīndriyeṣvapi draṣṭavyam । grahaṇālambanoparaktaṁ grahaṇasamāpannaṁ grahaṇasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate ॥] yujyate । saṁbandhaviśeṣācca yathā svapuruṣo grahītṛsvarūpaśca muktaśca cittavṛttiviśeṣasaṁbandhāt gṛhyate tadvat । na tu sarvātmanaiva mahadahaṅkārayorapi grahaṇaṁ mahattvāt ॥
tayorapi [tāvapi] yadi sarvātmanā gṛhyeyātām , cittasattvamātrātmānau jāyeyātām , tathā ca sati tadviṣayagrahaṇameva na syāt । pradhānapuruṣayostu tatsaṁbandhasya cātyantamavyaktasvarūpatvānna svarūpagrahaṇam । nanu ceśvarasyāsarvajñatā, [yataḥ] pradhānapuruṣatatsaṁbandhā na pratyakṣā iti । ucyate-pradhānapuruṣasaṁvandhebhyo'nyatsarvaṁ pratyakṣamityatra tāvat avipratipattiḥ, niravadhikapratyakṣajñānābhyupagamāt । (yatra tvanumānāgocaraḥ) [yattu asmākamagocaraḥ tat] sa eveśvaro jñātumarhati । jñeyaṁ cedasti tatsarvamasau yathā vā tathā vā jānātīti niścayaḥ । ajñātṛkasya jñeyatvānupapatteḥ ॥
kiñca-yadi prakṛtipuruṣau svarūpeṇa jñeyatvamā(nā)padyeyātāṁ tadā buddhivadbhogyatāprasaṅgaḥ । tataśca parārtho'pi syāt paraścānyaḥ kalpyaḥ syāt ॥
nanu puruṣāṇāmanyonyabhogyateti na paro bhoktā kalpyaḥ-naitadevamsamatvāt puruṣāṇāṁ viṣayaviṣayitvānupapatteḥ । na hi pradīpāvanyonyamupakurutaḥ । kiñca - bhogyatve sukhadirūpatāprasaṅgaśca puruṣasya । tathā ca sati pradhānasya nirhetukatvaprasaṅgaścetyevamādayo bhūyāṁso doṣāḥ ॥
nanu ca [‘parārthāt svārtasaṁyamāt puruṣajñānam'] iti puruṣapratyakṣatāṁ vakṣyati-satyaṁ yuktamuktam । ata evocyate puruṣo na svarūpeṇa viṣayībhavatīti । yenaivaṁ tatroktam ["na ca puruṣapratyayena buddhisatvātmanā puruṣo dṛśyate । puruṣa eva taṁ pratyayaṁ svālambanaṁ paśyatīti । tathā hyuktam ‘vijñātāramare kena vijānayāt"] itīti ॥
nanu puruṣālambanoparakta cittaṁ puruṣasya viṣayaḥ । tathā ca sati pratyakṣa eva puruṣaḥ । yathā ghaṭālambanoparakte pratyaye puruṣeṇopalabhyamāne ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ucyate-naiṣa doṣaḥ-ghaṭavatpuruṣasya cittenāvyāpyatvāt । ghaṭādistu bāhyaścittena vyāpyate, na puruṣaḥ, ānantyāt ॥
paricchinnaṁ hi cittaṁ viṣayīkurvanna puruṣaṁ viṣayiṇamanantaṁ vyāptumutsahate । yadi puruṣaṁ vyāpnoti pradhānamapi vyāpnuyāt ॥
tasmādyathā darpaṇe mukhaṁ chāyārūpeṇa gṛhyate, tathā puruṣacchāyākāreṇa pariṇataḥ pratyayo gṛhyate puruṣeṇa । tathā ca vyāsaḥ [‘yathā''darśatalaprakhye paśyatyātmānamātmani' ॥] iti ।
na tu muktānyapuruṣākāreṇa pariṇatau dvāramasti । yadi tadākareṇa pariṇameta, muktasyāpi tatsvameveti dṛśyaṁ syāt । na hi cittasya pariṇāmādanyatvaṁ nāmasti । svākoraṇa hi pariṇataṁ puruṣe na tu cittaṁ na paśyati । svapuruṣe svatvātsati saṁbandhe pariṇatidvāramasti ॥
kathaṁ tarhi svapuruṣādanyasya svatvāsaṁbandhino grahaṇam-ucyate-yathā paradarpaṇadvāreṇa paramukhadarśanaṁ, tathā darpaṇasthānīyaparasatvākārapariṇataṁ svasatvaṁ puruṣaḥ paśyan paramapi puruṣaṁ jānāti ॥
tasyāyamātmā mamāyamityanyatvantvanumānādeva pratipadyate svakīyādanyadīyasatvagataviśeṣaliṅgena । satvānāṁ ca triguṇatvādavaśyaṁ viśeṣāḥ santi । puruṣāṇāṁ tu nirviśeṣatvātsvarūpeṇa bhedī duravabodha eva ॥
[tasmādevamabhijātamaṇikalpasya cetaso grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu puruṣendriyabhūteṣu tatsthatadañjanatā ।] teṣu grahītrādiṣu tiṣṭhatīti tatsthaṁ tatsthatāviśiṣṭā yā grahītrādyañjanatā, tadevāha- [teṣu sthitasya tadākārāpattiḥ samāpatirityucyate ॥]
samyagāpattiḥ samāpattiḥ sā ca tādṛśī pratyastamitabahirvṛttereva bhavati । yadyapi vyutthitacittasyāpi samāpattirasti । tathā'pi sā na samīcīnatarā, rajastamobhyāṁ cittasatvasyātyantābhibhūtatvāditi ॥ 41 ॥
tatra śabdārthajñānavikalpaiḥ saṁkīrṇā savitarkā samāpattiḥ ॥ 42 ॥

tadyathā gauritiśabdo gaurityartho gauriti jñānamityavibhāgena vibhaktānāmapi grahaṇaṁ dṛṣṭam। vibhajyamānāścānye śabdadharmā anye'rthadharmā anye vijñānadharmā ityeteṣāṁ vibhaktaḥ panthāḥ। tatra samāpannasya yogino yo gavādyarthaḥ samādhiprajñāyāṁ samārūḍhaḥ sa cecchabdārthajñānavikalpānuviddha upāvartate sā saṁkīrṇā samāpattiḥ savitarketyucyate ।

yadā punaḥ śabdasaṁketasmṛtipariśuddhau śrutānumānajñānavikalpaśūnyāyāṁ samādhiprajñāyāṁ svarūpamātreṇāvasthito'rthastatsvarūpākāramātratayaivāvacchidyate। sā ca nirvitarkā samāpattiḥ। tatparaṁ pratyakṣam। tacca śrutānumānayorbījam। tataḥ śrutānumāne prabhavataḥ। na ca śrutānumānajñānasahabhūtaṁ taddarśanam। tasmādasaṁkīrṇaṁ pramāṇāntareṇa yogino nirvitarkasamādhijaṁ darśanamiti ॥ 42 ॥

vivaraṇam
saiṣā samāpattiścatuṣṭayī । tatra prathamāṁ samāpattiṁ vyācaṣṭe - [śabdārthajñānavikalpaiḥ saṅkīrṇā savitarkā samāpattiḥ ।] śabdaścārthaśca jñānaṁ ca śabdārthajñānāni teṣāṁ vikalpāḥ śabdārthajñānavikalpāḥ । dhyātavyālambanaviṣayairvikalpaiḥ saṁkīrṇā vimiśrā itaretarapratyayānuviddhā sā saṁkīrṇasamāpatiḥ ॥
nanu ca śabdārthapratyayā itaretaravyāvṛttasvarūpāḥ, yogī caikaṁ vastu dhyeyatvenālambate śabdamarthaṁ pratyayaṁ vā, tatra kaḥ śabdārthajñānavikalpasaṅkaraḥ ? ॥
evamevaitat । tathā'pi ayameva saṁvyavahāro loke, yadutāvibhāgena grahaṇam । [tadyathā gauriti śabdo gaurityartho gauriti jñānami] tyavibhāgena loke [grahaṇaṁ dṛṣṭam ।] evaṁ hi lokaḥ trayamapi gaurityeva vyapadiśati । tathā'nyataragrahaṇe'vaśiṣṭayorapi smṛtiḥ ॥
nanu ca tathābhūtametadvastu-naivaṁ-śabdārthasaṅketagrahaṇottarakālabhāvitvāt । nanu saṅketādapi prāk sāmānyaśabdaṁ yaṁ kañcidadhyavasyatyeva-na-viviktānāmapi grahaṇadarśanāt । [vivicyamānāścānye śabdadharmā] gakārādivarṇodāttasvaritadrutamadhya- vilambitaśrotragrahaṇādayaḥ । te nārthajñānayoḥ । tathā [nye'rthadharmāḥ] sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇadarśanasparśanādayaḥ । tathā (ca) [anye pratyayadharmāḥ] puruṣagrāhyātmakatvāvabhāsātmakatvasaṁskārādhāyitvādayaḥ, na te śabdārthayoḥ । na [tena]paramārthato'nyonyadharmasaṅkaragandho'pyasti । tena [viviktaḥ panthāsteṣām ॥]
tatra yatra kvacana [samāpannasya yo hyevārthaḥ samādhiprajñāmupārūḍhaḥ sa cecchabdārthajñānavikalpānuviddhaḥ] śabdārthasaddhetakṛto ya itaretarasmṛtyanuvyādhastadviśiṣṭathedartha [upāvartate sā saṅkīrṇā samāpattiḥ savitarketyucyate ॥]
anekajanmāntaraśabdārthasaddhetujñānasaṁskāraviśiṣṭatvādyogino'pi prathamatarāsamāpatirlokapratyayāviśiṣṭā । eṣa tu viśeṣo yat labdhasthitipadatvādyogicittasya samānapratyayapravāhateti ॥ 42 ॥
nirvitarkāyāḥ samāpatterasyāḥ sūtreṇa lakṣaṇaṁ dyotyate –
smṛtipariśuddhau svarūpaśūnyevārthamātranirbhāsā nirvitarkā ॥ 43 ॥

yā śabdasaṁketaśrutānumānajñānavikalpasmṛtipariśuddhau grāhyasvarūpoparaktā prajñā svamiva prajñāsvarūpaṁ grahaṇātmakaṁ tyaktvā padārthamātrasvarūpā grāhyasvarūpāpanneva bhavati sā tadā nirvitarkā samāpattiḥ।

vivaraṇam
idānīṁ nirvitarkā samāpattirucyate । [yadā punaḥ śabdasaṅketasmṛtipariśuddhau ।] śabdasaṅketo'syāyaṁ vācakaḥ ayamasya vācya iti samayapratipattiḥ । tajjanitasmṛtiḥ śabdasaṅketasmṛtiḥ । tasyāḥ pariśuddhirmithyātvādvinivṛttiḥ । sā rajastamasornyagbhāvāt ॥
[śrutajñānaṁ] āgamikam , [anumānajñānaṁ] laiṅgikaṁ, te ca sāmānyaviṣaya evānumānāgamajñāne, tayorvikalpo hi viśeṣādhyāropaḥ tenādhyāsena [śūnyāyāṁ] yoginaḥ [samādhiprajñāyāṁ] vyāvṛtalaiṅgikasāṅketikajñānādhyāsāyāṁ [svarūpamātreṇa] mātragrahaṇaṁ digdeśakālānubhāvādibhyo'pi vyāvṛtta ityevamarthaṁ, svaireva dharmairmahīyamānaḥ [tatsvarūpamātratayaiva] tasyārthasya svarūpamātratayaiva yoginaḥ prajñā [avacchidyate ।] na tasmādarthādbahirdeśakālādi kiṁcidālocayatītyarthaḥ ।
svamapi grahaṇātmakaṁ rūpaṁ tatprajñā nālocayati, nirmalataratvāt । grāhyamātraiva sā vibhāvyate । [sā ca] tādṛśī [nirvitarkā samāpatiḥ ।] nirgato vitarko'syāḥ nirvitarkaḥ vitarko'dhyāropaḥ । so'syāṁ nāsti ॥
[tat] etat [paraṁ] utkṛṣṭaṁ [śuddhaṁ pratyakṣaṁ] aparaṁ pratyakṣaṁ sarvasādhāraṇaṁ purastādvṛttimadhye paṭhitamidaṁ yogina eveti । [tacchrutānumānayorbījam ।] yadyapi pūrvoktamapi śrutānumānayorbījameva, tathā'pi tatkārye śrutānumānena vyabhicarato'pi, na punarnirvatarkasamādhijapratyakṣaprabhave vyabhicarata ityata āha- [tataḥ śrutānumāne prabhavata iti ॥]
[na ca (nanu) śrutānumānajñānasahabhūtaṁ taddarśanam,] śrutānumānajñānābhyāmasamānaviṣayamityetat । viśeṣaviṣayaṁ hi taddarśanaṁ, sāmānyaviṣaye śrutānumānajñāne । [tasmādasaṅkīrṇaṁ pramāṇāntareṇa yogino nirvitarkajaṁ darśanamiti (tannirvitarkāyāḥ] taditi tasmāditi) [samāpatterasyāḥ sūtreṇa lakṣaṇaṁ dyotyate- smṛtipariśuddhau svarūpaśūnyavārthamātranirbhāsānnirvitarkā ॥]
[śabdasaṅketaśrutānumānajñānavikalpasmṛtipariśuddhau] śabdasaṅketavikalpaḥ śrutajñānavikalpaḥ anumānajñānavikalpaśca, sa eva smṛtiḥ । smaraṇena hyanyasyānyadharmo'dhyāropyate । na hi vastu svarūpeṇa vastvantare'dhyāropayituṁ śakyam ।
nanu ca kathaṁ śrutānumite pratyakṣe'dhyāropyate । nanu ca prasiddho'dhyāropaḥ, tathā cedaṁ mayā śrutamidaṁ mayā'numitamidamiti ca paśyati ॥
nanu tadeva tat dṛśyamānamapi yadanumitaṁ śrutaṁ ca-na-sāmānyaviśeṣabhedāt । sāmānyaṁ śrutamanumitaṁ ca । viśeṣastu pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ । tasmiṁśca tatsāmānyādhyāsaḥ prasiddha eva ॥
[grāhyoparaktā] yoginaḥ [prajñā svaṁ prajñārūpaṁ grahaṇātmakaṁ tyaktvā padārthamātrasvabhāvā grāhyasvarūpāpanneva bhavati ।] ivaśabdena grahaṇātmakatāṁ na jahātīti । na hi sphaṭika upādhyāśrayatāyāṁ svāṁ svaccharūpatāṁ hāsyati । kiñca-grahaṇavyatiriktaṁ ca grāhyaṁ vastvantaramastīti coktaṁ bhavati ॥
[sā nirvitarkā samāpatiḥ ।]
tathā ca vyākhyātam – tasyā ekabuddhyupakramo hyarthātmā'ṇupracayaviśeṣātmā gavādirghaṭādirvā lokaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tathā ca vyākhyātam । tasyā hyekabuddhyupakramo'rthātmā ।] upakramyate ekayā buddhayā yaḥ sa ekabuddhyupakramaḥ ekabudviparicchedya iti । [arthātmā] bodhyātmetyetat ॥
gavādirghaṭādirvā viṣayaḥ na tu bodha eva gavādyākāro viṣayaḥ । [aṇupracayaviśeṣātmā] aṇūnāṁ tanmātrāvayavānāṁ pracayaviśeṣa ātmā yasya sa [gavādidhaṭādirvā] ālambanaṁ buddheḥ [sa ca] viṣayaḥ [saṁsthānaviśeṣaḥ] tathā saṁsthitāni hi tāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi ॥

sa ca saṁsthānaviśeṣo bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṁ sādhāraṇo dharma ātmabhūtaḥ phalena vyaktenānumitaḥ svavyañjakāñjanaḥ prādarbhavati। dharmāntarasya kapālāderudaye ca tiro bhavati। sa eṣa dhairmo'vayavītyucyate। yo'sāvekaśca mahāṁścāṇīyāṁśca sparśavāṁśca kriyādharmakaścānityaśca tenāvayavinā vyavahārāḥ kriyante।

vivaraṇam
etaduktaṁ bhavāti- [bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṁ sādhāraṇo dharma iti ātmabhūto] na vyatiriktaḥ । yathā sarpasya ābhogakuṇḍalanādi ॥
yeṣāṁ punaratyantavyatiriktamanyadeva kāraṇāt kāryaṁ, teṣāṁ kāraṇatantratvaṁ kāryasya na prāpnoti । aṁśutantro hi tantuḥ tantutantraśva paṭa: । na cātyantānyatve'nyatantratvaṁ dṛṣṭamanyasya । yathā mṛtpiṇḍatantratā na paṭasya, tantūnāṁ vā ॥
kiñca-tadvināśānuvināśitvaṁ ca na śakyaṁ, na hi kapālavināśamanuvinaśyati paṭa: ॥
athocyeta, sambandhaḥ kāraṇamiti । paṭasya hi tantavastantūnāñcāṁśava iti sambandhastatra hetuḥ kāraṇaṁ tattantratvatadanuvināśayoriti ॥
atrocyata-caitrakṣetrādisambandhe'pi prasaṅgaḥ syāt । caitrasyāpi kṣetrāditantratā tadanuvināśitvaṁ ca sambandhaviśeṣāt prasajyeta ॥
athāpi syāt-samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ kāraṇamiti – na - tasyāpi saṁbandhatvāviśeṣādahetutvaṁ, yathānyasaṁbandhaḥ saṁbandhinoranyataratantratvādyahetuḥ evaṁ samavāyalakṣaṇasyāpi saṁbandhavādanyataratantravādāvahetutvam ॥
api ca-na dravyavyatirekeṇa karmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ santi । dravyatantratvādyupapattereva । tatrāpi sambandhasyāpyahetutvameva ॥
kiñcānyat-saṁbandhasya ca saṁbandhinorevānyataratantratvādihetutve samavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaraṁ tasyāpyanya ityanavasthā prasajyeta । yathā guṇādīnāṁ samavāyalakṣaṇāt saṁbandhāt dravyatantratvaṁ, tathā samavāyasyāpi dravyavyatiriktatve dravyatantratvārthaṁ samavāyāntaraṁ kalpyeta, tasyāpyanyattasyāpyanyadityanavasthā syāt ॥
prāgutpatterabhāvāt kāryasya kāraṇena saṁbandhānupapattiḥ, aviśiṣṭaṁ cāsatvaṁ śaśaviṣāṇasya ghaṭasya ca । tatra ghaṭenaiva kāraṇasya saṁbandho na śaśaviṣāṇmādibhiriti heturvaditavyaḥ ॥
prāk asannotpadyeta śaśaviṣāṇavat । yastu tantubhyo'nyaḥ sa tantubhyo notpadyate, tantubhyo'nyatvāt । yathā tantubhyo ghaṭaḥ ॥
itara āha-prāk sannapi notpadyeta, satvāt, vidyamānaghaṭavaditi । yo yasmādananyaḥ so'pi tasmānnotpadyate, vidyamānatvāt, svarūpavaditi ॥
apara āha-yadi sannotpadyata iti sata uttpatyabhāva ucyeta, siddhasādhyatā syāt । athābhivyaktyabhāvaḥ, tadā dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ ॥
yadapyucyate yo yasmādananya iti, tatrāpi siddhasādhyatā dṛṣṭāntābhāvaśca । svarūpādeva hyabhivyajyate, nāsatyabhivyaṅgyasvarūpe'bhivyaktirabhivyañjakasahasreṇāpi śakyate kartum ॥
kiñcānyat-sarvavyavahāralopaśca । kathaṁ ? yadā devadattasya gairaśvo vā prātarvidyamānakarṇalāṅgūla: punaraṭavīṁ gataḥ kenacillūnakarṇo lūnalāṅgūle vā syāt, tadā pūrvāvayavavibhāgādvinaṣṭaḥ, anyastu navaḥ pralūnakarṇalāṅgūlo'svāmikaḥ sañjāta iti yena kenacidupādīyeta, tathā cāvayavavibhāgaḥ sarvatra sambhavatīti svasvāmisambandhādiniyamābhāvādaśeṣavyavahāralopaḥ syāt ॥
atha brūyāt-pūrvopārjitāvayavairevāvayavī navaḥ pralūnakarṇalāṅgūla ārabdha iti-naivam-na hi mātāpitrādivyatirekeṇedānīntanalūnakarṇalāṅgūlāvayavyantarapratyārambhiṇo dṛśyante ॥
kiṁca-yasya ca kṣetre lūnakarṇalāṅglo jātastasyaivāsau syāt, na pūrvāvayavikasya, tatkṣetrajātatṛṇapalāśādivat ॥
yathā cānyakṣetragatāni bījāni salilaughenānyakṣetramupanītāni cetaktadbījaniṣpannasasyaṁ kṣetravāneva gṛhṇāti, na tu pūrvabījavān (taḥ) । na cāsyāsau pratibadhnāti vidvānapi madīyabījapariniṣpannaṁ sasyamahamupādīyeti ॥
tathā lūnakarṇalāṅgūlamapi kṣetravāneva gṛhṇīta । na tatra pratibandha(rūpa) nīyammadīyāvayavairārabdho'yamavayavīti ॥
yeṣāmapyekasmingṛhīte tasminnaśve lūnakarṇalāṅgūlake jāte svakṣetre ca dṛṣṭe sa evāśvadātā anyoyaṁ (vitisanyoyaṁ) mahattamādaśvānmayā datto mahattama iti hareta । haratāmiti cetsarvavyavahāralopaprasaṅgaḥ śāstrake.opaśca । tasmāda[nanyo']vayavebhyaḥ kāraṇebhya eko'vayavī kāryamiti siddham ॥
yadapyucyata-śabdapratyayadharmādibhedādanya iti, tadapyayuktam । dṛśyate hi śabdādibhede'pyananyatvam । yathā hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiriti śabdabheda ekasya, pitṛtvaṁ putratvaṁ ca, pratyayabheda ekasyaiva baddhaḥ punarmuktaḥ sthito gataśceti kālabhedāt । dāhakatvaṁ pācakatvamityādayo dharmabhedā iti । digdeśādibhedāstvasiddhā eva । tasmādāha-ātmabhūtā iti ॥
sa ca [svaphalena vyaktenānumitaḥ । phalena] udakāharaṇadhāraṇasambhavanādinā । yasya hi phalaṁ kāryaṁ vyaktamupalabhyate so'stīti niścayaḥ । [anumita] iti vipratipannāpekṣayā, sādhāraṇaśabdena śaktirūpeṇa vocyate । sa tu pratyakṣa eva avyaktena daṇḍasūtrakulālādikārakavyāpārābhivyaktena [phalena] kāryeṇa ghaṭākhyena prāgapi mṛdādyavasthāyāmāstitvena anumitaḥ sa eva daṇḍādikārakaiḥ [svavyañjakairābhivyajyamānaḥ prādurbhavati dharmāntarodaye ca tirobhavati sa eṣa] bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṁ [dharmo'vayavītyucyate ॥]
etaduktaṁ bhavati--aṇūnāmapratyakṣatvānnāvirbhāvatirobhāvo yuktau । (tata) staśca to । tasmādya āvirbhavati, dharmāntarodaye virodhāttirobhavati ca, āvirbhave ca yo vyañjakādyapekṣate [so'vayavītyucyate ।] yaścaivaṁdharmaḥ so'ṇubhyo'nya iti ॥
kiñca-amī apyanye hetavo'vayavisadbhāve- [yo'sāvekaśca mahāṁ ścāṇīyāṁśca kriyādharmakaścānityaśca ।] pratyekamete hetavaḥ ॥
api ca-eko ghaṭa iti ghaṭaśabdavācyasyaikatvena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt । asti cedaṁ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ yo'sāveka iti । na hi bahūnāmaṇūnāmekatvena sāmānādhikaraṇyamupakalpate ॥
tathā mahatvena । na cāṇūnāṁ amahatāṁ mahatvena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ yujyate । tathā'ṇīyastvena । na hyaṇūnāmaṇvantarāpekṣayā aṇīyastvaṁ ghaṭate । sarva eva hi te'ṇīyāṁsaḥ । nāpi cāṇūnāmaṇutvaṁ gṛhyate'ṇubhyaḥ । aṇutve vastvantarasyāṇīyastvamupapatsyate ॥
kiñca-kriyādharmakaśca । kriyā dharmo yasya sa kriyādharmakaḥ । phalavadvayāpāranirvṛttikaratvadityuktaṁ bhavati । na hyaṇūnāṁ phalavadvyāpāranirmuktikaratvaṁ yuktam । aśakyaprayojyatvādasmadādibhiḥ । kiñca-anityatvāt । na hyaṇūnāmānityatvaṁ gṛhyate ॥
kiṁca-dṛśyatvāt । na hyaṇavo dṛśyante । tathā spṛśyatvācca hānāccopādānācca dhāraṇāccetyevamādayaḥ । [tenāvayavinā vyavahārāḥ kriyante nāṇubhiriti ॥]
yasya punaravastukaḥ sa pracayaviśeṣaḥ sūkṣmaṁ ca kāraṇamanupalabhyamavikalpasya tasyāvayavyabhāvādatadrūpapratiṣṭhaṁ mithyājñānamiti prāyeṇa sarvameva prāptaṁ mithyājñānamiti।

vivaraṇam
[yasya punaḥ] itthaṁ pramāṇasuprasiddhasattāko'pi [avastu[kaḥ]] avayavī, [sa pracayaviśeṣaḥ sūkṣmaṁ ca kāraṇamanupalabhyaṁ] aṇvādi, [tasyāvayavyabhāvādatadrūpapratiṣṭhaṁ mithyājñānamiti prāyeṇa sarvameva] viṣayajñānaṁ [prāptaṁ mithyājñānam ॥]
tataḥ sarvameva jñānaṁ śabdādyākāreṇa sukhādyākāreṇa tadjñānākāreṇa copajāyate । śabdādayaśca jñānākārakarāvayavitvābhimatā nābhyupagamyanta । sukhādayo'pi viṣayatvādavayavipakṣā eva । tathā tajjñānameva jñānākārakaratvātsvarūpamapi mithyeti prāptaṁ sarvameva mithyājñānam ॥
tataśca pratyakṣānumānayorapyābhāsatvameva tenābhyupetaṁ tayorapi śabdādiviṣayatvāt ।
yadapi sarvajñajñānamanityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmakatvādiviṣayaṁ tasyāpi viṣayābhāvāttadapi mithyājñānaṁ prāptamiti, svatantrasya tīrthakarasya cāprāmāṇyaṁ, tatra tīrthakarasahadharmābhāvaścābhyupagato bhavati । śabdādivatpramāṇaviṣayatvāviśeṣāt ॥
tadā ca samyagjñānamapi kiṁ syādviṣayābhāvāt। yadyadupalabhyate tattadavayavitvenā''mnātam। tasmādastyavayavī yo mahattvādivyavahārāpannaḥ samāpatternirvitarkāyā viṣayī bhavati ॥ 43 ॥

vivaraṇam
tadetatpratipādayati- [samyagjñānamapi kiṁ syādviṣayābhāvāt । yadyadupalabhyate tattadavayavitvenāghrātamiti,] jñānasya svākārasamarpakavāviśeṣāt । tacca svākārasamarpakaṁ kiñcana nābhyupeyata iti sarvasyātmīyasya jñānasya tena mithyātvamāpāditam ।
tathā ca samyagjñānamapi kiṁ syāt, yadapekṣayā mithyājñānamabhisandhīyate ॥
yadā cāvayavinaṁ sarvapramāṇasamyaksarvajñānasiddhamapahnute tadā na samyagjñānasya viṣayaḥ sampādayituṁ pāryate ॥
yadā ca na pārayati, tadā kathamabhisandadhīta sarvaṁ mithyeti । samyagjñānamapekṣya mithyājñānaṁ mithyābhāvamāsīdati āpekṣikatvātsamyaṅmithyājñānayoḥ ॥
yaścāpi manyate-nirviṣayaṁ jñānaṁ samyagiti, tasyāpi svarūpāgrahaṇāt tadastitvānupapattiḥ । gṛhyate cedviṣayatvādavayavimithyātvaṁ, tanmithyātvācca tajjñānamithyātvaṁ, tathā tajjñānamapīti sarvamithyātvamuktaṁ pūrvameva ॥
api ca-nirviṣayajñānasamyaktve sarvajñānasya viṣayānabhyupagamānnirviṣayatvamiti, samyaktvameva prāpnuyāt । tathāpi tu sarvajñānasamyaktvānmithyājñānaṁ kiṁsyāditi vaktavyam ॥
athāpi brūyāt-yatsaviṣayamivābhāti tanmithyājñānaṁ, yadatyantanirviṣayaṁ tatsamyagiti । tathā'pi tasyāstatve pramāṇābhāva ityukta eva doṣaḥ । tasmādavayavī samyagjñānasya viṣayo'vaśyābhyupagantavyaḥ ityāha- [tasmādastyavayavī yo mahatvādvyavahārāpannaḥ samāpaternirvitarkayā viṣayībhavatīti ॥ 43 ॥]
etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā ॥ 44 ॥

tatra bhūtasūkṣmakeṣvabhivyaktadharmakeṣu deśakālanimittānubhavāvacchinneṣu yā samāpattiḥ sā savicāretyucyate। tatrāpyekabuddhinirgrāhyamevoditadharmaviśiṣṭaṁ bhūtasūkṣmamālambanībhūtaṁ samādhiprajñāyāmupatiṣṭhate।

vivaraṇam
[etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā । tatra bhūtasūkṣmeṣvabhivyaktadharmakeṣu] tanmātreṣveva [deśakālanimittānubhavāvacchinneṣu] deśāvacchinneṣu kālāvacchinneṣu nimittāvacchinneṣvanubhavāvacchinneṣviti pratyeyakamavacchinnaśabdaḥ । sarvaṁ hi vastu deśādibhiravacchidyamānaṁ viṣayiṇā jñātrā saṁbadhyamānaṁ vyavahārāya kalpate । teṣvevaṁbhūteṣvevaṁbhūtaiva deśādivikalpābhisaṁhitaiva [yā samāpattiḥ sā savicāretyucyate ।] tataśca savicārāyāḥ savitarkāviśeṣatvaṁ siddham ॥
katham ? ihāpyadhyāsaviśeṣāt । ayantu viśeṣaḥ śabdasaṅketārthajñānadeśādisarvādhyāsāḥ savitarkāyām ॥
iha punastanmātrasūkṣmadharmeṣu śabdasaṅketasyāprasiddhatvādviśiṣṭanāmasaṅketajñānānadhyāsaḥ deśādyadhyāsaśca sūkṣmaviṣayatvañceti savitarkāviśeṣatvasiddhiḥ ॥
[tatrāpyekabuddhinigrāhyamevoditadharmaviśiṣṭaṁ] uktadeśādidharmaviśiṣṭamudbhūtadharmaviśiṣṭaṁ vā [bhūtasūkṣmamālambanībhūtaṁ] na tu nirviṣayaṁ jñānameva [samādhiprajñāyāmupatiṣṭhate ॥]

yā punaḥ sarvathā sarvataḥ śāntoditāvyapadeśyadharmānavacchinneṣu sarvadharmānupātiṣu sarvadharmātmakeṣu samāpattiḥ sā nirvicāretyucyate। evaṁ svarūpaṁ hi tadbhūtasūkṣmametenaiva svarūpeṇā''lambanībhūtameva samādhiprajñāsvarūpamuparañjayati।

vivaraṇam
[yadā punaḥ sarvathā] sarvaprakāreṇa [sarvataḥ] sarvatra [śāntāścoditāścābyapadeśyāśca] ye [dharmā] ste [śāntoditāvyapadeśyadharmāḥ] taiḥ [anavacchinneṣu ।] śānta iti yo vyāpāraṁ kṛtvoparato dharmaḥ । udita iti yo vyāpāramārūḍha़: । avyapadeśya iti na śānto nāpyuditaḥ nāpyudbhāvayaddṛśyamānanimittaḥ । tadyathā- suvarṇasyādṛṣṭānekāśrutākāropajanaśaktayastā avyapadeśyā dharmāḥ । [tairanavacchinneṣu] bhūtasūkṣmeṣu [sarvadharmānupātiṣu] sarvandharmānanupatanti tāni sūkṣmāṇi sarvaviśeṣārambhakatvāt । [sarvātmakeṣu] sarvebhyo viṣayebhyo'nanyatvāttanmātrāṇām । [tatra yā samāpattiḥ sā nirvicāre] ti । nirvitarkāyā yallakṣaṇaṁ tatsarvamiha nivicārāyāṁ draṣṭavyam ॥
taddarśayati-- [evaṁsvarūpaṁ hi tadbhūtasūkṣmamanenaiva svarūpeṇa] deśakālanimittānubhavādiviśeṣavirahitena sarvātmakena sarvadharmānupātinā [ālambanībhūtameva samādhiprajñāmuparañjayati ॥]

prajñā ca svarūpaśūnyevārthamātrā yadā bhavati tadā nirvicāretyucyate। tatra mahadvastuviṣayā savitarkā nirvitarkā ca, sūkṣmavastuviṣayā savicārā nirvicārā ca। evamubhayoretayaiva nirvitarkayā vikalpahānirvyākhyāteti ॥ 44 ॥

vivaraṇam
[prajñā ca svarūpaśūnyevārthamātrā yadā bhavati tadā nirvicārā ।] tasmannirvitarkāviśeṣā nirvicārā । tatsvayameva darśayati- [mahadvastuviṣayā ।] mahataḥ vastu mahadvāstviti samāsaḥ rāhuśira iti yathā । tadviṣayo yasyāḥ sā [mahadvastuviṣayā savitarkā nirvitarkā ca sūkṣmavastuviṣayā savicārā nirvicārā] ceti ॥
etayaiva savitarkanirvitarkākhyayā dvayyā samāpatyā savicārā nirvicārā ca samāpattirdvayī vyākhyātā । [ubhayoriti] savitarkanirvitarkayormadhye [etayaiva nirvitarkayā vitarkahānirvyākhyātā] nirvicārā vyākhyāteti । savicārā cārthātsavitarkayā vyākhyātā lakṣaṇasyebhayatra samānatvāt ॥ uktaśca viśeṣaḥ ॥ 44 ॥
sūkṣmaviṣayatvaṁ cāliṅgaparyavasānam ॥ 45 ॥

pārthivasyāṇorgandhatanmātraṁ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ। āpyasya rasatanmātram। taijasasya rūpatanmātram। vāyavīyasya sparśatanmātram। ākāśasya śabdatanmātramiti। teṣāmahaṁkāraḥ। asyāpi liṅgamātraṁ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ। liṅgamātrasyāpyaliṅgaṁ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ। na cāliṅgātparaṁ sūkṣmamasti। nanvasti puruṣaḥ sūkṣma iti। satyam। yathā liṅgātparamaliṅgasya saukṣmyaṁ na caivaṁ puruṣasya। kiṁtu, liṅgasyānvayikāraṇaṁ puruṣo na bhavati, hetustu bhavatīti। ataḥ pradhāne saukṣmyaṁ niratiśayaṁ vyākhyātam ॥ 45 ॥

vivaraṇam
savicārā nirvicārā ca samāpattiḥ sūkṣmaviṣayetyuktam । tatprasaṅgenedaṁ cintyate-ki(masamānaṁ)mavasānaṁ sūkṣmaviṣayatvamiti ॥ [sūkṣmaviṣayatvañcāliṅgaparyavasānam । pārthivasyāṇorgandha] mātrasvarūpamātrateti pṛthivīsamīkṣayā [sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ ॥]
gandhamātrasvarūpamātrasyāpi [liṅgamātraṁ] mahattatvaṁ [sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ ।] tato liṅgamātrānmahate nirvṛttāni sahāhaṅkāreṇa tanmātrāṇi layaṁ gacchantīti liṅgaṁ, layādvā pradhānālliṅgātpratyāgacchantīti liṅgaṁ, tadviparīta [maliṅgaṁ] pradhānaṁ na layaṁ gacchati, nāpyanyataḥ kutaścit layādāgacchati । [liṅgamātrasyāliṅgaṁ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ ॥]
[na cāliṅgātparaṁ sūkṣmamasti ।] sūkṣmaṁ nāma sthūlakāryāpekṣayā kāraṇaṁ, taccāliṅgāvasānam । [na cāliṅgāt] pradhānā(lliṅgā) [danyatsūkṣmaṁ kāraṇamasti ॥]
[nanu puruṣa iti ।] nanu tatra puruṣasyānāśaṅkaiva, kāryakāraṇasūkṣmatayā prakramāt-naiṣa doṣaḥ-puruṣasyāpi kaiścitkāraṇatvasyābhyupagamāt । tadāśaṅkayaiva hyetaducyate [nanu puruṣa iti ।] satyamaliṅgātmaka[tva]maliṅgasya saukṣmyam । kutaḥ? yataḥ kāraṇamaliṅgaṁ liṅgasya । yadyasyānvayikāraṇaṁ tattadapekṣayā sūkṣmamiti prakṛtam । nanu puruṣo'pyaliṅgātmaka eva । bāḍhaṁ, na tu liṅgāpekṣayā puruṣaḥ sūkṣmaḥ । kutaḥ ? yatastu liṅgasyānvayikāraṇaṁ puruṣo na bhavati satyapyaliṅgātmakatve । kāryasya caitanyenānanvitatvāt ॥
kiñca-puruṣasyāpi bhogyatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tathā ca pārārthyaṁ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvaṁ ca, nirhetukatvaṁ ca pradhānasya (puruṣasya) । tacca sarvapramāṇa(prāṇa) viprakupitamityata āha-- [hetustu bhavatīti ।] pradhānapravṛttau bhoktṛtvena nimittaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ । [ataḥ pradhānasya saukṣmyaṁ niratiśayaṁ vyākhyātam ॥ 45 ॥]
tā eva sabījaḥ samādhiḥ ॥ 46 ॥
tāścatasraḥ samāpattayo bahirvastubījā iti samādhirapi sabījaḥ। tatra sthūle'rthe savitarko nirvitarkaḥ, sūkṣme'rthe savicāro nirvicāra iti caturdhopasaṁkhyātaḥ samādhiriti ॥ 46 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tā eva sabījaḥ samādhiḥ । catasraḥ samāpattayo bahirvastuviṣayā iti] bahirvastuviṣayatvaṁ hetuḥ sabījatve । [samādhirapi sabījaḥ] samprajñāto [‘vitarkavicārānandāsmitārūpānugamātsamprajñātaḥ'] ityupavyākhyātaḥ । [sthūle'rthe savitarko nirvitarkaḥ, sūkṣme'rthe savicāro nirvicāra iti copavyākhyātaḥ] vitarkādilakṣaṇasūtreṇa ॥ 46 ॥
nirvicāravaiśāradye'dhyātmaprasādaḥ ॥ 47 ॥

aśuddhyāvaraṇamalāpetasya prakāśātmano buddhisattvasya rajastamobhyāmanabhibhūtaḥ svacchaḥ sthitipravāho vaiśāradyam। yadā nirvicārasya samādhervaiśāradyamidaṁ jāyate tadā yogino bhavatyadhyātmaprasādo bhūtārthaviṣayaḥ kramānanurodhī sphuṭaḥ prajñālokaḥ। tathā coktam –
prajñāprasādamāruhya aśocyaḥ śocato janān।
bhūmiṣṭhāniva śailasthaḥ sarvānprājño'nupaśyati ॥ 47 ॥

vivaraṇam
[nirvicāravaiśāradye'dhyātmaprasādaḥ । aśuddhyāvaraṇamalāpetasya] aśuddhirevāvaraṇaṁ tadeva malaṁ kleśādikaṁ tasmādapetasya [prakāśātmano buddhisatvasya rajastamobhyāmanabhibhūtaḥ svacchaḥ sthitipravāho vaiśāradyam । yadā nirvicārasya samādhervaiśāradyamidaṁ jāyate, tadā yogino bhavatyadhyātmaprasādaḥ] ātmādijñānavivekaḥ । asyaiva vyākhyānaṁ [bhūtārthaviṣayaḥ kramānurodhī] paripāṭikayā yāvatkleśakṣayamanuruddhayata iti kramānurodhī [sphuṭaṁ] viviktataraṁ śuddhatarātmaka: [prajñālokaḥ] prajñaivālokaḥ tayā hi yathāvastu jānāti ॥
[tathā coktam “prajñāprāsādamāruhya aśocyaḥ śocato janān । bhūmiṣṭhāniva śailasthaḥ sarvānprājño'nupaśyati ॥ ” iti ॥ 47 ॥]
ṛtaṁbharā tatra prajñā ॥ 48 ॥
tasminsamāhitacittasya yā prajñā jāyate tasyā ṛtaṁbhareti saṁjñā bhavati। anvarthā ca sā, satyameva bibharti na ca tatra viparyāsajñānagandho'pyastīti। tathā coktam –
āgamenānumānena dhyānābhyāsarasena ca।
tridhā prakalpayanprajñā labhata yogamuttamam ॥ iti ॥ 48 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ṛtaṁbharā] tatra [prajñā । tasmin] prajñāloke'dhyātmaprasāde [samāhitasya yā prajñā jāyate] vivekajanmā, [tasyā] vivekajanmanaḥ [ṛtambhareti saṁjñā bhavati । anvarthaiva sā satyameva bibharti na tatra viparyāsajñānagandho'pyasti ।] prakṣīṇasakalaviparyāsakalmaṣasya hi jāyate । jāyamānā ca viṣayakaळṅgamapanudati ॥
[tathā coktam -]
[‘āgamenānumānena dhyānābhyāsarasena ca । tridhā prakalpayanprajñāṁ labhate yogamuttamam ॥ ' iti ।]
yogāṅgaprajñāṁ tridhā vibhajate । tatraiko bhāgaḥ śāsrācāryopadiṣṭārthānusārī । dvitīyastasyaiva yuktyā'numānena vicāryāgamārthavirodhinirākaraṇapūrvakaṁ tatsamyagupapādanaparaḥ । tṛtīyastu sadāgamānumānasamyagupapakṣārthīlambanasya pratyayasyānuśīlanaṁ rasopayegī । taditthaṁ tridhā prakalpayanyogī yogaṁ labhate ॥ 48 ॥
sā punaḥ –
śrutānumānaprajñābhyāmanyaviṣayā viśeṣārthatvāt ॥ 49 ॥

śrutamāgamavijñānaṁ tatsāmānyaviṣayam। na hyāgamena śakyo viśeṣo'bhidhātuṁ, kasmāt, na hi viśeṣeṇa kṛtasaṁketaḥ śabda iti। tathā'numānaṁ sāmānyaviṣayameva। yatra prāptistatra gatiryatrāprāptistatra na bhavati gatirityuktam। anumānena ca sāmānyenopasaṁhāraḥ। tasmācchrutānumānaviṣayo na viśeṣaḥ kaścidastīti।

vivaraṇam
[sā punaḥ] ṛtambharā prajñā sāmānyapuruṣapratyayaviṣayādanyaviṣayetyāha-- [śrutānumānaprajñābhyāmanyaviṣayā । viśeṣaḥ] viśeṣāṇāmānanyānna saṅketayitu śakyate । sāmānyena hi kṛtasaṅketaḥ śabdaḥ । tataścāgṛhītaviśeṣasaṅketo na viśeṣamabhidhātuṁ jñāpayituṁ vā śanketi ॥
[tathānumānaṁ sāmānyaviṣayameva ।] tadapyuktameva ['sāmānyāvadhāraṇapradhānā vṛttiḥ'] iti । tathe.odāharaṇena ca pratipāditam * [yatra prāptistatra gatiḥ । yatrāprāptistatra na bhavati gatiḥ' iti । anumānena sāmānyopasaṁhāraḥ ।] sā mānyamātramanumānenopasaṁhriyate । [tasmācchutānumānavijñānaviṣayo na viśeṣaḥ kaścidasti] ॥

na cāsya sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭasya vastuno lokapratyakṣeṇa grahaṇamasti। na cāsya viśeṣasyāpramāṇakasyābhāvo'stīti samādhiprajñānirgrāhya eva sa viśeṣo bhavati bhūtasṛ'kṣmagato vā puruṣagato vā। tasmācchratānumānaprajñābhyāmanyaviṣayā sā prajñā viśeṣārthatvāditi ॥ 49 ॥

vivaraṇam
yadyevaṁ na lokapratyakṣeṇāpareṇa bhūtasūkṣmagataḥ puruṣagato vā viśeṣa: prajñāyeta । nānyacca pramāṇatrayavyatiriktaṁ pramāṇamasti, yena tadviśeṣaṁ sañjānīmahe iti cedāi-- [na cāsya sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭasya vastuno lokapratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam । na cāsya viśeṣasyāpramāṇikasyābhāvo'stīti ।] pramāṇāvagamyamānarūpo hi bhāvo'sti rājavīthīmadhirohati । tasmāt [samādhiprajñānigrahma eva viśeṣo bhavati bhūtasūkṣmagataḥ puruṣagato vā ॥]
nanu ca te sūkṣmagatā viśeṣāḥ pratyakṣeṇāvagamyante iti kimīśvarājñāpitam ? vastutvādavagamyanta iti cet---āgamānumānābhyāṁ santītyavagamyanta eva । na ca niyāmaka kiṁcidasti pratyakṣeṇaiva nirgrahyā iti । na hi viśeṣā hastatalagatā api sarve gṛhyante-na-anyavastugataviśeṣāṇāṁ pratyakṣagrāhyatvasyānumeyatvāt ॥
katham ? evaṁ manyate-bhūtasūkṣmādigatā viśeṣāḥ pratyakṣagrāhyāḥ kasya cit, kāryavastuviśeṣatvāt, gṛhyamāṇasvapāṇigatāviśeṣavaditi । [tasmācchrutānumānaprajñābhyāmanyaviṣayā sā prajñā, viśeṣārthatvāditi ।] viśeṣārthā hi sā ॥ 49 ॥
samādhiprajñāpratilambhe yoginaḥ prajñākṛtaḥ saṁskāro navo navo jāyate –
tajjaḥ saṁskāro'nyasaṁskārapratibandhī ॥ 50 ॥

samādhiprajñāprabhavaḥ saṁskāro vyutthānasaṁskārāśayaṁ bādhate। vyutthānasaṁskārābhibhavāttatprabhavāḥ pratyayā na bhavanti। pratyayanirodhe samādhirupatiṣṭhate। tataḥ samādhijā prajñā, tataḥ prajñākṛtāḥ saṁskārā iti navo navaḥ saṁskārāśayo jāyate। tataśca prajñā, tataśca saṁskārā iti। kathamasau saṁskārātiśayaścittaṁ sādhikāraṁ na kariṣyatīti। na te prajñākṛtāḥ saṁskārāḥ kleśakṣayahetutvāccittamadhikāraviśiṣṭaṁ kurvanti। cittaṁ hi te svakāryādavasādayanti। khyātiparyavasānaṁ hi cittaceṣṭitamiti ॥ 50 ॥

vivaraṇam
[samādhiprajñāpratilambhe yoginaḥ prajñākṛtaḥ saṁskāro navo jāyate ।] prajñā hi saṁskārārāmbhaṇīti siddham । prajñābhinavatvāttatsaṁskāraḥ pratyagrataro jāyate iti viśeṣaḥ । prajñānavatvaṁ tu tasyā (sāmānya) anyaviṣayatvāt । tajja [ssaṁskāro'nyasaṁskārapratibandhī] ṛtambhara [prajñāprabhavasaṁskāro vyutthānasaṁskārāśayaṁ anyaṁ bādhate] viśiṣṭayathārthaviṣayaprabhavatvātpratibadhnāti । āmokṣāccheta iti [saṁskārāśayaḥ ॥]
[vyutthānasaṁskārābhibhavāt] vyutthānasaṁskārāśayasya samādhiprajñāsaṁskāreṇābhibhavāt [tatprabhavāḥ] vyutthānasaṁskāraprabhavāḥ [pratyayā na bhavanti । pratyayanirodhe] vyutthānapratyayanirodhe [samādhiḥ] samprajñāta iva [upatiṣṭhate । tataḥ samadhijā prajñā, tataḥ prajñākṛtāḥ saṁskārā iti,] evaṁ [navaḥ saṁskārāśayo] vardhate । [tataśca prajñā tataśca saṁskārā] iti ॥
atrāha-samādhiprajñābhavaḥ saṁskārāśayaścittasyādhikārapravṛttihetuḥ, pratyayaprabhavatvāt, vyutthānaprabhavasaṁskārāśayavaditi, tathā cittasaṁskāratvācceti । tadetaddarśayati- [kathamasau saṁskārāśayaḥ cittaṁ sādhikāraṁ] saṁskāropetaṁ na kariṣyatīti ? ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ-tadvirodhitvāt । kathaṁ ? [te saṁskārāḥ kleśakṣayahetutvāccittamadhikāraviśiṣṭaṁ na kurvanti ।] vyutthānapratyayaprabhavānāṁ hi saṁskārāṇāmavidyādikleśahetutvacittasaṁskārābhimukhabhāvakāraṇatā । tadvirodhipratyayaprabhavatvāttu na samādhijapratyayajanmanāṁ saṁskārāṇāmadhikārābhimukhyanimittatā ॥
kiñca- [cittañca te svakāryāt] saṁskārābhimukhavṛttibhye' [vasādayanti] viramayanti । [khyātipayarvasānaṁ hi cittaviceṣṭitam ।] puruṣakhyātiśca jātā saṁskāraśva bhavatīti viruddham ॥
yo hi vigatatṛṣṇāsamudāyo, nāsau pānīyaṁ pipāsati । etāvadeva cittena puruṣasya karaṇīyam । na hi kaśvit kṛtaṁ karaṇīyaṁ cikīrṣati ॥ 50 ॥
kiṁ cāsya bhavati –
tasyāpi nirodhe sarvanirodhānnirbījaḥ samādhiḥ ॥ 51 ॥
sa na kevalaṁ samādhiprajñāvirodhī prajñākṛtānāmapi saṁskārāṇāṁ pratibandhī bhavati। kasmāt, nirodhajaḥ saṁskāraḥ samādhijānsaṁskārānbādhata iti।

vivaraṇam
kiñca— [tasyāpi nirodhe sarvanirodhānnirbījassamādhiriti । iti] śabdaḥ parisamāptyarthaḥ । [tasyāpi] samādhiprajñāprabhavasya saṁskārasyābhinavasya [nirodhe api] śabdātsaṁskārakāraṇasya samādhiprajñāyā api nirodhe, [sarvanirodho] bhavati । uktamevopāyadvayaṁ paravairāgyavirāmapratyayābhyāsākhyaṁ tannirodhasya ॥
kiṁ punastatsarvaṁ ? yannirotsyate । vyutthānasamādhiprajñātatsaṁskārāḥ । tasmāt [sarvanirodhānnirbījaḥ samādhiḥ ॥]
[sa na kevalaṁ] ṛtambharaprajñājanitasaṁskāraḥ [samādhiprajñānirodhī,] yathaiva tāṁ samādhiprajñāmṛtambharāṁ niruṇaddhi, tathaivātmanā sahātmasajātīyānāṁ svakāraṇa [prajñākṛtānāṁ saṁskārāṇāmapi pratibandhī] nirodhā [dbhavati ॥]
kasmāt ? [nirodhajaḥ saṁskāraḥ] yasmātsamādhiprajñāyāstajjanmanaśca saṁskārasya nirodhe, nirodhakaḥ samādhiprajñājānitasaṁskārādanyo jāyate, sa cāpi yataḥ samādhiprajñāṁ tajjanitasaṁskārāṁścātiraskṛtya na janma pratipadyate, tasmātsa [nirodhajaḥ saṁskāraḥ samādhijānsaṁskārānbādhata iti ॥]

nirodhasthitikālakramānubhavena nirodhacittakṛtasaṁskārāstitvamanumeyam। vyutthānanirodha-samādhiprabhavaiḥ saha kaivalyabhāgīyaiḥ saṁskāraiścittaṁ svasyāṁ prakṛtāvavasthitāyāṁ pravilīyate। tasmātte saṁskārāścittasyādhikāravirodhino na sthitihetavo bhavantīti।

vivaraṇam
kathaṁ punarasau nirodhajaḥ saṁskāro'stīti gamyate ? vidyamāne'pi sa bādhako bhavatīti ? āha- [nirodhasthitikālakramānubhaveneti ।] nirodhasya sthitistasyāḥ kālaḥ sa ca kālaḥ krameṇānubhūyate, yataḥ pratyabhyāsamabhivardhate, tasmāttena [nirodhasthitikālakramānubhavena] nirodha [cittakṛtaṁ] nirodhāvasthacittakṛtaṁ [saṁskārāstitvamanumeyam ॥]
[vyutthānanirodhasamādhiprabhavaiḥ] vyutthānasamādhiprabhavaiḥ nirodhasamādhiprabhavaiśca [saha kaivalyabhāgīyaiḥ saṁskaraiścittaṁ] avasitādhikāratvāt [svasyāṁ prakṛtau] svakāraṇe'smitāyāmahaṅkāre [pravilīyate] pratyastameti । [tasmātte] khyātinirodhajanmānaḥ [saṁskārā] yasmāt [cittasyādhikārāvirodhinaḥ na sthitihetavo bhavantīti ॥]
yasmādavasitādhikāraṁ saha kaivalyabhāgīyaiḥ saṁskāraiścittaṁ nivartate, tasminnivṛtte puruṣaḥ svarūpamātrapratiṣṭho'taḥ śuddhaḥ kevalo mukta ityucyata iti ॥ 51 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yasmādavasitādhikāraṁ saha kevalyabhāgīyaiḥ saṁskaraiścittaṁ] yaṁ puruṣaṁ prati caritaprayojanaṁ tasmāt [nivartate । tasminvinivṛtte puruṣaḥ svarūpamātrapratiṣṭhaḥ kevalo mukta ityucyate,] cittavṛttinivṛttireva muktiḥ iti ॥ 51 ॥
sādhanapādaḥ
uddiṣṭaḥ samāhitacittasya yogaḥ। kathaṁ vyutthitacitto'pi yogayuktaḥ syādityetadārabhyate –
tapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ ॥ 1 ॥

nātapasvino yogaḥ sidhyati। anādikarmakleśavāsanācitrā pratyupasthitaviṣayajālā cāśuddhirnāntareṇa tapaḥ saṁbhedamāpadyata iti tapasa upādānam। tacca cittaprasādanamabādhamānamanenā''sevyamiti manyate। svādhyāyaḥ praṇavādipavitrāṇāṁ japo mokṣaśāstrādhyayanaṁ vā। īśvarapraṇidhānaṁ sarvakriyāṇāṁ paramagurāvarpaṇaṁ tatphalasaṁnyāso vā ॥ 1 ॥

vivaraṇam
athedānīṁ dvitīyaḥ sādhanapāda ārabhyate । kaivalyasya sādhanaṁ samyagdarśanam । yogasādhanāni ca yogadvāreṇa samyagdarśanasādhanānyeva । tāni ca prādhānyenāsminpāde pratipādyanta iti sādhanapāda ityucyate ॥
tathā, yogasādhanānuṣṭhānapravṛttasyānuṣaṅgikavibhūteḥ prādhānyena pratipādanādvibhūtipāda ityucyate tṛtīyaḥ ॥
tathā, sakalayogaiśvaryavibhūtibhyo viraktasya sarvopasaṁhāradvāreṇa kaivalyasya prādhānyena pradarśanāt kaivalpāda ityucyate caturthaḥ ॥
tathā, samādhiḥ prādhānyenādāvupākhyāta iti prathamaḥ samādhipāda ityucyate ॥
tadetadāha- [uddiṣṭaḥ samāhitacittasya yoga iti] -karmaṇyacittasyetyarthaḥ । maitrīkaruṇādibhāvanādyupā(khyā)yalabdhasthitipadasya yoginaḥ paravairāgyavirāmapratyayasādhano nirbījaḥ samādhiruddiṣṭaḥ । [kathaṁ vyutthitacitto'pi yogayuktaḥ syāditi ।] vikṣiptacitto'pi kathaṁ nāma samādhiyogyo bhavedityata idamārabhyate ।
tapa ādisādhanamanukramyate- [tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ ।]
nanu ca tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyameṣu vadiṣyamāṇāni kimarthamihocyante ॥
nanu caitadeva prayojanaṁ--yaduktaṁ vyutthitacitto'pi yogayuktaḥ syāditi ॥
nai tadasti-yatra niyamāḥ paṭhyante tatraivedaṁ prayojanaṁ sidhyati ।
atha kleśatanūkaraṇārthamiti cenna-tasyāpi tatraivābhidhānāt । yathā [“ yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādaśuddhikṣaye”] iti । aśuddhiśca kleśādi: । samādhibhāvanārthañca yogāṅgānuṣṭhānamāmnāyiṣyata eva । yathā [“ samādhisiddhirīśvarapraṇidhānāt”] iti । tasmādiha tapa ādisamāmnānamanarthakam ॥
na-yogāṅgānuṣṭhānasya samyagdarśanopāyasya samyagdarśanapūrvatvapratipādanārthatvāt । sarvāṇi ca yogāṅgāni samyagdarśanopāyatvātsamyagdarśanaprākkālāni । teṣāṁ ca niyamaikadeśa iha paṭhita: sarvopāyaprākkālatve nidarśanāya । yadyapyupāyatvādeva prākālatvamarthātsiddham , tathā'pi spaṣṭatvamevaṁ sati syāditi ॥
nanu caivamapi prāk samyagdarśanādanantaraṁ paṭhitavyam-ucyate-na-samyagdarśanasyaiva sākṣātkleśadipratipakṣatvāt । avidyā hi samastānarthamūlam । sā ca sākṣātpratyanīkabhūtasamyagdarśanena nivartyate । tapa ādestadanantaraṁ pāṭhe satyavidyāsamyagdarśanayorvyavadhānaṁ bhavet । tato'bhiśaṁketa-kiṁ avidyāyāstapaādiḥ sākṣātpratipakṣaḥ ? kiṁ vā samyagdarśanameveti ॥
kiñca---viṣayaśca prathamaṁ darśanīyaḥ samyagdarśanaśāsrasya । sa ca kleśakarmavipākāśayābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ । yathā rogārtaḥ cikitsāśākhasya viṣayaḥ । tapaādestadanantaraṁ samāmnāne viṣayaviṣayiṇau vyavadhīyeyātāṁ, tataścāyaṁ viṣayo'yañca viṣayīti na vivicyeta ॥
pādādau ca pāṭhe samyagdarśanopāyatvaṁ ca pratipāditaṁ bhavati, prathamapādasambandhaśca vyākhyātaḥ syāt-samāhitacittasya yoga uddiṣṭaḥ, vyutthitacitto'pi tapaādisādhanaḥ kathaṁ yogayuktaḥ syāditi ॥
kiñca-samādhibhāvanakleśatanūkaraṇārthatvañca tapaādīnāṁ darśayitavyam ॥
nanu parastādevaitadvakṣyati- ["samādhisiddhirīścarapraṇidhānāt " "kāyendriyasiddhiraśuddhikṣayāttapasaḥ"] ityevam । pratyekasādhanānāṁ siddhiṁ ca vakṣyati ॥
naitadasti-siddhānāmiha tatra sādhanastutyarthamanuvādāt । atra hi tādarthyamucyate । tathā cāha- ["samādhibhāvanārthaḥ kleśatanūkaraṇārthaśca"] iti । tatra hyanūdyante sādhanastutaye । samprati sūtrākṣarāṇi vyākhyāyante-tapaśca svādhyāyaśceśvarapraṇidhānañca tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni । tānyava kriyārūpo yoga: kriyāyogaḥ । tapaādikriyā ca yogārthavādyoga ityucyate । citatdharmo hi samādhiryogaḥ । tadarthaścāyaṁ kriyāyogaḥ । tasmādanena kriyāyogena yogīti ॥
[tapa iti] kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādi, śītoṣṇādidvandvasahatvam । [svādhyāyaḥ] -praṇavasya mokṣaśāstrāṇāṁ copaniṣatprabhṛtīnāṁ pavitrāṇāṁ japaḥ । [īśvarapraṇidhānaṁ] -kriyāṇāṁ paramagurāvīśvare samarpaṇam । tāsāṁ vā phalasanyāsa: parameśvare saṁnyasanam ॥
kathaṁ punaścittasamādhānaṁ prati viprakṛṣṭasya kāyakleśadirūpasya tapaso yogatvam ? svādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānayostu yuktamantaraṅgatvādyogatvamiti, tadarthamāha - [nātapasvino yogaḥ sidhyatīti ॥]
śarīrādipoṣaṇābhiratacittasya kāyendriyamanaḥkhedaparihāraparāyaṇasyātyantaśarīrādyātmatvadarśinaḥ sukumārataraṁmanyasya na yogaḥ sidhyatīti tapasa upādānam ॥
kiñca- [anādivāsanācitrā] -viṣayagrahaṇavāsanābhiranadikālabhiruparacitavicitrabhāvā । tathā [pratyupasthitaviṣayajālā] -vartamānakālā viṣayā eva jāle, tena ca vartamānaviṣayākhyena jālena ānāyena jhaṣāniva cita aśuddhiḥ pāśayati yā sā pratyupasthitaviṣayajālā satī yasmāt [nāntareṇa tapaḥ] tapasā vinā [sambhedaṁ] vināśam [āpadyate,] asambhinnāśuddheścittasya kutaḥ samādhiḥ [iti] tatsambhedanāya ca [tapasa upādānam । tacca] tapaḥ [cittaprasādanaṁ] samādhyantaraṅgaṁ [abādhamānamanenāsevyamiti] yogā [manyante ।] cittaprasādārthatvāttapasastameva cedvādheta tādarthyameva hīyeta ॥ 1 ॥
sa hi kriyāyogaḥ –
samādhibhāvanārthaḥ kleśatanūkaraṇārthaśca ॥ 2 ॥

sa hyāsevyamānaḥ samādhiṁ bhāvayati kleśāṁśca pratanū karoti। pratanūkṛtānkleśānprasaṁkhyānāgninā dagdhabījakalpānaprasavadharmiṇaḥ kariṣyatīti। teṣāṁ tanūkaraṇātpunaḥ kleśairaparāmṛṣṭā sattvapuruṣānyatāmātrakhyātiḥ sūkṣmā prajñā samāptādhikārā pratiprasavāya kalpiṣyata iti ॥ 2 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sa hi kriyāyogaḥ] kimartha iti tasya pārārthyapratipādanārthamāha- [samādhibhāvanārthaḥ kleśatanūkaraṇārthaśca ॥]
kathaṁ punarubhayāthaitvamityāha- [sa hi āsevyamānaḥ samādhiṁ bhāvayati ।] itarayogāṅgasahitaḥ samādhiṁ bhāvayati [kleśāṁśca tanūkaroti ।] vakṣyati ca ["yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādaśuddhikṣaye jñānadīptirāvivekakhyāte:”] iti । tadetadāha- [tanūkṛtānkleśānprasaṁkhyānena] kleśatanūkaraṇāt sañjātasamyagdarśanaśīlanena, [dagdhabījakalpān] bījānīva dagdhaprasavaśaktīn , ata eva [aprasavadharmiṇaḥ] avidyamānaḥ prasavo yeṣāṁ te aprasavāḥ, aprasavāśca te dharmiṇaścetyaprasavadharmiṇaḥ, (sarvabījādiṣu vā draṣṭavyam) tānaprasavadharmiṇaḥ [kariṣyati] prasavaśaktirahitān kariṣyati ॥
[teṣāṁ tanūkaraṇānujanmā punaḥ kleśairaparāmṛṣṭā satvapuruṣānyatāmātrakhyātiḥ samāsādhikārā prajñā pratiprasavāya [kalpiṣyate]] saṁsārābhimukhatāyai punarna kalpiṣyata ॥
yadyapi śāstrācāryopadeśena yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādṛte'pi satvapuruṣānyatāmātrakhyātirupajāyate, tathā'pi na kleśādharmādīnatīvātiraskṛtya sā jāyeteti punaḥ punaḥ kleśādibhiḥ parāmṛśyata ityetaddarśayati [punaḥ kleśairaparāmṛṣṭe] tyanena ॥ 2 ॥
atha ke kleśāḥ kiyanto veti –
avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ ॥ 3 ॥
kleśā iti pañca viparyayā ityarthaḥ। te spandamānā guṇādhikāraṁ draḍhayanti, pariṇāmamavasthāpayanti, kāryakāraṇasrota unnamayanti, parasparānugrahatantrī bhūtvā karmavipākaṁ cābhinirharantīti ॥ 3 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ke te kleśāḥ] svarūpeṇa, [kiyanto vā] saṁkhyayā [iti] saṁkhyāsvarūpapratipādanārthaṁ sūtraṁ praṇīyate- [avidyāsmitārāgadveṣā bhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ] eṣāmekaikasya lakṣaṇaṁ sūtraireva vyākhyāyiṣyata iti [na] vyākhyeyatve yatnaḥ kriyate, vyākhyeyaṁ vetāvadeva ॥
yathā pramāṇaviparyayavikalpādayaḥ parasparabhinnāḥ, na tathā kleśānā viparyayādvedaḥ । kintarhi? viparyaṁyasyaivaite bhedā iti । kasmātū? viparyayabhāvabhāvitvādityetadāha- [pañca viparyaṁyā ityarthaḥ ॥]
nanu ca yathā vṛttibhedavyākhyāne pramāṇavṛtte: [“ pratyakṣānumānāgamāḥ pramāṇāni”] iti tridhā bhedastatraiva vyākhyātaḥ, tathā kasmāttatraivāsya viparyayasyāpi bhedaḥ pañcadhā nopavyākhyātaḥ ? cittavṛttireva ca viparyaya ityuktam । tathā codāhataṁ, [“sadviṣayeṇaikacandradarśanena dvicandradarśanaṁ bādhyate”] iti ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ--kleśānāmavṛttitvāt । na hi kleśāḥ pratyayamātrāḥ, pratyayamātrā hi vṛttayaḥ । kleśāstu cittasya malaṁ, yathā cakṣuṣastimiram । kleśamalaviyoge cittasya viparyayapratyayābhāvāt ॥
yadi hi pratyaya eva viparyayaḥ, tadā yathā kleśanirodhe'pi yoginaḥ smṛtipramāṇapratyayo bhavanti, tathā viparyayo'pi bhavet । na tu viparyayaḥ kṣīṇakleśānām । tasmāccākṣuṣa iva ayathārthagrahaṇanimittaṁ pratyayasya malaṁ viparyaya ityucyate ॥
tatpunaḥ pratyayavyatirekeṇa pratipattumākhyātuṁ cāśakyamita pratyayenaivākhyāyate ['viparyayo vṛttiḥ'] iti । tathā ca vṛttayaḥ [kliṣṭākliṣṭaśceti] kleśena viśeṣitāḥ । na ca vṛttibhireva vṛttīnāṁ viśeṣaṇaṁ yuktam । tathā ['kleśahetukā'] iti ca vyākhyātam । na ca vṛttaya eva vṛttihetukā iti yuktam ॥
tasmāccāvṛttitvādvṛtibhedatvena na tatra kleśā vyākhyātāḥ । tathā coktam- [''cittamalaprasaṅgenabhidhāyiṣyante''] iti kleśānāṁ na vṛttitvaṁ, malatvamevetyabhiprāyeṇa । abhedopacāreṇa tu pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ, yathā dhūmo malairagniṁ garbhādaśāntavṛttāstathā jñānameteneti, (?) tathaivātrāpi ॥
pratyayaviparītatvamāha- [te spandamānā] ityādinā । spandamānāḥ pratyayadvāreṇodbhāsamānāḥ, na hi svatasteṣāñcalanamasti, vastrādirāgavat । [guṇādhikāraṁ dṛḍhayanti] guṇānāmadhikāraṁ pravṛttiṁ (saṁ)kartavyatvaṁ sthirīkurvānti । na hi teṣu parispandamāneṣu kartavyatāśūnyaṁ cittaṁ bhavati ॥
[parīṇāmamavasthāpayānti] punaḥ punaḥ pariṇamayantīti yāvat । [kāryakaraṇasrota unnamayanti] śarīrasya karaṇādīnāṁ cakṣurādīnāṁ pravṛttisrota ucchrā(va)yayanti । kathamityāha- [parasparānugrahatantrībhūtvā] avidyādaya itaretaranimittanaimittikabhāveneti ॥
kiñca – [karmavipākāṁścābhinirvartayanti ।] karma trividhaṁ, tadvipākāṁśca jātyāyurbhogāniti ॥ 3 ॥
avidyā kṣetramuttareṣāṁ prasuptatanuvicchinnodārāṇām ॥ 4 ॥

atrāvidyā kṣetraṁ prasavabhūmiruttareṣāmasmitādīnāṁ caturvidhavikalpānāṁ prasuptatanuvicchinnodārāṇām। tatra kā prasuptiḥ। cetasi śaktimātrapratiṣṭhānāṁ bījabhāvopagamaḥ। tasya prabodha ālambane saṁmukhībhāvaḥ। prasaṁkhyānavato dagdhakleśabījasya saṁmukhībhūte'pyālambane nāsau punarasti, dagdhabījasya kutaḥ praroha iti। ataḥ kṣīṇakleśaḥ kuśalaścaramadeha ityucyate। tatraiva sā dagdhabījabhāvā pañcamī kleśāvasthā nānyatreti। satāṁ kleśānāṁ tadā bījasāmarthyaṁ dagdhamiti viṣayasya saṁmukhībhāve'pi sati na bhavatyeṣāṁ prabodha ityuktā prasuptirdagdhabījānāmaprarohaśca।

vivaraṇam
[avidyā kṣetramuttareṣāṁ prasuptatanuvicchinnodārāṇām ।] kathamasmitādayo viparyayā iti, tatpradarśyate sūtreṇaiva । [avidyā kṣetraṁ prasavabhūmiḥ] ātmalābhakṣetraṁ yathā pṛthivī tṛṇalatāgulmavīrudhāṁ svātmano'natiriktānāṁ, evamavidyāto viparyayādavyatiriktānāṁ [asmitādīnāṁ] caturṇamekaikaśaḥ [prasuptatanuvicchinnodāratayā caturvikalpānāṁ prasavabhūmiravidyā ॥]
viparyayapratyayā hi tāmāśrityātmānaṁ pratilabhante । tasmādavidyaivāsmitādicatuṣṭayarūpeṇa vipariṇamate ॥
[tatra kā prasuptiriti ।] asmitādīnāṁ prasutirnāma dharme ucyate, nāvidyāyāḥ । kāraṇatvāt । sarvāsmitādivikalpeṣvanugamātsarvadā prabuddhaiva sā, na prasuptā । prasvapane vyavahārābhāvāt । asmitādīnāmanyatamasya prasuptāvanyatamasyāvasthānamavaśyameva । anyathā kleśāntarasyodbhava eva na syāt । tasmādasmitādīnāmeva caturṇāṁ prasuptādicaturvikalpatvam ॥
[cetasi śaktimātrapratiṣṭhānami] tyasya vyākhyānaṁ karoti- [bījabhāvopagama] iti । yathā bījaṁ sadevānaṅkurībhavadapi bhūmigataṁ tiṣṭhati, tathā cetasyasmitādayaḥ śaktirūpeṇānabhivyaktasvarūpāṅkurā vyavatiṣṭhante ॥
[tasya prabodha] iti- [tasya] kleśasyāsmitādeḥ [prabodha] udbhavaḥ ālambane viṣaye [sammukhībhāvaḥ] svavyañjakāñjanasya ॥
tatraitat syāt, sarvadaiva kleśasya bījabhāvopagamaḥ prabodhaśca niyamena syāditi । tata āha- [prasaṁkhyānavataḥ] samyagdarśanābhyāsavataḥ [adagdhakleśabījasya] yoginaḥ [saṁmukhībhūte'pyālambane nāsau] bījabhāvopagamaḥ । [dagdhasya] dagdhatvādeva [kutaḥ punaḥ prabodhaḥ] udbhavaḥ । vidyamānasya hi bījasya kṣitijalādisaṁyoganimittaprāptāvaṅkurībhāvo na dagdhabījaśakteḥ, tathā kleśasyāpi ॥
yadyevam , eṣā pañcamī kasmādavasthā noktā dagdhaprasuptatanuvicchinno dārāṇāmiti-na-asādhāraṇatvāt । na hi sarvadehināṁ sādhāraṇī pañcamī kleśāvasthā । yogina eva hi sā, tato nāmnāyate ॥
kathaṁ vā asādhāraṇīti? tata āha- [tatraiva sā] samyagdarśanābhyāsavatyeva [dagdhā nānyatra । kṣīṇakleśaḥ kuśalaścaramadeha] iti samyagdarśana ucyate yogī । [tatraiva sā dagdhabījabhāvā pañcamī kleśāvasthā । satāṁ kleśānāṁ tadānīṁ dagdhaṁ bījasāmarthyam ।] yathā vidyamānānāṁ yavādibījānāṁ bharjitānāṁ bījasāmarthyaṁ dagdham । [viṣayasya sammukhībhāve'pi na bhavatyeṣāṁ prabodhaḥ,] samyagdarśinaḥ saṁskāraśeṣāvasthatvādiṣoriva lakṣyavimuktasya ॥

tanutvamucyate – pratipakṣabhāvanopahatāḥ kleśāstanavo bhavanti। tathā vicchidya vicchidya tena tenā''tmanā punaḥ punaḥ samudācarantīti vicchinnāḥ। kathaṁ, rāgakāle krodhasyādarśanāt। na hi rāgakāle krodhaḥ samudācarati। rāgaśca kvacidṛśyamāno na viṣayāntare nāsti। naikasyāṁ striyāṁ caitro rakta ityanyāsu strīṣu viraktaḥ kiṁtu tatra rāgo labdhavṛttiranyatra tu bhaviṣyadvṛttiriti। sa hi tadā prasuptatanuvicchinno bhavati।

vivaraṇam
uktā prasuptiḥ । kiñca dagdhabījānāṁ ca kleśānāmaprabodho yogina ukta iti । [tanutvaṁ] idānīṁ [ucyate] - [pratipakṣabhāvanopahatāḥ] pratipakṣasya śarīrādyavadyadarśanādeḥ [bhāvanayopahatāḥ] abalīkṛtā mandaprabhāvāḥ [kleśāstanava] ucyante ॥
[tathā vicchidya] vicchidyārthāntaropajanakālāntarāleṣu svātmānamapradarśayantaḥ [tena tenātmanā] yena rūpeṇa pūrvamupalabdhāstenaivātmanā [samudācaranti] punarudbhavantīti [vicchinnāḥ ॥]
yadi vā [vicchidya vicchidya] vicchedakāle [te vyaktenātmanā] svarūpeṇa pūrvottarakālavat [na samudācaranti ॥]
tatrodāharaṇamū- [kathaṁ ? rāgakāle krodhasyādarśanāt । na hi rāgakāle krodhaḥ samudācarati ।] kuta: rūpātiśayānāṁ vṛtyatiśayānāṁ ca virodhāt । sa hi rāgodayāttirobhūto'nyenāvyaktenātmanā vartata iti vicchinnaḥ ॥
tathā [rāgaśca kvaciddṛśyamāno na viṣayāntare nāsti ।] kutaḥ? viṣayavirodhādatra । pūrvatra rāgeṇa virodhādasamudācaraṇaṁ krodhasya । atra tu viṣayāṇāmanyonyavirodhāt । na hi viṣaya ekasminnupajanayati rāgaṁ viṣayāntaramapi tasyaiva rāgasyotpādakam ॥
tadyathā- [naikasyāṁ striyāṁ caitro rakta ityanyāsu viraktaḥ । kintu tatra rāgo labdhavṛttiḥ] yasyāṁ raktaḥ । [anyatra bhaviṣyadvṛttiḥ] anyāsu strīṣu sa hi bhaviṣyadrāgavyaktiviśeṣaḥ [tadā prasuptastanurveti ॥]
nanu ca ‘ [rāgaśca kacit dṛśyamāna’] ityādi bhāṣyaṁ kimarthaṁ? nanu rāgasvabhāvākhyānaṁ, itthaṁ viṣayabhedāllabdhabhaviṣyadvṛttisvabhāvo rāga iti-satyam tathā'pi prakrāntānupayogaḥ । prakrānta hi vicchedavyākhyānaṁ । na caitadvicchedavyākhyānam । nāpi vakṣyamāṇodāravyākhyānena sambandhaḥ । tasya nirākāṅkatvāt ॥
evaṁ tarhi pūrvaśeṣa evāyam । katham ? evaṁ manyate, prasuptatanūdāratvavyatirekeṇa vicchittirnāma dharma eva nāsti । katham ? yāvanna labdhavṛttistāvatprasupta ityuktam । pratipakṣabhāvanopahato mandapravṛttistanurityucyate ॥
yaścāpi labdhavṛttiḥ sa udāra ityākhyāyate । vicchinno nāma sa bhavati, yaḥ kvacidupalabdhaḥ punarupalabhyate । yathā sarasvatīsrotaḥ । na hi rāgodaye krodhaḥ kvacidapi dṛśyate । tasmānna vicchittirnāma dharmo'sti । adarśanāt ॥
atrocyate-yadyadarśanādvicchedo nāsti, tadā rāgasya kvaciddṛśyamānasyānyatrādarśanādabhāvo'stu । nanvastvevābhāvaḥ, anyatrādarśanāt । na hi । kasmāt ? kvacit dṛśyamānasvādeva । na hi viṣayāntarābhimukho na bhavatīti dharmiṇyapi cetasi nāsti । na hi cakṣuḥ kadācidgajābhimukhaṁ na bhavatīti ghaṭābhimukhapravṛttaṁ sannāsti । ghaṭābhimukhadarśanādeva । tadetadāha- [kacit dṛśyamāno na viṣayāntare nāstī] tyādi ॥
tathā krodho'pi rāgeṇodbhūtenābhibhūtatvādvicchinnadarśano bhaviṣyati, sarasvatīsrotovadeva । sa hi rāgo viṣayāntare prasuptaḥ tanurvā । tadābhimukhyenādṛśyamānaviśeṣatvāt ॥
kaḥ punaḥ prasuptivicchedayorviśeṣaḥ ? yāvatobhayatrādarśanamaviśiṣṭam । ucyate-pravṛttadarśanaprabandhasyāntarāvirodhinā'nubaddhatvādadarśanaṁ vicchittiradagdhasya ॥
prasuptiḥ punarnimitteṣu satsvapyadagdhabījasyaivāsatyapi virodhinā'bhibhave nyagbhūtatayā bījarūpeṇāvasthānam ॥
nanu caivaṁ sati “sa(na)hi tadā prasuptastanurve”ti viruddhaṁ, pravṛtteradarśanaprabandho hi viṣayāntareṇa dṛśyate-na-viṣayāntarābhimukhyasya vivakṣitatvāt । viṣayāntarābhimukhyaṁ nāma yo rāgasya dharmaḥ sa hi tadā prasuptaḥ tanurvā । na rāgaḥ sarvedā āmanaiva prasuptastanurvā । kvacit dṛśyamānatvādeva । krodhaḥ prasuptastanurvā ātmanaiva rāgakāle sarvaviṣayeṣu na dṛśyate ॥
athavā vichinnodāharaṇāntarapratipādanārthameva ['rāgaśca kvaci'] dityādi bhāṣyam । kathaṁ ? dviprakāro vicchedaḥ pradarśayiṣya(ti)te । ekastāvatpravṛttadarśanaprabandhasya virodhinā'bhibhavātsarvatrādarśanam । yathā darśitaṁ [‘rāgakāle krodhasyādarśanā'diti ॥]
tathā'yamanyo viṣayaviśeṣe dṛśyamānasyaiva viṣayāntare prātinimittasyādarśanam । yathā caitrasya ekasyāṁ striyāṁ raktasya anyāsu satīṣvapi rāgasyādarśanaṁ [tatra labdhavṛtti] riti kvacidviṣaye dṛśyamānasyaiva yatra [bhaviṣyadvṛtti] viṣaye yadadarśanaṁ, sa cāpi viccheda iti ॥
kasmātpunaranyatra na dṛśyata ityāha- [sa hi tadā prasuptastanurvā ।] na hi prasuptistānavaṁ vā vivakṣyate । yathā tathā vā bhavatu । tatrādarśanaṁ vicchedatvena vivakṣitam ॥

viṣaye yo labdhavṛttiḥ sa udāraḥ। sarva evaite kleśaviṣayatvaṁ nātikrāmanti। kastarhi vicchinnaḥ prasuptastanurudāro vā kleśa iti, ucyate – satyamevaitat, kiṁtu viśiṣṭānāmevaiteṣāṁ vicchinnāditvam। yathaiva pratipakṣabhāvanāto nivṛttastathaiva svavyañjakāñjanenābhivyakta iti। sarva evāmī kleśā avidyābhedāḥ। kasmāt, sarveṣvavidyaivābhiplavate। yadavidyayā vastvākāryate tadevānuśerate kleśā viparyāsapratyayakāla upalabhyante kṣīyamāṇāṁ cāvidyāmanu kṣīyanta iti ॥ 4 ॥

vivaraṇam
[viṣaye yo labdhavṛttiḥ sa udāraḥ ।] nanu ca prasuptatanuvicchinnānāṁ kāryāsamarthānāṁ na kleśatā । na hi prasuptastanuvicchinne vā prasuptivicchittitanniyamāvasthāyāṁ kāryaṁ kartuṁ kṣamate । na hyajātaśśatrurupaghātāyālam । vicchinne vā pradeśe srotasi snātuṁ śakyam । tasmādavidyā kṣetramuttareṣāmityetāvadevāstu । kintairakāryakṣamaiḥ prasuptatanuvicchinairupadiṣṭai: । etadāśaṁkyāha- [sarve caite kleśaviṣayatvannātikrāmantīti ।] na hi śatruḥ prasupto janiṣyamāṇo vā nāpakariṣyati ॥
[kastarhi vicchinnaḥ prasutastanurudāro vā kleśaḥ ।] na yuktamevaṁ bhedena vacanam । ekamevodāharaṇamastu । na codārāvasthāyā anyatra kāryaṁ kariṣyati ॥
[satyamevametat ।] tathā'pi parihāra ucyate, [kiṁ tu viśiṣṭānāmevaiteṣāṁ] aparityaktakleśatvadharmakāṇamiva [vicchinnāditvam ।] vicchinnādyavasthāyāmapi nāpāgamadapakartṛtvaśaktirityadoṣaḥ ॥
tatkāle kāryākṣamatvamiti cet-na-pratipakṣavidhānārthavādvacanasya । na hi śatroradṛśyamānasya prasuptasya janiṣyamāṇasya vā na pratividhātavyam ॥
śrūyate cendraḥ pratipakṣabhayena saptadhā ditergarbhamabhinaditi । tatra kāraṇaṁ svayameva prakaṭayati- [yathaiva pratipakṣabhāvanāto nivṛttastathaiva svavyañjakāñjanena] viṣayādinā [abhivyakta iti ॥]
yasmātte punarabhivyaktāḥ punaśca tirohitāḥ punarapyabhivyañjiṣyante ca, tasmātprasuptādyavasthā api pratipakṣavidhānāya vaktavyā eva, hreśatvānatikrāntatvāt ॥
idānīmupasaṁharati- [sarva evāmī kleśā avidyābhedāḥ । kasmāt?] yasmāt [sarveṣu] asmitādiṣu [avidyaivābhiplavate] pratarati, udbhūtā dṛśyate ॥
kiñca- [yadavidyayā vastvākāryate] prakalpyate [tadanuśerate] tadviṣayā upajāyante [kleśāḥ] rāgādayaḥ । yathā stryādipiṇḍe heye'pi bhogyo'yamityavidyayā parikalpyātmābhimānaṁ kṛtvā rajyate । dharmajñāne viparītaṁ parikalpya dveṣṭi ॥
kathaṁ punastadevānuśerate iti-yasmāt [viparyāsapratyayakāla evopalabhyante ।] itaścāvidyābhedā:, yasmā [tkṣīyamāṇāmavidyāmanu kṣīyanta iti ।] avidyāpraṇāśānupraṇāśino hi kleśā । asmitādayaḥ । na hyasatyāmavidyāyāṁ kaścidapi kleśaḥ sambhavati ॥ 4 ॥
tatrāvidyāsvarūpamucyate –
anityāśuciduḥkhānātmasu nityaśucisukhātmakhyātiravidyā ॥ 5 ॥

anitye kārye nityakhyātiḥ। tadyathā - dhruvā pṛthivī, dhruvā sacandratārakā dyauḥ, amṛtā divaukasa iti। tathā'śucau paramabībhatse kāye – sthānādbījādupaṣṭambhānniḥsyandānnidhanādapi। kāyamādheyaśaucatvātpaṇḍitā hyaśuciṁ viduḥ ॥ iti aśucau śucikhyātirdṛśyate। naveva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyeyaṁ kanyā madhvamṛtāvayavanirmitevacandraṁ bhittvā niḥsṛteva jñāyate, nīlotpalapatrāyatākṣī hāvagarbhābhyāṁ locanābhyāṁ jīvalokamāśvāsayantīveti kasya kenābhisaṁbandhaḥ। bhavati caivamaśucau śuciviparyāsapratyaya iti। etenāpuṇye puṇyapratyayastathaivānarthe cārthapratyayo vyākhyātaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tatrāvidyāsvarūpamucyate ।] kiṁ punaravidyāsvarūpākhyāne prayojanaṁ ? tatsvayameva bhāṣyakṛdākhyāsyate ['avidyā mūlamasya kleśasantānasya'] ityādinā । ajñāte ca kleśasantānamūlasvarūpe tanmūlonmūlanaṁ na śakyaṁ kartumiti tatsvarūpamākhyāyate ॥
[anityāśuciduḥkhānātmasu nityaśucisukhātmakhyātiravidyā ।] katham? [anitye kārye nityakhyātiḥ] nityamiti viparyayabuddhiḥ [yathā dhruvā pṛthivī, dhuvā sacandratārakā dyau:, amṛtā divaॅ.aukasa iti ॥]
nanu caitasmānmantrātpṛthivyādīnāṁ dhruvatvaṁ pratīyate । tatra kathameṣāṁ kāryatvamucyate ? āpekṣikatvādadoṣaḥ । manuṣyādyapekṣayā pṛthivyādayo dhruvāḥ । kāryatvamanityatvaṁ ca sarvapramāṇasiddhaṁ śrutiṣu vacanāt [‘dyaurāsīnna pṛthivī nāntarikṣa'] mityādiṣu siddham ॥
[tathā aśucau paramabībhatse] paramodvegakare'tyantaghṛṇāspade kārātmasadmanīvāśucau kāye । kathama(pi)sya bībhatsakatvamityāha- [sthānādaśuciḥ] garbhāśayasthānatvādaśuciḥ । [bījādaśuciḥ] -śuklaśoṇitabījo hi kāyaḥ । [upaṣṭambhāt] -vātapittaśleṣmopaṣṭambhāt । teṣāṁ cāśucitvaṁ prasiddham । [niṣyandāt] -prasvedamūtrapurīṣādimalājasraniṣyandāt । [nidhanādapi] -- maraṇāt । mṛtasaṁbandhināṁ daśāhādyāśaucasmaraṇam ॥
nanu ca svabhāvato yadyaśuciḥ kāyastasya śaucavidhānamanarthakaṁ prāpnotītyata āha- [kāyamādheyaśaucatvāditi ।] śāsrata ādhātavyameva śai.aucamasminna svato'stīti yāvat ॥
yadvā, karaṇani buddhisatvādīni satvātmakatayā śucīnyādheyānyasminniti, tacchrucitvādasyāpi śaucam । buddhisatvādyādheyaviprayoge cātyantāśucitvadarśanāt ॥
[tasmātpaṇḍitā hyaśuciṁ viduḥ ।] paṇḍitagrahaṇaṁ viparyastadhiyāṁ śucitvagrahaṇakhyāpanārtham ॥ [aśucau śucikhyātirdṛśyate] viparītacetasām ॥
na [veva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyeyaṁ kanyā amṛtāvayavanirmiteva candra bhitveva nissṛtā jñāyate nīlotpalapatrākṣī bhāvagarbhābhyāṁ locanābhyāṁ jīvalokaṁ samāśvāsayantīti kasya kenābhisaṁbandho bhavatīti ।] kva śarīrādiyāthātmyaṁ, kva [bhavatyevamaśucau] (kvacidvi)śuciviparyāsa iti ॥
[etenāpuṇye puṇyapratyayaḥ,] yathā saṁsāramocakānāṁ, [tathaivānarthe cārthapratyayo vyākhyātaḥ,] yathā taskarāṇām ॥

tathā duḥkhe sukhakhyātiṁ vakṣyati - pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairguṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekinaḥ iti। tatrasukhakhyātiravidyā। tathā'nātmanyātmakhyātirbāhyopakaraṇeṣu cetanācetaneṣu bhogādhiṣṭhāne vā śarīre puruṣopakaraṇe vā manasyanātmanyātmakhyātiriti। tathaitadatroktam - vyaktamavyaktaṁ vā sattvamātmatvenābhipratītya tasya saṁpadamanu nandatyātmasaṁpadaṁ manvānastasya vyāpadamanu śocatyātmavyāpadaṁ manvānaḥ sa sarvo'pratibuddhaḥ iti। eṣā catuṣpadā bhavatyavidyā mūlamasya kleśasaṁtānasya karmāśayasya ca savipākasyeti।

vivaraṇam
[tathā duḥkhe sukhakhyātiṁ] vakṣyati । ['pariṇāma tāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairguṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekinaḥ'] iti । [tatra] sarvasmin saṁsāre duḥkhe [sukhakhyātiravidyā ॥]
[tathā anātmanyātmakhyātibodhyopakaraṇeṣu cetanācetaneṣu] gavādighaṭādiṣu [bhogādhiṣṭhāne vā śarīre puruṣopakaraṇe vā manasyanātmanyātmakhyātireti ॥]
atrocyate-kasya punarmanasyanātmanyātmakhyātiriti ? nanu manasa eva khyātiḥ, kiṁ codyate-yāvatā avidyā viparyayaścittavṛttiriti hyuktam । cittameva prāptacaitanyopagrahaṇarūpatvādātmānaṁ cetanamabhimanyate ‘ahaṁ draṣṭṛ śrotṛ vā ahamidaṁ mame'ti cāviśeṣeṇa ।
[tathaitadatra] etasminnarthe [uktaṁ vyaktamavyaktaṁ vā] pradhānādikaṁ śarīrendriyādi viṣayaviśeṣaparyantaṁ kiṁcit [vyaktaṁ] ānubhavikaṁ, kiṁcidānumānikamāgamikaṁ [avyaktaṁ vā satvamātmatvenābhipratītaḥ] pratipannaḥ [tasya sampadamanu nandati] tasya vyaktāvyattātmakasyātmatvenāvagatasya sampadaṁ samṛddhiṁ vibhūtimanu nandati anu hṛṣyati, [ātmasampadaṁ manvānaḥ] ‘sampanne'hamanayā sampadā, mamaiṣā sampadi”ti manyamānaḥ । [tasya vyāpadaṁ] tasya kṣayaṁ [anu śocati] ‘mamaiṣā vyāpadahameva vyāpanna' iti । [sa sarva] evābhimānī [apratibuddhaḥ] ajña [iti ॥]
[eṣā catuṣpadī bhavatyavidyā ।] nanu cāpuṇye puṇyakhyātiḥ puṇye apuṇyakhyātiḥ ityābhyāṁ ṣaṭpadītvam-na-caturṣveva padeṣu yathāsaṁbhavamantarbhāvāt । [avidyā mūlaṁ] prabhavabījam [asya kleśasantānasya] abhiniveśāntakleśānāmanavaratapravartanasya । kiṁ ca- [karmāśayasya] ca trividhasya jātyāyurbhogalakṣaṇa [vipākatrayasahitasya] sakalasya saṁsārasyetyarthaḥ ॥

tasyāścāmitrāgoṣpadavadvastusatattvaṁ vijñeyam। yathā nāmitro mitrābhāvo na mitramātraṁ kiṁ tu tadviruddhaḥ sapatnaḥ। yathā vā'goṣpadaṁ na goṣpadābhāvo na goṣpadamātraṁ kiṁtu deśa eva tābhyāmanyadvastvantaram, evamavidyā na pramāṇaṁ na pramāṇābhāvaḥ kiṁtu vidyāviparītaṁ jñānāntaramavidyeti ॥ 5 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tasyā] śca avidyāyāḥ [amitrāgoṣpadavadvastusatatvaṁ] vastvantaratvaṁ [vijñeyam ।] kimarthamidamucyate ! yāvatā viparītakhyātiriti vastusatatvamuktameva ॥
ayamabhiprāyaḥ-avidyā iti nañsamāso'yaṁ tatpuruṣaḥ, sa cottarapadārthapradhāno vā syāt , yathā rājapuruṣa iti । yadvā, pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ, ardhapippalīti ॥
tatra yadi pūrvapadārthapradhānastadānīṁ vidyāyāḥ pramāṇasyābhāva (vādi) iti, yatraiva vidyāprasaṅgo vṛttisāmānyāttatraiva (smṛtya)vṛttyantarādau pratītiriti, anirdhāritaviśeṣatatvo'rthaḥ prajñāyeta । yā tu viparītākhyātiḥ pūrvoktā avidyeti sā pāribhāṣikī syāt ॥
tataḥ ko doṣaḥ syāt ? avidyāśabdaśravaṇe sandehaḥ syāt । kiṁ prasiddha eva śabdārtha: paribhāṣita: śākhasaṁvyavahārārthaṁ, yathā [loke yeṣvarthaṣu prasiddhāni padāni tāni sati sambhave tadarthānyeva sūtreṣvityavagantavyaṁ] iti । athāśabdārtha eva, yathā [‘iko guṇavṛddhī'] iti । tataścāniścite padārthe nāvidyāśabdena vyavahāra: kriyeta ॥
athottarapadārthaprādhānyaṁ samānādhikaraṇatvānnīlotpalavat, tatrāpi nīlotpalaśabdārthayoravirodhādviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvena saṁbandho yuktaḥ ॥
iha nañā nivṛttirucyate । vidyāśabdenāpi vidyā । tatra yadyuttarapadasyārthaṁ pradhānaṁ prati guṇabhūto nañ tasyaivottarapadārthasyābhāvaṁ kuryāt, tadā tadguṇatvameva hīyeta । nāpītarasya prādhānyam ॥
yo hi kañcinnirvartayituṁ anuprasthito nirvartyameva vyāpādayet, na tasya nirvartyaṁ prati guṇatvam । nāpi nirvartyasya pradhānatā, tadvat । tasmāt pradhānavaśavartinā guṇena bhavitavyamiti vidyāyāmanyasyābhāva eveti kevalo nañ nityānuvādīti vidyāmātraṁ pratīyeta ॥
tadetadevaṁ kṛtvocyate । [‘tasyāścāmitrāgoṣpadavadvastusatatvaṁ vijñeyam’] iti । [yathā amitro na mitrābhāvaḥ] yathā pūrvapadārtheprādhānye ardhapippalīti । [na mitramātram ।] yathoktaṁ uttarapadārthaprādhānye pradhānavaśavartinā guṇena bhavitavyaṁ, na pradhānavināśeneti । tathā coktam-- [“abrāhmaṇamānayetyukte brāhmaṇamātrasyānayanaṁ prāpnotī'ti] nañvārtike । uttarapadārthaprādhānyapakṣe naño nityānuvādatvāt । evamamitra iti । evamavidyādi ॥
[yathā vā agoṣpadaṁ na goṣpadābhāvo na goṣpadamātraṁ, kintu deśa eva tābhyāṁ] goṣpadābhāvagoṣpadamātrābhyām [anyadvastvantaram । [kathamevam?]] dhyavasāyasvarūpayā: [ekātmateva] ekaśvāsāvātmā ca tasya bhāva ekātmatā । ivaśabdenātyantaviviktatāmācaṣṭe । [ekasvarūpāpattirivāsmitā kleśa ucyate ॥]
tataścāgoṣpadamiti goṣpadaprasakto'rthaḥ , goṣpadamātraṁ, goṣpadaviruddhaśceti trayo'rthāḥ pratibhānti । tatra yadi goṣpadamātraṁ bhavettadā nañaḥ prayogo'narthaka eva । anyābhāvānuvādī cedgoṣpade nañ syādevamapyanarthaka eva ।
atha goṣpadaprasaṅgayukte'rthe, tathāpi nañamukhye'rthe pravṛttassyāt , gobhiratyantāsevitatvasyānuktatvāt । yataḥ sevitattve bhaviṣyatyapi triṣvapi kāleṣu śabdaprayogo yuktassyāt । mukhyaścārtho nāma sa bhavati, yatra gobhiḥ sevitaṁ na bhūtaṁ na vartate nāpi bhaviṣyati । tasmāt, sati sambhave nañarthaḥ sa eva yukta iti na sevitaprasaṅgo nāpi sevitamātra iṣyate । gosevitaviruddha eva deśo'goṣpadaśabdenābhidhīyate ।
kathaṁ punarnīlotpalavadviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvaḥ ekasya, bhāvābhāvayorvirodhāt । tadabhāvapratipādanamātreṇa saṁvyavahārānupapatteḥ yasmin vastuni tadabhāva ucyate tadeva vastvantaraṁ pratīyate । taduktam - "goṣpadaṁ sevitāsevitapramāṇeṣu iti" ।
atrāsevitagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe ca bahuvrīhirayaṁ vijñāyate, avidyamānasevitāsevita iti । (tasmāt) avidyā na pramāṇaṁ na ca pramāṇābhāvaḥ । [kintu viparītaṁ jñānāntaramiti] ॥ 5 ॥
dṛgdarśanaśaktyorekātmatevāsmitā ॥ 6 ॥

puruṣo dṛkśaktirbuddhirdarśanaśaktirityetayorekasvarūpāpattirivāsmitā kleśa ucyate। bhoktṛbhogyaśaktyoratyantavibhaktayoratyantāsaṁkīrṇayoravibhāgaprāptāviva satyāṁ bhogaḥ kalpate। svarūpapratilambhe tu tayoḥ kaivalyameva bhavati kuto bhoga iti। tathā coktam – ‘buddhitaḥ paraṁ puruṣamākāraśīlavidyādibhirvibhaktamapaśyankuryāttatrā''tmabuddhiṁ mohena’ iti ॥ 6 ॥

vivaraṇam
adhunāsmitākhyaṁ viparyayamācaṣṭe - dṛk darśanam upalabdhiḥ puruṣaḥ sa eva śaktiḥ । dṛśyate'neneti darśanam । saiva śaktiḥ antaḥkaraṇādhyavasāyarūpā । tayoḥ dṛgdarśanaśaktyoḥ upalabdhyadhyavasayasvarūpayoḥ ekātmateva ekaścāsāvātmā ca tasya bhāva ekātmatā । ivaśabdenātyantaviviktatāmācaṣṭe । ekasvarūpāpattirivāsmitā kleśa ucyate ॥
yasminnahaṁpratyaye cittapuruṣayorviveko nopalabhyate so'yamahaṁpratyayo'smitākhyaḥ kleśa ucyate ।
pūrvatra tu puruṣopakaraṇe'ntaḥkaraṇe'nātmanyātmakhyatiriti viparītadarśanamevāvidyetyuktama । iha tu punarbuddhipuruṣayoraviśeṣadarśanamekasvarūpāpattiriva darśanamasmiteti viśeṣaḥ ॥
tadetaduktaṁ bhavati - [bhoktṛbhogyaśaktyoratyantāviviktayoḥ] atyantāsaṅkīrṇayoḥ [avibhāgaprāptāviva satyāṁ bhogaḥ kalpate ।] bhogaheturasmitābhidhānakleśa ityarthaḥ । sati hyahaṁpratyaye sukhito'haṁ du:khito'hamati sukhadu:khādisambandho bhavati । tasmādetadevamiti ॥
[svarūpapratilambhe tu tayoḥ] viveke nāhaṁ mameti svarūpopalabdhau satyāṁ buddhipuruṣayoḥ kaivalyameva avimiśrataiva bhavati । [kuto bhoga iti ।] kāraṇe hyaviśeṣāhaṁpratyayātmani sati kāryaṁ bhogaḥ, tasminnasati kāraṇe na bhoga iti ॥
na hi manasi cetanāvatvamanadhyāropya sukhitvaṁ duḥkhitvaṁ vā śakyaṁ pratyetum । ahaṁpratyayaviṣayo hi sukhaduḥkhapralyayādhikaraṇam । 'ahaṁ sukhī duḥkhī cāham' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt । tasmādasmitākhyo'haṅkāro bhogahetuḥ ॥
[tathā coktaṁ-buddhitaḥ paraṁ puruṣaṁ] buddhitaḥ sakāśāt [vibhaktaṁ] vilakṣaṇamanyam । kairguṇairvibhāga ityāha- [ākāraśīlavidyābhiḥ ākāreṇa] vṛtisārūmyeṇa, [śīlena] buddhipratisaṁveditathā । [vidyayā] caitanyasvarūpatayā । athavā [ākāreṇa] śuddhānantasvarūpatvena, [śīlena] apariṇāmitvādapratisaṁkramatvena, [vidyayā] citiśaktisvarūpatayā । tadetairdharmarbuddhito vibhāgaḥ ॥
tathā buddherapi [ākāreṇa] sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvena, [śīlena] prakhyāpravṛttisthityātmanā, [vidyayā] sarvārthīdhyavasāyātmakatvena puruṣāt [vibhāgaḥ ।] itthamanyonyamākāraśīlavidyābhirvibhaktaṁ puruṣaṁ [apaśyan kuryāttatra] tasyāṁ buddhau [ātmabuddhim] ātmapratyayaṁ [mohena] loka iti । vidyāśīlākārairatyantavibhaktayorbuddhipuruṣaye.oravibhāga iva taddarśanamityanenāṁśenodāharaṇam ॥
yattu [vibhaktamapaśyan kuryāttatrātmabuddhim] iti । sā pūrvoktaivāvidyā । yadvā asmitāyā avidyābhedatvāt sarvamudāharaṇamiti । apaśyan kuryāditi puruṣasvarūpādarśanamavidyāyāḥ, asmitāyāśca hetuḥ kāraṇaṁ cittasya draṣṭṛdṛśyoparaktatā । puruṣasya tvadarśanaṁ draṣṭṛtvādeva ॥ 6 ॥
sukhānuśayī rāgaḥ ॥ 7 ॥
sukhābhijñasya sukhānusmṛtipūrvaḥ sukhe tatsādhane vā yo gardhastṛṣṇā lobhaḥ sa rāga iti ॥ 7 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sukhānujanmā] sukhānuśayī [rāgaḥ ।] anu janma, anu utpattiryasya saḥ । [sukhānuśayī] tathā [duḥkhānuśayīti] anyeṣāṁ pāṭhaḥ । [sukhānuśayī rāgaḥ duḥkhānuśayī dveṣa] iti te vyācakṣate, sukhamanubhavituṁ śīlamasya sa sukhānuśayī, tathā duḥkhānuśayīti । ubhayadhā'pyanujanmataiva । tadeva tācchīlyam । tathā ca vakṣyati- ['dharmātsukhaṁ sukhādraga:'] iti ॥
kathaṁ sukhānuśayitvamiti tadāha - [sukhābhijñasya] sukhe ābhijñānamābhijñā yasya sa sukhābhijñaḥ sukhaṁ ya upalabdhavāṁstasya, sukhābhijñasya [sukhānusmṛtipūrvaḥ] sukhaṁ pūrvānubhūtamanusmaran [sukhe] hlāde [tatsādhane vā] agarucandanādāvanurajyate । tatra [yo'sau gardhaḥ sa] ucyate [tṛṣṇā lobho rāga iti ॥ 7 ॥]
duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ ॥ 8 ॥
duḥkhābhijñasya duḥkhānusmṛtipūrvo duḥkhe tatsādhane vā yaḥ pratigho manyurjighāṁsā krodhaḥ sa dveṣaḥ ॥ 8 ॥

vivaraṇam
[duḥkhānujanmā] duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ । duḥkhamuktam [‘yenābhihatāḥ prāṇinastadapaghātāya prayatante'] iti । [duḥkhābhijñasyeti] pūrvavadvyākhyānam । [duḥkhānusmṛtipūrvo duḥkhe tatsādhane vā] sataskarārdau [yo manyurujjihāsā] uddhātumicchā [krodhaḥ sa dveṣaḥ ।] rāgeṇa tulyaṁ vyākhyānaṁ sarvam ॥ 8 ॥
svarasavāhī viduṣo'pi tathā rūḍho'bhiniveśaḥ ॥ 9 ॥

sarvasya prāṇina iyamātmāśīrnityā bhavati mā na bhūvaṁ bhūyāsamiti। na cānanubhūtamaraṇadharmakasyaiṣā bhavatyātmāśīḥ। etayā ca pūrvajanmānubhavaḥ pratīyate। sa cāyamabhiniveśaḥ kleśaḥ svarasavāhī kṛmerapi jātamātrasya pratyakṣānumānāgamairasaṁbhāvito maraṇatrāsa ucchedadṛṣṭyātmakaḥ pūrvajanmānubhū'taṁ maraṇaduḥkhamanumāpayati।

vivaraṇam
[svarasavāhī viduṣo'pi tathā rūḍho'bhiniveśaḥ svarasena] svabhāvena cittasyavidyāmātraṇa [voḍhuṁ] pravartirnu [śīlamasya ।] vahaterakarmakasyāpi darśanāt yathā nadī vahatīti । athavā [svarasaṁ] svabhāvaṁ [voḍhuṁ śīlamasya svarasavāhī viduṣo'pi] samyagdarśanasyāpi । apiśabdādaviduṣa eva yukto maraṇatrāsa ātmocchedamānina ityabhiprāyaḥ । samyagdarśanasyātmānucchedamānino'yukta iti । tathā vimūḍhatarabuddhiṣvātmocchedadarśiṣvayamabhiprāyo maraṇatrāso rūḍho'bhiniviṣṭaḥ sthiro yathā tathaiva viduṣe'pyātmānucchedadarśitvādayukto'pi rūḍhaḥ ॥
kasmāt punarayaṁ maraṇatrāsaḥ svarasenaiva rūḍha iti ? yataḥ [sarvasya prāṇinaḥ iyamātmāśīrnityā bhavati,] yadasau [maraṇaṁ mānvabhūvam] ucchedaṁ mā prāpam । iyamāśīrvā, [bhūyāsaṁ] guṇaiḥ śubhātmabhiḥ sampatsīyeti na tairviyogo bhūyāditi । mūḍheṣu bhogasampadāmātmanaścānucchedaḥ prārthanīyaḥ ॥
kimetayā''śiṣā avagamyata ityāha- [na cānanubhūtamaraṇadharmakasya bhavatyeṣā ā.ātmāśī] riti । [etayā ca] ātmāśiṣā [pūrvajanmānubhavaḥ pratīyate ।] tadetaduktaṁ bhavati-na hyananubhūte sukhe bhavati prārthanā, nāpyananubhūte duḥkhe tatparihāravāñchā bhavatīti । yenāpi pratyakṣānumānābhyāmananubhūtaṁ maraṇaduḥkhaṁ tasyāpyanayātmāśiṣā pūrvo maraṇānubhavaḥ pratīyate, so'pi nāntareṇa janmeti janmānubhavaḥ । tayā pūrvaḥ pūrvo janmamaraṇānubhavo'nādiriti mataḥ । [sa cāyamabhiniveśaḥ leśaḥ kṛmerapi jātamātrasyeti ॥]
maraṇānubhavakāraṇamācaṣṭe- [pratyakṣānumānāgamairasambhāvito maraṇātrāsa ucchedadṛṣṭadyātmaka] ātmabhogocchedapratipattihetuḥ [pūrvajanmānubhūtaṁ maraṇadu:khamanumāpayati ।]
yathā cāyamatyantamūḍheṣu dṛśyate kleśastathā viduṣo'pi vijñātapūrvāparāntasya rūḍhaḥ। kasmāt। samānā hi tayoḥ kuśalākuśalayormaraṇaduḥkhānubhavādiyaṁ vāsaneti ॥ 9 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yathā cāyamatyantamūḍheṣu dṛśyate] kṛmiprabhṛtiṣu [kleśastathā viduṣo'pi vijñātapūrvāparāntikasyāpi] pūrvāntikaṁ bandhaḥ aparāntikaṁ muktiḥ । jñātajanmamaraṇāntikasya vā [rūḍhaḥ । kasmāt] punarmūḍhasyeva viduṣo [rūḍha] iti, tata āha- [samānā hi kuśalākuśalayorvidvadaviduṣormaraṇānubhavādiyaṁ vāsanā] maraṇabhayavāsanā ॥ 9 ॥
te pratiprasavaheyāḥ sūkṣmāḥ ॥ 10 ॥
te pañca kleśā dagdhabījakalpā yoginaścaritādhikāre cetasi pralīne saha tenaivāstaṁ gacchanti ॥ 10 ॥

vivaraṇam
[‘kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayaḥ’, ‘sati mūle tadvipākaḥ’] iti vakṣyate । tasmātte kleśā hātavyāḥ । hānārthaśca te pradarśaitāḥ । tadavahānau copāyaṁ vakṣyati – [‘dhyānaheyāstadvṛttayaḥ?] iti । tatra na jñāyate kiṁviṣayo dhyānaprayogaḥ, kiṁ dagdhabījakarmakleśaviṣayaḥ ? kiṁ sarvaviṣayaḥ ? iti । tadviṣayavibhajanārthamidaṁ sūtramārabhyate-- [te pratiprasavaheyāḥ sūkṣmā iti ॥]
[te pañca kleśāḥ dagdhabījakalpāḥ yoginaśvaritādhikāre cetāsi pralīne saha tenāstaṁ gacchanti ।] etaduktaṁ bhavati--samyagdarśanābhyāsānaladagdhabījasāmarthyānāṁ kleśānāṁ kṛtāśeṣapuruṣaprayojanasya cetasaḥ pratiprasavenaiva pralayenaiva pralayotpatterna dhyānasādhanāpekṣā । na hi dagdhaṁ dāhamapekṣate, piṣṭaṁ vā peṣaṇamiti । cetastu sādhitapuruṣārthatvāt sthitiprayojanābhāvācca svayameva nivartate ॥ 10 ॥
sthitānāṁ tu bījabhāvopagatānām –
dhyānaheyāstadvṛttayaḥ ॥ 11 ॥

kleśānāṁ yā vṛttayaḥ sthūlāstāḥ kriyāyogena tatkṛtāḥ satyaḥ prasaṁkhyānena dhyānena hātavyā yāvatsūkṣmīkṛtā yāvaddagdhabījakalpā iti। yathā vastrāṇāṁ sthūlo malaḥ pūrvaṁ nirdhūyate paścātsūkṣmo yatnenopāyena cāpanīyate tathā svalpapratipakṣāḥ sthūlā vṛttayaḥ kleśānāṁ, sūkṣmāstu mahāpratipakṣā iti ॥ 11 ॥

vivaraṇam
kīdṛśānāṁ punardhyānādisādhanāpekṣetyata ucyate- [sthitānāṁ tu bījabhāvopagatānāmiti ॥]
