[dhyānaheyāstadvṛttayaḥ । kleśānāṁ yā vṛttayaḥ sthūlāstāḥ kriyāyogena] tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānākhyena sthūlapratipakṣeṇa [tanūkṛtāḥ] pūrvam । tata idānīṁ tanūkaraṇādbījaśaktyavasthāḥ [prasaṁkhyānena] samyagdarśanaśīlanato naipuṇaviśeṣeṇa [dhyānena] mahatā balīyasā pratipakṣeṇa [hātavyāḥ,] tato'pi [yāvatsūkṣmīkṛtāḥ ।] kimuktam bhavati ! [yāvaddagdhabījakalpāḥ] yāvanirbājīkṛtā iti ॥
tat kimiveti ? [yathā vastrāṇāṁ sthūlo malaḥ pūrvaṁ nirdhūyate, paścātsūkṣmo] malaḥ khenehanādinimitto [yatnena copāyena] kṣārādiviśiṣṭopāyena [apanīyate, tathā svalpapratipakṣāḥ] tapassvādhyāyeśvaraprāṇidhānayamānayamādiyogāṅgānuṣṭhānādipratipakṣāḥ [sthūlā vṛttayaḥ kleśānām । sūkṣmāstu mahāpratipakṣā iti ।] tapassvādhyāyādyanuṣṭhānapratilabdhadīptiprakarṣāviplavasamyagdarśanamahāpratipakṣā: sūkṣmā bījaśaktyapekṣā iti ॥ 11 ॥
kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ ॥ 12 ॥

tatra puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayaḥ kāmalobhamohakrodhaprabhavaḥ। sa dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaścādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca। tatra tīvrasaṁvegena mantratapaḥsamādhibhirnirvartita īśvaradevatāmaharṣimahānubhāvānāmārādhanādvā yaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ sa sadyaḥ paripacyate puṇyakarmāśaya iti। tathā tīvrakleśena bhītavyādhitakṛpaṇeṣu viśvāsopagateṣu vā mahānubhāveṣu vā tapasviṣu kṛtaḥ punaḥ punarapakāraḥ sa cāpi pāpakarmāśayaḥ sadya eva paripacyate। yathā nandīśvaraḥ kumāro manuṣyapariṇāmaṁ hitvā devatvena pariṇataḥ। tathā nahuṣo'pi devānāmindraḥ svakaṁ pariṇāmaṁ hitvā tiryaktvena pariṇata iti। tatra nārakāṇāṁ nāsti dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśayaḥ। kṣīṇakleśānāmapi nāstyadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśaya iti ॥ 12 ॥

vivaraṇam
kimarthaṁ punaḥ kleśahānāya prayatata ityāha--yataḥ [kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ ॥ kleśā] avidyādayo [mūlaṁ] janmakāraṇaṁ yasya karmāśayasya sa [kleśamūla: karmāśaya] iti । ākarmaphalapradānādantaḥkaraṇe śeta iti karmāśayaḥ śuklakṛṣṇātmakaḥ । dṛṣṭaṁ cādṛṣṭaṁ ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭe janmanī tayorvedanīyamanubhavanīyaṁ phalaṁ yasya [sa dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśayaḥ ।] yo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakarmānubhavitavyaṁphalaḥ karmāśayaḥ sa kleśamūla iti sūtrārthaḥ ।
yasya puṇyāpuṇyarūpasya karmāśayasya yasmin janmani niṣpattistasya tasminneva janmani vedanīyaṁ phalaṁ sa dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ । yasya tu janmāntare vedanīyaṁ phalaṁ so'dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśaya iti ॥
bhāṣyamidānīṁ vyākhyāyate- [tatra puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayo lobhakrodhamohaprabhava iti,] kleśamūlatvaṁ tasyācaṣṭe । puṇyakarmāśayo lobhaprabhavo yathā-svarge vā atra vā śubhaṁ phalamanubhaviṣyāmīti svargakāmaputrakāmayāgādiḥ । krodhaprabhavo yathāviśvāmitrasyāmbāyāśca । mohaprabhavo yathā-draupadyāḥ kumbhakarṇasya ca ॥
apuṇyakarmāśayo'pi lobhaprabhavo yathā---carmaṇi dvīpinaṁ hanti kuñjaraṁ hanti dantayoḥ । karṇasya cāsrajñānalobhādanṛtavacane ॥ krodhaprabhavo yathā-brahmahatyā । bhārate(bhāve)'pyaśvatthāmnaśca । mohaprabhavo yathā-saṁsāramocakādīnāṁ nahuṣasya ca ।
asmitāvidyayorlobhakrodhamohaiḥ pratyekaṁ sambandhaḥ । katham ? ahamadhikṣipto'smīti krudhyati । ahaṁ sukhamanubhaviṣyāmīti lubhyati । ahaṁ muhyāmīti muhmati ॥
avidyā'pi sarvatraiva viparītadarśanalakṣaṇā sambadhyate । nahyasātyāmavidyāyāmasmitādīnāṁ sambhavo'sti । rāgastu lobha eva । dveṣastu krodhaḥ । abhiniveśe vimoha evāntarbhavati ॥
yattu mohaḥ punaravidyeti, tadavivekasāmānyāduktam । lobhakrodhamohāstu parasparanirapekṣā dharmādharmotpatidvāram । tathā ca vakṣyati--lobhakrodhamohapūrvikā iti ॥
[sa dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca] sa lobhakrodhamohaprabhavaḥ karmāśayo [dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca ।]
kathaṁ punaḥ karmaṇāṁ svarūpanimittatulyatve kasyaciddṛṣṭajanmavedanayitvaṁ kasyacidadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvañcetyāha--- [yathā tīvrasaṁyogena] tīvrodyamena [mantratapassamādhibhi] ryathāprasiddharūpaistīvrasaṁvegānuṣṭhitai [rnirvartitaḥ, īśvaradevatāmaharṣimahānubhāvānāmārādhanādvā ।] īśvara uktaḥ, devatā adityādayaḥ, maharṣayo bhṛgvādayaḥ, mahānubhāvā dharmajñānaniratamatayaḥ, eta eva vā (tadeṣāṁ vā) । tīvratarā [rādhanapariniṣpannaḥ sadyaḥ paripacyate] sa tasminneva janmani । yathā nandīśvarakumārasya ॥
[tathā tīvrakleśena] lobhādiprakarṣeṇa [bhītavyādhitakṛpaṇeṣu visrambhopagateṣu mahānubhāveṣu vā tapasviṣu] jñānadharmeniratamatiṣu tapasviṣu [punaḥ punaḥ] ābhīkṣṇyena [kṛto'pakāra:, sa cāpi pāpakarmāśayaḥ sadya eva paripacyate] phalati । yathā nahuṣasya ॥
loke'pi kṣetrabījasaṁskāraviśeṣeṇa vṛkṣādiphalasannikarṣaḥ prasiddhaḥ vṛkṣāyurvedaprasiddhyā । tathā kriyāsu phalasannikarṣaviprakarṣadarśanaṁ gamipacyādiṣu tīvramandānuṣṭhānaviśeṣataḥ ।
tatra puṇyakarmāśayasyodāharaṇamāha--- [yathā nandīśvaraḥ kumāro manuṣyapariṇāmaṁ svakaṁ hitvā] maheśvarārādhanapariniṣpannena tīvratarakleśānuṣṭhānena janmanā [devatātvena pariṇataḥ ॥]
[tathā nahuṣo'] puṇyakarmāśayasyodāharaṇam । sa [devānāmindraḥ ।] sa [svakaṁ pariṇāmaṁ hitvā] tīvrataramohānuṣṭhānajena karmāśayena [tiryaktvena pariṇata iti ॥]
krodhādīnāṁ tu yathāsaṁkhyaṁ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvenodāharaṇāni vyākhyātāni pūrvameva । etena ca mandamandataralobhādikkeśānuṣṭhānajanmānau puṇyapāpakarmāśayāvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyau vyākhyātau lokavadeva । tatrāpi tāvaducyate ॥
[tatra nārakāṇāṁ nāsti] -yairnarakaprāptyarthameva karmānuṣṭhitaṁ brahmahatyāgurudāragamanādilakṣaṇaṁ, teṣāṁ nārakāṇāṁ nārakatvasyāśubhāvitvamāśritya [teṣāṁ nārakāṇāṁ nāsti dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaphalaḥ karmāśayaḥ] [yena phalaṁ] ā.ārabhyate ॥
kathaṁ punarnārakāṇāṁ karmārambhastiryagādīnāṁ devatānāṁ ca ? manuṣyāṇāṁ hi karmādhikāraḥ । eṣā ca karmabhūmirna narakādirityucyate---na-nahuṣārdanāṁ karmadarśanāt । śrūyate ca śatakratorapi vṛtrādivadhena brahmahatyāprāptiryogādyanuṣṭhānaśravaṇaṁ ca ॥
yanmanuṣyāṇāṁ karmādhikāra: iyaṁ ca karmabhūmiriti, tatkṣipraphalasiddhyapekṣam । taduktama- ['kṣipraṁ hi mānuṣe loke siddhirbhavati karmajā”] iti । vyāsena kīṭopākhyāna(śrava)smaraṇāca tiraśvāmipi karmopapattiḥ ॥
kiñca-dehendriyādimataḥ kriyopapatteḥ । kriyāṇāṁ ca kāyavāṅmanaḥprabhavānāṁ phalārambhakatvaṁ, kleśapūrvakavāt ॥
[kṣīṇakleśānāmapi] samyagdarśināmapi [nāstyadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśayaḥ] kleśābhāvādeva । na hi vītarāge jāto dṛśyate । kleśānāṁ kamīrambha iva karmaphalārambhe'pi hetutvāt । kṣīṇakleśasyāpi jñānaprāpteḥ prāgārabdho dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ sambhavati karmāśayaḥ pravṛttaphalatvānmuktaśaravaditi ॥ 12 ॥
sati mūle tadvipāko jātyāyurbhogāḥ ॥ 13 ॥

satsu kleśeṣu karmāśayo vipākārambhī bhavati nocchinnakleśamūlaḥ। yathā tuṣāvanaddhāḥ śālitaṇḍulā adagdhabījabhāvāḥ prarohasamarthā bhavanti nāpanītatuṣā dagdhabījabhāvā vā, tathā kleśāvanaddhaḥ karmāśayo vipākaprarohī bhavati nāpanītakleśo na prasaṁkhyānadagdhakleśabījabhāvo veti। sa ca vipākastrividho jātirāyurbhoga iti।

vivaraṇam
kiśva- [sati mūle tadvipāko jātyāyubhoṁgāḥ । mūlaṁ hi] karmaṇāṁ kleśaḥ । asmin [sati mūle] kleśeṣu satsvityarthaḥ । [tasya] lobhakrodhaprabhavasya puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayasya [vipākaḥ] phalaniṣpattiḥ [tadvipākaḥ ।] kiṁ punastatphalamityāha-- [jātyāyubhoṁgāḥ ॥]
bhāṣyaṁ [“satsu kleśeṣu karmāśayo vipākārambhī bhavati nocchinnakleśamūla”] iti, mūlasya vyākhyānam । tatra satsu kleśeṣu karmaśayo vipākārambhītyisya dṛṣṭāntamāha- [yathā tuṣāvanaddhāḥ śālitaṇḍulā adagdhabījabhāvāḥ ॥]
tuṣāvanaddhā api kadāciddagdhabījabhāvā na prarohasamarthā bhavanti । adagdhabījabhāvā api vyapanītatuṣā na prarohāyālaṁ bhavanti । ubhayathā ca dārṣṭāntikapratipādanārthaṁ dṛṣṭhāntavikalpa: ॥
katham ? [tathā kleśāvanaddhaḥ karmāśayo vipākaprarohī bhavati] kleśopabandhaḥ tuṣāvanaddhaśālitaṇḍulavat । [nāpanītakleśo] [na prasaṁkhyāna] [dagdhakleśabījabhāvo veti ।] apanītatuṣaśālitaṇḍulavadapanītakleśo na vipākaprarohī ॥
yogāṅgānuṣṭhānakleśakṣayapūrvasamyagdarśanānāṁ yogināma[na]panītakleśo'pya [na] panītatuṣadagdhabījaśaktiśālivadyogāṅgānuṣṭhānapraṇālikevalasamyagdarśanānaladagdhabījasāmarthyo na vipākaprarohī bhavati ॥
tathā ca vyāsaḥ sāṁkhyānāṁ yogināṁ ca pṛthaṅmokṣaṁ darśayati ॥
[“bījānyagnyupadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ ।]
[jñānadagdhaistathā leśainātmā sampadyate punaḥ ॥ ”] iti ॥
tathā [“yogaiśvaryamatikrānto yogī mucyeta”] ityādi । vakṣyati cātrāpi prāptāprāptaiśvaryayogayoḥ kaivalyam ॥
katiprakāro'sau vipāka ityāha- [sa ca vipākastrividhaḥ jātirāyurbhoga] iti ॥

tatredaṁ vicāryate – kimekaṁ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇamathaikaṁ karmānekaṁ janmā''kṣipatīti। dvitīyā vicāraṇā – kimanekaṁ karmānekaṁ janma nirvartayati athānekaṁ karmaikaṁ janma nirvartayatīti। na tāvadekaṁ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam। kasmāt, anādikālapracitasyāsaṁkhyeyasyāvaśiṣṭasya karmaṇaḥ sāṁpratikasya ca phalakramāniyamādanāśvāso lokasya prasaktaḥ, sa cāniṣṭa iti। na caikaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam। kasmāt, anekeṣu karmasu ekaikameva karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇamityavaśiṣṭasya vipākakālābhāvaḥ prasaktaḥ, sa cāpyaniṣṭa iti। na cānekaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam। kasmāt, tadanekaṁ janma yugapanna saṁbhavatīti krameṇaiva vācyam। tathā ca pūrvadoṣānuṣaṅgaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tatredaṁ vicāryate ।] kiṁ punarvicāraphalam ? ucyate-ekaikena prāṇinā viruddhaphalāni bhūyiṣṭhānyekasminneva janmani karmaṇi kriyante । tadyathā –
[śarīrajaiḥ karmadoṣairyāti sthāvaratāṁ naraḥ ।]
[vācikaiḥ pakṣimṛgatāṁ mānasairantyajātitām ॥ “]
svargārthāni ca tāvadanutiṣṭhati । narakaprāpīṇi ca karmāṇi । tatraikasya brahmahatyādikarmaṇo'nekajanmakārakatvaṁ śrūyate [śvasūkarakharoṭrāṇāmi] tyādasmṛteḥ ॥
tatra viruddhadeśakālanimittavipākānāṁ karmaṇāmekajanmārambhe viruddhavipākatādarthyaṁ hīyeta । tataśca tādarthyacodanāḥ karmeṇāṁ bādhyeran ॥
atha paryoyeṇa janmārambhitvaṁ, karmaṇāmasaṁkhyeyatvāt kenacideva phalamārabdhaṁ nānyairiti, tatra niyamānupapattiḥ, kenārabdhaḥ kena vā neti । tathā । ca kartṝṇāṁ karmaphalaṁ pratya(pya)visrambhādutsāhavibhaṅgaḥ syāt abhyudayāniśreyasapravṛttiṣu ॥
athānyatamenārambhe vināśa evānyeṣāmiti, tathā'pi sa eva doṣaḥ, kiṁ vinaṣṭa kimārambhakamityaniyamāt ॥
athāvināśa eva, tathāpyavaśiṣṭasyārambhakālābhāvo mokṣābhāvaśveti । tasmātpravṛttinivṛttiśāstrārthavatvapratipādanārthamidaṁ vicāryate ॥
[kimekaṁ karma ekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇaṁ] svargādiprāptinimitteṣu bahuṣu karmasu satsu । [athaikaṁ karmānekaṁ janmākṣipatī] ti prathama vicāraṇā । viruddhapakṣadvayālambinī hi vicāraṇā ekaiva syāt ॥
[dvitīyā vicāraṇā - kimanekaṁ karmānekaṁ janma nirvartayati] viruddhaphalamaviruddhaphalaṁ vā । [athānekaṁ karmaikaṁ janma nirvartayati] viruddhaphalamaviruddhaphalaṁ vā ॥
kiñcāta: ? [na tāvadekaṁ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam । kasmāt?] bahuṣu karmasu satsvekameva karma janmaikaṁ nārabhata iti ॥
yadyekasyaiva janmārambhitvaṁ, tadā [anādikālapracitasya] saṁsārānāditvādekaikena puruṣeṇāsaṁkhyeyamekaikasmin janmani karma pracīyate viruddhaphalamaviruddhaphalaṁ ca ॥
tatra [avaśiṣṭasya] janmārambhikarmavyatiriktasya [asaṅkhyeyasya] anekajanbhāntarapracitasya [karmaṇaḥ] karmakalāpasya [sāmpratasya ca] vartamānajanmapracitasyānārabdhakāryasya [phalakramāniyamāt] kiṁ pūrvajanmepacitakarmarāśigatasya kasyacideva bhaviṣyajjanmārambhitvam, āhotvididānīntanajanmakarmarāśigatasya kasyaciditi phalakramo na niyamyeteti [anāścāso lokasya ॥]
kiṁ pūrvajanmakarmaṇā duṣṭenāduṣṭena vā phalamārabdhavyam ? athedānāntanakarmaṇā duṣṭenāduṣṭena vā? ityavisrambhāt na kaścidagnihotrādi kurvīta । nāpi mokṣāya samīhetetyanāścāsaḥ [prasaktaḥ, sa cāgniṣṭaḥ ॥]
idānīṁ prathamavicāraṇāyāṁ dvitīyaṁ pakṣaṁ nirākaroti- [na caikaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam । kasmāt ?] ekaikasmiṁstāvajanmāna [anekaṁ karmā] nuṣṭhīyate, [tatraikaikameva cetkarmānekasya janmavipākasya] janmapariṇāmasya [nimittaṁ bhavet , tato'vaśiṣṭasya] ārabdhakāryādanyasya [vipākakālābhāvaḥ] prasaktaḥ, [sa cāpyaniṣṭaḥ ।] phalakramāniyamaśceti pūrvadoṣo'pi । naivaṁbhūtamaniṣṭamabhyupagantavyam । yattu brahmahatyādikarmaṇāmekaikasyānekajanmārambhitvaṁ, tasya śāstragocaratvāt brahmahatyādiviṣayatvamevābhyupagamyate ॥
dvitīyavicāraṇāyāmidānīṁ prathamaḥ pakṣo nirākriyate – [na cānekaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam । kasmā] devaṁ nābhyupagamyate? taducyate, [tadevānekaṁ janma yugapanna sambhavati] ekasyānīśvarasya । tataśca [krameṇa vācyamāne] kimekamanekaṁ janmārabhata iti । [tathā ca pūrvadoṣānuṣaṅgaḥ] sarvatra prathamadoṣānuṣaṅgaḥ phalakramāniyamādanāśvāsa iti ॥

tasmājjanmaprāyaṇāntare kṛtaḥ puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayapracayo vicitraḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvasthitaḥ prāyaṇābhivyakta ekapraghaṭṭakena maraṇaṁ prasādhya saṁmūrchita ekameva janma karoti। tacca janma tenaiva karmaṇā labdhāyuṣkaṁ bhavati। tasminnāyuṣi tenaiva karmaṇā bhogaḥ saṁpadyata iti। asau karmāśayo janmāyurbhogahetutvāttrivipāko'bhidhīyata iti। ata ekabhavikaḥ karmāśaya ukta iti।

vivaraṇam
[tasmāt] evaṁ pakṣatrayānupapattāvidānī siddhāntamupasaṁharati-— [janmaprāyaṇāntare] janmamaraṇayorantare madhye kṛtaḥ [puṇyapāpakarmāśayaḥ] aviruddhajanmadeśanimitta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ । viruddhajanmadeśanimittaḥ punaḥ adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ apratiniyatavipākaḥ । tasya tridhā viniyogaṁ vakṣyati । tasmādaviruddhaphalasyaiva puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayasyāyaṁ niyama ucyate ॥
[pracayavicitraḥ] tulyātulyānekakarmapracitatvā [tpracayena vicitraḥ । pradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvasthitaḥ] kiñcitkarma kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ pradhānamapi kasya cidanyasyopasarjanamupasarjanamapi pradhānamityevamanekakarmaśabalimnā'vasthitaḥ ॥
[prāyaṇābhivyaktaḥ] yathā bījakṣetrasaṁskārasaṁyogo'ṅkurabhāvābhivyaktikāraṇaṁ, tathā prāyaṇamapyaviruddhānāṁ karmaṇāmabhivyaktinimittam । [ekapraghadṛkena] ekalolībhāvena [samuccitaḥ] ekībhūtaḥ [ekameva janma karoti ॥]
[tacca janma tenaiva] prāyaṇābhivyaktātmanā [karmaṇā labdhāyuṣkaṁ bhavati । tasminnāyuṣi tenaiva karmaṇā bhogaḥ sampadyate,] yena janmāyuṣī kṛte । yathā yena bījenāṅkuro nirvṛttastenaiva phalapuṣpādayo'pi ॥
tena ca karmaṇā bhogāyurnivṛttirbhavatyeyavetyavadhāryate । na punaranyasyāyurbhegādinimitasya putrapaśukāmādiyāgādeḥ putrāyurādiprāterhetutvaṁ nirākriyate । itarathā hi sarvaśrutismṛtiviprakopaḥ syāt । tasmā [ttenaiva karmaṇeti] janmamātramārabhya kṛtakāryatvādvinivṛttyāśaṅkaniṣedhamātraṁ kriyate ॥
[asau karmāśayo janmāyurbhogahetutvāt] trayo vipākā janmādayo yasya sa [trivipāko'bhidhīyate । ayamaikabhavikaḥ karmāśaya uktaḥ] eka (eva) janmaprayojana ekabhavikaḥ ॥

dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyastvekavipākārambhī bhogahetutvāddvivipākārambhī vā āyurbhogahetutvāt nandīśvaravannadvuṣavadveti। kleśakarmavipākānubhavanirvartitābhistu vāsanābhiranādikālasaṁmūrchitamidaṁ cittaṁ vicitrīkṛtamiva sarvato matsyajālaṁ granthibhirivā''tatamityetā anekabhavapūrvikā vāsanāḥ। yastvayaṁ karmāśaya eṣa evaikabhavika ukta iti। ye saṁskārāḥ smṛtihetavastā vāsanāstāścānādikālīnā iti।

vivaraṇam
[dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyastvekavipākārambhī] yathā – putrāgrāmādikāmayāgaḥ । [dvivipākārambhī] vā [bhogāyurhetutvāt ।] yathā āyurādikāmayāgaḥ । [trivipākārambhī vā nandīśvaranahuṣavat ॥]
nanu ca nandīśvaranahuṣayordṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvaṁ trivipākāsmbhitvaṁ ca viruddham । dṛṣṭaṁ hi janma nandīśvarasya manuṣyatvam । yatpunarnandīśvarasya devatvaṁ, nahuṣasya cājagaratvaṁ tat dvayamapyadṛṣṭaṁ, na hi manuṣyatva eva devatvaṁ saṁvedyaṁ nandīśvarasya, nāpi devatva eva nahuṣasyājagarasvaṁ sevadyamiti, kathaṁ trivipākārambhitvaṁ dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvaṁ ceti ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ । dṛśyamānajātiviśiṣṭameva śarīraṁ tayorjātyantaratvena pariṇatam । na ca yathā'nyeṣāṁ dṛṣṭajātiviśiṣṭaśarīropamardena jātyantaropādānaniṣekādinimittāpekṣayā jātyantaraprāptiḥ, tathā nandīścaranahuṣayoḥ । tasmāt trivipākārambhitvaṁ dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvaṁ cetyudāhṛtam ॥
tatra trividhaḥ karmarāśirdṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaścādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca । dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatavipākaniyatavipāraḥ kadācidbhogaheturityekavipākaḥ । kadācidbhogāyurhetutvāt dvivipākaḥ । kadācit jātyāyurbhegahetutvāt trivipāko nandīśvaranahuṣayoriva ॥ ।
adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyastu dvividho niyatavipākaścāniyatavipākaśca । niyatavipākastu pradarśitaḥ [tasmājjanmaprāyaṇāntare kṛta] ityādinā । yastvaniyatavipākaḥ sa trividho vakṣyate ॥
idānīṁ tu karmavipākajanito vāsanārāśirapara ākhyāyate – [kleśakarmavipākānubhavanirvartitābhaiḥ] kleśānubhavaśca karmānubhavaśca vipākānubhavaśca kleśakarmavipākānubhavāḥ, tairnirvartitābhiḥ [vāsanābhiḥ] saṁskaraiḥ [anādikālasaṁmūrchitamidaṁ cittaṁ citrīkṛtamiva] paṭakuḍyādivat [sarvato matsyajālaṁ granthibhirivātataṁ] vyāptam ॥
athaikaikasmin janmāni [anekabhavapūrvakā vāsanāḥ] karmaṇi vipāke ca tadaṅgībhāvena vyāpriyante । na hi vāsanāyāḥ karmavipākānajñabhāve sati jātamātrasya pṛṣadaṁśadārakasya vṛṣabuvānaṁ prati sphuritaparikopasyāvaskandanaṁ jāghaṭīti । na ca sakṛdanubhavavāsanāmāttratayā tena śakyaṁ bhavitum ॥

yastvasāvekabhavikaḥ karmāśayaḥ sa niyatavipākaścāniyatavipākaśca। tatra dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya niyatavipākasyaivāyaṁ niyamo na tvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyāniyatavipākasya। kasmāt। yo hyadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyo'niyatavipākastasya trayī gatiḥ – kṛtasyāvipakvasya nāśaḥ, pradhānakarmaṇyāvāpagamanaṁ vā, niyatavipākapradhānakarmaṇā'bhibhūtasya vā ciramavasthānamiti।

vivaraṇam
[yastvayaṁ karmāśayaḥ] yastvayaṁ janmaprāyaṇāntare kṛto'viruddhajanmadeśanimittaḥ pradhānopasarjanībhāvena trivipākārambhī [eṣa evaikabhavika uktaḥ ।] na dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ, nāpyaniyatavipaktiradṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ, nāpi ca vāsanāḥ ॥
tāsāṁ tāvat svarūpamāha – [ye saṁskārāḥ smṛtihetavastā vāsanāstāścānādikālīnāḥ,] saṁsārasya kleśararmavipākānubhavarūpasyānāditvātū ॥
[yastvasāvekabhavikaḥ karmāśayaḥ] pūrvottastasyāpavāda ucyate ekadeśasya । kathaṁ ? [sa niyatavipākaścāniyatavipākaśca ।] ko'sau niyatavipākaḥ ? yaḥ prāyaṇābhivyaktaḥ kāryamārabhate । sa eva caikabhavikaḥ ॥
yastu viruddhajanmadeśakālanimittaḥ so'dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvasāmānye satyapyaniyatavipākaḥ । kasmāt? niyatavipākena virodhāt । nacāyamekabhavikaḥ, virodhādeva । yatvasyaikabhavikatvamuktaṁ, [yastvasāvekabhavika: karmāśaya] iti, tadadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvasāmānyena ॥
nanu ca yadyevaṁ [janmaprāyaṇāntare kṛtaḥ puṇyapāpakarmāśayaḥ pracayavicitraḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvasthitaḥ prāyaṇābhivyaktaḥ ekapraghaṭṭena sammūrchita ekajanma karotī] tyevamādirniyamo virudhyeta । kutaḥ ? prāyaṇasya sarvapūrvakarmābhivyañjakatvāt, āśayādhāropamardena cāśayāntarotpatteḥ, mānuṣyakāśayādhāre pūrvaṁ daivatairyagyonāśayānāṁ samavatthānaṁ, tadādhāropamardanakāle ca prāyaṇe sādhāraṇe sarvakarmabhivyaktikāraṇe daivatairyagyonāśayānāṁ kasyacidevābhivyaktirnetareṣāmiti nāsti hetuḥ । na hi svagecarāpannaṁ vyaṅgyamekadeśaparityāgenābhivyanakti pradīpaḥ ॥
atrecyate – naitadyuktaṁ, karmānarthakyaprasaṅgāt । bahuprakārāṇi hi karmaṇi parasparaviruddhāni kriyante । yo hi svargārtha karma kṛtavān sa eva paśugrāmādyarthaṁ karmānuṣṭhāya punarbahmahatyāṁ vā sthāvarādiprāptyarthaṁ vā balavakarmānutiṣṭhet । tatra narakasyāvarādiprāptasya na hi paśugrāmādilābhasaṁbhavaḥ । tataśca tatkarmaṇāmānarthakyaṁ prasajyeta ॥
atha tatrāpi grāmādilābhasukhaṁ bhavatīti cet – na hi grāmakāma ityukte grāmasukhatvamabhipretam । na hi grāmasukhaṁ prāpto grāmaṁ prāptavān ॥
kiñca – sarvaśāstraviprakopaśca syāt । adṛṣṭānāṁ ca svarganarakādīnāṁ sukhaduḥkhamātraprasaṅgaḥ । [‘tataḥ śeṣeṇa'] iti śeṣasadbhāvajñāpanaśrutismṛtayo bādhyeran । tasmānna sarvaṁ karma prāyaṇe'bhivyajyate । atyantaviruddhānāṁ karmaṇāmānarthakyaprāpteḥ । karmaśākhānarthakye ca mokṣaśāstre'pyanāśvāsaprasaṅgaḥ ॥
abhivyañjakānāmapi kasyacidabhivyañjakatvaṁ kasyacinneti dṛśyate vyabhicāraḥ । yathā cakṣuṣo rūpābhivyañjakatve'pi caitroळ.ūkacakṣuṣorahorātrayoritaretaravyabhicāraḥ । ālokasya ca samāne sarvacakṣussahakāritve, nolūkacakṣussahakāritvam । ekasmiśva stryādipiṇḍe sukhaduḥkhamehānāṁ sarveṣāmabhivyaktinimitte'pi kasyacidevābhivyaktiḥ ॥
tatra karmādyapekṣayā virodhādadoṣa iti cet – ihāpi virodhādanabhavyaktiḥ sarvakarmaṇām । na cāpi bījādhāre kṣetre upamardyamāne jalādinimittasaṁyoge satyapi tadgatānāṁ bījānāṁ viruddhajātīyānāmaṅkurādikāryārambhitvam । evaṁ mānuṣyakālīnāśayādhāre'pyupamardyamāne, na viruddhajātīyadevatairyagyonāśayānāṁ sarveṣāṁ yugapadvṛttilābhaḥ ॥
na ca prāyaṇameva karmaṇāmabhivyañjakam । dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyānāṁ bhogārthānāṁ darśanāt । yeṣāṁ prāyaṇamevābhivyañjakaṁ teṣāṁ sarveṣāṁ bhavatvabhivyaktiriti cet – na – virodhāddaivatairyagyonamānuṣyakāśyānām ॥
prāyaṇānāṁ ca bhūtabhaviṣyatkālaviśeṣervi(ṣāvi)śeṣopapatterna sarvakarmābhivyañjakatvam । prāyaṇaviśeṣaśravaṇācca prāyaṇabhedaḥ yathā – [‘yaṁ yaṁ vāpi smaranbhāvaṁ tyajatyante kaळ.ebaram’] iti smaraṇaviśeṣabhedāt prāyaṇabhedaḥ । tasmānna sarvakarmabhivyañjakatvaṁ prāyaṇasya । anyathā viśeṣaṇānarthakyaprasaṅgāt ॥
na ca smaraṇādiviśeṣaṇena prakṛtasyānyathātvaṁ nāśo vā syāt । tannāśanyathātvakaraṇe hi smaraṇasya prakṛtakarmasahakāritvaṁ na syāt । svatantraṁ hi smaraṇaṁ syāt । tathā cānuṣṭhitakarmanairarthakyaṁ bhavet ॥
kiñca – kalalādyavasthāsu mṛtānāṁ mokṣaprasaṅgaḥ । karmārambhāt । tāsāṁ phalatravatkarmatvamapīti cet – na – karaṇāvyūhāt । karaṇeṣu hi vyūhiteṣu karmaṇāṁ vṛttilābhaḥ phalatvaṁ ca । na tadā tadvyūha upapadyate ॥
svapnavaditi cenna । tatrāpi karmānabhyupagamāt । śrutiśca [‘sa yattatra kiñcitpaśyatyananvāyatastena bhavati’] iti karmaṇā svapnadarśanajenāsambandhaṁ darśayati । na kaścitsvapnairaparādhavānasti । brahmahatyādikaraṇadarśanāt । atha skannaprāyaścittādidarśanānneti cenna, retasskandananimittatvātprāyaścittasya ॥
tasamādyadyapi svapnādyavasthāyāmiva kalalādyavasthāsu phalamabhyupagamyate, tathā'pi karaṇavyāpārābhāvāt svapnanāvasthāvadeva phalamātraṁ tat, na karmakartṛtvamiti mokṣaprasaṅga eva garbhaprasṛtānāmapatita iti ॥
tasmānna sarvakarmābhivyañjakatvaṁ prāyaṇānāṁ, teṣāṁ ca viśeṣopapatterityata idamucyate-- [tatrādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya niyatavipākasyaivāyaṁ niyamo] yo'sau [‘janmaprāyaṇāntare kṛta'] ityevamādibhāṣyeṇa trivipākārambhitvaniyama uktaḥ, [na tu addaṣṭajanmavedanīyasya aniyatavipākasya । kasmāt ? yastvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ aniyatavipākastasya trayī gatiḥ ॥]
katham ? [kṛtasyāvipakasya vināśaḥ] nāśakālamaprāptasyaiva nāśa: । yathā---prāyāścittādinā pratiṣiddhasya kṛtasya nāśaḥ ॥
[pradhānakarmaṇyāvāpagamanaṁ] pradhānakarmaṇi niyatavedanīye ācāpāpāte: pradhānakarmaphalātiraskareṇa svayamapi mandamandaṁ phalaṁ madhyamanupraviśya prayacchati । yathā – sakaleṣu taṇḍuleṣu vipacyamānaṣu asakalā api taṇḍulakaṇā uptā alpīyāṁsamartha sādhayantyeva । [niyatavipākapradhānakarmābhibhūtasya vā'pyavasthānaṁ] niyatavipākaṁ yatpradhānakarma prārabdhaphalaṁ tenābhibhūtasya nyakkṛtasya viruddhadeśakālanimittavipākatvādavasthānamū । yathā-vijigīṣamāṇayorantareṇa pravṛttarājyenābhibhūtasyetarasyāvasthānaṁ deśakālanimittāpekṣayā ॥

tatra kṛtasyāvipakvasya nāśo yathā śuklakarmodayādihaiva nāśaḥ kṛṣṇasya। yatredamuktam –“dve dve ha vai karmaṇī veditavye pāpakasyaiko rāśiḥ puṇyakṛto'pahanti tadicchasva karmāṇi sukṛtāni kartumihaiva te karma kavayo vedayante।”

vivaraṇam
[tatra kṛtasyāvipakasya nāśo yathā śuklamoṁdiyādihaiva] tapasvādhyāyayogādilakṣaṇasya śuddhasyodayāt prāyaścittādilakṣaṇasya ca, [kṛṣṇasya aśuddhirūpasya] hiṁsādilakṣaṇasya prāgeva vṛttilābhāt [nāśaḥ । ihaiveti] tvavivakṣitam । janmāntare'pi prāgvṛttilābhānnāśepapatte: । yathā kaunakhyādinimittapāpaviśeṣaṇāṁ kaunakhyādicihairavagamya prāyaśvittena nāśaḥ kriyate ॥
tadetattantrāntaraprasiddhenodāharaṇena vyācaṣṭe--- [yatredamuktaṁ dve dve ha vai karmaṇī] śuklakṛṣṇe janmani janmani sādhakasya puruṣasyādhikṛtasya । [eko rāśiḥ svādhyāyādipuṇyena kṛtaḥ puṇyakṛtaḥ apahantī] taramapuṇyena kṛtaṁ rāśim । atha vā [puṇyakṛtaḥ] puruṣasya śuklakarma [rāśiḥ] kṛṣṇakarmarāśi [mapahanti । tadicchasva] tasmāt [svacchakarmaṇi svakīyāni] karmāṇi śuklāni [sukṛtāni kartum ।] kutaḥ ? yataḥ [ihaiva atraiva tava śarma sukhaṁ] śāntiṁ [kavayo vedayante] karmavipākavibhāgajñāḥ jñāpayanti ॥

pradhānakarmaṇyāvāpagamanam। yatredamuktaṁ – “syātsvalpaḥ saṁkaraḥ saparihāraḥ sapratyavamarṣaḥ kuśalasya nāpakarṣāyālam। kasmāt, kuśalaṁ hi me vahvanyadasti yatrāyamāvāpaṁ gataḥ svarge'pyapakarṣamalpaṁ kariṣyati” iti।

vivaraṇam
pradhānakarmaṇyāvāpagamanamudāharaṇena pradarśyate- [svalpasaṅkaraḥ] alpīyānū, doṣāvakaraḥ । kutaḥ ? [saparihāraḥ] parihārasahitaḥ । parihāramapekṣate, na tu parihṛtaḥ । parihāraśaktyuṇayāvijñānasamānāśraya ityarthaḥ । [sapratyavamarśaḥ] sapratyavekṣaṇaḥ । kathamakārya mayā kriyate kadā nu nistariṣyāmyetat na punaḥ kariṣyāmītyāpadi pravṛttasyākāryaṁ kurvataḥ prāṇasthityādinimittam ॥
[kuśalasya] karmaphaladoṣaparihārādivibhāgāvaśāradasya viduṣaḥ । [nāyamapakarṣāya] nāyaṁ svalpaḥ saṁkaraḥ puṇyaphalātpravṛttādvahutarādapakraṣṭum, apakṛṣya ca svakārye niyoktuṁ paryāptaḥ । atha vā, [kuśalasya] karmaṇa eva [nāyamapakarṣāya paryāptaḥ ।] kasmāt ? [kuśalaṁ hi me ।] sādhaka evaṁ manyate । śubhaṁ yasmānmama [bahvanyadasti yatrāyaṁ] yasmin bahuni śubhe [ayaṁ saṅkara avāpagataḥ svarge'pyapakarṣamalpaṁ kariṣyatīti ॥]
[niyatavipākapradhānakarmabhibhūtasya vā'pyavasthānam । katha] miti duṣṭābhiprāyaḥ praśnaḥ । kathaṁ ? pravṛttarājyenaparasyāpravṛttarājyasyābhibhave yukto nimittabhedena rājyapravṛtteḥ । iha tu nimittamābhivyañjakaṁ maraṇaṁ sarveṣāṁ karmaṇāṁ tulyaṁ tasmiṁstu nimitte sati sarveṣāṁ karmaṇāṁ vṛtilābho yukta iti pradhānakarmābhabhavo na yukta itarasyeti manyate । tataśvāvāpagamanamevāstviti ॥
atrocyate – [tatrādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyaiva] aviruddhadeśakālavipākadinimittasya [niyatavipākasya] puṇyāpuṇyarūpasyānekasya [karmaṇaḥ samānaṁ maraṇamabhivyaktikāraṇamuktam । na tu dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya] putragrāmādiviṣayasya, [aniyatavipākasya vā] adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya yathākṛtavyākhyānasya ॥
[yattvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyamaniyatavipākaṁ tannaśyedāvāpaṁ vā gacchedabhibhūtaṁ vā ciramapyupāsīta] udāsīta, [yāvatsamānama] viruddhaṁ tulyajātīya [mabhivyañjakaṁ nimittaṁ] karma । samānajātīyaṁ hi karma vipacyamānameta [dabhimukhaṁ karoti ॥]
[tadvipākasyaiva] tasyāniyatavipākasya karmaṇo vipākasyaiva । [deśakālanimittānavadhāraṇā] tkasminvā deśe kasminvā nimitte kasminkāle vā tatkarma vipākābhimukhaṁ bhaviṣyatītyanavadhāraṇāt । [iyaṁ gatiścitrā durjñānā ca] bhavati । [citrā] nāśāvāpābhibhavādivaicitryāt । [durjñānā] deśakālanimittānavadhāraṇāt ॥

niyatavipākapradhānakarmaṇā'bhibhūtasya vā ciramavasthānam। kathamiti, adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyaiva niyatavipākasya karmaṇaḥ samānaṁ maraṇamabhivyaktikāraṇamuktam na tvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyāniyatavipākasya। yattvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaṁ karmāniyatavipākaṁ tannaśyedāvāpaṁ vā gacchedabhibhūtaṁ vā ciramapyupāsīta, yāvatsamānaṁ karmābhivyañjakaṁ nimittamasya na vipākābhimukhaṁ karotīti। tadvipākasyaiva deśakālanimittānavadhāraṇādiyaṁ karmagatiścitrā durvijñānā ceti। na cotsargasyāpavādānnivṛttirityekabhavikaḥ karmāśayo'nujñāyata iti ॥ 13 ॥

vivaraṇam
nanu cādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya prāyaṇe'bhivyaktasya [ekameva janma karotī] tyekajanmārambhitvamuktam - tadidānīṁ nāśāvāpābhibhavāvasthānādivacanādvādhyeteti ceta – na – upapādite.ottaratvāt [adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya niyatavipākasyevāyaṁ niyama] iti । [na tasyotsargasya] asmādaniya [māpavādānnivṛttiriti ।] kathaṁ [na] nivṛttiḥ ? [ekabhavikaḥ karmāśayo dujñāna ityevaṁ] na nivṛttiḥ । aniyatavipākasyāpyekajanmārambhitvaṁ na pratiṣiddhamityartha: ॥
athavā, utsargasyāpavādānnivṛttiriti matvā naikabhavikaḥ karmāśayo durśana ityanena nañ saṁbadhyate । yasmādutsargasyaikadeśasyāpavādo nivartako na savaisya, tasmānniyatavipaki ekabhavika karmīśayaḥ sujñāna eva ॥
aparaḥ kalpaḥ--iha karmagatirjñātavyeti prakṛtaṁ, tasyāyamapavāda ekabhavikaḥ karmāśayo durjñāna iti । tatretiśabdo hatvarthe । yasmāddhetorautsargikasya karmagatijñānasya prakṛtasya etasmādapavādānna nivṛttiriti, tasmādyathā jñeyā karmagatistathā jñātavyaiva । durjñānā iti duḥkhena jñeyatvamucyate kleśena ॥ 13 ॥
te hlādaparitāpaphalāḥ puṇyāpuṇyahetutvāt ॥ 14 ॥
te janmāyurbhogāḥ puṇyahetukāḥ sukhaphalā apuṇyahetukā duḥkhaphalā iti। yathā cedaṁ duḥkhaṁ pratikūlātmakamevaṁ viṣayamukhakāle'pi duḥkhamastyeva pratikūlātmakaṁ yoginaḥ ॥ 14 ॥

vivaraṇam
karmāṁśaya upavyākhyāto dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśva adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca । tasyāpi trividhā vipākā jātyāyurbhogāḥ [hlādaparitāpaphalāḥ puṇyāpuṇyahetutvāt ।] hvāda: sukhaṁ, paritāpī du:khaṁ, hvādaśca paritāpaśca hvādaparitāpau, tau phalaṁ yeṣāṁ te hlādaparitāpaphalāḥ । tathā puṇyaṁ ca apuṇyañca puṇyāpuṇye, te eva hetū yeṣāṁ te puṇyāpuṇyahetavaḥ, teṣāṁ bhāvaḥ puṇyāpuṇyahetutvaṁ, tasmātpuṇyāpuṇyahetutvāt । [te jātyāyurmorgāḥ puṇyahetukā: sukhaphalāḥ । apuṇyahetukā duḥkhaphalāḥ । yathedaṁ duḥkhaṁ pratikūlātmakamevaṁ viṣayasukhakāle'pi du:khamasyeva pratikūlātmakaṁ yoginaḥ ॥ 14 ॥]
kathaṁ, tadupapādyate –
pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairguṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekinaḥ ॥ 15 ॥

sarvasyāyaṁ rāgānuviddhaścetanācetanasādhanādhīnaḥ sukhānubhava iti tatrāsti rāgajaḥ karmāśayaḥ। tathā ca dveṣṭi duḥkhasādhanāni muhyati ceti dveṣamohakṛto'pyasti karmāśayaḥ। tathā coktam – “nānupahatya bhūtānyupabhogaḥ saṁbhavatīti hiṁsākṛto'pyasti śārīraḥ karmāśayaḥ” iti। viṣayasukhaṁ cāvidyetyuktam।

vivaraṇam
[kathaṁ] viṣayasukhakāle yogina: du:khamasti ? tathā pūrvatra coktaṁ [du:khe sukhakhyārti vakṣyatīti । tadupapādyate] pratipādyate । tatra caitanna pratipāditam । duḥkhasya karmakāryatvāt, karmānantaraṁ pratipādanayuktamiti, bahuvaktavyatvācca । [pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairguṇavṛtivirodhācca duḥkhameva sarva vivekinaḥ ॥]
pariṇatiḥ [pariṇāmaḥ,] tapti [stāpaḥ,] saṁskṛtiḥ [saṁskāraḥ,] tāpaśca saṁskāraśca [tāpasaṁskārau,] pariṇāmaśva tāpasaṁskārau ca [pariṇāmatāpasaṁskārā:,] ta eva [duḥkhā] duḥkhanimittāni, etaiḥ [pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkheheṁtubhiḥ sarvameva duḥkham ।] kintatsarva ? kleśa । duḥkhakāraṇatvādeva heto: । karmāṇa hlādaparitāpaphalatvāt । jātyāyubhaugāśva kleśādīnāmāśrayanimittaviṣayāśva duḥkhahetutvādityetatsarvameva duḥkham ॥
kiṁ sarvasyaiva ? netyāha- [vivekina iti ।] kleśādīnāṁ vibhāgavivekī yasya vidyate sa vivekī ; tasya kleśakarmavipākābhijñasya pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraguṇavṛttivirodhātmaka(dhāñca)sarvaduḥkhatvopapādaka(pratipādaka)hetvabhidarśina ityartha: । netarasyānitthaṁdarśinaḥ ॥
tasya tu tatimātraṁ duḥkham । tadapi ‘ahaṁ tapya' ityātmatvena pratipadyamānaḥ tatrāpi saṁśayāno'sau mamedaṁ duḥkhamityetāvanmātramapi viviṅkte । yadi hyetāvadapyantaraṁ viviścīta, tato duḥkhasādhanamapyetadduḥkha(sādhana)miti manvīta ॥
tathā ca sarvamidaṁ duḥkhamiti titikṣediti so'pi vivekī syāt । tasmādyadyapi tāpakāle duḥkhamātraṁ paśyanti, tathā'pi na tatsādhanādi sarvaṁ du khamiti manyante nirvivekinaḥ । yasya punaḥ pariṇāmaduḥkhahetudarśarnaṁ tasya vivekinaḥ sarvameva duḥkham ॥
tatra tāvatpariṇāmaduḥkhatāṁ vyācaṣṭe-- [sarvasyāyaṁ rāgānuviddhaḥ ।] sarvasyetyanena sarvaprāṇiprasiddhatvādavyabhicāripratyakṣāvagamyatvaṁ darśayati । [cetanācetanādhīnaḥ] putrapuśuhiraṇyādisādhanāyattaḥ sukhānubhava iti । sukhānubhavakāle rāgo manovyāpāra: tadviśiṣṭo hi sukhamanubhavati । sa sarvo vyāpāra: kleśopasaṁhitatvāddharmādharmahetuḥ । tatpūrvaśca karmāśayaḥ prārabdhaphala upabhujyate, bhogakāle cāpara upacīyate । tataśva [kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayaḥ sati mūle tadvipāka] ityupapannaṁ bhavati ॥
[tathā,] sukhavelāyāṁ sukhapratyanīkabhūtāni [duḥkhasādhanāni] upalabhamāno [dveṣṭi,] tathā sukhopabhogaparipālanavyagranaramānaso [muhyati ceti dveṣamoha] pūrvavyāpārajanito'pya [sti karmāśayaḥ ।] athavā dveṣamohāveva vyāpārarūpāviti tatkṛta eva ॥
[tathā,] yaśvāsau sukho [pabhogaḥ] sa [nānupahatya] nānupahiṅsya [bhūtānyupabhogaḥ sabhbhavatīti ।] upabhoga evopaghātahetutvādupahantṛvena vivakṣita iti, samānakartṛkatvam । anyo'pi madīyamevopabhokṣyata iti manyate, tatrāpi sarvopabhogasāmarthyayuktaṁ dhanamita tasminnupādīyamāne dhruvaṁ parapīḍā syāt । kimuta pīḍayitvaiva yadupādīyate । tataśva [hiṁsākṛto'pyasti karmāśaya: śārīraḥ ।] tadupādānavyāpārasya śarīranirvartyatvāt ॥
evamekasminnupabhogakāle bahudhā karmaśayo lobhakrodhamohanimitta upacīyate । tathā ca rāgadveṣamohaviśiṣṭatvādanekamukhakarmāśayaviśiṣṭa: sukhānubhavaḥ pariṇamamānaḥ sannanubandhe duḥkhībhavatīti pariṇāmaduḥkhatetyucyate । vivekinasvevaṁ paśyataḥ sukhānubhavakāle'pi duḥkhamasyeva । tadyathā – viṣadigdhatāṁ jñātvā dadhyodanaṁ bhuñjānasya ॥
itaśva sarva duḥkhameva, avidyātvādviṣayasukhasya । avivekapratyayātmako hi viṣayasukhānubhavaḥ । tadetadāha – [viṣayasukhaṁ cāvidyetyuktamiti ।] kvoktam ? ihaiva paryāyaśabdena [“atyantavivi[bha]ktayoratyantāsaṅkīrṇayoravivekaprāptāviva satyāṁ bhogaḥ kalpate । svarūpapratilambhe tu tayoḥ kaivalyameva bhavati kuto bhoga iti”] ityanena bhāṣyeṇa ॥
yadvā, sūtrakoreṇoktamupariṣṭāt [“pratyayāviśeṣo bhogaḥ”] iti । avidyā ca pariṇamamānā sarvamanarthaṁ kareti । tataśva duḥkhabījāvādduḥkhameva viṣayasukham । yathā vyādhinimittatvāt svādutaramapi bhakṣyamāṇam ॥

yā bhogeṣvindriyāṇāṁ tṛpterupaśāntistatsukham। yā laulyādanupaśāntistadduḥkham। na cendriyāṇāṁ bhogābhyāsena vaitṛṣṇyaṁ kartuṁ śakyam। kasmāt, yato bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇāmiti। tasmādanupāyaḥ sukhasya bhogābhyāsa iti। sa khalvayaṁ vṛścikaviṣabhīta ivā''śīviṣeṇa daṣṭo yaḥ sukhārthī viṣayānuvāsito mahati duḥkhapaṅke nimagna iti। eṣā pariṇāmaduḥkhatā nāma pratikūlā sukhāvasthāyāmapi yoginameva kliśnāti।

vivaraṇam
viṣayasukhaṁ cāvidyetyasyaivārthasya prakāśanārtha tantrasiddhamudāharaṇaṁ darśayati-- [yā bhogoṣvindriyāṇāṁ] bhujyanta iti bhogāḥ śabdādayaḥ teṣu nimitteṣu yā tṛptiḥ tata indriyāṇām [upaśāntiḥ] upaśamaḥ kimanarthāyāsahetukayā vṛttyeti nirākulatayāvasthānaṁ tat [sukham ॥]
yā tu lailyādīpsayā tṛṇāta: sakāśaldanupaśāntaḥ anuparatiḥ tadduḥkham । taduktam -
[“nāsti tṛṣṇāsamaṁ duḥkhaṁ nāstyatṛṣṇāsamaṁ sukham” iti ॥]
nanu copabhogenaiva vaitṛṣṇye bhavati upabhogānte । upabhogaśva sukheṁ bhaviṣyati । tata āha-- [na cendriyāṇāṁ bhogābhyāsena śakyaṁ vaitṛṣṇyaṁ kartum । kasmāt ?] ata āha-- [yato bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante indriyāṇāṁ rāgāḥ ।] tathā cetam –
[“ na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati ।]
[haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate ॥ '] iti ॥
[kauśalāni] naipuṇāni ca bhogābhyāseṣvandriyāṇāmanu vivardhante । yadyapi mana:kauśalapūrvakamindriyāṇāṁ kauśalaṁ, tathā'pi dṛśyata eva bhikṣā[kṣvā]dīnāmindriyasyāpi kauśalam । [tasmādanupāyaḥ sukhasya bhogābhyāsa iti] bhogābhyāsānnivṛttireva sukham ॥
[sa khalvayaṁ vṛścikabhīta ivāśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo yaḥ sukhārthī viṣayānanvavasitaḥ] anvavabaddhaḥ anupravṛtto'nuvyavasito vā, yathā mandaviṣādvṛścikādupajātabhīti: paṭutareṇāśīviṣeṇa prasto mahattaraṁ du:khamabhiprapadyate,
tathā'yamapraduḥkhābhāsāyāḥ pariṇāmamahāsukhāyā nivṛtto duḥkhabuddhyā bhītaḥ sannapāre [mahati duḥkhapaṅke magna iyeṣā pariṇāmadu:khatā] sukhasya [pratikūlā sukhāvasthāyāmapi yoginaḥ ।] sa he yogī pravṛttavepathunaiva hṛdayena pratiniyatavedanīyasya kurmaṇo balīyasvādanubhuṅkte sukham । tasmāt sarvaṁ duḥkhaṁ vivekinaḥ ॥

atha kā tāpaduḥkhatā, sarvasya dveṣānuviddhaścetanācetanasādhanādhīnastāpānubhava iti tatrāsti dveṣajaḥ karmāśayaḥ। sukhasādhanāni ca prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate tataḥ paramanugṛhṇātyupahanti ceti parānugrahapīḍābhyāṁ dharmādharmāvupacinoti। sa karmāśayo lobhānmohācca bhavatītyeṣā tāpaduḥkhatocyate। kā punaḥ saṁskāraduḥkhatā, sukhānubhavātsukhasaṁskārāśayo duḥkhānubhavādapi duḥkhasaṁskārāśaya iti। evaṁ karmabhyo vipāke'nubhūyamāne sukhe duḥkhe vā punaḥ karmāśayapracaya iti।

vivaraṇam
atha tāpaduḥkhatā vyākhyāyate – sukhepabhogastu pariṇamamānaḥ sannanubandhe vijñāte viṣadigdhasvādudadhyodanopabhogavaddduḥkhībhavati, svarūpataḥ punaravidyārūpo'nukūlavedanāgandho'pi । iha punaḥ svarūpata eva duḥkhatā tāpasya pratikūlātmakatvāt ॥
katham ? [sarvasya dveṣānuviddhaḥ] dveṣānugataḥ [cetanācetanasādhanādhīnaḥ] śatrukaṇṭakādisāṁdhanayaṁttaḥ tāpānubhavaḥ pūrvavardevadharmaphalaṁmanu bhavati apūrvaścopacīyamānaḥ [tatrāsti dveṣajaḥ karmāśayaḥ ॥]
tena ca duḥkhena paritapyamānaḥ sukhasādhanāni candanādīni [prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate] ceṣṭate । tacca paripandanaṁ parānugrahāya parapīḍanāya vā bhavati । tataḥ [parānugrahapīḍābhyāṁ dharmādharmāvupacinoti । sa ca] parānugrahapīḍākṛto dharmādharmākhyaḥ [karmāśayo lobhānmohācca prabhavatītyeṣā] tāvat [tāpaduḥkhatā] dradhīyasī viprasṛtā । evaṁ paśyato vivekinaḥ sarvamevāśrayaviṣayanimittairduḥkhabhiti ॥
adhunā hlādaparitāpānubhavajanitasaṁskāraduḥkhamucyate--- [kāḥ punaḥ saṁskāradu:khatā? sukhānubhavāt sukhasaṁskārāśaya, dukhānubhavādapi । duḥkhasaṁskārāśayaḥ ।] sukhaduḥkhayo rāgaṁdveṣānuviddhatvātatsaṁskārāśayāvapi rāgadveṣānuviddhau । [evaṁ karmaṇo vipāke] jātyāyurbhogākhye' [nubhūyamāne sukhaduḥkhe] bhavataḥ ॥
tato'pi sukhadu:khānubhavasaṁskārāśaya: yathā nairantaryeṇa sukhadu:khānubhavastathaiva tadanubhavasaṁskārāvapi rāgadveṣānuviddhau nirantaratayā bhavataḥ । tau ca saiskārāśayau kriyāyā upabhogasya cāṅgībhavataḥ । evaṁ saṁskārāśayaṁsya duḥkhahetutvam । saṁskārahetukaṁ saṁskāradu:khaṁ, tathā ca tatsaṁskāraduḥkhatā । na hmasmarannupabhogmaya kriyāyai vā sādhanamupādatte । smṛteśca saṁskāranimittatvamupapāditam ॥

evamidamanādi duḥkhasroto viprasṛtaṁ yoginameva pratikūlātmakatvādudvejayati। kasmāt, akṣipātrakalpo hi vidvāniti। yathorṇātanturakṣipātre nyastaḥ sparśena duḥkhayati na cānyeṣu gātrāvayaveṣu, evametāni duḥkhānyakṣipātrakalpaṁ yoginameva kliśnanti netaraṁ pratipattāram। itaraṁ tu svakarmopahṛtaṁ duḥkhamupāttamupāttaṁ tyajantaṁ tyaktaṁ tyaktamupādadānamanādivāsanāvicitrayā cittavṛttyā samantato'nuviddhamivāvidyayā hātavya evāhaṁkāramamakārānupātinaṁ jātaṁ jātaṁ bāhyādhyātmakobhayanimittāstriparvāṇastāpā anuplavante। tadevamanādinā duḥkhasrotasā vyuhyamānamātmānaṁ bhūtagrāmaṁ ca dṛṣṭvā yogī sarvaduḥkhakṣayakāraṇaṁ samyagdarśanaṁ śaraṇaṁ prapadyata iti।

vivaraṇam
yadyapi saṁskārasya svarūpato duḥkhatā nāsti, tathāpi saṁskārasya da:khahetutāṁ jānato vivekina: sattāmātreṇa du:khatvaṁ, bhakṣitamātraviṣavat । itthametaiḥ pariṇāmatāpasaṁskārahetubhiḥ sarvemevaṁ duḥkhamitya [nādiduḥkhasroto yoginameva pratikūlātmakatvādudvejayati ॥]
nanu cetarasyāpi pratikūlātmakameva, kasmānna tamudvejayati । nātyantakleśādikāluṣyāvivekakiṇīkṛtacetastvāditaramudrejayati । na pratikūlātmakatā prabhāvyate । yo hi dayitāmuṣṭighātaṁ mudgarābhighātadeśīyamapi mastakena pratīcchati । putrasya vā mūtrapurīṣamurasā dhārayati । asāvānandamahodanvattaraṅgāyamāṇaḥ [ṇaṁ] svātmanyapi na vātitarām [svātmānamapi na veti tarām] । na hi tasya tatpratikūlātmakam । rāgameva hi taditarasya pratipattṛtvādabhivardhayati tarām ॥
nanu ca yogino'pi tatsamānaṁ nimittaṁ, kasmāttamudvejayatīti । udvejatyeva tam । [kasmāt ? akṣipātrakalpo hi saḥ ।] prasannatvādviraktatvādityarthaḥ । tasmānna samānaṁ nimittaṁ tasya, yato'sau [vidvāniti । na hi viduṣaḥ kleśādi] kāluṣyāvivekakiṇīkṛtacetastvam । na ca tatkirṇākṛtacetasvatiraskārādṛte vidvattā । tasmādakṣipātrakalpatvādvidvāṁsamevodvaijayati, netaram ॥
tatra dṛṣṭāntābhyāṁ vidvadaviduṣorantaramācaṣṭe-- [yathorṇātanturatimṛdusparśī'pyakṣipātre nyastaḥ sparśena duḥkhayati] svacchataratvadakṣipātrasya, tathā yoginaṁ viviktataraprajñānamakaluṣahṛdayamudvejayati duḥkham । sa evorṇātanturanyeṣu gātreṣu kṣiptaḥ kharatarasaṁsparśenāpi na duḥkhayati, tathā [netaraṁ pratipattāraṁ] duḥkhaṁ pīḍayati, kleśādikiṇīkṛtacetasvāt kaṭhinataretaragātrāvayavakalpo hi saḥ ॥
tadidamāha-- [evametāni du:khāni akṣipātrakalpaṁ yoginameva kliśnanti netaraṁ pratipattāram ।] itarasya tu pratipatturitaragātrāvayavasvabhāvatāṁ darśayannāha-- [itaraṁ tviti । tāpā anuplavanta] ityevamantena vākyasamaptiḥ ॥
[svakāraṇopahṛtaṁ] duḥkhaprāptinimittaiścetanācetanādibhirupahṛtamupanītaṁ buddhivṛttidvoraṇa puruṣasya karmatāmāpāditaṁ, [duḥkhamupāttaṁ tyajantaṁ] śarīratyāgena, anyatra ca [tyaktaṁ] punaranyaṁ śarīrādilakṣaṇameva du:khasamudāyamu [pādadānamanādivāsanācitrayā] avidyayā [cittavṛtyā sarvato'nuviddhamiva ॥]
[itaraṁ] pratipattāraṁ kiṁviśiṣṭam ? [hātavyāhaṅkāramamakārānupātinam ।] kāryakaraṇeṣu taddharmaṣu ca kriyāguṇaphaleṣu viparyayeṇa pratipattirahaṅkāraḥ । mamakārastu teṣu bāhyeṣu ca cetanācetaneṣu mameti pratyayaḥ । tau ca viparyayatvāt samastakleśakarma vipākabījatvāca hātavyau । na hi tāvantareṇa rāgādayaḥ karmavipākā vā samudācaranti । tasmāddhātavyau tau tāvanupatituṁ śīlamasyeti hātavyāhaṅgāramamakārānupātī, tamū ॥
[jātaṁ jātam] anyagātrāvayavakalpaṁ [bāhyādhyātmikobhayanimittāḥ] bāhyaṁ devatā bhūtāni ca, adhyātmikaṁ kāryaṁ kāraṇaṁ ca, bāhyādhyātmikāni cobhayāni ca nimittaṁ yeṣāṁ te bāhyādhyātmikobhayanimittāḥ ॥
[triparvāṇaḥ] bāhyādinimittameva triparvatvam । bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānatvaṁ vā triparvatvam । vakṣyati ca [“heyaṁ duḥkhamanāgatam' iti ।] yadvā, kleśakarmavipākātmakatvam । yadvā, pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhatvam । ataste triparvāṇa [stāpā anuplāvante] anuṣajyanti ॥
[ta(me)devaṁ] aviveka pratipattāram [anādidu:khasrotasohyamānamātmānaṁ ca] duḥkhasrotasi magnaṁ tathā [bhūtagrāmaṁ ca dṛṣṭvā yogī sarvadu:khakṣayakaraṁ samyagdarśana śaraṇaṁ prapadyata iti ॥]
nanu ca yogitvādeva samyagdarśanaṁ pratipannaḥ । ucyate – yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādeva yogitvam, ṛte'pi samyagdarśanāt । tasmāt samyagdarśanasādhanatvaṁ yogasya darśayati । yogaṁ yogaphalaṁ ca sarvameva duḥkhaṁ paśyan samyagdarśanaikaśaraṇaṁ pratipadyate । tathā ca vakṣyati – [“tadvairāgyādapi doṣabījakṣaye kaivalyam?] iti ॥

guṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥravameva sarvaṁ vivekinaḥ। prakhyāpravṛttisthitirūpā buddhiguṇāḥ parasparānugrahatantrī bhūtvā śāntaṁ ghoraṁ mūḍhaṁ vā pratyayaṁ triguṇamevā''rabhante। calaṁ ca guṇavṛttamiti kṣiprapariṇāmi cittamuktam। rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca paraspareṇa virudhyante, sāmānyāni tvatiśayaiḥ saha pravartante। evamete guṇā itaretarāśrayeṇopārjitasukhaduḥkhamohapratyayāḥ sarve sarvarūpā bhavantīti, guṇapradhānabhāvakṛtastveṣāṁ viśeṣa iti। tasmādduḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekina iti।

vivaraṇam
[itaśva sarvaṁ duḥrkhaṁ vivekinaḥ ।] kutaśva ? [guṇavṛttivirodhāccāpi ।] nanu ca kimarthaṁ sūtre pṛthagvibhaktikriyā? yāvatā pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraguṇavṛttivirodhairiyeva kartavyam । naiṣa doṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavatadvāsanāḥ sarvajanaprasiddhā iti pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairiti nirdiṣṭāḥ । tatkāraṇavibhāgajñānaviśāradasyaiva vivekaprakarṣavato guṇavṛttivirodhā vijñeyā iti pṛthakkaraṇam । sarvaduḥkhahetutvasāmānyātvekasūtravinyāsaḥ ॥
guṇāḥ sattvādayaḥ, teṣāṁ vṛttayo guṇavṛttayaḥ, tāsāṁ virodhādguṇavṛttivirodhāt । te ca guṇā antaḥkaraṇadyākārasanniviṣṭāḥ । teṣāṁ guṇapradhānabhāvenābhinnapariṇāmatvācca viruddhavṛttitvaṁ bhavati । anyatamavṛttirudbhavantyā'nyatamavṛttyā'bhibhūyate ॥
evaṁ trayāṇāmapi pratikṣaṇa(pakṣa)manyenyavṛttitiraskāra itaretaravṛttyudbhāvitvaṁ ca । na sukhaduḥkhamohātmakānāṁ guṇānāmanyatamavṛttilābho'nyatamānanusaṁhitaḥ । tata etatsiddhaṁ bhavati – yadā duḥkhātmikaṁ raja udbhavati, tadā duḥkhatvādeva tadvṛtterna duḥkhamiti vaktavyam । sattvatamase.ārīpa rajo'nugatirastyeveti tayerapi duḥkhatvameva । satvatamaḥpravṛttinivṛtyorapi rajovyāpārānujavādduḥkhatvameva sarvasyeti ॥
etadupabyācaṣṭe – [prakhyāpravṛttisthitiśīlābhirvṛttibhirguṇāḥ parasparānugrahatantrāḥ] parasparaviruddhā api parasparopakāryopakārakabhāvena tailavartyagnivat [śāntaṁ] sāttvikaṁ [ghoraṁ] rājasaṁ [mūḍha़ṁ] tāmasaṁ [pratyayaṁ triguṇamevārabhante ।] i(tare)tarayoraṅgabhāvenānugatatvādyadā sāttvikaḥ śāntaḥ pratyaya udbhūtaḥ so'nantaramevodbubhūṣatā tamo'nusaṁhitena ghoreṇa rājasena pralyayena hanyate ॥
yadā ca rājaso ghoraḥ pratyaya itaraguṇānugata udbhūto bhavati so'nantaramevodbubhūṣatā tāmasena pratyayena mūḍhena sattvānugatena sāttvikena vā tamo'nugatena hanyate । tathā tāmaso'pītarapratyayāmyāṁ paryāyeṇa । tathā sāttvikena itarāvityanyonyodayābhibhavapravṛttayā guṇāḥ ॥
kasmāt ? yataḥ [calaṁ guṇavṛttaṁ] guṇasvabhāvatvaṁ cittākāreṇa guṇāḥ sanniviṣṭā iti [kṣiprapariṇāmaṁ cittamuktam ।] kva ? tantre ॥
kasmāt punarguṇā virudhyanta iti । anekātiśayānāmekatrāsambhavāt । yathā apavarake tamaḥprakāśayoratiśayavatoḥ, evamantaḥkaraṇākārasanniveśināṁ sukhaduḥkhamoharūpāṇāṁ prakāśapravṛttiniyamavṛttīnāṁ guṇānāṁ rūpeṇa vā sukhādinā vṛttyā vā jñānādilakṣaṇayā yugapadatiśayo na sambhavati ॥
sāmānyānāṁ tvavirodhādavyaktarūpāṇāmatiśayarvyaktaiḥ saha vṛttiryuktā । tena [‘rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante । sāmānyāni tvatiśayaiḥ saha vartante’] ityucyate । yadā sukharūpātiśayastadā na duḥkharūpātiśayo moharūpātiśayo vā । ’ tathā itarātiśaye netarātiśayaḥ । tathā, jñānavṛttyatiśaye na lobhapratatyavṛttyatiśayaḥ । tathā, anyatamavṛttyatiśaye nānyatamavṛttyatiśayaḥ ॥
[evamete guṇā itaretaropāśrayeṇopārjitasukhaduḥkhamohapratyayāḥ ।] sukhena rajastasaupāśrayeṇopārjitaḥ sukhapratyayaḥ । rajasāpi sattvatamaupāśrayeṇopārjito duḥkhapratyayaḥ । tasamāpi sattvarajaupāśrayeṇopārjito mohapratyayaḥ । tataḥ [sarve sarvakāryā bhavanti ॥]
yadyevamayaṁ pratyayaḥ sāttvikaḥ, tāmaso'yaṁ, rājasaścāyamiti viśeṣaḥ ka ityāha – [guṇapradhānabhāvakṛtastveṣāṁ viśeṣa] iti । pradhānopasarjanatayā saṁjñālābhālābhau । yathā pāñcabhautiktave'pi pārthivaṁ taijasamāpyamiti ॥
yata evaṁ guṇavṛttivirodhaḥ, [tasmāt sarvameva duḥkhaṁ vivekina iti ।] guṇavṛttivirodhādityetatparavairāgyārtham । kathaṁ ? pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairiti dṛṣṭānuśravikraviṣayāvatṛṣṇasyaiva sarvasya du:khapratipādanārtha pṛthagvibhaktikaṁ kṛtam । na hi tatra duḥkhatvamapaśyato vairāgyamupakalppata iti ॥
etattu guṇavṛttivirodhāceti guṇānāṁ parasparavirodhivṛttitvena duḥkhatvapratipādanāttebhyo vyaktāvyaktadharmakebhyaḥ paraṁ vairāgyamupakalpyata ityevamartham । tathā cātrāpi pradhānopasarjanabhāvena sarve sarvarūpā bhavantīti vyaktāvyaktadharmatvaṁ pratipāditam । evaṁ ca kṛtvā sūtre'pi guṇavṛttivirodhācceti pṛthak paṭhitam ॥

tadasya mahato duḥkhasamudāyasya prabhavabījamavidyā। tasyāśca samyagdarśanamabhāvahetuḥ। yathā cikitsāśāstraṁ caturvyūham – rogo rogaheturārogyaṁ bhaiṣajyamiti, evamidamapi śāstraṁ caturvyūhameva। tadyathā – saṁsāraḥ saṁsāraheturmokṣo mokṣopāya iti। tatra duḥkhabahulaḥ saṁsāro heyaḥ। pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṁyogo heyahetuḥ। saṁyogasyā''tyantikī nivṛttirhānam। hānopāyaḥ samyagdarśanam।

vivaraṇam
pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhadharmatvāt [tasyaitasya mahato] guṇagauṇalakṣaṇasya [duḥkhasamudāyasya prabhavabījamavidyā । tasyāśva samyagdarśanamabhāvahetuḥ] pratipakṣatvāt । bhūtārthāśrayatvādvidyāyā abhūtārthāśrayatvāccāvidyāyā vidyaivābhāvahetuḥ । yathā sadviṣayeṇaikacandradarśanenasidviṣayasyānekacandradarśanasya bādhanam ॥
saha duḥkhanidānana kleśakarmavipākalakṣaṇena sarva duḥkhamityupapāditam । anena duḥkhena yo duḥkhī vivekī sa etasya samyagdarśanaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ adhikṛto, netaro du:khasyaiva pratipattṛtvādityetaddṛṣṭāntena pratipipādayeṣanāha – [yathā cikitsāśāsraṁ caturvyūham – rogo rogaheturārogyaṁ bhaiṣajyamiti ।] rogarogohatumāṁstannivivartayiṣurbhaiṣajyasya śāstrasyārogyasya prayojanasya viṣayaḥ ॥
[evamidamapi śāsraṁ caturyūhameva । yathā—saṁsāraḥ saṁsaheturmīkṣo mokṣahetuḥ । tatra duḥkhabahulaḥ saṁsāro] heyaḥ । [pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogo heyahetuḥ । saṁyogusyāntitikī nivṛttirhānam । hānopāyaḥ samyagdarśanami] tyete catvāro vyūhāḥ ॥
yathā cikitsāśāstraṁ roge rogahatau cārogye ca tatprayojanake bhaiṣajaye ca catuṣṭaye svarūpapratipādanāya vyūhitaṁ, tata eva ca rogādayo'sya catvāro vyūhā iti caturvyūhaṁ, tathā asya śāstrasya । duḥkhabahulaḥ saṁsāraḥ [heyaḥ], avidyāhetukaśca pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogo hetuḥ, sanimittasya saṁsārasya hānaṁ samyagdarśanaśāstrasya prayojanaṁ, tathā samyagdarśarna ceti catvāra ete vyūhā asyāpi iti caturvyūhaṁ śāstram । eṣu vā'rtheṣu caturdhā vyūho'syeti catuvryūham ॥
tatra hātuḥ svarūpamupādeyaṁ vā heyaṁ vā na bhavitumarhatīti hāne tasyocchedavādaprasaṅga upādāne ca hetuvādaḥ। ubhayapratyākhyāne śāśvatavāda ityetatsamyagdarśanam ॥ 15 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra hātuḥ svarūpamiti । nanu ‘draṣṭā dṛśimātra'] iti hātṛlakṣaṇasūtra etadvaditavyam । naiṣa doṣaḥ । śāstrārambhaprayojanapratipipādayiṣuṇā kleśādikaḥ samasto duḥkhāvasānaḥ saṁsāro nirvarṇitaḥ । saṁsārī ca yaḥ saṁsāraduḥkhena nirviṇṇo vivekī so'sya śāstrasya viṣaya upapāditaḥ । tasya vivekinaḥ śāstramata: paramārabhyate । etacca prathamasūtre pradarśitam । ābhyamāṇasya śāsrasya samyagdarśanameva prayojanam । tacca saṁsāraduḥkhanirvarṇanānantaramavasaraprāptaṁ pratipādayitavyamityetaducyate – [tatra hātuḥ svarūpamiti ॥]
hātā puruṣaḥ, tasya [svarūpamupādeyaṁ vā heyaṁ vā na bhavati ।] kuta etadevam ? heyopādeyavyatirekeṇa vastvadarśanāt । yathā loke sukhaṁ tatkāraṇaṁ copādeyaṁ, duḥkhaṁ tatkāraṇaṁ ca heyam , evamayamapi puruṣo vastutvādanyataradharmī bhavitumarhatītyabhiprāyaḥ । kimato yadyevam ? ata etadbhavati, [hāne tvasyocchedavādaprasaṅga] iti ॥
yadyasau heyatvadharmā, tata eṣa hātavyaḥ । hāne tvasya kiṁ syāt ? ā.ātmocchedavādaprasaṅgaḥ syāt । ataḥ ko doṣaḥ syāt ? doṣaṁ kaivalyapāde pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ ॥
kiñcānyat – asya hātrantarasya(kiñcānyatarasya)abhāvāddhānānupapattitvam । svayamevātmana ātmā hāteti cet – na – svātmani kriyāvirodhādbhedābhāvācca । heyādātmana ātmā hātā cedanyastadā'navasthāsaṅgaḥ । yo yo hātā । tasyāpi heyatvāt । na ca yugapaddvayorhatroḥ saṁbhavo'sti । bhinnakālabhāvinostu heyahātṛtvānupapattiḥ ॥
hātuśca heyatvābhyupagame tasyānavasthitatvāddheyasambandhānupapattiḥ । hāturanavasthitatve ca svayameva heyatvapratipatterhāturhānāyodyamānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ । hānaphalānupapātiśva । na hi baddhasya svarūpanāśa eva phalam । mokṣo hi tasya phalam । nāpi mriyamāṇo'pi jñātakṣaṇāntaramaraṇaḥ svarūpavināśamicchati । vināśasyārthaprāptatvādevamanavasthitaśveddhātā na svarūpahānamicchet, arthaprāserhānasya ॥
yathā ca hāturnitya vaṁ tathā [draṣṭṛsūtre] kaivalyapade ca vyākhyāsyāmahe । tasmānna heyatvadharmaṁ puruṣaḥ । saṁsārastu mahadādivyaktiḥ duḥkhabalo heyaḥ । tattulyadharmakaḥ puruṣo na bhavatītyarthaḥ । tattulyadharbhakatve [tasyocchedavādaprasaṅga] iti ॥
astu tarhyapādeyaḥ, yathā sukhārthaṁ sukhakāraṇaṁ dravyam । naitadevam । kasmāt ? [upādāne] tvasya [hetuvāda] grasaṅgāt । yasya dravyādyupādānaphalena sambandhaḥ [sa] cedupādīyeta, tannirhetumasyopādanaṁ syāt । anyasyopādāturabhāvāt । na hi paṭaḥ paṭenaivopādīyate । anyasya hyanyadupādeyam । upādātrantarasambhave hi tadanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ, so'pyanyenepādīyate so'pi cānyeneti ॥
kiṁ ca – pārārthryaprasaṅgaśca । anyasya hi hetoranyadupādīyate, satvādilakṣaṇasya pradhānasyopādāne puruṣo heturabhyupeyate, yathā ghaṭāya mṛtpiṇḍopādāne kulālo hetuḥ । sa cetpuruṣaḥ pradhānopādanahetuḥ pradhānavadupādīyeta, tasyapi sattvādidharmatvaṁ syāt, upādeyatvānmṛtpiṇḍavat । tate.o'sya pradhānasya nirhetukaṁ kāryārthamupādānaṁ prāpnoti ॥
atheśvarārthamupādeyaḥ, puruṣāṇāṁ vā parasparārthamiti cet, bhogyatvācetanatvapariṇāmitvādidoṣasāmagrī prasajyeta, tasmānnāpi pradhānadharmakaḥ puruṣa [ityupādāne ca hetuvādaprasaṅga] ityucyate ॥
taduktam – [hetustvapuruṣo bhavatīti ।] tasya copādane ahetu: pradhānavṛttirnirhetukī syāt । na ca svayaṁ svārthaṁ śakyaṁ vijñātum । prakāśādiṣu svārthatvādarśanātū ॥
[ubhayapratyākhyāne] heyatvopādeyatvapratyākhyāne । [śāśvatavādaprasaṅgaḥ] ātmanityatvavādaprasaṅgaḥ । yadyapi pradhānasyopādeyasyāpi śāśvatatvaṁ, tathā'pi vikārātmanā tadaśāśvatameva । anekātmakatvamaśucitvamavidyātvaṁ parārthatvamityevamādayo doṣāḥ pradhāna । puruṣāṇāmapi tathātve satyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ । bandhamokṣayostaddhetvośca vidyāvidyayoḥ svarūpāvyatirekādbandhamuktayośva nirviśeṣatvaprasaṅgāt । tasmāddheyopādeyatvapratyākhyānena śāśvatavāda [ityetadeva samyagdarśanam ॥ 15 ॥]
tadetacchāstraṁ caturvyūhamityabhidhīyate –
heyaṁ duḥkhamanāgatam ॥ 16 ॥

duḥkhamatītamupabhogenātivāhitaṁ na heyapakṣe vartate। vartamānaṁ ca svakṣaṇe bhogāruḍhamiti na tatkṣaṇāntare heyatāmāpadyate। tasmādyadevānāgataṁ duḥkhaṁ tadevākṣipātrakalpaṁ yoginaṁ kliśnāti netaraṁ pratipattāram। tadeva heyatāmāpadyate ॥ 16 ॥

vivaraṇam
yathā cikitsyavyatiriktarogādicatuṣṭayamantareṇa cikitsāśāstramārogyaprayojanaṁ caturvyūhaṁ na saṁbhavati, tathedamapi hātṛsvarūpavyatiriktaheyādicatuṣṭayamantareṇa samyagdarśanaśāstraṁ hānaphalaṁ caturvyūhaṁ na sambhavatīti, heyādicatuṣṭayapratipādanena [tadetacchāstraṁ caturvyūhamabhidhīyate ॥]
katham ? [heyaṁ duḥkhamanāgatam । duḥkhamatītam] atikrāntaṁ, vartamānājjanmano'tikrāntajanmalakṣaṇaṁ duḥkhaṁ, [tadupabhogenātivāhitam] atinītaṁ na heyapakṣe vartate ! svayameva hīnatvāt ॥
[vartamānaṁ ca] yajjanmalakṣaṇaṁ duḥkham [svakṣaṇopabhogārūḍham] svaṁ vartamānaṁ bhogaviśiṣṭaṁ kṣaṇamadhvānamupabhujyamānātmakatvenārūḍha़ṁ [tat] duḥkhaṁ [na kṣaṇāntare heyatāmāpadyate ।] svayameva bhogena hīnaṁ na hānāya kṣaṇāntaramapekṣate ॥
[tasmādyadevānāgataṁ] prāyaṇānantarabhāvijanmaduḥkhalakṣaṇaṁ [duḥkhaṁ tadevākṣipātrakalpaṁ yoginaṁ kliśnātīti tadeva heyaṁ] samyagdarśanena hānīyamucyate । bhaviṣyajjanmābhāvāyaiva yatitavyam । na vartamānaduḥkhanirodhāya ॥
vartamānajanmayiyatiṣāyāṁ hi samyagdarśanamaśakyaviniyogatvādanarthakaṁ syāt । muktabāṇavat pravṛttaphalatvādvartamānaduḥkhasya । bhaviṣyati punarapravṛttatvādbījanirodha upakalpata iti samyagdarśanārthavatvam । svaviṣayo hi samyagdarśanasya sa iti ॥ 16 ॥
tasmādyadeva heyamityucyate tasyaiva kāraṇaṁ pratinirdiśyate –
draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ saṁyogo heyahetuḥ ॥ 17 ॥

draṣṭā buddheḥ pratisaṁvedī puruṣaḥ। dṛśyā buddhisattvopārūḍhāḥ sarve dharmāḥ। tadetaddṛśyamayaskāntamaṇikalpaṁ saṁnidhimātropakāridṛśyatvena svaṁ bhavati puruṣasya dṛśirūpasya svāminaḥ, anubhavakarmaviṣayatāmāpannaṁ yataḥ। anyasvarūpeṇa pratilabdhātmakaṁ svatantramapi parārthatvātparatantram। tayordṛgdarśanaśaktyoranādirarthakataḥ saṁyogo heyaheturduḥkhasya kāraṇamityarthaḥ। tathā coktam – tatsaṁyogahetuvivarjanātsyādayamātyantiko duḥkhapratīkāraḥ। kasmāt, duḥkhahetoḥ parihāryasya pratīkāradarśanāt।

vivaraṇam
tadetacchāstraṁ caturvyūhamabhidhīyata ityuktam । ekaścaturṣu vyūhaḥ pratipāditaḥ [heyaṁ du:khamanāgata] miti । idānīṁ dvitīyo vyūhaḥ [tasya] duḥkhasya [kāraṇaṁ] , hetuḥ [pratinirdiśyate ॥]
nanu nirdiṣṭamava duḥkhakāraṇamiti, tathaivopasaṁhṛtamante – [tasyaitasya mahato du:khasamudāyasya prabhavabījamavidyeti ।] satyamevam । kintu du:khasvarūpamātraṁ tatkāraṇasvarūpamātraṁ ca pūrvaṁ nirdiṣṭam । na ca tatsvarūpamātre, iti tatkāraṇaṁ nirdiśyate । [draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ saṁyogo heyahetuḥ ॥]
draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṁ ca draṣṭṛdṛśye । tayerdraṣṭṛdṛśyayoriti । draṣṭṛdṛśyasaṁyoga iti tu vaktavye pṛthagvibhaktigrahaṇaṁ tayorbhinnajātīyatvakhyāpanārtham । bhoktṛbhogyayoḥ svasvāminoḥ pradhānapuruṣayoriti vā sūtrayituṁ śakyata eva । tathāpi draṣṭṛdṛśyagrahaṇamanena draṣṭṛdṛśyatvenaiva saṁyogo nānyathetyevamartham ॥
[draṣṭā buddheḥ pratisaṁvedī puruṣo] vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ । pratisaṁvedituṁ śīlamasya sa pratisaṁvedī । kasya ? [buddhe] riti । [dṛśyā buddhiḥ] antaḥkaraṇaṁ pratyayarūpeṇa ॥
nanu ca śabdadayo'pi viṣayā dṛśyā evetyata āha – [satvopāruḍhāḥ saveṁ dharmāḥ] śabdādayo buddhisatvamupārūḍhā buddhipratyayākārā eva dṛśyā na svataḥ । svataśca dṛśyatve jñātājñātaviṣayatvaṁ puruṣasya syāt । sadā jñātaviṣayatvaṁ ca puruṣasya nyāyena sthāpyate । tasmādbuddhayupārūḍhā eva sarve dharmā dṛśyāḥ ॥
[tadetaddṛśyamayaskāntamaṇikalpam] ayaso'pi kriyārthenaivopakartā'yaskāntamaṇiryathā, tathā [puruṣasya] puruṣārthena dvividhena bhogāpavargalakṣaṇenopakartṛtvādayaskāntamaṇiriva [svaṁ dṛśirūpasya] cititvarūpamātrasya [svāminaḥ ॥]
kathaṁ svamityata āha – [karmaviṣayatvamāpannaṁ] karmaiva viṣayaḥ karmaviṣayaḥ, karmatvāpattireva । viṣayo dṛśirūpasya dṛśyatāmāpanna ityetat । kathambhūtaṁ satkarmaviṣayatāmāpadyata iti tadviśeṣaṇārthamāha – [anyasvarūpeṇa pratilabdhātmakamiti ॥]
anyasvarūpeṇa svaparapuruṣarūpeṇa śabdādirūpeṇa ca pratilabdhātmakaṁ pratilabdhaviśeṣarūpaṁ pratilabdhapuruṣaśabdādiviśeṣasvabhāvaṁ puruṣasvarūpeṇa labdhātmakaṁ saddṛśyatvena karmatāmāpannamapavargārthena svaṁ bhavati । śabdādyākāreṇa labdhātmakaṁ saddṛśyatvena karmatāmāpannaṁ bhogārthena svaṁ bhavati ॥
nanu kathaṁ svatantrasya svatvam । na hi kiñcit svatantraṁ svayaṁ vyāpriyamāṇamanyadapekṣate । yadapi svavyāpārānuniṣpādipuruṣārtharūpaṁ, tadapi svabhāvādeva । na puruṣaniyogakāri । tasmāt svatantrasya sataḥ svatvaṁ na yuktamityata āha – [svatantramapi] puruṣārthadvayakartṛtvena [parārthatvātt paratantram ।] tataśca svameva ॥
[tayordṛgdarśanaśaktyoriti ।] draṣṭṛdṛśyayorityupakramasya dṛgdarśanaśaktyorityupasaṁhāraḥ, buddhipuruṣasaṁyogasya buddhyutpattyanantarabhāvitvādādimattvamāśaṅkya tadanādimattvapradarśanārthaṁ kriyate । [dṛgdarśanaśaktyoranādiḥ saṁyogaḥ ।] dharmiṇāṁ nityatvāt nityasambandhopapattestacchaktyorapi draṣṭṛdṛśyatvalakṣaṇo'nādiḥ saṁyogo' [rthakṛtaḥ] puruṣārthaprayojanavaśa ityarthaḥ ॥
tathā ca satyanāditve'pi prayojananivṛttau saṁyoganivṛttirupapadyate । dharmiṇāṁ tu svarūpasaṁyogaḥ sattāmātreṇa na prayojanakṛta iti nitya eva । dharmamātrābhistvanityābhiranityaḥ saṁyogaḥ । sa tu buddhipuruṣasaṁyogo [heyahetuḥ duḥkhasya kāraṇam] ityarthaḥ ॥
[tathā coktaṁ tantre – tatsaṁyogahetuvivarjanāt] tayorbuddhipuruṣayoḥ saṁyogastasya heturavidyā tadvivarjanāt । kathaṁ vivarjanam ? vidyayā samyagdarśanena tatpratipakṣeṇa nivartanāt । tasmāttatsaṁyogahetuvivarjanāt [ātyantiko'] tyantāya prabhavati [duḥkhapratīkāraḥ ।] ko'sau ? yatsamyagdarśitvam ॥

tadyathā – pādatalasya bhedyatā, kaṇṭakasya bhettṛtvaṁ, parihāraḥ kaṇṭakasya pādā'nadhiṣṭhānaṁ pādatrāṇavyavahitena vā'dhiṣṭhānam, etattrayaṁ yo veda loke sa tatra pratīkāramārabhamāṇo bhedajaṁ duḥkhaṁ nā''pnoti। kasmāt, tritvopalabdhisāmarthyāditi। atrāpi tāpakasya rajasaḥ sattvameva tapyam। kasmāt, tapikriyāyāḥ karmasthatvāt, sattva kriyā nāpariṇāmini niṣkriye kṣetrajñe, darśitaviṣayatvāt। sattvaṁ tu tapyamāne tadākārānurodhī puruṣo'pyanutapyata iti ॥ 17 ॥

vivaraṇam
kathametaditi, prasiddhaṁ dṛṣṭāntamāha-- [tadyathā--pādatalasya bhedyatā] sukumārataratvāt । [kaṇṭakasya bhetṛtvaṁ] karkaśasvabhāvatvāt । tatsaṁyogo viśiṣṭo dukhaheturityarthasiddham । tatra kaṇṭakavyathāduḥkhasya [parihāraḥ kaṇṭake padā pādena anadhiṣṭhānam] anākramaṇam । athādhiṣṭhānakārarṇa cedasti [pādatrāṇavyavahitena vā padādhiṣṭhānam । etaddvayaṁ yo veda] bhedyabhettṛdvarye parihāradvayaṁ vā yo veda [loke sa tatrā] nyataraṁ [parihāra] mārabhate । [sa tatra pratīkāramārabhamāṇī bhedajaṁ] kaṇṭakabhedajanitaṁ [duḥkhaṁ nāpnoti ॥]
tathehāpi puruṣaḥ sattvadvāreṇa kaṇṭakasthānīyaṁ pradhānam, tayorviśeṣṭaḥ saṁyego'vidyānimitto duḥkhakāraṇam , duḥkhaparihāro'pyayam – guṇagauṇebhyaḥ pradhānamātraviśeṣebhyo dṛśyebhyo nirapekṣatā, samyagdarśanena prayojanābhāvaṁ buddhvā puruṣasyāvikriyasvāt kaṇṭakādhiṣṭhānavaccharīrārambhiṇī vā karmaṇo niyatavadanīyatvādavaśyaṁ phaladāyitvaṁ buddhvā aprārthitopanatānāṁ śabdādīnāṁ samyagdarśanavyavahitena satvena bhogaḥ । evaṁ parihāraṁ sañjānānaḥ kaṇṭakabhedaduḥkhaparihāramiva saṁsāraduḥkhaṁ nāmeti ॥
kasmādetadevamiti - tritvopalabdhisāmarthyāt । pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogatritvopalabdhisāmarthyāt । evaṁ hi vijñānasya sāmarthyaṁ dṛśyate । pādatalakaṇṭakatatsaṁyogeṣvajñānasya ca tritvānupalabdherduḥkhahetutvaṁ dṛśyata eva ।
yadyevaṁ puruṣaścenna tapyate puruṣārthaṁ pradhānaṁ pravartata ityetadanupapannam । vṛttisārūpyeṇoktottarattvāt । tadevedamucyate - darśitaviṣattvāt । apariṇāmino'vikriyattvāt darśitaviṣayattvam । tasmāt dṛśikarmaṇi sattve tapye tadākārānurodhī tadākārānuvartī । tadākārānurodhitvaṁ taddṛśisannidhau bauddhasya pratyayasya dṛśirūpāvabhāsatā । yathā lākṣārasasannidhau sphaṭikasya lākṣākārāvabhāsatā, tathā puruṣo'pi tapyata ityupacaryate ॥ 17 ॥
dṛśyasvarūpamucyate –
prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlaṁ bhūtendriyātmakaṁ bhogāpavargārthaṁ dṛśyam ॥ 18 ॥

prakāśaśīlaṁ sattvam। kriyāśīlaṁ rajaḥ। sthitiśīlaṁ tama iti। ete guṇāḥ parasparoparaktapravibhāgāḥpariṇāminaḥ saṁyogaviyogadharmāṇa itaretaropāśrayeṇopārjitamūrtayaḥ parasparāṅgāṅgitve'pyasaṁbhinnaśaktipravibhāgāstulyajātīyātulyajātīyaśaktibhedānupātinaḥ pradhānavelāyām upardaśitasaṁnidhānā guṇatve'pi ca vyāpāramātreṇa pradhānāntarṇītānumitāstitāḥ puruṣārthakartavyatayā prayuktasāmarthyāḥ saṁnidhimātropakāriṇo'yaskāntamaṇikalpāḥ pratyayamantareṇaikatamasya vṛttimanu vartamānāḥ pradhānaśabdavācyā bhavanti। etaddṛśyamityucyate।

vivaraṇam
[dṛśyasvarūpamucyate ।] nanu ca [draṣṭṛdṛśyayo] rityuktaṁ pūrvasūtre । tatra kramaprāptasannidhānaṁ dṛṣṭrasvarūpameva pūrvaṁ vaktavyam । naiṣa doṣaḥ । dṛśyasvarūpāvagamapūrvakatvāddraṣṭṛsvarūpāvabedhasya । dṛśyasya hi svātmavyatiriktadraṣṭrarthavādvyatiriktadraṣṭṛsadbhāvasiddhiḥ । ata eva prādhānyāt pūrvasūtre draṣṭuḥ pūrvanipātaḥ kṛtaḥ । tallakṣaṇe tvarthakramo vivakṣyate ॥
[prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlaṁ bhūtendriyātmakaṁ bhogāpavargārthaṁ dṛśyam ।] prakāśaśca kriyā ca sthitiśca prakāśakriyāsthitayaḥ । prakāśasyābhyarhitatvāt pūrvanipātaḥ । bahuṣu cāniyamāt sthitikriyāśabdayoraniyama iti kriyāśabdasya pūrvanipātaḥ । tā eva śīlaṁ yasya tatprakāśakriyāsthitiśīlam । prakāśanaṁ prakāśaḥ, sa śīlaṁ yasya [tat prakāśaśīlaṁ sattvam ।] nanu ca yadā prakāśanaṁ kriyā, kathaṁ । tacchīlaṁ sattvaṁ syāta 1 rajo hi tacchīlaṁ, sthitiśīlaṁ vā tamaḥ kathamiti ॥
nanu ca svarūpameva tatprakāśanaṁ sthitiśca । na । svarūpamātre śīlaśabdāyogāt । na hi mṛdaṅgaśīle mārdaṅgikaḥ । mṛdaṅgavādanaśīlo hi sa ucyate । na hi vyāpāraśūnye kvacidapi śīlaśabdaḥ · prayujyate ॥
nanu ca sthitiprakāśāvapi sattvatamasoḥ svarūpam । tadetenaiva gamyate svarūpe śīlaśabdaḥ prasaṁkṣyata iti । ucyate – na svarūpe sarvatra śīlaśabdaprayogaḥ । ihāpi rajasi duḥkhasvarūpe kriyāśīlamiti kriyayā samprayujya śīlaśabdavyapadeśaḥ । sthitiprakāśāvapi vyāpārarūpāvabhipretau ॥
atha mataṁ – kriyāpi rajasaḥ svarūpameveti – na – pradhānāvasthāyāṁ sāmyābhyupagamāt guṇānām । yadi kriyā rajasaḥ svarūpamabhaviṣyat pradhānasyāpi kriyāvatvaṁ guṇasāmyāvasthāyāmabhuviṣyat । kāryāvasthāyāṁ hi kriyāvatvamabhyupagamyate, na pradhānavelāyām । tasmānna svarūpābhiprāyeṇa śīlaśabdaprayogaḥ ॥
tatrākriyāśīlayorapi sattvatamasornityaṁ kriyāśīlena rajasā saṁyogādrajaḥ kriyayaiva kriyāvattvaṁ sthitiprakāśayorapīti tatkriyopacāreṇa [prakāśaśīlaṁ sattvaṁ sthitiśīlaṁ tama] iti vyapadiśyate । sthitiprakāśayorātmalābhasya rajaḥkriyāpūrvatvāccalatorevābhivyaktestācchīlyaṁ sattvatamaserucyate ॥
tatra [prakāśaśīlaṁ] yattatsattvam । [kriyāśīlaṁ] pravṛttiśīlaṁ [rajaḥ । sthitiśīlaṁ] varaṇaśīlaṁ niyamaśīlaṁ [tama ityete guṇāḥ parasparoparaktapravibhāgāḥ] paraspareṇoparakta: pravibhāge bhedo yeṣāṁ guṇānāṁ te [parasparoparatapravibhāgāḥ ॥]
yathā prakāśaśīlamiti sattvamucyate'traiva । rajaḥkriyoparañjanāt sarvāvabhāsasamarthasyāpi satvasya niyataprakāśatvaṁ tamauparaktatvena । tathā rajaso'pi pravṛttyabhivyaktiḥ sattvoparāgeṇa ! niyatapravṛttitvaṁ tu tamauparāgeṇa ! tathā tamase'pi sthilyabhivyaktiḥ satvoparāgeṇa ! sthitiśīlatvaṁ rajauparāgeṇa । sthitistu svata eva । rajase'pi pravṛttiḥ svataḥ । sattvasyāpi prakāśaḥ svata eva । itthamevānyeṣvapi kāryeṣu satvādīnāmitaretaroparāgo draṣṭavyaḥ ॥
[saṁyogaviyogadharmāṇaḥ ।] saṁyogaśva viyogaśva saṁyogaviyogau, tau dhamaiṁ yeṣāṁ te saṁyogaviyogadharmāṇaḥ । kasmiṁścit kāryaṁ aārambhabhmāṇe guṇapradhānabhāvenānyonyaṁ saṁyujyante । tathaivārabdhakāryavirodhidharmāntarodaye parasparaṁ viyujyante ॥
[iteretaropāśreyaṇopārjitamūrtayaḥ] -mahadādistambaparyantā mūrtaya itaretaropāśrayeṇopārjitā dharmadharmilakṣaṇā yaiste itarataropāśrayeṇopārjitamūrtayaḥ ॥
[parasparato bhinnā api] -paramārthato'nyonyato'nyo'pi । [asambhinnaśaṁtipravibhāgāḥ] -atyantaṁ vyāvṛttakāryārambhābhimukhyasāmathryaprabhedāḥ ॥
etaduktaṁ bhavati – ekasmin kārya ārabdhavye'tyantavyatiṣaktaparasparaśaktayaḥ kāryārambhakāle pṛthaktvenānupalakṣyamāṇaśaktipravibhāgā iti ॥
[tulyajātīyātulyajātīyaśatibhedānupatinaḥ ।] sātvikānāṁ sattvaṁ tulyajātiḥ, rājasānāṁ rajastulyajātiḥ, tāmasānāṁ tama iti ca । parasparāpekṣayā tu bhinnajātīyatvam । tulyajātīyātulyajātīyānāṁ śaktiprabhedamanupatituṁ śīlaṁ yeṣāṁ te [tulyajātīyātulyajātīyaśaktiprabhedānupatinaḥ ।] na hi sāttvike vā rājase tāmase vā prārabdhavyasya trayāṇāṁ śaktiprabhedānupātamantareṇa kāryārambhaḥ sambhavati ॥
yadyevaṁ sarvaśaktiprabhedānupātitvadekaikasya kāryārambhe tulyai prādhānyamityata āha – [pradhānavelāyāmupadarśitasannidhānāḥ] sarve । ekaikasmin prādhānyena svakāryārambhiṇi tatkāla itarayorapi sannidhānamupasarjanabhāvenopadarśitamiti [pradhānavelāyāmupadarśitasannidhānāḥ ।] na hi sarveṣāṁ yugapat prādhānyam । samapradhānatve hi pradhānameva bhaveyuḥ, na kāryarambhitvam ॥
athecyate – kathaṁ punarekasmin prādhānyena kāryārambhiṇītarāstitvamavagamyata iti । taducyate – [guṇatve] copasarjanabhāve [ca vyapāramātreṇa] pradhāna upalakṣyamāṇena vyāpāramātreṇa । [pradhānāntarnītena] na hi pradhānasyāntarnāto vyāpāraḥ itarayorupasarjanabhāvenāsānnidhāne saṁbhaviṣyatīti pradhānavyāpariṇā [numitāstitvāḥ ॥]
[puruṣārthetikartavyatāprayuktasāmarthyāḥ] puruṣārthe bhogāpavargau tasyetikartavyatā yathā yathā arthaniṣpattistathā tathā prayuktaṁ kāryārambhaṁ prati [sāmarthyaṁ] yeṣāṁ te [puruṣārthetikartavyatāprayuktasāmarthyāḥ ॥]
[sannidhimātropakāriṇaḥ] vikārapratyayarūpasannidhimātreṇa puruṣasyepakurvantīti [sannidhimātre.opakāriṇaḥ । ayaskāntamaṇikalpāḥ ॥]
pratyayaṁ vṛttiṁ jñānamantareṇa ekatamasya vṛttiṁ sthitilakṣaṇāṁ samatāmanuvartamānāḥ । [pradhānaśabdavācyā bhavānti ।] naiva triguṇīvyatirekeṇānyatpradhānaṁ nāmāsti । ta eva guṇā: sāmyāvasthāḥ pradhānaikaśabdābhidhānīyakaṁ pratipadyante । vaiṣamyaṁ bhajante vikāraśabdābhidheyā vṛttimante bhavanti ॥
[etaddṛśyamityucyate ।]

tadetadbhūtendriyātmakaṁ bhūtabhāvena pṛthivyādinā sūkṣmasthūlena pariṇamate। tathendriyabhāvena śrotrādinā sūkṣmasthūlena pariṇamata iti। tattu nāprayojanamapi tu prayojanamurarīkṛtya pravartata iti bhogāpavargārthaṁ hi taddṛśyaṁ puruṣasyeti। tatreṣṭāniṣṭaguṇasvarūpāvadhāraṇamavibhāgāpannaṁ bhogo bhoktuḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇamapavarga iti। dvayoratiriktamanyaddarśanaṁ nāsti। tathā coktam – ayaṁ tu khalu triṣu guṇeṣu kartṛṣvakartari ca puruṣe tulyātulyajātīye caturthe tatkriyāsākṣiṇyupanīyamānānsarvabhāvānupapannānanupaśyannadarśanamanyacchaṅkata iti।

vivaraṇam
tadetaddṛśyaṁ [bhūtendriyātmakaṁ] bhūtātmakamindriyātmakaṁ ca । kathaṁ tadātmakatvamityāha – [bhūtabhāvena pṛthivyādinā sūkṣmasthūlena] sūkṣmeṇa tanmātrarūpeṇa sthūlena viśeṣarūpeṇa । dvividho hi bhūtabhāvastanmātrarūpo viśeṣarūpaśca । [vipariṇamate] sthūlasūkṣmabhāvamāpadyate । [indriyabhāvene] driyarūpeṇa [śrotrādinā sūkṣmasthūlena vipariṇamate ।] sūkṣmeṇāhaṅkārarūpeṇa sthūlena śrotrādirūpeṇa ॥
tattu dṛśyaṁ [nāprayojanam ।] sarvatraiva pravṛtteḥ prayojanadarśanāt । [api tu prayājanamūrīkṛtya] aṅgīkṛtya [pravartate ।] kiṁ purnadṛśyapravṛtiprayojanamityāha – [bhāgāpavargārthaṁ hi dṛśyaṁ puruṣasya] agnyādipratipattivat ॥
kau punastai bhogāpavargavityāha – [tatreṣṭāniṣṭaguṇasvarūpāvadhāraṇamavibhāgāpannam iṣṭānām] agarucandanasparśanādilakṣaṇānām [aniṣṭānāṁ] pratikūlātmakānāṁ kṛpāṇakaṇṭakādisparśanarūpaṇāṁ guṇānāṁ [svarūpāvadhāraṇaṁ] svarūpāvagamaḥ svarūpādhyavasānam । tasya viśeṣaṇam [avibhāgāpannaṁ] puruṣapratyaye 'nāyaṁ puruṣa idaṁ sattvam’ ityavibhāgatāṁ gatam । prāptacaitanyopagraharūpavādbauddhasya pratyayasya । sa itthaṁbhūtaḥ puruṣasya [bhoga] ityākhyāyate ॥
tasmādbhogasvarūpādbauddhātū pratyayādvivicya tatsākṣiṇo dṛśirūpasya [svarūpāvadhāraṇaṁ] bhoktṛsvarūpādavadhāryamāṇāduttarakālamapyapavṛttasya viśeṣābhāvādapavarga ityucyate । sarvadā svarūpapratiṣṭho hi (tadā) sa iti । vṛttisārūpyamitaratra viśeṣa iti ॥
[dvayo] rbhogāpavargayo [ratiriktamanya] ttṛtīyaṁ da [rśanaṁ nāsti ।] yāvadavidyā tāvadiṣṭāniṣṭe sta iti bhoga eva । puruṣasya tvaheyānupādeyasvarūpatvāt tadavadhāraṇe kuto bhoga iti bhogarūpasyāvidyālakṣaṇasya pratyayasya pratipakṣaḥ pratyayaḥ puruṣāvadhāraṇam । yasmādetadata etaddarśanadvayavyatirekeṇa tṛtīyaṁ darśanāntaraṁ na kalpayituṁ śakyate ॥
[tathā coktam – ayaṁ tu khalvevaṁ] samyagdaśī [triṣu] guṇeṣūktalakṣaṇeṣu [kartuṣu] sarvavyāpāranirvṛttikareṣvakartari ca guṇadharmavilakṣaṇe [puruṣe caturthe tatkriyāsākṣiṇi] guṇakriyāsūpadraṣṭari sandhikriyāsākṣibhūtopadraṣṭṛva [dupānīyamānān] antaḥkaraṇalakṣaṇairguṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇān darśitaviṣayatvāt [sarvabhāvān] upapannān gaiṇāneva bauddhapratyayākaraṇa pariniṣpannān paśyan upalabhamāno [nāhaṁ] na mametyevaṁ [na darśanamite'nyat] sambhavati samyagdarśanamiti [na śaṅkate ।] nāstyevānyat samyagdarśanamiti manyate ॥

tāvetau bhogāpavargau buddhikṛtau buddhāveva vartamānau kathaṁ puruṣe vyapadiśyete iti। yathā vijayaḥ parājayo vā yoddhṛṣu vartamānaḥ svāmini vyapadiśyate, sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti, evaṁ bandhamokṣau buddhāveva vartamānau puruṣe vyapadiśyete, sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti। buddhereva puruṣārthāparisamāptirbandhastadarthāvasāyo mokṣa iti। etena grahaṇadhāraṇohāpohatattvajñānābhiniveśā buddhau vartamānāḥ puruṣe'dhyāropitasadbhāvāḥ। sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti ॥ 18 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tāvetau bhogāpavargau buddhikṛtau] budvinirvartitau [buddhāveva vartamānau ।] anyakṛtasyāpyanyatra vṛttirdṛṣṭā yathā rajakakṛto vastrarāga iti kathaṁ [puruṣe'padiśayete?] iti tau buddhāveva vartamānau puruṣe'padiyete iti kuta etat ? [sa hi tattatphalasya bhokteti] samyaṅmithyāpratyayayorupalabdheti ॥
dṛṣṭāntena vyākhyātamarthaṁ nigamayati – [yathā vijayaḥ parājayo veti । budverevārthāparisamāptirbandha iti ।] yāvat samāptau kartavyau bhogā'pavargāviti buddhirmanyate tāvadbandhaḥ । [tadarthāvasāyo mokṣaḥ ।] tasyā eva buddherarthāvasāyaḥ kartavyasamāptiḥ । yadā ātmavilakṣaṇaṁ bandhamokṣāsambandhinaṁ puruṣamīkṣate nāsya kartavyamastīti, sa kartavyāvasāyo buddhermokṣa iti ॥
[etena grahaṇadhāraṇavijñānohāpohakriyāvacanayathānyāyāvadhāraṇābhiniveśāḥ] puruṣe'vyāropitasadbhāvā iti jñeyāḥ । pratyayatvāviśeṣāt buddhidharmāḥ [buddhāveva vartamānāḥ] buddhikṛtāḥ [puruṣe'dhyāropitasadbhāvāḥ] puruṣo gṛhṇāti puruṣo dhārayatītyevameva puruṣe apyāropyante ॥
[grahaṇaṁ] śabdādīnāṁ śrotrādibhirupādānam । gṛhītānāmavismaraṇaṁ [dhāraṇam ।] dhāritasya sāmānyaviśeṣāvadhāraṇaṁ [vijñānam ।] vijñātasyaiva punastadgataviśeṣāvabubhutsayohana [mūhaḥ ।] ūhitasya viruddhānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ vyudasa [namapohaḥ] । viṣayeṣu pravṛttiḥ [kriyā ।] vākyaviṣayo vṛttiviśeṣaści tasya [vacanam ।] yo yo nyāyo yathānyāyaṁ yasya ca vastuno yathaivopapattistathaivāvadhāraṇaṁ [yathānyāyāvadhāraṇam ।] tatra punaḥ punaḥ samyakpratyayāvicalanāya yaścittasyābhiyogaḥ so ['bhiniveśaḥ ।] ta ete grahaṇādayaḥ puruṣe'dhyāropitasadbhāvāḥ । [sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti] grahaṇadiphalasyopalabdheti ॥ 18 ॥
dṛśyānāṁ guṇānāṁ svarūpabhedāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate –
viśeṣāviśeṣaliṅgamātrāliṅgāni guṇaparvāṇi ॥ 19 ॥

tatrā''kāśavāyvagnyudakabhūmayo bhūtāni śabdasparśarūparasagandhatanmātrāṇāmaviśeṣāṇāṁ viśeṣāḥ। tathā śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇāni buddhīndriyāṇi, vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ karmendriyāṇi, ekādaśaṁ manaḥ sarvārtham, ityetānyasmitālakṣaṇasyāviśeṣasya viśeṣāḥ। guṇānāmeṣa ṣoḍaśako viśeṣapariṇāmaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[dṛśyānāṁ 'guṇānāṁ] yathāvyākhyātātmanāṁ [svarūpabhedāvadhāraṇārthaṁ] tattvāvarathābhedāvadhāraṇārthamidaṁ sūtramārabhyate – [viśeṣāviśeṣaliṅgamātrāliṅgā guṇaparvāṇaḥ ।] viśeṣāścāviśeṣāśva liṅgamātraṁ cāliṅgaśca, na liṅgati, kutaścinnāgacchati pradhānākhyo'rtha iti pacādyac sarvadhātubhya iti yaugikassanabhidheyaliṅge bhajate । yo hi cihnaparyāyo liṅgaśabda: sa napuṁsakaliṅgaḥ । sa ca karaṇasādhana iti । atha vā liṅgaṁ na vidyate, liṅgamavagamanaṁ paricchedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pradhānākhyasyārthasyāsāvaliṅgaḥ iti bahuvrīhiḥ ॥
te ca viśeṣādayaḥ puruṣābhiprāyaṁ pālayanti bhogāpavargapradānena, pūrayanti vā vikārān svāniti piparteḥ [‘anyebhyo'pi dṛśyante'] iti kartari vanipralyayaḥ ॥ tathā ca sati yannāntamakartari tannapuṅsakam । yatu nāntaṁ kartari tatsarvaliṅgaṁ bhavati । yathā merudṛśvā merudṛśvanīti । tataśca viśeṣādayaḥ parvaṇaḥ । keṣāṁ te sambandhina iti? guṇānāṁ parvāṇo guṇaparvaṇaḥ । keṣāñcidayameva pāṭho – viśeṣāviśeṣaliṅgamātrāliṅgāni guṇaparvāṇīti ॥
[tatrākāśavāyvagnijalabhūmayo bhūtāni ।] śabdatanmātrārabdhamākāśam । sparśatanmātraṇa śabdasparśalakṣaṇenārabdho vāyu; । rūpatanmātreṇa śabdasparśarūpalakṣaṇenārabdho'gniḥ ॥ rasatanmātreṇa śabdasparśarūparasacatuṣṭayalakṣaṇenā''pa ārabdhāḥ । gandhatanmātreṇa śabdasparśarūparasagandhapañcatayalakṣaṇena bhūmirārabdhā ॥
nanu ca nityamākāśam , prāgutpattervināśakālaṁ ca viśeṣābhāvāt । yo ya utpatimāṁstasya tasya pṛthivyādeḥ prāgutpattervināśottarakālaṁ ca viśeṣo dṛṣṭaḥ । tathā ākāśaṁ yadyutpattimat syāt prāgutpattervināśottarakālaṁ ca bhavedviśeṣaḥ । na ca so'sti । tasmādākāśamanutpattikam ॥
athāvakāśadānābhāvo viśeṣa iti cenna, mūrtimato'nyasyābhāvāttulyaṁ nityatve'pi । anityalakṣaṇābhāvāca nityamākāśam, sarvagatatvādātmādivat ॥
na – āgamāvirodhāt । ["tasmādvā etasmādātmana akāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ’] ityāgamavirodhaḥ । smṛtivirodhaśca । avakāśaṁ kurvate tadupacāra iti cenna, vāyvādiṣvapyupacārapraṅgāt । [ākāśādvāyuḥ] sambhūta ityekavākyatvāt ॥
prāgutpatterviśeṣābhāvādānityo na bhavatīti ca bruvatā viśeṣābhāvānnityatvamityuktaṁ bhavati । viśeṣabhāvāccānityatvamityuktaṁ bhavati । tathā ca satyātmadīnāmapi bandhamokṣopalabdhyanupalabdhyādiviśeṣābhāvāt sato vaiśeṣikasya anityatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tathā, paramāṇvādīnāṁ cānityatvaṁ prasajyeta ॥
athāpyutpattimata eva prāgūrdhvaṁ ca viśeṣabhāvābhāvai vivakṣitāviti cet – na – ākāśasyotpatyabhyupagamaprasaṅgāt । athākāśotpativādinā viśeṣo vaktuṁ na śakyata iti cet – na – puruṣārthasādhanāsādhanatvaviśeṣāt । sarvagatatvāditi cāsiddho hetuḥ ॥
aṁsaṁrvagatāni kāladigākāśamanāṁsyanityāni ca, svārthībhāve parārthatvātū, ghaṭādivat । utpatimanti ca, pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyatvāt, ghaṭādivat । evamākāśam [utpatimadanityaṁ ca] bāhendriyaviṣayaguṇatvāt, ghaṭādivat । bhūtatvācca, pṛthivīvat । anityadravyasaṁyogotpādyaguṇatvāt, pṛthivyādivat । cikitsānivartyaprakopakaratvāt, vāyuvat । nabhasaśca prakopaścikitsānivartanīyaścikitsakaprasiddhimupārūḍhaḥ । etenānityasādharmyaṁ vyākhyātam ॥
etāni ca [bhūtāni śabdasparśarūparasagandhatanmātrāṇāmaviśeṣāṇāṁ viśeṣāḥ ।] śāntadhoramūḍhādyanekaviśeṣavatvādviśeṣā: । śāntādyabhāvāccāviśeṣā: tanmātrāṇi ॥
[tathā śrotratvak-cakṣurjihvāghrāṇani,] śabdādiviṣayabuddhayarthavād- [buddhīndriyāṇi] svaviṣayabuddhi.ābhirevānumitāni । [vākpāṇapādapāyūpasthāni karmendriyāṇi] vacanadikriyānirvartakāni tadanumatānyeva । na vāgādīni karmandriyāṇi siddhānīti cenna, śrutiprasiddhatvāt । indriyāṇa prakṛtya [‘sarveṣāṁ vedānāṁ vāgekāyanam’] ityādiśruteḥ ॥
smṛtiṣu ca sarvatraiva vidhipratiṣedhaviṣayapravṛttinivṛttimatvācca śrotrādivadindriyatvam । [‘na vākcapalo na pāṇipādacapalaḥ’] ityādervidhipratiṣedhaviṣayapravṛttinivṛttimatvasiddhaḥ ॥
tathā, vāgādīnīdriyāṇa, kauśalayatvāt, cakṣurādivat । sarvagotraṣu cendriyaśaktiḥ karaṇavṛttyāḥ sandarśanādiṣyata eva । vāggudaprabhṛtīnāṁ sarpādīnāṁ mūkaṣaṇḍānāṁ ca mukhamevopasthendriyam । [ekādaśaṁ manaḥ sarvārtha] matītānāgatavartamānaviṣayārthaṁ buddhīndriyakarmendriyaviṣayārthaṁ ca ॥
[etānye] kādaśendriyāṇya [smitālakṣaṇasya] asmibhāvo'smitā asmīti pratyayaḥ, sa ca lakṣaṇaṁ yasya so ['smitālakṣaṇo] 'smitāpratyayena hi lakṣyate liṅgyate ṣaṣṭhamaviśeṣākhyaṁ tattvamahaṅkāraḥ । tasyā [viśeṣasya viśeṣā] etāni ॥
[guṇānāma] viśeṣākārasaṁsthitānāṁ sattvādīnā [meṣa ṣoḍaśako viśeṣapariṇāmaḥ] sattvabahulamākāśaṁ, rajobahulo vāyuḥ, satvarajobahule.o'gniḥ, [jalaṁ ca] । sattvatamobahulā pṛthivī, grāhyatvāt । tāmasatve'pyeṣāṁ guṇapradhānakṛto viśeṣaḥ । karaṇāni prakāśatvāt sattvabahulāni, mana:ṣaṣṭhāni tu buddhīdriyāṇi prakāśaprādhānyāt sattvabahulāni । karmendriyāṇi kriyāprādhānyādrajebahulāni ॥

ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ। tadyathā – śabdatanmātraṁ sparśatanmātraṁ rūpatanmātraṁ rasatanmātraṁ gandhatanmātraṁ ceti ekadvitricatuḥpañcalakṣaṇāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañcāviśeṣāḥ, ṣaṣṭhaścāviśeṣo'smitāmātra iti। ete sattāmātrasyā''tmano mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣapariṇāmāḥ। yattatparamaviśeṣebhyo liṅgamātraṁ mahattattvaṁ tasminnete sattāmātre mahatyātmanyavasthāya vivṛddhikāṣṭhāmanubhavanti।

vivaraṇam
[ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ । tadyathā śabdamātraṁ sparśamātra] miti dvilakṣaṇasyāpi pradhānena vyapadeśaḥ । tathā [rūpamātramiti] trilakṣaṇasyapi pradhānena vyapadeśaḥ । tathottarayorapi [mātra] śabdaḥ śāntaghorādiviśeṣavyāvartanārthaḥ । [ekadvitricatuḥpañcalakṣaṇabhedāḥ] śabdatattaivaikalakṣaṇaḥ śabdatanmātrabhedaḥ । śabdasparśalakṣaṇaḥ spaśatanmātrabhedaḥ, ityevamekaikādhikyenottaratrāpi draṣṭavyam । [ṣaṣṭhaścāviśeṣo'smitāmātraḥ ।] śabdāditanmātrāpekṣayā ṣaṣṭha indriyāṇāmekādaśānāmaviśeṣaḥ ॥
[ete sattvamātrasyā] stitvamātrasya [liṅgamātrasya] mūrtimātrasya, pradhānasyāmūrtasya prathamā mūrtiriyaṁ yathā bījasyāṅkurībhāvaḥ । [ātmano] vasturūpasya [mahataḥ] sarvaviśeṣāviśeṣebhyo mahattvāt [ṣaḍaviśeṣapariṇāmāḥ] ṣaḍaviśeṣā eva pariṇāmāḥ sattvādīnāṁ mahadrūpāvasthitānāmamī [aviśeṣapariṇāmāḥ ॥]
[yattatparaṁ sūkṣmamaviśeṣebhyo liṅgamātraṁ mahattattvam, tasminnete sattāmātre mahatvānmahatyavasthāya] kāraṇasvarūpe mahatyavasthāya [vivṛddhikāṣṭhāṁ] pṛthivyādiviśeṣāntatā [manubhavanti ॥]

pratisaṁsṛjyamānāśca tasminneva sattāmātre mahatyātmanyavasthāya yattanniḥsattāsattaṁ niḥsadasannirasadavyaktamaliṅgaṁ pradhānaṁ tatpratiyanti। eṣa teṣāṁ liṅgamātraḥ pariṇāmo niḥsattāsattaṁ cāliṅgapariṇāma iti।

vivaraṇam
[pratisaṁsṛjyamānāśca] pratilīyamānāścāviśeṣāḥ [tasminneva sattāmātre liṅgamātre mahatyātmanyavasthāyāvyaktaṁ prati yānti ।] kiṁviśiṣṭam ? [nissattāsattaṁ] viśeṣāviśeṣadharmarahitam । [nissadasaditi] avyaktādīṣadvikṛtamiti sat, aviśeṣebhyaḥ sūkṣmataramiti cāsat, saccāsacca sadasaditi mahattattvamucyate । taddharmarahitamavyaktaṁ nissadasaditi ॥
[eṣa teṣāṁ] guṇānāṁ sattvādīnāṁ [liṅgamātraḥ pariṇāmaḥ] yasminnavasthāya vivṛddhikāṣṭhāṁ pratilayaṁ ca pratiyāntyaviśeṣāḥ । [nissattāsaktaṁ] cāvyaktaṁ [ca] yat sa teṣāmeva guṇānā [maliṅgapariṇāmaḥ ।] paraśca na sūkṣmo'vasthāntarapariṇāmo'sti guṇānām ॥ [‘sūkṣmāviṣayatvaṁ cāliṅgaparyavasānam’] iti hi vyākhyātam ॥

aliṅgāvasthāyāṁ na puruṣārtho heturnāliṅgāvasthāyāmādau puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti। na tasyāḥ puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti। nāsau puruṣārthakṛteti nityā''khyāyate। trayāṇāṁ tvavasthāviśeṣāṇāmādau puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṁ bhavati। sa cārtho heturnimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ bhavatītyanityā''khyāyate। guṇāstu sarvadharmānupātino na pratyastamayante nopajāyante। vyaktibhirevātītānāgatavyayāgamavatībhirguṇānvayinībhirupajananāpāyadharmakā iva pratyavabhāsante। yathā devadatto daridrāti। kasmāt। yato'sya mriyante gāva iti, gavāmeva maraṇāttasya daridrāṇaṁ na svarūpahānāditi samaḥ samādhiḥ।

vivaraṇam
aliṅgatvādevā [liṅgāvasthāyāṁ na puruṣārtho hetuḥ ।] aliṅgāvasthānimittaṁ na puruṣārtho hetuḥ । nāliṅgāvasthā puruṣārthaprayuktetyarthaḥ । tadetat vyācaṣṭe – [nāliṅgāvasthāyāmādau puruṣārthatā kāraṇam ।] kasmāt punastadavasthā puruṣārthaprayuktā na bhavatīti ? tat āha – [yasmānnāsyāṁ puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṁ vidyate ।] svayamapi [nāsau puruṣārthatā] mahadādivadasaṁvedyatvādīśvarāṇāmapi ॥
yataścaitadevaṁ tasmā [nnityā vyākhyāyate ।] yo hi puruṣārthaprayukta: so'nityo dṛṣṭo yathā pṛthivyādiḥ । na caiṣā pradhānāvasthā puruṣārthaprayukteti nityā vyākhyāyate ॥
[trayāṇāṁ tvavasthāviśeṣāṇāṁ] viśeṣāviśeṣaliṅgamātrāṇā [mādau puruṣārthatā] mahadādyavasthā puruṣārthaprayuktā । [sa cārthaḥ] sa ca puruṣārthe [heturnirmittaṁ kāraṇamityanityā vyākhyāyante] mahadādyāstino'vasthāḥ ॥
[guṇāstu sarvadharmānupātinaḥ] sarvavikārānupātinaḥ । yathā sarpaḥ prāṁśutvasarpaṇakuṇḍalatvādiviśeṣānupātī, tathā viśeṣāditatvānupatino guṇāḥ piṇḍapratyayānupātinaśca [na pralīyante nopajāyante ।] yathā sarpaḥ kuṇḍalāditve pralīyamāne na pralīyate tadupajane ca [nopajāyate] tathaiva guṇā api । yathā ca ghaṭapiṭharādiṣu pralīyamāneṣu jāyamāneṣu ca mṛnna pralīyate nāpi jāyate ॥
[guṇā vyaktibhireva dharmairevātītānāgatavyayāgamavatībhikhrilakṣaṇābhirguṇānvayinībhirguṇopādānakāraṇabhirupajanāpāyadharmakā ivo] tpattipralayavanta iva [pratyavabhāsante] na svarūpeṇa vinaśyanti jāyante vā ॥
etasyaivārthasya dṛṣṭāntamāha – [yathā devadatto daridrāti । kasmāt ? yenāsya mriyante gāva iti । gavameva maraṇāttasya daridrāṇaṁ na svarūpahānāditi samaḥ samādhiḥ] tulyaścarco dṛṣṭāntena dārṣṭāntikasya devadattadaridrāṇavadeva guṇānugatābhivryatibhirmahadādibhirguṇavimardanavaicitryakṛtābhirvivardhamānabhirguṇānāmāḍhyatā tatpralaye ca teṣāṁ daridrāṇāṁ, na svarūpeṇāpacaya upacayo veti tulya: samādhiriti ॥

liṅgamātramaliṅgasya pratyāsannaṁ, tatra tatsaṁsṛṣṭaṁ vivicyate kramānativṛtteḥ। tathā ṣaḍaviśeṣā liṅgamātre saṁsṛṣṭā vivicyante pariṇāmakramaniyamāt। tathā teṣvaviśeṣeṣu bhūtendriyāṇi saṁsṛṣṭāni vivicyante। tathā coktaṁ purastāt। na viśeṣebhyaḥ paraṁ tattvāntaramastīti viśeṣāṇāṁ nāsti tattvāntarapariṇāmaḥ। teṣāṁ tu dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā vyākhyāyiṣyante ॥ 19 ॥

vivaraṇam
sarvasya pradhānakāryatve sati viśeṣā aviśeṣā vā kasmādanantaraṁ nopajāyanta iti tadāha – [liṅgasyāliṅgaṁ pratyāsannaṁ] yathā mūlaṁ vṛkṣasya pratyāsannaṁ bīje saṁsṛṣṭaṁ mūlameva prathamataraṁ vivicyate, na vṛkṣasyottarāvasthā । evaṁ tanna pradhāne tat liṅgaṁ [saṁsṛṣṭaṁ] saṁlīnaṁ prathamaṁ [vivicyate] āvirbhavati nottare viśeṣā viprakṛṣṭatvādeva । tadevāha – [kramānatipatteḥ] kramānatikramāt । na hi loke kasyacidutpadyamānasya kramātilaṅghanamasti ॥
[tathā ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ] pūrvottā [liṅgamātre] pratyāsannatvāt [saṁsṛṣṭatvādvivicyante ।] kasmādityāha – [pariṇāmakramaniyamāt । tathā teṣvaviśeṣeṣu bhūtendriyāṇi ।] tanmātreṣu bhūtāni saṁsṛṣṭāni vivicyante । asmitāmātre indriyāṇi manassahitāni ॥
[tathā coktaṁ purastāt । na viśeṣebhyaḥ] prāguktebhya ākāśādibhyaḥ [paraṁ tattvāntaramasti ।] na viśeṣāṇāmanyastattvāntarapariṇāma ityarthaḥ । etadevāha – [viśeṣāṇāṁ nāsti tattvāntaramiti ।] tattvaṁ hi nāma sādhāraṇaṁ sarvaprāṇadhāriṇāmāmahāpralayasthāyi । nairvilakṣaṇaṁ pṛthivyādibhya utpadyamānamanyadasti । dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmāstu bhavantyeveti । [teṣāṁ tu] viśeṣāṇāṁ [dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā vyākhyāyiṣyante] tṛtīyapade ॥ 19 ॥
vyākhyātaṁ dṛśyamatha draṣṭuḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate –
draṣṭā dṛśimātraḥ śuddho'pi pratyayānupaśyaḥ ॥ 20 ॥

dṛśimātra iti dṛkśaktireva viśeṣaṇāparāmṛṣṭetyarthaḥ। sa puruṣo buddheḥ pratisaṁvedī। sa buddherna sarūpo nātyantaṁ virūpa iti। na tāvatsarūpaḥ। kasmāt। jñātājñātaviṣayatvātpariṇāminī hi buddhiḥ। tasyāśca viṣayo gavādirghaṭādirvā jñātaścājñātaśceti pariṇāmitvaṁ darśayati। sadājñātaviṣayatvaṁ tu puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvaṁ paridīpayati। kasmāt। nahi buddhiśca nāma puruṣaviṣayaśca syādagṛhītā gṛhītā ceti siddhaṁ puruṣasya sadājñātaviṣayatvaṁ tataścāpariṇāmitvamiti।

vivaraṇam
[vyākhyātaṁ dṛśyam] avaghṛtaṁ dṛśyam । yadarthaṁ ca dṛśyate tasyedānīṁ [draṣṭuḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidabhārabhyate – draṣṭā dṛśimātraḥ śuddho'pi pratyayānupaśyaḥ draṣṭā] dṛśyasya yathāvyākhyātarūpasyopalabdhā puruṣaḥ । tasyedaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ [dṛśimātraḥ śuddho'pi pratyayānupaśya] śceti । purastādākhyātam – [‘tadā draṣṭuḥ svarūpe'vasthānam' 'vṛttisārūpyamitaratra’] iti ca, tadeva dvayamiha pratipādyate ॥
