yaccoktaṁ [pratisaṁvedī buddheḥ puruṣa ityupapādayiṣyāma] iti, taccātropapādyate । dṛśirdarśanamupalabdhistāvanmātro [dṛśimātraḥ ।] yata evaṁ tasmācchuddhaḥ । śuddho'pi sannasau bauddhasya [pratyayasyānupaśyaḥ,] dṛśimātratvādeva । tasmāttamanupaśyan tatsvarūpo bhavati । dṛśisannidhau vṛtterdṛśisvarūpāvabhāsatā draṣṭurvṛttisārūpyam ॥
dṛśimātrasyaivāvikriyātmakasya sato'sya bauddhapratyayānudarśanaṁ yasmātasmācca svarūpapratiṣṭhatā ca siddhā । [pratyayānupaśya iti ।] etattu tadastitvānumānam । katham ? ghaṭādīnāṁ dṛśyānāṁ svarūpavyatiriktenānyena dṛśyatvadarśanāt , tatprakāśakānāṁ ca ālekādīnāṁ vyatiriktadṛśyatvāt , sarvārthāvabhāsakānāmapi pratyayānāṁ svarūpavyatiriktadṛśyatvaṁ dṛśyatvādavagamyate ghaṭāditadālokādivaditi ॥
yasmācca bauddhameva pratyayamanupaśyati, taṁ ca paśyatyeva, na kadācit svaviṣayaṁ pratyayaṁ na paśyati, tasmāddṛśimātraḥ । mātragrahaṇaṁ dharmāntaranivartanārtham । etena draṣṭurdṛśirityetannivartitamicchādisamānāśrayatvaṁ ca nivartitaṁ, dṛśereva draṣṭṛtvāt । tadetaducyate – [dṛśimātra iti । dṛkchaktireva] dṛgdarśanaṁ tadeva śaktirdṛkchaktiḥ । nāpyanyo dṛkchaktimānasti । saiva śaktirdṛgiti । tatra mātraśabdārthaṁ vyācaṣṭe – [viśeṣeṇāparāmṛṣṭetyarthaḥ ।] viśeṣeṇa kenacidicchādinā guṇairguṇadharmeśvāparāmṛṣṭaḥ ॥
[sa puruṣo buddheḥ] pratisaṁvedituṁ śīlamasyeti [pratisaṁvedī ।] bauddhapralayopalabdhisvabhāva ityarthaḥ । puruṣo buddhe: pratisaṁvedī dṛśimātraḥ śuddhaśreti kathaṁ gamyata ityāha – [sa buddherna sarūpo nātyantaṁ virūpa] iti । na samānalakṣaṇo nāpyatyantavidharmetyetat । asarūpatayā dṛśimātratrva śuddhatvaṁ cāha । nātyantavirūpa iti vṛttisārūpyatāmāha ॥
kathaṁ punaḥ na sarūpateti ? ucyate – [na tāvat sarūpaḥ ।] kasmāt ? ko hetuḥ ? । buddhestāvat svarūpaṁ vaidharmyadarśanārthamāha— [jñātājñātaviṣayatvāt pariṇāminī buddhirita ।] kaḥ punarasau buddherviṣayo yo jñātaścājñātaścetyāha – [tasyāstu viṣayo gavādirghaṭādiśca jñātaścājñātaśca ।] yena bāhyākāreṇa pariṇatā buddhiḥ sa jñātaḥ । yenākāreṇa na pariṇatā so'jñātaḥ ॥
yadi na pariṇametāpariṇamamānā cedviṣayaṁ vikhyāpayet sadaiva viṣayitvaṁ buddheḥ syāt । tasmāt jñātājñātaviṣayatā pariṇāmitvaṁ khyāpayati । pariṇāminī buddhiḥ, jñātājñātaviṣayatvāt । dīpacakṣurādi(viṣaya)vat ॥
tadvilakṣaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ sadā jñātaviṣayaḥ । sarvadā hi jñāta eva puruṣasya svo viṣayaḥ । tasmāt [sadā jñātaviṣayatvaṁ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvaṁ paridīpayati ।] sadā jñātaviṣayatvamasiddhaṁ puruṣasyetyāśaṅkayāha – [kasmāt ?] ko hetuḥ ? [na hī] ti [hi] śabdaḥ prasiddhāvadyotanārthaḥ । [buddhiśca nāma] buddhiriti bauddhapratyayaḥ, [puruṣasya viṣayaḥ syādagṛhītā gṛhītā ceti ।] sarvadā ca gṛhīta eva bauddhaḥ pratyayaḥ । tadavyabhicāreṇaiva puruṣasya vyatiriktatvasiddhiḥ । tasmāt puruṣasya sadā jñātaviṣayatvam । tataścāpariṇāmitvaṁ siddham । apariṇāmī puruṣa iti pratijñā । sadā jñātaviṣayatvāditi hetuḥ । vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto buddhayādiḥ ॥
nanu ca buddhyā vyavasitamarthaṁ puruṣaścetayati, buddheśca sarvo viṣayo jñātaścājñātaśca puruṣasyāpi samānaḥ । jñātājñātaviṣayatvaṁ buddhyā vyavasitārthopalambhitvāt । tasmāt puruṣasyāpi pariṇāmitvaṁ jñātājñātaviṣayatvādbuddhivadeva ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ । buddhereva puruṣaviṣayatvāt । buddhireva hi bāhyārthākārā puruṣasya viṣayo nārthaḥ kevalaḥ kharūpeṇa । tasmānna jñātājñātaviṣayaḥ puruṣaḥ । buddhistu sadaiva jñātaiveti na pariṇāmitvaṁ puruṣasya ॥
kiṁ ca parārthā buddhiḥ saṁhatyakāritvāt, svārthaḥ puruṣa iti। tathā sarvārthādhyavasāyakatvāttriguṇā buddhistriguṇatvādacetaneti। guṇānāṁ tūpadraṣṭā puruṣa ityato na sarūpaḥ।

vivaraṇam
nanu ca buddhayā vyavasitamarthaṁ puruṣaścetayatīti kaścidāha । tat katham ? ucyate – na – tairapyapariṇāmitvasyābhyupagamāt puruṣasya । buddhayā vyavasitamarthamityetaduktaṁ bhavati – buddhyākāraṁ cetayati buddhivyavasāyākārāpannamarthaṁ cetayatīti । anyathā hi teṣāṁ pariṇāmitvaparārthatvasaṁhatyakārivādayo buddhidharmāḥ sarva eva prasajeyuḥ ॥
athāpariṇāmitve darśanānupapattiriti cet – na – darśanasaiyaiva puruṣasvarūpatvāt । yo hi puruṣapariṇāmitvamabhimanyate, sa idaṁ praṣṭavyaḥ – kiṁ pariṇāmena kriyata iti ॥
sa cedabhidadhīta – darśanamiti । sa pratyabhidhānīyaḥ – puruṣasya darśanameva rūpam, ataḥ pariṇāmānarthakyamiti ॥
sa cet pratibrūyāt – na puruṣasyopalabdhirbhogaḥ, kastarhi ? vikriyaiva bhoga iti - sa punarvaktavyaḥ – tathāpi vikriyāvattvādanityattvamupanataṁ śarīrādivadeva ॥
athāpi pratibhāṣeta – svātmani vikriyā nānityatvakāraṇaṁ syāt , kiṁ tvavasthāntarabhāvivikriyā hi kāraṇamanityatvasyeti । sa puna: pratibhāṣitavyaḥ – vikriyāvasthāyā evāvasthāntaratvāt । pūrvamavikṛtasya vastunaḥ punarvikriyā avasthāntaram ॥
kiṁ ca – viṣayābhyupagame ca vikriyaiva, tāvatā niyamaḥ pāryete na kartum । na cāpi svātmani vikriyamāṇānāṁ vajravaidūryādīnāmanityatvaṁ nāsti । na ca vikriyājanitasyaiva darśanasya dṛśyaviṣayatvaṁ na nityasya darśanasyeti niyamaheturasti । vikriyaivopalabdhirna vikriyājaniteti cet – na – śarīrādīnāṁ vikriyāvatāmupalabdhiprasaṅgāt ॥
tasmāddṛśimātra evāpariṇāmī ca, sadā jñātaviṣayatvāt puruṣa iti siddham । tasya ca nityopalabdhisvarūpatve'pi dṛśyabauddhapratyayabhāvābhāvikṛto'yaṁ vyapadeśaḥ paśyati darśayiṣyati dadarśeti ca । savitrādiprakāśanavyapadeśavat । yathā prakāśayati savitā prakāśayiṣyati prācīkaśaditi ca prakāśyabhāvābhāvakṛto vyapadeśaḥ । śuddhatvādayo hetavo vaidharmyeṇa buddhayādayo dṛṣṭāntāḥ ॥
itaśvāsurūpaḥ । [sarvārthādhyavasāyitvādgho] raśāntādisamastārthāvasāyitvāt [triguṇā buddhiḥ] śrotrādivat । [guṇānāṁ tūpadraṣṭe] tyupadraṣṭṛtvaṁ hetuḥ । [atriguṇaḥ puruṣa] iti pratijñā । vaidharmyeṇa buddhaśyādireva dṛṣṭānto'triguṇatvāccāsarūpaḥ ॥

astu tarhi virūpa iti। nātyantaṁ virūpaḥ। kasmāt, śuddho'pyasau pratyayānupaśyo yataḥ। pratyayaṁ bauddhamanupaśyati, tamanupaśyannatadātmā'pi tadātmaka iva pratyavabhāsate। tathā coktam - apariṇāminī hi bhoktṛśaktirapratisaṁkramā ca pariṇāminyarthe pratisaṁkrānteva tadvṛttimanupatati, tasyāśca prāptacaitanyopagraharūpāyā buddhivṛtteranukāramātratayā buddhivṛttyaviśiṣṭā hi jñānavṛttirityākhyāyate ॥ 20 ॥

vivaraṇam
[astu tarhi virūpa] eva । tataścātyantavirūpatvādbhogānupapattiriti । atrocyate – [nātyantaṁ virūpaḥ । kasmāt ?] ke.o'tra hetuḥ ? na hi śuddhasya buddhisvarūpavirūpasyāśuddhabai.auddhapratyayādatyantāvairūpyasiddhaye heturityabhiprāyaḥ ॥
na – buddhipratyayasākṣitvasya siddhatvāt । [yataḥ śuddho'pyasau bauddhaṁ pratyayamanupaśyati] tacca bauddhapratyayānudarśanaṁ sādhitam । [anupaśyatīti] viṣayākārapariṇāme sati bauddhaṁ pratyayaṁ paśyatītyarthaḥ । [tamanupaśyannapi na tadātmā] na triguṇaḥ । [tadātmaka iva] śāntaghoramūḍhavyavasāyarūpa iva [pratyavabhāsate ।] tasmānnātyantavirūpa: pravṛttisārūpyāt । tatra yaduktaṁ buddheḥ [pratisaṁvedī puruṣa ityupapādayiṣyāmaḥ] iti, tadupapāditam । tathā ca tatsārūpyamādarśitam । tathoktaṁ tantre – [apariṇāminī bhoktṛśaktiḥ] –dṛkchaktiryathāvyākhyātarūpā [apratisaṅkramā ca pariṇāminyarthe] bauddhe pratyaye pratisaṅkrānteva pratyayaviṣayatvāt tadvṛttimanupatantīva asyā buddhervṛttimanupatantīva draṣṭratvādupalabhamānā । bauddhaḥ pratyayo jāyamāna eva dṛkchakteḥ karmatāmāpadyate । tamanupatantyupalabhamānā bhoktṛśaktiḥ [tasyāśca prāptacaitanyopagraharūpāyāḥ] prāptaṁ caitanyopagraharūpaṁ puruṣopagraharūpai yayā buddhivṛtyā āsāditaṁ pāvakopagraharūpataptalohapiṇḍavaddṛgśikarmamaitvādeva [anukāramātratayā] buddhivṛttisārūpyamātratayā [buddhivṛtyaviśiṣṭā jñavṛttiriti] jña evopalabdhireva [vṛttirityākhyāyate ॥ 20 ॥]
tadartha eva dṛśyasyā''tmā ॥ 21 ॥

dṛśirūpasya puruṣasya karmarūpatāmāpannaṁ dṛśyamiti tadartha eva dṛśyasyā''tmā bhavati। svarūpaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ। svarūpaṁ tu pararūpeṇa pratilabdhātmakaṁ bhogāpavargārthatāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ puruṣeṇa na dṛśyata iti। svarūpahānādasya nāśaḥ prāpto na tu vinaśyati ॥ 21 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadartha eva dṛśyasyātmā ta] cchabdena draṣṭā dṛśimātraḥ śuddho yathādhigatātmā pratyāmnāyate । tadarthaḥ tasmai tadarthastatprayojanaḥ dṛśikarmatvārtha ityarthaḥ । bhogarūpeṇāpavargarūpeṇa ca । ko'sāvityāha – [dṛśyasyātmā] pradhānasyātmā svarūpe svarūpalābha iti ॥
nanu caturvyūhatvaṁ vyācikhyāsitaṁ kimarthametadaprakṛtamucyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । ātyantikaduḥkhanivṛttiprayojanasya prakṛtatvāt । kathaṁ dṛśyatādarthyalābhāvadhāraṇenātyantikī duḥkhaviratiruktā bhavediti । ucyate – yadi dṛśyasvarūpapratilaibhastadartha eva, tadā aśeṣatadarthaviratau punaḥ kṛtārthatvāt kāryābhāvādātyantikadṛśyaviratiḥ syāt । tasya punaḥ pravṛttau prayojanābhāvāt । na hi kṛtameva punaḥ karaṇīyakamupāśnute । atha tu svārtho'pi dṛśyasyātmalābho'bhaviṣyadataḥ svārthasya bhāvāt punaḥ punaḥ prāvartiṣyata । tataśca nātyantikī nivṛttiḥ । tasmāttādarthyamevāvadhāryete ॥
dṛśyātmalābhasya svārthābhāvaśca dṛśyasya bhogyatvāt odanādivat siddhaḥ, acetanatvātsaṁhatyakārivācca । tadāha – [dṛśirūpasya puruṣasya karmaviṣayatāmāpannaṁ dṛśyamiti ।] itiśabdo hetvarthe । [tadartha eva dṛśyasyātmā bhavati svarūpaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ ।] puruṣārtha eva pradhānasyātmalābho dṛśikarmatāpatterodanādivat ॥
sūtraprayojanamācaṣṭa idānīm – [tataśca] tādarthyasya niyatatvāt kāraṇāt [puruṣarūpeṇa pratilabdhātmakaṁ] prāptacaitanyopagraharūpaṁ [sadbhogāpavagīrthatāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ puruṣeṇa na dṛśyate ।] bhogāpavargavyatirekeṇa kartavyābhāvāt ॥ 21 ॥
kasmāt –
kṛtārthaṁ prati naṣṭamapyanaṣṭaṁ tadanyasādhāraṇatvāt ॥ 22 ॥

kṛtārthamekaṁ puruṣaṁ prati dṛśyaṁ naṣṭamapi nāśaṁ prāptamapyanaṣṭaṁ tadanyapuruṣasādhāraṇatvāt। kuśalaṁ puruṣaṁ prati nāśaṁ prāptamapyakuśalānpuruṣānprati na kṛtārthamiti teṣāṁ dṛśeḥ karmaviṣayatāmāpannaṁ labhata eva pararūpeṇā''tmarūpamiti। ataśca dṛgdarśanaśaktyornityatvādanādiḥ saṁyogo vyākhyāta iti। tathā coktam –rdhamiṇāmanādisaṁyogāddharmamātrāṇāmapyanādiḥ saṁyoga iti ॥ 22 ॥

vivaraṇam
sūtrasambandhaṁ karoti – yaṁ puruṣaṁ prati caritārthaṁ dṛśyaṁ, taṁ prati dṛśikarmatāṁ nāpatsyata iti svarūpahānam, ataśca [svarūpahānādasya vināśaḥ prāptaḥ । na tu vinaśyati] sarvātmanā । [kasmāt ?] ko hetuḥ ? pradhānānāṁ pratipuruṣaṁ bahutvāt kṛtārthaṅ prati naṣṭameveti manyate ॥
[kṛtārthaṁ prati naṣṭamapyanaṣṭaṁ tadanyasādhāraṇatvāt । kṛtārthaṁ] yaṁ puruṣaṁ prati bhogāpavarganirvartanena kṛtaprayojana [tamekaṁ puruṣaṁ prati] punaḥ kāryakaraṇarūpeṇāpravartanādbhāvābhāvayoraviśeṣā [nnaṣṭamapi ।] asya vyākhyānaṁ [nāśaprāptamapīti । anaṣṭaṁ tadanyapuruṣasādhāraṇatvāt ।] yān pratyakṛtārthaṁ tān pratyanaṣṭam ॥
kathamanaṣṭamityāha-- [kuśalapuruṣān prati nāśaprāptaṁ] bhogāpavargapradānena kuśalapuruṣānprati kṛtaprayojanam । [akuśalapuruṣān prati akṛtārthaṁ] bhogāpavargayoḥ kartavyayorakṛtatvā [tteṣāma] kuśalānāṁ [dṛśeḥ] ta eva dṛśistasyāḥ [karmatāṁ dṛśyatāmāpannaṁ labhata eva puruṣarūpeṇa] puruṣanirbhāsatayā [ātmarūpami] ti । ataśca sādhāraṇatvādekameva pradhānaṁ pṛthivyādivat । kāryakaraṇānāṁ ca bhinnatvāt puruṣāṇāṁ nānātvaṁ siddham । sukhaduḥkhanānātvācca puruṣabhedasiddhiḥ ॥
[ataśca dṛgdarśanaśaktyornityatvādanādiḥ saṁyogo vyākhyātaḥ । tathā coktaṁ tantre – dharmiṇāmanādisaṁyogāt] guṇānāṁ puruṣāṇāṁ cānādisaṁyogā [ddharmamātrāṇāṁ] mahadādikāryakaraṇāntānāmapi [puruṣairanādiḥ saṁyogo] dharmibhirdharmāṇāmabhihrutvāt ॥ 22 ॥
saṁyogasvarūpābhidhitsayedaṁ sūtraṁ pravavṛte-
svasvāmiśaktyoḥ svarūpopalabdhihetuḥ saṁyogaḥ ॥ 23 ॥

puruṣaḥ svāmī dṛśyena svena darśanārthaṁ saṁyuktaḥ। tasmātsaṁyogādṛśyasyopalabdhiryā sa bhogaḥ। yā tu draṣuḥ svarūpopalabdhiḥ so'pavargaḥ। darśanakāryāvasānaḥ saṁyoga iti darśanaṁ viyogasya kāraṇamuktam। darśanamadarśanasya pratidvaṁdvītyadarśanaṁ saṁyoganimittamuktam। nātra darśanaṁ mokṣakāraṇamadarśanābhāvādeva bandhābhāvaḥ sa mokṣa iti। darśanasya bhāve bandhakāraṇasyādarśanasya nāśa ityato darśanaṁ jñānaṁ kaivalyakāraṇamuktam।

vivaraṇam
dṛśyamavadhṛtam । draṣṭā cāvadhṛtaḥ । draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ saṁyogo heyaheturiti coktam । sa ca saṁyogo'vadhārayitavyaḥ kīdṛśa iti । tataśca saṁyogasvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidaṁ sūtraṁ pravavṛte – [svasvāmiśaktyoḥ svarūpopalabdherhetuḥ saṁyogaḥ । svasvāmiśaktyoḥ] buddhipuruṣayoḥ [svarūpopalabdherhetuḥ] kāraṇam । yasmin sati tayoḥ svarūpamupalabhyate vadanadarpaṇayoriva, sa tayeḥ svarūpopalabdhahetuḥ । [saṁyogaḥ] dṛśyadṛśyatvarūpakāryānumeya ityarthaḥ ॥
pramāṇaṁ cātra svasaṁyogapūrvikā buddhipuruṣayoḥ svarūpopalabdhiḥ, viṣayaviṣayisvarūpopalabdhitvāt , īkṣaṇadarpaṇasvarūpopalabdhivat । yā kācit sukhaduḥkhopalabdhirvivādagocarāpannā sā sukhaduḥkhahetusaṁyogapūrvekā, sukhaduḥkhepalabdhitvāt, candanakaṇṭakasukhaduḥkhopalabdhivat ॥
tadāha – [puruṣaḥ svāmī dṛśyena svena] svayā buddhyā [darśanārthaṁ] bhogāpavargadarśanārthaṁ [saṁyuktaḥ ।] darśanaprayukta eva saṁyoga ityarthaḥ ॥
[tasmāt saṁyogādda] rśanaprayuktā [dṛśyasyopalabdhiḥ] aviśiṣṭā yā [sa bhogaḥ । yā tu draṣṭuḥ svarūpopalabdhi] rviviktā [so'pavargaḥ ।] yasmāddarśanakāryadvayaprayuktaḥ saṁyogastasmā [ddarśanakāryāvasānaḥ saṁyogaḥ] tena puruṣasaṁyogava [ddarśanaṁ viyogasya kāraṇamityuktam ।] guṇapuruṣāntaradarśanaṁ pradhānapuruṣaviyogasya kāraṇamityuktaṁ, kāryasya darśanena paryavasitatvāt ॥
saṁsārisaṁsārahetuyāthātmyadarśarnaṁ duḥkhaduḥkhisaṁyogahetunivartakaṁ, duḥkhiduḥkhahetuyāthātmyaviṣayatvāt , rogirogahetuyāthātmyadarśanavat ॥
avidyā draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ saṁyogakāraṇaṁ, duḥkhanimittasaṁyegahetutvāt, rogahetusaṁyoganimittamithyājñānavat । draṣṭṛdṛśyasaṁyogo mithyājñānapūrvaka:, duḥkhahetutvāt , rogirogahatusaṁyogavat । yasmādduḥkhiduḥkhahetuyāthātmyaviṣayaṁ [darśanaṁ,] tasmāttadanyathāviṣayasyā [darśanasya pratidvandvamityadarśanaṁ saṁyoganimittamityuktaṁ] tasya [heturavidyeti ।] duḥkhanimittatvācca saṁyogasya ॥
yasmādadarśanameva nivartayati darśanaṁ nānyatkāryaṁ karoti, tasmānnātra [darśanaṁ mokṣakāraṇam adarśanābhāvādevā] rthādadarśanakāryasya duḥkhaheto [rbandhasyābhāvaḥ, sa mokṣaḥ] । na punarbandhābhāvavyatirekeṇa bhāvayitavyo mokṣaḥ । tataśca mokṣasya nityatvasiddhiḥ ॥
[darśanasya bhāve] draṣṭṛdṛśyaviṣayasya darśanasya bhāve tadviṣayasyā [darśanasya nāśaḥ ।] darśanādarśanayorekatra virodhāt timiraravikiraṇajalayoriva । [ato darśanaṁ kaivalyakāraṇamuktam – ‘vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ’] iti ॥
kiṁ cedamadarśanaṁ nāma, kiṁ guṇānāmadhikāra āhosviddṛśirūpasya svāmino darśitaviṣayasya pradhānacittasyānutpādaḥ। svasmindṛśye vidyamāne yo darśanābhāvaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[kiṁcedamadarśanaṁ nāma ?] nanu coktamavidyaiva । sā cā [mitrāgoṣpadavaditi] vidyāviparyayeṇa vyākhyātā । satyamevaṁ, kintu śāsragatā vikalpā darśayiṣyante svābhimatapakṣaniścicīṣayā । paraparikalpitavastukhaṇḍimānamāpādayatā hi nijābhimatanirūpitavastu draḍhimānamatitarāmānīyate ॥
[kiṁceda] miti sarvaireva vikalpairvakṣyamāṇairabhisaṁbandhanīyam । [kiṁ guṇānāmadhikāra] iti, sāmānyena paripṛṣṭasya viśeṣaparyanuyogaḥ । [adhikṛtiradhikāraḥ,] guṇānāṁ pravṛttiḥ ॥
nanu guṇānāmadhikārasya kathamadarśanāśaṅkā ? ucyate – arthadvāreṇa bhavatyevādarśanamadhikāraḥ । yāvaddhi guṇānāṁ pravṛttistāvadbandhaḥ । bandhakāraṇamavidyeti sthitisthairyamānīyate । śabdadvāreṇāpi – darśanādanyadadarśanaṁ yadā, bhavatyeva tadānīmāśaṅkā । guṇadhikāro hi darśanādanya eveti ॥
[āhosviddṛśisvarūpasya svāmino darśitaviṣayasya cittasyānutpādaḥ ।] iha tu pūrvapadārthapradhānatvamadarśanasya gṛhītvā śaṅkyate । [cittasyānutpādaḥ] prāgutpatterdarśanasyābhāvaḥ । kimuktaṁ bhavatyanutpāda ityata āha – [svasmin dṛśye citte vidyamāne yo darśanābhāvaḥ] guṇapuruṣāntaradarśanānutpattiradarśanamiti ॥

kimarthavattā guṇānām। athāvidyā svacittena saha niruddhā svacittasyotpattibījam। kiṁ sthitisaṁskārakṣaye gatisaṁskārābhivyaktiḥ। yatredamuktaṁ pradhānaṁ sthityaiva vartamānaṁ vikārākaraṇādapradhānaṁ syāt।

vivaraṇam
[kimarthavatā guṇānāṁ] bhogāpavargābhyāṁ yā guṇānāmarthavatā tadadarśanamiti । atra tvarthadvāreṇaivāśaṅkā । prayojanavato hi prayojanamavaśyakṛtyamiti ॥
kaḥ punareṣu pakṣeṣu doṣaḥ ? ucyate – yadyadhikāro guṇānāmadarśanaṁ vidyānarthakyaṁ prāptam । na hyāsmin pakṣe vidyā pratyanīkabhūtā syādadarśanasya । yasmādvidyādhikārayoravirodhaḥ, ataścānirmokṣaḥ prasaktaḥ । punaḥ punaḥ prayojanavattayā pravṛttisaṁbhavāt ॥
guṇārthavattā adarśanamiti pakṣe'pyeṣa eva doṣaḥ । tathā cittasyānutpādapakṣe'pyeṣa eva । anutpādo hi darśanābhāvaḥ, tasya cāvastutvādvidyayā nivṛtiranupapanneti । abhāve hi sati pratyanīkavidhānamanarthakameva ॥
[athāvidyā svacintena saha niruddheti ।] atra hyavidyāyā adarśanasya ca kenacidaṁśena bhedaṁ manyamāno vikalpayati । katham ? aniruddhā hyavidyā dṛśyamānatvāddarśanameva । yā tu niruddhā cittena saha pralīnā svakāraṇe । [svacittasyotpatibījamu] tpattikāraṇaṁ sā na dṛśyata ityadarśanamityabhimānaḥ । tataścānirodhāvasthāyā darśanatvaprasaṅga iti duṣṭa evāyaṁ pakṣaḥ syāt । atha tu nirodhānirodhāvasthayorapyadaśarnameva, tathā satyabhimatasiddhiriṣyadoṣa eva । [kiṁ sthitisaṁskārakṣaye gatisaṁskārābhivyaktiḥ । kime] tadadarśanamiti na saṁbadhyate । kathaṁ tarhi saṁbandhaḥ? ucyate – tatrāvidyā svacittasahaniruddhā cittasyotpattibījāmityuktaṁ, tata idamarthāt siddham – cittaṁ svakāraṇe nirudhyate punaścotpadyata iti । tataścedamapi siddhamarthāccittasya kāraṇamapi sthityā gatyā ca vartata iti । tataścaitadvispaṣṭīkaraṇārthaṁ pṛcchati ॥
sthityartho guṇānāṁ sāmyavasthāhetuḥ saṁskāraḥ [sthitisaṁskāraḥ ।] tasya [kṣaye sthitisaṁskārakṣaye] gatirmahadādyākāreṇa pravṛttistadarthaḥ saṁskāro [gatisaṁskāraḥ] tasyā [bhivyakti] riti ॥
yadi sthityā gatyā ca vartate, tataḥ ko doṣaḥ syāttadudāharaṇena darśayati – [yatredamu] ktaṁ pradhānaṁ [sthityaiva vartamānaṁ vikārākaraṇāt mahadādyākāreṇā] pariṇāmā [dapradhānaṁ syāt ।] yataḥ pradhatte vikārāniti pradhānam । tena vikārāṇām apradhātṛtvādapradhānaṁ syāt ।

tathā gatyaiva vartamānaṁ vikāranityatvādapradhānaṁ syāt। ubhayathā cāsya vṛttiḥ pradhānavyavahāraṁ labhate nānyathā। kāraṇāntareṣvapi kalpiteṣveva samānaścarcaḥ। darśanaśaktirevādarśanamityeke, “pradhānasyā''tmakhyāpanārthā pravṛttiḥ” itiśruteḥ। sarvabodhyabodhasamarthaḥ prākpravṛtteḥ puruṣo na paśyati sarvakāryakaraṇasamarthaṁ dṛśyaṁ tadā na dṛśyata iti। ubhayasyāpyadarśanaṁ dharma ityeke। tatredaṁ dṛśyasya svātmabhūtamapi puruṣapratyayāpekṣaṁ darśanaṁ dṛśyadharmatvena bhavati। tathā puruṣasyānātmabhūtamapi dṛśyapratyayāpekṣaṁ puruṣadharmatvenevādarśanamavabhāsate। darśanaṁ jñānamevādarśanamiti kecidabhidadhati। ityete śāstragatā vikalpāḥ। tatra vikalpabahutvametatsarvapuruṣāṇāṁ guṇānāṁ saṁyoge sādhāraṇaviṣayam ॥ 23 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tathā gatyaiva vartamānaṁ] nityaṁ vikārarūpeṇeva vartamānaṁ [vikāranityatvānna] vikārān pradhata iti kāraṇatvahāne [rapradhānaṁ syāt । ubhayathā vṛttiḥ] gatyā sthityā ca vartanaṁ vṛttiryasya pradhānasya [tadubhayathāvṛtti vyavahāraṁ pradhānatvavyavahāraṁ] kāraṇatvavyavahāraṁ [labhate । nānyathā] pradhānatvaṁ pradhānasya । [kāraṇāntareṣvapi] puruṣeśvaraparamāṇvādiṣu [parakalpiteṣu samānaścarcaḥ] tulyaviṣayaḥ nyāyaḥ । prakṛta evādhunā nirūpyate । [darśanaśaktirevādarśanamityeke । darśanasya śaktira] nabhivyaktāvasthā bīja ivānabhivyaktāṅkurāvasthā tadetadadarśanami [tyeke manyante ।] kutaḥ ? [pradhānasyātmaprakhyāpanārthā] prakhyāpanaṁ darśanamākhyāyamānarūpatā tasyai tadadarśanamiti śruteḥ ॥
asmin pakṣe tadevānābhivyaktātmakaṁ śaktirūpamadarśanaṁ tadeva cābhivyaktaṁ darśanamiti svātmani virodhānupapatterdarśanādadarśanasya nivṛttyanavaklṛptiḥ ॥
tathā darśanāntaraṁ – [sarvabodhasamarthaḥ] bodhātmakatvāt [prāk pravṛteḥ] pradhānapravṛtteḥ [prāṅna paśyati] darśanātmako'pi san puruṣa iti । [sarvakāryakaraṇa] kriyā [samarthaṁ dṛśyaṁ] pradhānaṁ [na tadā prākpravṛtteḥ] paramārthamapi [sat dṛśyata ityubhayasya] pradhānapuruṣayo [radarśanaṁ dharma ityeke manyante ॥]
atrāpyubhayorapi prāgavasthaivādarśanamuttarakālāvasthā ca darśanamiti pūrvadoṣaḥ sthita eva । [dṛśyasyātmabhūta] mavyatiriktamapi [puruṣapratyayāpekṣaṁ] puruṣākāreṇa puruṣasya na dṛśyate । puruṣākāraviśiṣṭatayā vā puruṣasya dṛśyata iti puruṣapratyayāpekṣamadarśanaṁ puruṣasya dharmatvena bhavati । tadetatspaṣṭayati – [puruṣasyānātmabhūtamapi dṛśyapratyayāpekṣaṁ] dṛśyapratyayo'jñānaṁ tadapekṣaṁ, kathaṁ puruṣākāreṇādarśanāt saṁkareṇa vā darśanādantaḥkaraṇapratyayāpekṣaṁ puruṣānā [tmabhūtamapi puruṣadharmatvenaivādarśanamābhāsate ।] tathā ca sati dṛśyadharma evāyamityadoṣaḥ ॥
sarvavikalpapakṣakhyāpanārtha upanyāsaḥ । [darśanaṁ jñānaṁ,] tadeva jñāna [madarśanamiti kecinmanyante ।] samāsasyottarapadārthaprādhānyamūrīkṛtyārya vikalpaḥ । etasya doṣo'vidyāsūtra eva vyākhyātaḥ ।
[ete śāstragatā vikalpāḥ] darśanāntaragatā vikalpāḥ । [tatra vikalpabahutvamātrametat] na bahutvamātreṇārthīseddhirityabhiprāyaḥ । yasya tu buddhipuruṣasaṁyogahetutvaṁ tasyādarśane [natvaṁ] yuktaṁ daśainavirodhāt । tathā ca vyākhyātamiti nātra punaḥ prayatyate ॥ 23 ॥
yastu pratyakcetanasya svabuddhisaṁyogaḥ –
tasya heturavidyā ॥ 24 ॥

viparyayajñānavāsanetyarthaḥ। viparyayajñānavāsanāvāsitā ca na kāryaniṣṭhāṁ puruṣakhyātiṁ buddhiḥ prāpnoti sādhikārā punarāvartate। sā tu puruṣakhyātiparyavasānāṁ kāryaniṣṭhāṁ prāpnoti, caritādhikārā nivṛttādarśanā bandhakāraṇābhāvānna punarāvartate।

vivaraṇam
[sarvapuruṣāṇāṁ guṇasaṁyegāviśeṣaḥ ।] guṇaiḥ saṁyogaḥ sarveṣāmaviśiṣṭaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ, tathā [pyasādhāraṇaviṣayastu] pratyātmaṁ viśiṣṭastu [pratyakcetanasya] bauddhapratyayānudarśinaḥ [svabuddhisaṁyogaḥ ।] sa cāsādhāraṇaḥ svabuddhisaṁyogo yena bhavati tadevādarśanam । [tasya heturavidyā । tasya] svasvāmiśākasvarūpopalabdhihetoḥ – saṁyogasya hetuḥ kāraṇam avidyā viparyayajñānavāsanetyarthaḥ ॥
nanu ca ['viparyayo mithyājñānamatadūpapratiṣṭham’] ityuktam । tathā ['anityāśuciduḥkhānātmasu nityaśucisukhātmakhyāti] ravidyā' ityutam । atra kathaṁ viparyāyaijñānavāsanetyucyate ! naiṣa doṣaḥ-avidyākāryatvādvāsanāyāḥ saivāvidyetyucyate । pralīneṣvapi karaṇeṣu sāmyāvasthāyamapi satyāmavidyāvāsanā punaḥ punaḥ pravṛttau pradhānasya heturbhavati । na punarviparyayaḥ prāk buddhyutpatterabhāvātpravṛttikāraṇamiti, tadvāsanaiva pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogasya kāraṇamityākhyāyate ॥
tadevāha – [viparyayajñānavāsanāvāsitā na kāryaniṣṭhāṁ] kāryesamāptim । kāryaniṣṭhāmāha – [puruṣakhyāti] miti । tāṁ buddhi [rna prāpnoti ।] puruṣakhyātiparyavasānā hi buddheḥ karaṇīyavattā । [sādhikārā] karaṇīyavatī [punaḥ punarāvartate] viparyayajñānavāsanāvaśāt ॥
[sā tu] buddhiḥ [puruṣakhyātiparyavasānā kāryaniṣṭhāṁ prāpnoti ।] punarapi tadeva spaṣṭayati – [caritādhikārā nivṛttādarśanabandhanā] karmāvipākayoradarśanamūlatvādadarśanameva bandhanam । adarśananivṛttau ca bandhanivṛtte [rbandhakāraṇābhāvādba] ndhakāraṇasyādarśanasyābhāvā [nna punarāvartate ॥]

atra kaścitpaṇḍakopākhyānenoddhāṭayati - mugdhayā bhāryayā'bhidhīyate - paṇḍakā''ryaputra, apatyavatī me bhaginī kimarthaṁ nāma nāhamiti, sa tāmāha - mṛtaste'hamapatyamutpādayiṣyāmīti। tathedaṁ vidyamānaṁ jñānaṁ cittanivṛttiṁ na karoti, vinaṣṭaṁ kariṣyatīti kā pratyāśā। tatrā''cāryadeśīyo vakti – nanu buddhinivṛttireva mokṣo'darśanakāraṇābhāvādbuddhinivṛttiḥ।

vivaraṇam
[atra kaścitpaṇḍakopākhyānenoddhaṭṭayati ।] paṇḍakaḥ [ṣaṇḍaḥ ।] sa kila [mugdhayā bhāryayā abhidhīyate ।] katham ? [āryaputra, me bhaginyapatyavatī, kimarthaṁ nāham apatyavatyasmīti । tāmaha mṛtaste'hamapūtyamutpādayiṣyāmīti । tathadaṁ vidyamānaṁ jñānaṁ citanivṛttiṁ na karoti, naṣṭaṁ kariṣyatīti kā pratyāśā ॥]
ayamudghaṭṭayiturabhiprāyaḥ – avidyā cedbuddhipuruṣasaṁyegasya kāraṇaṁ, tasyāśca vidyā nivṛttihetuḥ, tataśca vidyamānāyāṁ vidyāyāṁ tadvirodhinyavidyā nivartate । na tu vidyotpattyanantaramapi cittanivṛttiḥ । tatra yathaiva satyāṁ vidyāyāṁ na cittanivṛtaḥ, tathā naṣṭāyāmapi vidyāyāṁ na nivartsyati tarāmidānī ṣaṇḍādiva mṛtādapatyopattiḥ । ata eva kāraṇādavidyā'pi na saṁyogakāraṇam ॥
[atrācāryadeśīyaḥ parihāraṁ vakti ।] ācāryadeśīyagrahaṇaṁ pūrvapakṣasyāsāratvaprakhyāpanārtham । uddhaṭṭanenaiva pratyuttaraṁ vadāmi iti ॥
[nanu buddhinivṛttireva mokṣaḥ ।] katham ? [adarśanakāraṇābhāvādbuddhinivṛttiḥ ।]
taccādarśanaṁ bandhakāraṇaṁ darśanānnivartate। tatra cittanivṛttireva mokṣaḥ, kimarthamasthāna evāsya mativibhraḥ ॥ 24 ॥

vivaraṇam
[taccādarśanaṁ bandhakāraṇaṁ darśanānnivartate, tannivṛttireva mokṣaḥ । kimarthamasthāne vibhramaḥ] । pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogasya du:khahetoravidyā kāraṇamiti vistareṇa pratipāditam । tataśca darśanādadarśananivṛtyupapettaḥ pūrvapakṣamasāraṁ manyate ॥
nanu coktaṁ vidyānantarameva buddhirna nivartata iti । ucyate । vidyayā tāvadavidyā nivartata eva । nātra vibhramaḥ kāryaḥ । tasyāṁ tu nivṛttāyāṁ budvinivṛttiśca bhavatyeva । punarbuddhisaṁyogasyāvidyāvyatirekeṇa kāraṇāntarābhāvāt । tataśca buddhinivṛttireva mokṣaḥ ॥
yattu vidyānantarameva buddhirna nivartata iti, tadakāraṇam । kasmāt ? nimittanaimitikayoranekaprakāradarśanāt । yathā takṣādinimitāḥ prāsādādayastakṣādiṣūparateṣvapi na nimittaviratyā viramanti । bhagnasya ca drumasya bhaṅgānantarameva viśeṣādarśanāt । tathā cittasyapi vimuktasāyakavadārabdhasaṁskārāparikṣayāt, tatsaṁskārāpekṣayā kaṁcitkālaṁ darśanenaivāvasthānam iti । tathā ca śrutiḥ – [“tasya tāvadeva ciram”] iti ॥ 24 ॥
heyaṁ duḥkhaṁ heyakāraṇaṁ ca saṁyogākhyaṁ sanimittamuktamataḥ paraṁ hānaṁ vaktavyam –
tadabhāvātsaṁyogābhāvo hānaṁ taddṛśeḥ kaivalyam ॥ 25 ॥

tasyādarśanasyābhāvādbuddhipuruṣasaṁyogābhāva ātyantiko bandhanoparama ityarthaḥ। etaddhānam। taddṛśeḥ kaivalyaṁ puruṣasyāmiśrībhāvaḥ punarasaṁyogo guṇairityarthaḥ। duḥkhakāraṇanivṛttau duḥkhoparamo hānaṁ, tadā svarūpapratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣa ityuktam ॥ 25 ॥

vivaraṇam
catvāro vyūhāḥ prakṛtāḥ । tatra heyaṁ du:khaṁ ' [heyaṁ duḥkhamanāgatam'] ityuktam । regasthānīya eka vyūho vyākhyāta ityarthaḥ । [heyakāraṇaṁ ca sanimittaṁ saṁyogākhyamuktam ।] dvitīyo vyūho rogahetusthānīyo heyohetustvavidyānimittasāhitaḥ pradhānapuruṣasaṁyoga upavarṇitaḥ । uttaparikīrtanaṁ ca sopapattikoktestadvaṣayākāṅkṣānivṛttyartham ॥
[ataḥ paraṁ hānam] ārogyasthānīyaṁ mokṣaśāstraprayojane [vaktavyam ।] vakṣyamāṇasaṁkīrtanaṁ ca śrotṛbuddhisamādhānārtham । [tadabhāvāt saṁyogābhāvo hānaṁ tat dṛśeḥ kaivalyam ॥]
[taditi] pūrvaprakṛtāyā avidyāyāḥ pratyavamarśaḥ । [tasyādarśanasya] avidyāyā [abhāvāt buddhipuruṣasaṁyogasya] duḥkhaheto: [abhāvaḥ ālyantiko bandhanoparama ityarthaḥ । etat hānam] arerāgyasthānīyam । [tat dṛśeḥ kaivalyaṁ] tadeva hānaṁ atyantiko bandhanoparamaḥ [dṛśeḥ puruṣasya kaivalyam ।] asya vyākhyānaṁ [puruṣasyāmiśrabhāvaḥ punarasayogo guṇairityarthaḥ ॥]
padārthaṁ vyākhyāya vākyārthamidānīṁ darśayati – [duḥkhakāraṇanivṛtau duḥkhoparamo hānam । tadā svarūpapratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣa ityuktam – “svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktiḥ” iti ॥]
nanu ca aniyatavipākasya karmaṇaḥ sadbhāve kathaṁ hānaṁ syāt ? punarāneyatavipākakarmaṇā śarīrasyārambha iti । na—abhihitapratividhānatvāt । samyagdarśanena kreśabījasya dāhāta karmaṇāmanārambhakatvamuktaṁ dagdhabījabhāvāpanītatuṣaśalitaṇḍulanidarśanena । tasmāt na viduṣaḥ kāraṇābhāvāccharīrārambhaḥ ॥ 25 ॥
atha hānasya kaḥ prāptyupāya iti –
vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ ॥ 26 ॥

sattvapuruṣānyatāpratyayo vivekakhyātiḥ। sā tvanivṛttamithyājñānā plavate। yadā mithyājñānaṁ dagdhabījabhāvaṁ vandhyaprasavaṁ saṁpadyate tadā vidhūtakleśarajasaḥ sattvasya pare vaiśāradye parasyāṁ vaśīkārasaṁjñāyāṁ vartamānasya vivekapratyayapravāho nirmalo bhavati। sā vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ। tato mithyājñānasya dagdhabījabhāvopagamaḥ punaścāprasava ityeṣa mokṣasya mārgo hānasyopāya iti ॥ 26 ॥

vivaraṇam
uktastṛtīye vyūhaḥ – ārogyasthānīyo hānaṁ nāma । adhunā caturthaṁ vyūhaṁ bhaiṣajyasthānīyamupācikhyāsannāha – [hānasya kaḥ prāptyupāyaḥ?] iti ॥
nanu ca kathaṁ hānasya prāpyupāya iti ? yāvatā naiva hānamavastutvāt prāpyam । bandhanoparama eva hi hānam । naiṣa doṣaḥ । yatnasādhyatvādavidyānivṛtteḥ yathā nigalabhedaḥ । samyakūkhyātau satyāmavidyānivṛttiriti hānamavastvapi prāpyamityupacaryete ॥
[vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ ।] kā punarvivekakhyātirityāha – [sattvapuruṣānyatāpratyayaḥ] sattvapuruṣayoḥ sādharmyayaivaidhamyaiyāthātmyāvabodha ityarthaḥ । [sā tu] vivekakhyātiḥ [anivṛttamithyājñānā vipluvatte] na sthirībhavati, na kāryekṣameti ॥
tathā coktam-- [‘yathā hemāvipakvaṁ na virājate ।]
[tathā'pakvakaṣāyasya vijñānaṁ na prakāśate ॥]
tathā [“kāmagrāhagṛhītasya jñānamapyasya na plavaḥ” ।] iti ॥
[yadā tu mithyājñānaṁ dagdhabījabhāvaṁ] dagdhabījatvādeva [vandhyaprasavaṁ] kāryārambhākṣamaṁ [sampadyate] , [tadā vidhūtakleśarajasaḥ] kleśā eva rajaḥ vidhūtaṁ yasya tadvidhūtakeśarajaḥ tasya [sattvasya] rāgādimalākalaṅkitasya [pararayāṁ vaśīkārasaṁjñāyāṁ vartamānasya] jñānaprasādamātre vartamānasya । tadevānuvadati – [vivekapratyayapravāhaḥ] vivekajñānanirantarabhāvaḥ [nirmalo bhavati ॥]
[sā vivekakhyātiḥ] itthaṁbhūtā satī [aviplavā bhavati ।] yadaivamaviplavā vivakakhyātiḥ [tato mithyājñānasya dagdhabījabhāvopagamo] viruddhatvāt । punaścāprasavaḥ mithyājñānasya dagdhabījabhāvopagamādeva । tathā coktam –
[“bījānyagnyupadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ ।]
[jñānadagdhaistathā kleśairnātmā sampadyate punaḥ ॥ ” iti ।]
sā ca tādṛśī vivekakhyāti [rmokṣasya mārgo hānasyopāya] ityarthaḥ ॥ 26 ॥
tasya saptadhā prāntabhūmiḥ prajñā ॥ 27 ॥
tasyeti pratyuditakhyāteḥ pratyāmnāyaḥ। saptadheti aśuddhyāvaraṇamalāpagamāccittasya pratyayāntarānutpāde sati saptaprakāraiva prajñā vivekino bhavati।

vivaraṇam
utpakṣasamyagdarśanasya samyagdarśanotpattau svānubhavapratyayaliṅgaprakaṭīkaraṇārthamāha – [tasya saptadhā prāntabhūmiḥ prajñā । tasyeti pratyuditakhyāteḥ] pratyutpannasamyagdarśanasya [pratyāmnāyaḥ] pratyavamarśaḥ । [saptadheti aśuddhyāvaraṇamalāpagamāt ।] aśuddhirevāvaraṇaṁ kleśāḥ karmaṇi ca, tadeva malaṁ tasyāpagamāt [cittasya pratyayāntarānutpāde] mamāhamiti ca viruddhapratyayāntarāṇāmanutpattau । saptadhetyasya vivaraṇe [saptaprakāraiva prajñā] buddhiḥ [vivekino bhavati ॥]

tadyathā – parijñātaṁ heyaṁ nāsya punaḥ parijñeyamasti। kṣīṇā heyahetavo na punareteṣāṁ kṣetavyamasti। sākṣātkṛtaṁ nirodhasamādhinā hānam। bhāvito vivekakhyātirūpo hānopāya iti। eṣā catuṣṭayī kāryā vimuktiḥ prajñāyāḥ। cittavimuktistu trayī caritādhikārā buddhiḥ। guṇā giriśikharataṭacyutā iva grāvāṇo niravasthānāḥ svakāraṇe pralayābhimukhāḥ saha tenāstaṁ gacchanti। na caiṣāṁ pravilīnānāṁ punarastyutpādaḥ prayojanābhāvāditi। etasyāmavasthāyāṁ guṇasaṁbandhātītaḥ svarūpamātrajyotiramalaḥ kevalī puruṣa iti। etāṁ saptavidhāṁ prāntabhūbhiprajñāmanupaśyanpuruṣaḥ kuśala ityākhyāyate। pratiprasave'pi cittasya muktaḥ kuśala ityeva bhavati guṇātītatvāditi ॥ 27 ॥

vivaraṇam
tān sapta prakārān kramaṇācaṣṭe – [yathā parijñātaṁ heyaṁ] sarvaṁ duḥkhaṁ heyaṁ sarvaṁ duḥkhaṁ heyaṁ jñātamupapattibhiḥ । [nāsya parijñātavyo] duḥkhaprakāraḥ ॥
[kṣīṇā heyahetava] iti bahuvacanaprayogāt kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca abhidhīyante । na punareṣāṁ kleśakarmaṇāmalpamapi samyagdarśanapāvakādagdhabījābhāvāt kṣe(dutprekṣi)tavyamasti । etenāpi prāntabhūmitvamevoktam । itthaṁ ca pratyupasthitasamīcīnapratyayasya kṣīṇakleśatvāt na kṣetavyamasti । kṛtakaraṇīyo'hamiti ca samyagdarśanaparipākaliṅgapratyaya upāvartate । yathā rogāturasya rogahetukṣaye nīrogo'haṁ na punarbhaiṣajyamastīti pratyayaḥ । evameva [ṣa] dvitīyaḥ prajñāprakāra uktaḥ ॥
[sākṣātkṛtaṁ nirodhasamāpattirhānam ।] hānapratyāsannatvāt hānatulyarūpatvācca nirodhasamādhireva hānamityākhyāyate । tacca [sākṣātkṛtam] anubhavaviṣayatāmānītam । tadidaṁ kaivalye paryavasitam kaivalyaṁ kartavyamiti ca prajñāyate । eṣo'pi prāntabhūmiprajñāprakāraḥ tṛtīya ākhyātaḥ ॥
[bhāvitaḥ] samyagabhyastataraḥ [vivekakhyātirūpo hānopāyaḥ ।] samyagdarśanaṁ yathāvadupasthitamiti niścitā cetprajñā vivekino jāyate sa eṣa caturthaḥ prajñāprakāraḥ । [ityeṣā catuṣṭayī kāryavimuktiḥ] kāryāt kartavyāt vimuktiryasyāḥ prajñāyāḥ sā kāryavimuktiḥ catūrūpā [prajñā] puruṣārthekartavyatetyarthaḥ ॥
atha vā – kāryasya vimuktiḥ nivṛttiḥ [kāryavimuktiḥ ।] sā ca [catuṣṭayī kāryavimuktiriti] samāptaṁ vākyam । [prajñā] iti pareṇa saṁbadhyate । katham ? prajñā (pra) yuktam, vivekakhyātiyuktaṁ cittaṁ [prajñācittaṁ] tasya vimuktiḥ pralayaḥ [prajñācittavimuktiḥ ।] sā trayī । tathā ca vakṣyati – [“puruṣārthaśūnyānāṁ guṇānāṁ pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyam” iti ॥]
tatra kāryavimuktiścatuṣṭayī । purūṣāthaiśśūnyatvaṁ pūrvamuktam । idānīṁ buddhiguṇānnivṛtiḥ । puruṣārthakartavyānāṁ puruṣārthaśūnyānāṁ pratiprasavaḥ prajñācittavimuktistrayī vyākhyāyate । yathā – [caritādhikārāḥ] nivṛttakartavyāḥ [buddhiguṇāḥ] sattvādayo buddhyākāravasthitāḥ [praळyābhimukhāḥ ।] kimiva ? [giriśikharakūṭacyutā iva grāvāṇo niravasthānāḥ] kartavyābhāvāt svakāraṇe ahaṁkāre [pralayābhimukhāḥ saha tena] buddhisaṁsthānena kāyeṁṇa, athavā, svakāraṇenāhaṅkāreṇa kuśalaṁ puruṣaṁ prati svakāraṇamapyavyaktabhāvaṁ pratipadyata iti [saha tenāstaṁ gacchanti] ityucyate । eṣā prathamā prajñācittavimuktiḥ ॥
[na caiṣāṁ pratipralīnānāṁ puruṣaṁ prati punarastyutpādaḥ prayojanābhāvāt ।] vimuktaṁ hi caturvidhaṁ kāryam । eṣā dvitīyā prajñācittavimuktiḥ ॥
[etasyāmavasthāyāṁ] caritārthaguṇapralayāvasthāyāṁ [guṇasambandhātītaḥ] guṇasaṁbandho draṣṭṛdṛśyalakṣaṇaḥ tamatītaḥ । svarūpamātrajyotiḥ dṛśisvarūpamātramevaṁ jyotiḥ । [puruṣaḥ kevalī śuddha] iti tṛtīyā prajñācittavimuktiriti ॥
[etāṁ saptavidhāṁ prāntabhūmiṁ] prāntāḥ pragatāvasānāḥ bhūmayaḥ avasthāḥ yasyāstāṁ [prāntabhūmiṁ prajñāmanupaśyan] samyagdarśanaliṅgaparipākabhūtāmīkṣamāṇaḥ [puruṣaḥ kuśala ityākhyāyate ।] kuśala iti saṅketaḥ । [pratiprasave'pi] pralaye'pi [cittasya muktaḥ kuśala ityeva] bhūtapūrvagatyā kuśala ityeva [bhavati ।] kutaḥ kauśalaṁ tasyetyāha – [guṇātītatvāt iti ।] guṇānatīto hi kuśalaḥ ॥ 27 ॥
siddhā bhavati vivekakhyātirhānopāya iti, na ca siddhirantareṇa sādhanamityetadārabhyate –
yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādaśuddhikṣaye jñānadīptirāvivekakhyāteḥ ॥ 28 ॥

yogāṅgānyaṣṭāvabhidhāyiṣyamāṇāni। teṣāmanuṣṭhānātpañcaparvaṇo viparyayasyāśuddhirūpasya kṣayo nāśaḥ। tatkṣaye samyagjñānasyābhivyaktiḥ। yathā yathā ca sādhanānyanuṣṭhīyante tathā tathā tanutvamaśuddhirāpadyate। yathā yathā ca kṣīyate tathā tathā kṣayakramānurodhinī jñānasyāpi dīptirvivardhate। sā khalveṣā vivṛddhiḥ prakarṣamanubhavatyā vivekakhyāteḥ, āguṇapuruṣasvarūpavijñānādityarthaḥ। yogāṅgānuṣṭhānamaśuddherviyogakāraṇam। yathā paraśuśchedyasya। vivekakhyātestu prāptikāraṇaṁ yathā dharmaḥ sukhasya nānyathā kāraṇam। kati caitāni kāraṇāni śāstre bhavanti। navaivetyāha।

vivaraṇam
[siddhā vivekakhyātiḥ] samadhigatā vivekakhyātiḥ saptavidhaprāntabhūmiprajñāphalāvasānā [hānasyopāya iti । na ca siddhiḥ antareṇa sādhanam, ityata idaṁ] vivekakhyātisiddhisādhanārthamārabhyate – [yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādaśuddhikṣaye jñānadīptirāvivekakhyateḥ ॥]
yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādeva vivekakhyātiriti nāvadidhārayiṣitam, gurūpāsanadharmaprabhṛtikebhyo'pi vivekakhyāteḥ siddhiriṣyata eva ! kiṁ tarhi ? sādhanamātramantareṇa na bhavatyevetyavadhārayiṣyate । na punaryogāṅgānuṣṭhānameva sādhanaṁ, yogāṅgānuṣṭhānāttu bhavatyeva vivekakhyāti siddhiriti । tathā cācāryairuktam – [‘yogastattvajñānārthaḥ’] iti ॥
[yogāṅgānyabhidhāyiṣyamāṇāni teṣāmanuṣṭhānaṁ] yogāṅgānuṣṭhānam tasmāt । aśuddheḥ kleśākhyāyāḥ kṣayaḥ, tatkṣaye dīptiḥ prakarṣaḥ । kiyadavasānetyāha- [ā vivekakhyateḥ] bhavatītyupaskāraḥ ॥
svayameva bhāṣyakāraḥ spaṣṭataraṁ vivṛṇoti- [yogāṅgānyaṣṭāvabhidhāyiṣyamāṇāni । teṣāmanuṣṭhānāt paśvaparvaṇo viparyayasya aśuddhirūpasya kṣayaḥ nāśaḥ, tatkṣaye samyagdarśanasyābhivyaktiḥ'] dīptiḥ । kathametadbhavatītyāha - [yathā yathā ca sādhanānyanuṣṭhīyante tathā tathā tanutvamaśuddhirāpadyate ।] tathā ca manurabhāṣiṣṭa –
[“prāṇāyāmairdaheddoṣān dhāraṇābhiśca kilbiṣān ।]
[pratyāhāreṇa saṁsargān dhyānenānaiśvarān guṇān ॥ ” iti ।]
[yathā yathā cāśuddhiḥ kṣīyate tathā tathā tatkṣayakramānuredhinī] divasakarasyeva śiśirāvasāne [jñānasya dīptirvivardhate । sā khalviyaṁ vivṛddhiḥ prakarṣamanubhavati ।] kimavasānam ? tadāha- [ā vivekakhyāteḥ ।] tasya vyākhyānam - [ā guṇapuruṣasvarūpavivekajñānādityarthaḥ ।] sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiparyavasānaiva śuddhiḥ ॥
[yogāṅgānuṣṭhānamaśuddheḥ kṣayakāraṇaṁ vivekakhyāteśca prāptikāraṇamiti,] dvidhaiva kāraṇam, dharmaparaśudvayasthānīyamekamubhayakāraṇaṁ, [nānyathā] bhavatīti । tatra kāraṇaprasaṅgena śāstraprasiddhāni kāraṇāni vyācaṣṭe – [kati caitāni kāraṇāni śāstre bhavanti ? navaivetyāha ।]

tadyathā – utpattisthityabhivyaktivikārapratyayāptayaḥ। viyogānyatvadhṛtayaḥ kāraṇaṁ navadhā smṛtam ॥ iti। tatrotpattikāraṇaṁ mano bhavati vijñānasya, sthitikāraṇaṁ manasaḥ puruṣārthatā, śarīrasyevā''hāra iti। abhivyaktikāraṇaṁ yathā rūpasyā''lokastathā rūpajñānaṁ, vikārakāraṇaṁ manaso viṣayāntaram। yathā'gniḥ pākasya। pratyayakāraṇaṁ dhūmajñānamagnijñānasya। prāptikāraṇaṁ yogāṅgānuṣṭhānaṁ vivekakhyāteḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tadyathā] – tāni ślokenaiva kathayati [utpattisthityabhivyaktivikārapratyayāptayaḥ ।]
[viyogānyatvadhṛtayaḥ kāraṇaṁ navadhā smṛtam ॥] iti ।
tatpravivekārthamudāharaṇāni prastāviṣyante । [tatrotpattikāraṇaṁ mano bhavati [vijñānasya]] , manaso hi vṛttiḥ [jñānaṁ,] yathā jalamūrbhīṇām ॥
[sthitikāraṇaṁ] sthiteḥ kāraṇam [manasaḥ puruṣārthatā ।] bhogāpavargārthavena hi manasaḥ sthitiḥ । [śarīrasya] yathā sthitikāraṇa [māhāraḥ ॥]
[abhivyakteḥ kāraṇaṁ rūpasyālokaḥ । tadā rūpajñānam ।] na hyālokenānabhivyakte rūpe'vabodhaḥ ॥
[vikārasya] kāraṇaṁ [manaso viṣayāntaram ।] viṣayāntarasannidhānena hi mano vikriyāmāsīdati । [yathā agniḥ pākasya ।] yaḥ pākākhyo vikārastasya pākasya vikārarūpasyāgniḥ kāraṇaṁ yathā ॥
[pratyayakāraṇaṁ dhūmajñānamagnijñānasya ।] pratyayasya phalavataḥ pramāṇasya kāraṇamityarthaḥ । pūrvatra tu [‘bhavati vijñānasya’] iti jñānasyopādānakāraṇaṁ vivakṣitam ॥
[prāptikāraṇaṁ yogāṅgānuṣṭhāne vivekakhyāteḥ] dharma iva sukhasya ।

viyogakāraṇaṁ tadevāśuddheḥ। anyatvakāraṇaṁ yathā suvarṇasya suvarṇakāraḥ। evamekasya strīpratyayasyāvidyā mūḍhatve dveṣo duḥkhatve rāgaḥ sukhatve tattvajñānaṁ mādhyasthye। dhṛtikāraṇaṁ śarīramindriyāṇām। tāni ca tasya। mahābhūtāni śarīrāṇāṁ, tāni ca parasparaṁ sarveṣāṁ tairyagyaunamānuṣadaivatāni ca parasparārthatvādityevaṁ nava kāraṇāni। tāni ca yathāsaṁbhavaṁ padārthāntareṣvapi yojyāni। yogāṅgānuṣṭhānaṁ tu dvidhaiva kāraṇatvaṁ labhata iti ॥ 28 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadevāśuddherviyogakāraṇaṁ] paraśuriva chedyasya ॥
[anyatvakāraṇaṁ yathā suvarṇakāraḥ suvarṇasya ।] suvarṇaṁ hi bhittvā vardhamānakamanyaṁ karoti । tathā vardhamānakaṁ bhitvā anyadābharaṇāntaraṁ karoti । tathā'nyaditi ॥
[evamekasya 'strī' iti pratyayasyāpi avidyā kāraṇaṁ mūḍhatve । dveṣa] stasyaiva strīpratyayasya [duḥkhatve kāraṇam ।] tathā [rāgaḥ sukhatve ।] tathā tasyaiva [mādhyasthye] heyopādeyaśūnyatāyāṁ [vivekayuktaṁ jñānaṁ] kāraṇam । evamekaḥ strīpratyayaḥ suvarṇavadanekadhā mūḍhatvaduḥkhatvasukhatvamādhyasthyādibhedairbhidyate ॥
[dhṛteḥ kāraṇam ।] dhāraṇe dhṛtiḥ, tasyāḥ kāraṇaṁ [śarīramindriyāṇām ।] na hi śarīramaprāpyendriyāṇi dhṛtiṁ labhante । [tāni] cendriyāṇi [tasya] śarīrasya [dhṛtikāraṇaṁ] bhavanti । indriyavṛttidvāreṇa hi śariraṁ dhriyate ॥
tathā [mahābhūtānyā] kāśādīni [śarīrāṇāṁ] dhṛtikāraṇam । mahābhūtārabdhāni hi śarīrāṇi brahmādistambāvasānāni [[tāni ca] parasparam] upakāryopakārakatvadvāreṇa dhṛtikāraṇam ॥
tathā [sarveṣāṁ] padārthānāṁ [tairyagyaunamānuṣadaivatāni] dhṛtikāraṇam । kutaḥ? [parasparārthatvāt ।] tairyagyaunaṁ mānuṣadaivatayorvāhanadohanahavirādibhirupakurvat dhṛtikāraṇam ॥
tathā mānuṣaṁ ijyārakṣaṇādibhirdaivatairyagyaunayoḥ dhṛtikāraṇam । tathā daivamitarayoḥ śītoṣṇapravarṣaṇārdanā dhṛtikāraṇam ॥
evaṁ varṇāśramāṇāmapyanyonyopakāreṇa dhṛtikāraṇatvam । parasparopāśrayeṇa hi jagadakhilamapi dhriyate । [evaṁ navaiva kāraṇāni] iti kāraṇāntaraṁ pratiṣedhati । [tāni ca yathā'rthasaṁbhavaṁ] yo yo'rthasaṁbhavaḥ [padārthāntareṣvapya] nudāhṛteṣu [tathā ye.ājyāni । yogāṅgānuṣṭhānaṁ tu dvidhaiva kāraṇatvaṁ labhate ।] tathā ca vyākhyātam ॥ 28 ॥
tatra yogāṅgānyavadhāryante –
yamaniyamāsana​prāṇāyāmapratyāhāra​dhāraṇādhyāna​samādhayo'ṣṭāvaṅgāni ॥ 29 ॥
yathākramameṣāmanuṣṭhānaṁ svarūpaṁ ca vakṣyāmaḥ ॥ 29 ॥

vivaraṇam
kāni punastāni yogāṅgāni? yeṣāmanuṣṭhānaṁ dvidhā kāraṇatvaṁ labhata iti । [tatra yogāṅgānyavadhāryante – yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhāradhāraṇādhyānasamādhayo'ṣṭāvaṅgāni ॥]
nanu ca yogaśāstrāntareṣvāsanādīnyeva ṣaḍaṅgāni । tadyathā - [‘ṣaḍaṅgo yoga ucyata'] ityādi ।
kiñca – sākṣādāsanādīnyeva samādherupakurvanti, na yamaniyamau ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ । yamaniyamavatoryogādhikāropapatteḥ । na hi yathākāmacāriṇāṁ yogādhikāraḥ । [‘nāvirato duścaritānnāśanāntaḥ’] iti śruteḥ । tathā – [‘yeṣāṁ tapo brahmacaryaṁ yeṣu satyaṁ pratiṣṭhitam’] ityādi cātharvaṇe । tathā gītāyām [‘brahmacārivrate sthitaḥ’] iti । tasmādyamaniyamayorapyaṅgatvam ॥
yamaniyamayośca yamasya prathamopādānaṁ prādhānyakhyāpanārtham । yamasya hi prādhānyaṁ sarvatra siddham । yamaniyamayuktasyādhikṛtasya yogina āsanādyaṅgānāṁ pūrvapūrve sthirapadaprāptasyottarottarānuṣṭhānaṁ prāptam । na hi prathamaṁ sopānamanāruhyottaramāroḍhuṁ śakyam ॥
yadanyatrācyate –
[“sthānāsanavidhānāni yogasya vidhayo'pi vā ।]
[vyākṣepajanākāḥ sarve na te yogasya hetavaḥ ॥]
[sarvadoṣaparityāgaḥ samādhiśceti taddvayam ॥]
[nirṇaya[yāt] yogahetuḥ syādbhavati vānyanna vā [bhavatvanyanna vā bhavet] ॥ ”] iti ॥
tatsamādhisarvadoṣaparityāgayoḥ prādhānyāt tatstutyartham, nāsanādyaṅgapratiṣedhārtham । [yathākramameṣāṁ] yamādīnā [manuṣṭhānaṁ svarūpaṁ ca vakṣyāmaḥ] - svarūpe hi anavagate nānuṣṭhātuṁ śakyamiti ॥ 29 ॥
tatra –
ahiṁsāsatyasteyabrahmacaryāparigrahā yamāḥ ॥ 30 ॥

tatrāhiṁsā sarvathā sarvadā sarvabhūtānāmanabhidrohaḥ। uttare ca yamaniyamāstanmūlāstatsiddhiparatayaiva tatpratipādanāya pratipādyante। tadavadātarūpakaraṇāyevopādīyante। tathā coktam – sa khalvayaṁ brāhmaṇo yathā yathā vratāni bahūni samāditsate tathā tathā pramādakṛtebhyo hiṁsānidānebhyo nivartamānastāmevāvadātarūpāmahiṁsāṁ karoti।

vivaraṇam
[tatra] teṣu yamādiṣu prathamaṁ yamā vyākhyāyante- [ahiṁsāsatyāsteyabrahmacaryāparigrahā yamāḥ । tatrāhiṁsā sarvathā] sarvātmanā sarvaprakāreṇa, [sarvabhūtānāmanabhidrohaḥ] sarvabhūtānāṁ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṁ anabhidroho'pīḍanam ॥
yamaniyamānāmahiṁsā pradhānabhūtā kāyavāṅmanasaiḥ sarvātmanā karaṇīyeti darśayati – [uttare ca yamāḥ] satyādayaḥ [tanmūlāḥ] ahiṁsāprayojanāḥ ahiṁsārthāḥ [tatsiddhiparatayaiva] ahiṁsāsiddhitatparatvena [pratipādyante ।] kimukaṁ bhavatītyāha - [tadavadāta[rūpa]karaṇāyopādīyante] ahiṁsāśuddhipratipādānāyopādayante ॥
tathā hyuktam – sa khalvayaṁ [brāhmaṇo yathā yathā bahūni vratāni samāditsate tathā tathā pramādakṛtebhyo hiṁsānidānebhyaḥ] hiṁsāmūlebhyaḥ hiṁsākāraṇebhyaḥ [nivartamānastāmevāvadātarūpāmahiṁsāṁ karoti iti ॥]

satyaṁ yathārthe vāṅmanase। yathā dṛṣṭaṁ yathā'numitaṁ tathā vāṅmanaśceti। paratra svabodhasaṁkrāntaye vāguktā, sā yadi na vañcitā bhrāntā vā pratipattivandhyā vā bhavediti। eṣā sarvabhūtopakārārthaṁ pravṛttā na bhūtopaghātāya। yadi caivamapyabhidhīyamānā bhūtopaghātaparaiva syānna satyaṁ bhavetpāpameva bhavettena puṇyābhāsena puṇyapratirūpakeṇa kaṣṭaṁ tamaḥ prāpnuyāt। tasmātparīkṣya sarvabhūtahitaṁ satyaṁ brūyāt।

vivaraṇam
uktaṁ ca – satyaṁ brūyāt priyaṁ brūyānna brūyāt satyamapriyam । priyaṁ ca nānṛtaṁ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ॥ ” iti ।

steyamaśāstrapūrvakaṁ dravyāṇāṁ parataḥ svīkaraṇaṁ, tatpratiṣedhaḥ punaraspṛhārūpamasteyamiti। brahmacaryaṁ guptendriyasyopasthasya saṁyamaḥ। viṣayāṇāmarjanarakṣaṇakṣayasaṅgahiṁsādoṣadarśanādasvīkaraṇamaparigraha ityete yamāḥ ॥ 30 ॥

vivaraṇam
[steyaṁ aśāsrapūrvaṁ dravyāṇāṁ parataḥ svīkaraṇaṁ] spṛhānimittam । yat steyaṁ [tatpratiṣedhastu] na spṛhālūnāṁ sambhavatīti tasyaiva steyasya pratiṣedhastu । saḥ aspṛhārūpamasteyamucyate ॥
[brahmacaryaṁ guptendriyasya] guptānyendriyasya puruṣasya abrahmacaryārthavāṅmanasādivṛttiśūnyasya [upasthendriyasaṁyama] iti ॥
[viṣayāṇāmārjanarakṣaṇakṣayasaṅgahiṁsādoṣadarśanādasvīkaraṇam] anupādānaṁ [aparigrahaḥ ।] na punarasāmarthyenāsvīkaraṇam । ityete yamāḥ ॥ 30 ॥
te tu –
jātideśakālasamayānavacchinnāḥ sārvabhaumā mahāvratam ॥ 31 ॥

tatrāhiṁsā jātyavacchinnā matsyavadhakasya matsyeṣveva nānyatra hiṁsā। saiva deśāvacchinnā na tīrthe haniṣyāmīti। saiva kālāvacchinnā na caturdaśyāṁ na puṇye'hani haniṣyāmīti। saiva tribhiruparatasya samayāvacchinnā devabrāhmaṇārthe nānyathā haniṣyāmīti। yathā ca kṣatriyāṇāṁ yuddha eva hiṁsā nānyatreti। ebhirjāti deśakālasamayairanavacchinnā ahiṁsādayaḥ sarvathaiva paripālanīyāḥ। sarvabhūmiṣu sarvaviṣayeṣu sarvathaivāviditavyabhicārāḥ sārvabhaumā mahāvratamityucyante ॥ 31 ॥

vivaraṇam
anyadharmāṇāṁ jātideśakālādyavacchedenānuṣṭhānādihāpi tathā prasaṅga iti tatpratiṣedhāyāha- [ete tviti । ete] tvahiṁsādayo mahāvratasaṁjñāḥ saṁnyāsavatāmanuṣṭhānīyāḥ । kīdṛśāste mahāvratanāmāna iti- [jātideśakālasamayānavacchinnāḥ sārvabhaumā mahāvratam ।] mahacca tat vrataṁ ca mahāvratam । mahattvaṁ ca sārvabhaumatvam ॥
kathaṁ punarjātyādyanavacchinnatvameṣāmiti anavacchedapratipādanāya vyatirekeṇa ahiṁsāmudāharati- [tatra ahiṁsā jātyavacchinnā matsyabandhakasya matsyeṣveva nānyatra matsyajāterhiṁsā ।] sā ca matsyajātyavacchinnā matsyabhūmemanaśnuvānā vartata iti asārvabhaumyeva ॥
[saivāhiṁsā deśāvacchinnā] katham? [na tīrthe] prayāgādau [haniṣyāmīti ।] tīrtheṣvahiṁsā ca tīrthādanyaṁ deśaṁ na vyaśnuta iti asārvabhaumī ॥
[saiva ca kālāvacchinnā] yathā – [na caturdaśyāṁ na puṇye'hanīti ।] caturdaśyādikālādanyaṁ kālaṁ na vyaśnuta iti sāpyasārvamaimī ॥
[tribhiḥ] api jātideśakālaiḥ [uparatasya tasyaiva] matsyabandhakasya [samayāvacchinnā] samayaḥ kartavyatāniyamaḥ, katham ? [devabrāhmaṇārthaṁ] haniṣyāmi [nānyatheti] , śrāddhādisamayabhūmimanaśnuvānā vartata iti sā'pi na sārvabhaumī । [yathā ca kṣatriyasya yuddha eva hiṁsā nānyatreti] samayāvacchinnasyaivodāharaṇam ॥
ye punarete yamāḥ [jātideśakālasamayairanavacchinnā ahiṁsādayaḥ, te sarvathaiva paripālanīyāḥ sarvabhūmiṣu] jātyādiṣu [sarvaviṣayeṣu] sarvaprāṇiṣu [sarvathaivāviditavyabhicārāḥ] vinā vyabhicāreṇa, te cetthaṁ viśiṣṭāḥ [sārvabhaumā mahāvratamityucyante ॥ 31 ॥]
śaucasaṁtoṣatapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ ॥ 32 ॥

tatra śaucaṁ mṛjjalādijanitaṁ medhyābhyavaharaṇādi ca bāhyam। ābhyantaraṁ cittamalānāmākṣālanam। saṁtoṣaḥ saṁnihitasādhanādadhikasyānupāditsā। tapo dvaṁdvasahanam। dvaṁdvāśca jighatsāpipāse śītoṣṇe sthānāsane kāṣṭhamaunākāramaune ca। vratāni caiṣāṁ yathāyogaṁ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇasāṁtapanādīni। svādhyāyo mokṣaśāstrāṇāmadhyayanaṁ praṇavajapo vā। īśvarapraṇidhānaṁ tasminparamagurau sarvakarmārpaṇam। śayyāsanastho'tha pathi vrajanvā svasthaḥ parikṣīṇavitarkajālaḥ। saṁsārabījakṣayamīkṣamāṇaḥ syānnityayukto'mṛtabhogabhāgī ॥ yatredamuktaṁ tataḥ pratyakcetanādhigamo'pyantarāyābhāvaśceti ॥ 32 ॥

vivaraṇam
[śaucasantoṣatapassvādhyāyeśvaraprāṇadhānāni niyamāḥ । tatra śaucaṁ mṛdādijanitam] ādiśabdādudakaṁ ca । [medhyābhyavaharaṇāni ca] dhṛtapayaādīni bhakṣaṇāni । caśabdāt medhyadarśanaśravaṇādīni ca । bāhyametacchaucam ॥
[ābhyantarama] dhunocyate - [cittamalānāṁ] kāmakrodhādīnāṁ tatpratipakṣabhāvanāsalilaiḥ [ākṣālanam ॥]
[santoṣaḥ sanni.āhatasādhanāśvāsāt] sannihitādāśvāsīnamittāt [adhikasādhanānupāditsā] sannihitamātrādatṛptau satyāmapyalaṁpratyayaḥ ॥
[tapo dvandvasahanam । dvandvaśca jighatsāpipāse ।] jighatsā attumicchā । pātumicchā pipāsā । jighatsāpipāsāsahanaṁ tapaḥ । [svarūpeṇaiva [vā] te jighatsāpipāse] alpīyaḥ pānāśananimitte tapaḥ । [śītoṣṇe] apratikriyamāṇe alpapratikriye vā tapaḥ । [sthānāsane 'tiṣṭhadahani rātrāvāsīta'] iti smṛtiprasthānam । [kāṣṭhamaunākāṣṭhamaune ।] kāṣṭhamaunaṁ hastaprayogādirahitam । akāṣṭhamaunaṁ hastādiprayogayuktaṁ sambhāṣaṇādirahitam ॥
[vratāni caiṣāṁ] yogināṁ [yathāyogaṁ] yathāsambhavam । homādiviruddhadharmaviruddhapratiṣedhārthaṁ yathāyogamityāha । kāni tāni? kṛcchrādīni । kṛcchraṁ prājāpatyādi । [tryahaṁ prātaḥ tryahaṁ sāyaṁ tryamadyādayācitam । upoṣaṇaṁ tryaham'] iti । [cāndrāyaṇaṁ] yavamadhyapipīlikāmadhyādi । [‘ekaikaṁ vardhayet grāsam’] ityādismṛtiḥ । [sāntapanam—]
[‘gomūtraṁ gomayaṁ kṣīraṁ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam ।]
[ekarātropavāsaśca kṛcchraḥ sāntapanaḥ smṛtaḥ ॥]
etānyeva dravyāṇi trirabhyastāni mahāsāntapanam । ādigrahaṇaṁ parākādi pratyupādānārtham । [svādhyāyo mokṣaśāstrādhyayanam] upaniṣadādyadhyayanaṁ praṇavajapo vā । [pratyakcetanādhigamo'pyantarāyābhāvaśceti ॥ 32 ॥]
eteṣāṁ yamaniyamānām –
vitarkabādhane pratipakṣabhāvanam ॥ 33 ॥

yadā'sya brāhmaṇasya hiṁsādayo vitarkā jāyeranhaniṣyāmyahamapakāriṇamanṛtamapi vakṣyāmi krayamapyasya svīkariṣyāmi dāreṣu cāsya vyavāyī bhaviṣyāmi parigraheṣu cāsya svāmī bhaviṣyāmīti। evamunmārgapravaṇavitarkajvareṇātidīptena bādhyamānastatpratipakṣānbhāvayet। ghoreṣu saṁsārāṅgāreṣu pacyamānena mayā śaraṇamupāgataḥ sarvabhūtābhayapradānena yogadharmaḥ। sa khalvahaṁ tyaktvā vitarkānpunastānādadānastulyaḥ śvavṛtteneti bhāvayet।

vivaraṇam
tatra [yamaniyamānāṁ] viruddhāstarkāḥ [vitarkāḥ, taiḥ bādhane] sati [pratipakṣān bhāvayet] abhidhāsyamānena prakāreṇa । apratibhāvyamānā hi vitarkā yoginaṁ । hiṁsādiṣu praṇidhāpayeyuḥ ॥
[yadā asya brāhmaṇasya vitarkā hiṁsādayo jāyeran ।] tatrāhiṁsādivitarkā ye vā hiṁsādayaste vitarkāḥ kīdṛśā iti ? tatrāhiṁsāyā vitarkaḥ hiṁsā [haniṣyāmyapakāriṇamiti ।] tathā satyasya [anṛtaṁ vadiṣyāmīti] viruddhaḥ pratyayo vitarkaḥ । tathaivāsteyasya vitarkaḥ [dravyamasya svīkariṣyāmīti ।] tathā brahmacaryasya vitarkaḥ [dāreṣu cāsya garmiṣyāmīti ।] tathaivāparigrahasya vitarkaḥ [parigraheṣu cāsya svāmī bhaviṣyāmīti ॥]
asyetyetat sarvatra hiṁsādiṣu anugamapratipādanārtham । [dravyamasya svīkariṣyāmīti] paradravyasyātmasaṁbandhakaraṇam । [parigraheṣu cāsya svāmīti] parasaṁbandhiṣveva dravyeṣu svayaṁ svāmīti । yathā kumāranarapatisacivādīnām ॥
[itthamunmārgahāriṇā vitarkajvareṇa dīptena bādhyamānastatpratipakṣān bhāvayet ॥]
kathaṁ bhāvayediti ? [ghoreṣu saṁsārāṅgāreṣu pacyamānena mayā । śaraṇamabhyupagataḥ sarvabhūtābhayapradānena yogadharmaḥ । sa khalvahaṁ tyaktvā vitarkān hiṁsādīn punastānādadānastulyaḥ śvavṛtteneti ।] śuna iva vṛttaṁ yasya saḥ śvavṛttaḥ । śvavadvā vṛttaḥ śvavṛttaḥ । tena tulya iti [bhāvayet ।]
yathā śvā vāntāvalehī tathā tyaktasya punarādadāna iti mādi sūtrāntareṣvapi yojyam ॥ 33 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yathā śvā vāntāvalehī tathā tyaktasya punarādānaṁ kurvan] ityupaskāraḥ । tena puruṣeṇa tulyo'hamiti । tathā kathamahaṁ bhaveyaṁ, na yuktametaditi bhāvayet ॥
[ityevamādi sūtrāntare'pi] niyamasūtre'pi [yojyam ।] śaucādīnāṁ pratyekaṁ vitarkī draṣṭavyāḥ śaucaṁ na kariṣyāmītyādayaḥ । bhāṣye tu yamānameva pradarśanam, teṣāmavaśyakartavyatvāt, akaraṇe ca doṣagauravāt, atyādarārtham ॥ 33 ॥
vitarkā hiṁsādayaḥ kṛtakāritānumoditā lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam ॥ 34 ॥

tatra hiṁsā tāvat – kṛtā kāritā'numoditeti tridhā। ekaikā punastridhā lobhena māṁsacarmārthena krodhenāpakṛtamaneneti mohena dharmo me bhaviṣyatīti। lobhakrodhamohāḥ punastrividhā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā iti। evaṁ saptaviṁśatirbhedā bhavanti hiṁsāyāḥ। mṛdumadhyādhimātrāḥ punastridhā - mṛdumṛdurmadhyamṛdustīvramṛduriti। tathā mṛdumadhyo madhyamadhyastīvramadhya iti। tathā mṛdutīvro madhyatīvro'dhimātratīvra iti। evamekāśītibhedā hiṁsā bhavati। sā punarniyamavikalpasamuccayabhedādasaṁkhyeyā, prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṁkhyeyatvāditi। evamanṛtādiṣvapi yojyam।

vivaraṇam
vitarkāṇāṁ svarūpaṁ bhedaḥ prabhavahetuḥ phalaṁ ca sūtreṇaiva pradarśyate – [vitarkā hiṁsādaya] iti svarūpam । [kṛtakāritānumoditā iti bhedaḥ । lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā iti] prabhavahetuḥ । [mṛdumadhyādhimātrā iti] mandamadhyottamadoṣatvam । [duḥkhājñānānantaphalā] iti pratipakṣabhāvanam । phalaṁ vā tenaiva vyākhyāyate ॥
[tatra hiṁsaiva] ekā udāhriyate sarveṣāṁ pradarśanāya । sā [kṛtā kāritā anumoditeti trividhā ।] kṛtā svavyāpāreṇa । kāritā prayojyavyāpāreṇa । anumoditā pareṣāṁ vyāpāreṇa manasā anujñātā ॥
[ekaikā punastridhā ।] katham ? [lobhena, māṁsacarmā(sthi)rthī] mṛgaṁ hinasti । [krodhena, apakṛtamaneneti । mohena, dharmo me bhaviṣyatīti ।] evamete nava bhedāḥ । ekai(tvena)sya punastridhā bhedaḥ । katham ? [lobhakrodhamohāḥ punāstridhā] - [mṛdumadhyādhimātrā] iti । [[ekaikaṁ punaḥ] tridhā bhavati - mṛdumṛdurmadhyamṛdustīvramṛduriti । tathā mṛdumadhyo madhyamadhyastīvramadhya iti । tathā mṛdutīvro madhyatīvrastīvratīvra iti । evaṁ ekāśītibhedā hiṁsā bhavati ॥]
sā ca punaḥ ekāśītibhedā'pi satī [niyogāvikalpasamucayabhedāt] asaṅkhyeyā । yathā niyogabhedaḥ kaścinniyuktaḥ sannanyaṁ niyuṅke ; yathā rājñaḥ । sa cāpi niyuktaḥ param, sa cāpi paramiti । te ca sarve niyuktāḥ samuccayena vikalpena vā hiṁsanti । tathā mūlaniyoktāpi niyojyaiḥ saṁhatya vikalpaya ca hiṁsāmanutiṣṭhatīti । vadhyaghātakādi [prāṇibhedasyāsaṅkhyeyatvāditi । evamanṛtādiṣvapi yojyam ।] kṛtakāritānumoditādi yojyam ॥

te khalvamī vitarkā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam। duḥkhamajñānaṁ cānantaṁ phalaṁ yeṣāmiti pratipakṣabhāvanam। tathā ca hiṁsakastāvatprathamaṁ vadhyasya vīryamākṣipati। tataśca śastrādinipātena duḥkhayati। tato jīvitādapi mocayati। tato vīryākṣepādasya cetanācetanamupakaraṇaṁ kṣīṇavīryaṁ bhavati। duḥkhotpādānnarakatiryakpretādiṣu duḥkhamanubhavati, jīvitavyaparopaṇātpratikṣaṇaṁ ca jīvitātyaye vartamāno maraṇamicchannapi duḥkhavipākasya niyatavipākavedanīyatvātkathaṁcidevocchvasiti। yadi ca kathaṁcitpuṇyāvāpagatā hiṁsā bhavettatra sukhaprāptau bhavedalpāyuriti। evamanṛtādiṣvapi yojyaṁ yathāsaṁbhavam। evaṁ vitarkāṇāṁ cāmumevānugataṁ vipākamaniṣṭaṁ bhāvayanna vitarkeṣu manaḥ praṇidadhīta ॥ 34 ॥

vivaraṇam
[te khalvamī vitarkā duḥkhājñānānantaphalāḥ ।] duḥkhaṁ cājñānaṁ ca duḥkhājñāne, te evānantaṁ [phalaṁ yeṣāṁ] te [duḥkhājñānānantaphalāḥ । duḥkhameṣāmanantaṁ phalam । ajñānaṁ caiṣāmanantaṁ phalam ।] tasmādetān vitarkān manasā'pi nopekṣayediti [pratipakṣaṁ bhāvayet ॥]
tatra hiṁsyasya triprakārā pīḍā pratipādyate tadbhedadvāreṇa phalabhedapradarśanārtham । [tathā ca hiṁsako vadhyasya vīryamākṣipati ।] ghātakarūpāvalokanabhatsainādinā trastasya vīryamākṣipya [śastrādinipātanena duḥkhayati । tato jīvitādapi mocayati ।] prāṇebhyo viyojayati ॥
[tasya vīryākṣepādasya] hiṁsituḥ [cetanācetanaṁ] paśukṣetrādikaṁ [upakaraṇaṁ kṣīṇavīryaṁ bhavati ॥]
śastrādinipātana [duḥkhotpādāt] hiṁsāviśeṣāt [narakatiryakpretādiṣu duḥkhamanubhavati ॥]
tathā [jīvitavyaparopaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṁ ca jīvitātyaye vartamāno] janmamaraṇāntare vartmani pratikṣaṇaṁ [maraṇamicchannapi duḥkhavipākasya niyatavedanīyatvāt] avaśyānubhavitavyatvāt [kathaṁcidevocchvāsiti ॥]
[yadi ca kathaṁcitpuṇyāvagamāt prabhūtapuṇyāvāpagatā] alpīyasī [hiṁsā bhavet, tatra] puṇyabhūmnā [sukhaprāptaḥ] sannapi [bhavedalpāyuḥ] āvāpagatahiṁsādoṣeṇa ॥
[itthamanṛtādiṣvapi yathāsaṁbhavaṁ] hiṁsāyāmuktaṁ [yojyam । evaṁ vitarkāṇāṁ] hiṁsādīnāṁ [chāyāmivānugataṁ vipākamaniṣṭaṁ bhāvayet, na vitarkeṣu manaḥ praṇidadhīta ॥ 34 ॥]
pratipakṣabhāvanāddhetorheyā vitarkā yadā'sya syuraprasavadharmāṇastadā tatkṛtamaiśvaryaṁ yoginaḥ siddhisūcakaṁ bhavati। tadyathā –
ahiṁsāpratiṣṭhāyāṁ tatsannidhā vairatyāgaḥ ॥ 35 ॥
sarvaprāṇināṁ bhavati ॥ 35 ॥

vivaraṇam
[pratipakṣabhāvanāheyā vitarkāḥ yadā ca syuraprasavadharmiṇaḥ] aprasavāśca te dharmiṇaścetya [prasavadharmiṇaḥ ।] yadā yogino manasi notpadyante nikṛtamūlāḥ santaḥ, [tadā tatkṛtaṁ] yamaniyamasthairyekṛtam [aiśvaryaṁ yoginaḥ siddhisūcakam] ahiṁsādiphalasiddhijñāpakaṁ jāyata iti yogasiddhiphalamavasthitameva । anyadapi yogāṅgastutaye aiśvaryamanuṣaṅgajātamucyate । katham ? ekaikasyāpyahiṁsādīnāṁ sthiratvaliṅgamīdṛśaṁ yajñādidharmaphalairapyasamānaṁ pratyakṣata upalabhyate, kimaṅga saṁhatānāṁ yogasiddhikaratvamiti । tadetatpratidarśayati – [tadyathā – ahiṁsāpratiṣṭhāyām] ahiṁsāsthiratve avitarkaprādurbhāve । [tatsannidhau vairatyāgaḥ ।] śāśvatikavidveṣaṇāmapi sarpanakulādīnāṁ tasya ahiṁsakasya sannidhau vairatyāgo bhavati ॥ 35 ॥
satyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ kriyāphalāśrayatvam ॥ 36 ॥
dhārmiko bhūyā iti bhavati dhārmikaḥ, svargaṁ prāpnuhīti svargaṁ prāpnoti। amoghā'sya vāgbhavati ॥ 36 ॥

vivaraṇam
[satyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ] satyasthairye [kriyāphalāśrayatvaṁ] yajñādikriyāphalānāmāgamanaṁ prāptirbhavati । satyavādivākyāditi śeṣaḥ । katham ? adhārmiko'pi [dhārmiko bhūyā] ityukte tadvacanā [ddhārmiko bhavati ।] yathā [dharme'sya ramatāṁ mana] iti devairuktaḥ kuṇḍadhārārādhī brāhmaṇo dhārmiko babhūva । tathā [svargaṁ prāpnuhī] tyuktaḥ [svargaṁ prāpnoti ।] yathā viśvāmitreṇoktaḥ svargaṁ prāpnuhīti triśaṅkuḥ svargaṁ prāpa । kiṁ bahunā । [amoghā'sya vāk bhavati ॥ 36 ॥]
asteyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ sarvaratnopasthānam ॥ 37 ॥
sarvadiksthānyasyopatiṣṭhanti ratnāni ॥ 37 ॥

vivaraṇam
[asteyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ] aspṛhāyām । tataḥ kimasya bhavati ? [ratnopasthānaṁ] bhavati [sarvadiksthānyasyopatiṣṭhante ratnāni ātmānaṁ] darśayanti ॥ 37 ॥
brahmacaryapratiṣṭhāyāṁ vīryalābhaḥ ॥ 38 ॥
yasya lābhādapratighānguṇānutkarṣayati। siddhaśca vineyeṣu jñānamādhātuṁ samartho bhavatīti ॥ 38 ॥

vivaraṇam
[brahmacaryapratiṣṭhāyāṁ vīryalābhaḥ । brahmacaryalābhādapratighān guṇānutkarṣayati ।] apratibandhānātmana upapādayati । sarvaśubhārthapravṛttiṣvapratibaddhavīryo bhavati । na kenacit pratighātena vivadhyata ityarthaḥ ॥
kiñca – [vinayeṣu] śiṣyeṣu yogyeṣu vā sādhuṣu [jñānamādhātuṁ samartho bhavati] yathā bhagavān vyāsaḥ saṁ( [jñaye] )jajñe ॥ 38 ॥
aparigrahasthairye janmakathaṁtāsaṁbodhaḥ ॥ 39 ॥

asya bhavati। ko'hamāsaṁ kathamahamāsaṁ kiṁsvididaṁ kathaṁ svidadaṁ ke vā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kathaṁ vā bhaviṣyāma ityevamasya pūrvāntaparāntamadhyeṣvātmabhāvajijñāsā svarūpeṇopāvartate। etā yamasthairye siddhayaḥ ॥ 39 ॥

vivaraṇam
[aparigrahasthairye janmakathantāsambodhaḥ ।] janmanaḥ kathaṁbhāvabodho'sya [bhavati ।]
[kiṁsvididaṁ] (sama)mama janmanaḥ kiṁ satattvam, [kathaṁ sthididaṁ] kena prakāreṇa svit, [kiṁ bhaviṣyāmaḥ] prāṇo [prāyaṇo]ttarakālaṁ kiṁ vā na bhaviṣyāmaḥ, bhaviṣyanto vā [ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ, kathaṁ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, ityevam asya pūrvāparāntamadhyeṣu] bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamāneṣu [ātmajijñāsā] samyagdarśanasya pūrvarūpaṁ [svarūpeṇopāvartate ।] bāhyaparigrahāsaṅgābhāvāt svātmaviṣayālocanamayatvena pravartate । nānyeṣāṁ parigrahasantāpavitānitatṛṣāṁ yatnenāpi jāyate ॥ 39 ॥
niyameṣu vakṣyāmaḥ –
śaucātsvāṅgajugupsā parairasaṁsargaḥ ॥ 40 ॥

svāṅge jugupsāyāṁ śaucamārabhamāṇaḥ kāyāvadyadarśī kāyānabhiṣvaṅgī yatirbhavati। kiṁ ca parairasaṁsargaḥ kāyasvabhāvāvalokī svamapi kāyaṁ jihāsurmṛjjalādibhirākṣālayannapi kāyaśuddhimapaśyankathaṁ parakāyairatyantamevāprayataiḥ saṁsṛjyeta ॥ 40 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yameṣu siddhaya uktāḥ । idānīṁ niyameṣu vakṣyāmaḥ – śaucāt svāṅgajugupsā parairasaṁsargaḥ । svāṅgajugupsayā śaucamārabhamāṇaḥ kāyāvadyadarśī] śarīragarhyatvadarśī [kāyānabhiṣvaṅgī yatirbhavati । kiñca – parairasaṁsargo] bhavati । [kāyasvabhāvāvalokī svamapi kāyaṁ jihāsurmṛjjalādibhirākṣālayannapi kāyaśuddhimapaśyan kathaṁ parakāyairatyantamevāprayataiḥ saṁsṛjyata iti ॥ 40 ॥]
kiṁ ca –
sattvaśuddhisaumanasyai​kāgryendriyajayātma​darśanayogyatvāni ca ॥ 41 ॥
bhavantīti vākyaśeṣaḥ। śuceḥ sattvaśuddhistataḥ saumanasyaṁ tata aikāgryaṁ tata indriyajayastataścā''tmadarśanayogyatvaṁ buddhisattvasya bhavatītyetacchaucasthairyādadhigamyata iti ॥ 41 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiṁ cā] nyadbhavati । [sattvaśuddhisaumanasyaikāgryendriyajayātmadarśanayogyatvāni cāsya bhavanti ।] pūrvasya pūrvasya sthairyāduttarasyāvirbhāvaḥ । katham ? [śuceḥ] sattvaśuddhiḥ । [tataḥ saumanasyam, tata aikāgryam, tataścendriyajayaḥ, tataścātmadarśanayogyatvaṁ buddhisattvasya bhavatī] tyataḥ [śaucasthairyādādhigamyata etat] sarvam । tataśceyaṁ śaucasiddhireva ॥ 41 ॥
saṁtoṣādanuttamaḥ sukhalābhaḥ ॥ 42 ॥
tathā coktam – yacca kāmasukhaṁ loke yacca divyaṁ mahatsukham। tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṁ kalām ॥ iti ॥ 42 ॥

vivaraṇam
[santoṣādanuttamaḥ sukhalābhaḥ ।] santoṣavitarkānutpattau [anuttamaḥ] na vidyate'smādanya uttamaḥ ।
[tathā coktam – ''yacca kāmasukhaṁ loke,] yaccaihikam । [yacca divyaṁ mahatsukham ।] devādisambandhi । [tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṁ kalām'' ॥ 42 ॥]
kāyendriyasiddhiraśuddhikṣayāttapasaḥ ॥ 43 ॥
nirvartyamānameva tapo hinastyaśuddhyāvaraṇamalaṁ tadāvaraṇamalāpagamātkāyasiddhiraṇimādyā। tathendriyasiddhirdūrācchravaṇadarśanādyeti ॥ 43 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kāyendriyasiddhiraśuddhikṣayāttapasaḥ । nirvartyamānameva tapo hinastyaśuddhyāvaraṇam] kimaṅga nirvartitamityabhi(mānaḥ)prāyaḥ ॥
[tadāvaraṇamalāpagamāt kāyasiddhiraṇimādyā ।] mātāpitrādisaṁbandhajaṁ kāyamalaṁ baijaṁ gārbhaṁ cāhārādijaṁ ca sarvaṁ tapasā nighātayiṣyate । tataścāṇimādikāyasiddhiḥ ॥
tathā viṣayādisamparkajamindriyāṇāmadharmādyāvaraṇaṁ malaṁ tapassnotasvinīsrotasā kṣālyate । [tathā indriyasiddhirdūrācchravaṇādyā ॥ 43 ॥]
svādhyāyādiṣṭadevatāsaṁprayogaḥ ॥ 44 ॥
devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhāśca svādhyāyaśīlasya darśanaṁ gacchanti,kārye cāsya vartanta iti ॥ 44 ॥

vivaraṇam
[svādhyāyādiṣṭadevatāsamprayogaḥ । devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ siddhāśca ya iṣṭāste svādhyāyaśīlasya darśanaṁ gacchanti kāryeṣu cāsya upadeśādiṣu vartante ॥ 44 ॥]
samādhisidvirīśvarapraṇidhānāt ॥ 45 ॥
īśvarārpitasarvabhāvasya samādhisiddhiryayā sarvamīpsitamavitathaṁ jānāti deśāntare dehāntare kālāntare ca। tato'sya prajñā yathābhūtaṁ prajānātīti ॥ 45 ॥

vivaraṇam
[samādhisiddhirīśvarapraṇidhānāt । īśvarārpitasarvabhāvasya samādhiḥ sidhyati । yayā] samādhisiddhyā [sarvamīpsitamavitathaṁ jānāti । tathā deśāntare kālāntare cāsya prajñā yathābhūtaṁ jānāti ॥ 45 ॥]
uktāḥ saha siddhibhiryamaniyamāḥ। āsanādīni vakṣyāmaḥ। tatra –
sthirasukhamāsanam ॥ 46 ॥
tadyathā padmāsanaṁ bhadrāsanaṁ svastikaṁ daṇḍāsanaṁ sopāśrayaṁ paryaṅkaṁ krauñcaniṣadanaṁ hastiniṣadanamuṣṭraniṣadanaṁ samasaṁsthānaṁ sthirasukhaṁ yathāsukhaṁ cetyevamādīni ॥ 46 ॥

vivaraṇam
[uktāḥ saha siddhibhiryamānayamāḥ ।] idānīṁ [āsanādīni vakṣyāmaḥ] - [tatra sthirasukhamāsanam ।] sthiraṁ sukhaṁ cāsanam । yasminnāsane, sthitasya manogātrāṇāmupajāyate sthiratvam, duḥkhaṁ ca yena na bhavati tadabhyasyet । [tadyathā] – śāstrāntaraprasiddhāni nāmāni [padmāsanādīni] pradarśyante ॥
tatra śucau devanilayagiriguhānadīpulinādau jvalanasalilāsamīpe jantuvivarjite nira(ṅga)śmake śuciḥ samyagācamya, parameśvaramakhilabhuvanaikanāthaṁ abhivandyāṁśca yogeśvarānātmagurūśca praṇipatya, cailājinakuśottaramaduḥkhakaraṁ prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā viṣṭaramadhiṣṭhāya, anyatamadeṣāmāsanaṁ nirbadhnīyāt ॥
tatra padmāsanaṁ nāma – savyaṁ pādamupasaṁhṛtya dakṣiṇopari nidadhīta । tathaiva dakṣiṇaṁ savyasyopariṣṭāt । kaṭyurogrīvaṁ ca viṣṭabhya, mṛ(ga)tasuptavannāsikāgranihitadṛṣṭiḥ, samudgakavadapihitoṣṭhasampuṭaḥ, dantairdantāgramaparāmṛśan , muṣṭimātrāntaraviprakṛṣṭācibukorassthalaḥ, rājaddantāntaranihitarasanāgraḥ, hastau pārṣṇyorupari kacchapakaṁ brahmāñjaliṁ vā kṛtvā, sakṛdāsthāpitetthaṁsaṁsthāna:, punaḥ punaḥ śarīrāvayavaśarīravinyāsaviśeṣaparityaktaprayatnaḥ san yenāsīta, tat [padmāsanam ॥]
etacca sarvamanyeṣāmāsanānāmapi tulyam । kaścideva viśeṣaḥ ॥
tathā dakṣiṇaṁ pādaṁ savyasyopari kṛtvā, hastaṁ ca dakṣiṇaṁ savyahastasyopari nidhāya, yenāste, tat [bhadrāsanam] । anyat samānam ॥
tathā kuñcitānyatarapādamavanivinyastāparajānukaṁ [vīrāsanam ।] ucyamāna eva viśeṣaḥ sarvatra ॥
dakṣiṇaṁ pādāṅguṣṭhaṁ savyenorujaṅghena parigṛhyādṛśyaṁ kṛtvā, tathā savyaṁ pādāṅguṣṭhaṁ dakṣiṇenorujaṅghenādṛśyaṁ parigṛhya, yathā ca pārṣiṇibhyāṁ vṛṣaṇayorapīḍanaṁ tathā yenāste, tat [svastikamāsanam ॥]
samagulphau samāṅguṣṭhau prasārayan samajānū pādau daṇḍavadyenopaviśet, tat [daṇḍāsanam ॥]
(na)yogapaṭṭasaṁ[sthaṁ]stambhādyāśrayaṁ vā [sopāśrayam ॥]
ājānuprasāritabāhuśayanaṁ [paryaṅkāsanam ॥]
[krauñcaniṣadanaṁ hastiniṣadanaṁ uṣṭraniṣadanaṁ ca] kauñcādiniṣadanasaṁsthānasādṛśyādeva draṣṭavyam ॥
bhūmau nyastorujaṅghaṁ [samasaṁsthitam ॥]
[sthitaprasrabdhiḥ ।] anyenāpi prakāreṇa svayamutprekṣya [sthitaprasrabdhiḥ ।] anāyāse yena bhavati tadapyāsanaṁ sthita [prasrabdhi] rnāma ॥
[yathāsukhaṁ ca] - yena rūpeṇāsīnasya sukhaṁ bhavati tat [yathāsukham ।] ādiśabdādanyadapi yathācāryopadiṣṭamāsanaṁ draṣṭavyam ॥ 46 ॥
prayatnaśaithilyānantasamāpattibhyām ॥ 47 ॥
bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ। prayatnoparamātsidhyatyāsanaṁ yena nāṅgamejayo bhavati। anante vā samāpannaṁ cittamāsanaṁ nirvartayatīti ॥ 47 ॥

vivaraṇam
tadāsanajayābhyupāya idānīmupapādyata – [prayatnaśaiśilyānantyasamāpattibhyām । bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ ।] āsanaṁ dṛḍhaniṣpannaṁ bhavatītyupaskāraḥ । [prayatnoparamādā] sanabandhottarakālaṁ prayatnākaraṇādvā sidhyati । [yena nāṅgamejayo bhavati । yena] prayatnoparameṇa । prayatnena hyaṅgaṁ kampayati । yena acalitāsano bhavatītyarthaḥ । [anantye vā samāpannam ।] anantaṁ viśvam , anantabhāva anantyam , tasmin samāpannaṁ, vyāpya viśvabhāvaṁ sthitaṁ [cittamāsanaṁ nirvartayati] draḍhayati ॥ 47 ॥
tato dvandvānabhighātaḥ ॥ 48 ॥
śītoṣṇādibhirdvaṁdvairāsanajayānnābhibhūyate ॥ 48 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tato dvandvānabhighātaḥ । tataḥ] āsanasthirībhāvāt । idaṁ dṛṣṭamānuṣāṅgikam । yat [śītoṣṇādibhirdvandvairnābhibhūyeta ॥ 48 ॥]
tasminsati śvāsapraśvāsayorgativicchedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ ॥ 49 ॥
satyāsanajaye bāhyasya vāyorācamanaṁ śvāsaḥ, kauṣṭhyasya vāyorniḥsāraṇaṁ praśvāsaḥ, tayorgativiccheda ubhayābhāvaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ ॥ 49 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiñca] – prāṇāyāmādiyogyatā ca bhavati । katham ? tasmin sati [śvāsapraśvāsayorgativicchedaḥ prāṇāyamaḥ । satyāsane dṛḍhe bāhyasya vāyorācamanaṁ śvāsaḥ ।] yathā santatatvādudakaṁ nālenākṛṣyate, tathā santatatvāt nāsikāpuṭanālābhyāmapānavāyusaṁbandho bahirvāyurākṛṣyate, tadākarṣaṇaṁ śvāsaḥ । tathā [kauṣṭhyavāyorniścāraṇam ।] prāṇavṛttisambandhī hi kauṣṭhyo vāyuḥ । tasya bahirnissāraṇaṁ [praśvāsaḥ । tayorgativicchedaḥ ।] kimuktaṁ bhavatyata āha - [ubhayābhāvaḥ prāṇāyāma iti ॥ 49 ॥]
sa tu –
bāhyābhyantarastambhavṛttirdeśakālasaṁkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭo dīrghasūkṣmaḥ ॥ 50 ॥

yatra praśvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ sa bāhyaḥ। yatra śvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ sa ābhyantaraḥ। tṛtīyaḥ stambhavṛttiryatrobhayābhāvaḥ sakṛtprayatnādbhavati। yathā tapte nyastamupale jalaṁ sarvataḥ saṁkocamāpadyate tathā dvayoryugapadgatyabhāva iti। trayo'pyete deśena paridṛṣṭā iyānasya viṣayo deśa iti। kālena paridṛṣṭāḥ kṣaṇānāmiyattāvadhāraṇenāvacchinnā ityarthaḥ। saṁkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭā etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ prathama uddhātastadvannigṛhītasyaitāvadbhirdvitīya uddhāta evaṁ tṛtīyaḥ। evaṁ mṛdurevaṁ madhya evaṁ tīvra iti saṁkhyāparidṛṣṭaḥ। sa khalvayamevamabhyasto dīrghasūkṣmaḥ ॥ 50 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sa tu] trividhaḥ [bāhyābhyantarastambhavṛttirdeśakālasaṁkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭo dīrghasūkṣmaḥ ।] sa bāhyavṛttirabhyantaravṛttiḥ stambhavṛttiśca । [yatra śvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ sa bāhyavṛttiḥ ।] bāhyasya vāyorantaḥ praveśanaṁ prati vṛttiḥ yasya sa bāhyavṛttiḥ । tasmāt sa [bāhyaḥ ।] bāhyamanye pūraka ityācakṣate ॥
[yatra praśvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ sa ābhyantaravṛttiḥ ।] ābhyantarasya vāyorbahirnissāraṇaṁ prati vṛttiryasya sa abhyantaravṛttiḥ । [tasmāt sa ābhyantaraḥ ।] taṁ recaka ityācakṣate ॥
[tṛtīyastu stambhavṛttiḥ । tatrobhayābhāvaḥ] ācamananiścāraṇayorabhāvaḥ sa tu [sakṛtprayatnāt prabhavati । yathā tapte nyastaṁ upale jalaṁ sarvataḥ saṁkocamāpadyate, tathā] sakṛtprayatnāt prāṇadivṛttayaḥ saṁkocamupayāntītyāha - [dvayoryugapat gatyabhāva iti ॥]
[trayo'pyate deśena paridṛṣṭhāḥ iyānasya deśa iti ।] yathā bahirvṛtterantarācamyamānasya nāsikāgraprabhṛtyapādāṅguṣṭhaṁ deśavyāptiḥ । evamantarvṛtterbahirniścāryamāṇasya vāyoḥ pādāṅguṣṭhaprabhṛtyanāsikāgraṁ deśavyāptiḥ । stambhavṛtterāmastakāpādatalavyāptiḥ । athavā bahirapi vitastyādikrameṇa deśavyāptirastyeva ॥
[kālena paridṛṣṭāḥ, kṣaṇānāmiyattāvadhāraṇena] iyantaḥ kṣaṇāḥ prāṇāyāmenātivāhitā iti ॥
[tathā saṅkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭāḥ, etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ] atītaiḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ [prathama udghātaḥ ।] yathā nirodhakṣubhitānāṁ vāyūnāṁ sakṛt mūrdhānamuddhatya nivṛttiḥ prathama uddhātaḥ । [sa eva mṛduḥ ॥]
punaśca sakṛduddhata [nigṛhītasya vāyoḥ tāvadbhiḥ] praśvāsairatītaiḥ paridṛṣṭo [dvitīya uddhātaḥ] prāṇāyāmo [madhyama] ityucyate ॥
tathā [tṛtīyaḥ,] etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ [tṛtīya udghātaḥ ।] sa eva ca triruddhātaḥ [tīvra] iti ॥
[sa khalvayamevaṁ] deśakālasaṅkhyāparidṛṣṭo'bhyasto dīrghakālavyāpī bhavati bhūmijayāt । tathā carṣīṇāmanekavarṣavyāpī śrūyate । tataśva [dīrghaḥ ॥]
tathā vāyūnāṁ dīrghatvamandatvāpatteḥ [sūkṣmaṁ] ca bhavati ॥ 50 ॥
bāhyābhyantaraviṣayākṣepī caturthaḥ ॥ 51 ॥

deśakālasaṁkhyābhirbāhyaviṣayaparidṛṣṭa ākṣiptaḥ। tathā''bhyantaraviṣayaparidṛṣṭa ākṣiptaḥ। ubhayathā dīrghasūkṣmaḥ। tatpūrvako bhūmijayātkrameṇobhayorgatyabhāvaścaturthaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ। tṛtīyastu viṣayānālocito gatyabhāvaḥ sakṛdārabdha eva deśakālasaṁkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭo dīrghasūkṣmaḥ। caturthastu śvāsapraśvāsayorviṣayāvadhāraṇātkrameṇa bhūmijayādubhayākṣepapūrvako gatyabhāvaścaturthaḥ prāṇāyāma ityayaṁ viśeṣa iti ॥ 51 ॥

vivaraṇam
[bāhyābhyantaraviṣayākṣepī caturthaḥ] – bāhyasya viṣayāḥ pādāṅguṣṭhādayaḥ । bāhyo hi vāyurācamyamāno'ntardeśān vyāpnoti, ākṣipati । ābhyantarasya viṣayā bhūmyādayaḥ । sa ca bahirniścāryamāṇe bhūmyādīn deśakālasaṅkhyāparidṛṣṭān vyāpnoti, ākṣipati । [sa bāhyābhyantaraviṣayākṣepī caturthaḥ] prāṇāyāmaḥ ॥
[deśakālasaṅkhyābhirbāhyavastuviṣayaḥ paridṛṣṭa ākṣipto] vyāptaḥ । [tathā ābhyantaraviṣayaḥ paridṛṣṭo] deśakālasaṅkhyābhiḥ ākṣipto vyāptaḥ । [ubhayathā dīrghasūkṣmaḥ ।] bāhyābhyantaraviṣayākṣepeṇobhayathā dīrghasūkṣmatvāpannaḥ ॥
kimuktaṁ bhavatītyāha - [tatpūrvakaḥ] ubhayaviṣayākṣepapūrvakaḥ । [bhūmijayāt] ubhayavṛttivāyubhūmijaya [krameṇobhayoḥ] prāṇāpānavṛttyorbāhyābhyantarayoḥ gatyabhāvaścaturtheḥ ॥
tṛtīyacaturthayorubhayavṛttisāmānyādaviśeṣatvamāśaṅkyāha – [tṛtīyastadviṣayānālocitaḥ sakṛdārabdha eva] gatyabhāvo [deśakālasaṅkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭo dīrghasūkṣmaḥ । caturthastu śvāsapraśvāsayoḥ] ātamitoḥ [viṣayāvadhāraṇāt krameṇa vā yadvṛttibhūmijayakrameṇobhayākṣepapūrvako gatyabhāvaścaturthaḥ prāṇāyāma ityayaṁ viśeṣaḥ tṛtīyacaturthayoḥ ॥ 51 ॥]
tataḥ kṣīyate prakāśāvaraṇam ॥ 52 ॥

prāṇāyāmānabhyasyato'sya yoginaḥ kṣīyate vivekajñānāvaraṇīyaṁ karma। yattadācakṣate – mahāmohamayenendrajālena prakāśaśīlaṁ sattvamāvṛtya tadevākārye niyuṅkta iti। tadasya prakāśāvaraṇaṁ karma saṁsāranibandhanaṁ prāṇāyāmābhyāsāddurbalaṁ bhavati pratikṣaṇaṁ ca kṣīyate। tathā coktam – “tapo na paraṁ prāṇāyāmāttato viśuddhirmalānāṁ dīptiśca jñānasya” iti ॥ 52 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tataḥ kṣīyate prakāśāvaraṇam ।] prakāśa āvriyate yena tat prakāśāvaraṇaṁ karma । [prāṇāyāmānabhyasyato yogino] vivekajñānamāvriyate yena tat [vivekajñānāvaraṇīyaṁ karma । yattu ācakṣate] śāstrāntare [‘mahāmohamayenendrajālena prakāśaśīlaṁ satvamāvṛtya tadevākārye viniyuṅkte”] iti ॥
yadāvriyate viparyayajñānamahendrajālena tadeva satvamāvaraṇakarmaṇā sarvākārye viniyujyate । [tat prāṇāyāmābhyāsādasya prakāśāvaraṇaṁ karma saṁsāranibandhanaṁ durbalaṁ bhavati ।] na kevalaṁ durbalabhāva eva, [pratikṣaṇaṁ ca kṣīyate ॥]
tathā coktam – [‘na paraṁ prāṇāyāmāttapaḥ’] iti । tasmāt [tataḥ prāṇāyāmāt] rajastamaḥkāryāṇāṁ [viśuddhirmalānāṁ, dīptiśca jñānasyeti ॥ 52 ॥]
kiṁ ca –
dhāraṇāsu ca yogyatā manasaḥ ॥ 53 ॥
prāṇāyāmābhyāsādeva। pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vā prāṇasya iti vacanāt ॥ 53 ॥

vivaraṇam
kiṁ ca – bhavatyanyadapi prāṇāyāmābhyāsāt । [dhāraṇāsu] vakṣyamāṇāsu [yogyatā manasaḥ prāṇāyāmādeva । 'pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vā prāṇasya’ iti vacanāt] tābhyāṁ hi manasaḥ sthitisampattiruktā ॥ 53 ॥
atha kaḥ pratyāhāraḥ –
svaviṣayāsaṁprayoge citasvarūpānukāra ivendriyāṇāṁ pratyāhāraḥ ॥ 54 ॥

svaviṣayasaṁprayogābhāve cittasvarūpānukāra iveti, cittanirodhe cittavanniruddhānīndriyāṇi netarendriyajayavadupāyāntaramapekṣante। yathā madhukararājaṁ makṣikā utpatantamanūtpatanti niviśamānamanu niviśante tathendriyāṇi cittanirodhe nītyeṣa pratyāhāraḥ ॥ 54 ॥

vivaraṇam
[atha kaḥ pratyāhāraḥ ?] pratyāhāraviśeṣamabhidhitsamānaḥ praśnenopakramate । svaviṣayādindriyāṇāṁ pratyāharaṇamātraṁ pareṣāṁ pratyāhāraḥ । atra punarviśeṣavānucyate [svaviṣayāsamprayoge cittasya svarūpānukāra ivendriyāṇāṁ pratyāhāra iti ॥]
[svaiḥ svaiśśabdādibhirviṣayaiḥ] indriyāṇāṁ śrotrādīnāṁ [saṁyogābhāve] viṣayadoṣadarśanāt dhyāyināṁ svaviṣayāt nivartitānāṁ [cittasvarūpānukārateva ।] yoginaścittaṁ yadākāratāṁ bhajata tat cittasvarūpānukārateveti ॥
etaduktaṁ bhavati – [cittanirodhe cittavanniruddhāni nopāyāntaramapekṣante] jayārtham । cittanirodhādeva tāni nirudhyante । [yathā madhukararājānam] śrutyakṣarametat । madhukararājāmityarthaḥ । [makṣikā utpatantamanūtpatanti, niviśamānamanu niviśante । tathaivendriyāṇi cittanirodhe niruddhānītyeṣa pratyāhāraḥ ॥ 54 ॥]
tataḥ paramā vaśyatendriyāṇām ॥ 55 ॥

śabdādiṣvavyasanamindriyajaya iti kecit। saktirvyasanaṁ vyasyatyenaṁ śreyasa iti। aviruddhā pratipattirnyāyyā। śabdādisaṁprayogaḥ svecchayetyanye। rāgadveṣābhāve sukhaduḥkhaśūnyaṁ śabdādijñānamindriyajaya iti kecit। cittaikāgryādapratipattireveti jaigīṣavyaḥ। tataśca paramā tviyaṁ vaśyatā yaccittanirodhe niruddhānīndriyāṇi netarendriyajayavatprayatnakṛtamupāyāntaramapekṣante yogina iti ॥ 55 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tataḥ] pratyāhārasthairyāt [paramā vaśyatendriyāṇāṁ] bhavati । [iti] śabdaḥ samāpyarthaḥ । yāsāṁ ca vaśyatānāṁ madhye pratyāhārasthairthāt paramā vaśyatā jāyate tā ucyante - [śabdādiṣvindriyajayaḥ avyasanaṁ] punaḥ punarapravṛttiranāsaktirveti [kecidāhuḥ ।] vyasanamiti nirbravīti – [saktirvyasanam ।] katham ? [vyasyati] kṣipati [enaṁ] pratipattāraṁ [śreyasaḥ] sakāśāditi vyasanam ॥
[aviruddhā pratipattirvā ।] viruddhānāṁ vā śabdādīnāmapratipattirvaśyateti । tasyaiva vyākhyānaṁ – [nyāyyaḥ] śāstrānujñātaḥ [śabdādiṣu saṁyogaḥ svecchayā ।] teṣvaviruddheṣu yadīcchati pravartate na vā itye [vamanye manvate ॥]
[rāgadveṣābhāve sukhaduḥkhaśūnyaṁ] heyopādeyatvavarjitaṁ [śabdādijñānaṁ] vaśyatetyeke । madhyamāyāṁ tu rāgadveṣasadbhāvamātramapi na vāryata iti viśeṣaḥ ॥
svābhipretā ākhyāyate – [aikāgryāt] cittaikāgratvānuvidhānādindriyāṇāṁ [apratipattireva] śabdādīnāmiti [jaigīṣavyo manyate ॥]
[paramā tviyaṁ] sarvāsāmuktānāmiyaṁ paramā [vaśyatendriyāṇāṁ, yat] yasmin [cittaniruddhānīndriyāṇi na itarendriyajayavat] pūrvoktāsvindriyavaśyatāsu [upāyāntaramapekṣante] jayārthaṁ, asyāṁ [punarna prayatnakṛtamupāyāntaramapekṣante yoginaḥ ॥ 55 ॥]
vibhūtipādaḥ
uktāni pañca bahiraṅgāni sādhanāni। dhāraṇāvaktavyā –
deśabandhaścittasya dhāraṇā ॥ 1 ॥
nābhicakre hṛdayapuṇḍarīke mūrdhni jyotiṣi nāsikāgre jihvāgra ityevamādiṣu deśeṣu bāhye vā viṣaye cittasya vṛttimātreṇa bandha iti dhāraṇā ॥ 1 ॥

vivaraṇam
[uktāni pañca bahiraṅgāni sādhanāni] samprajñātasya yogasya । adhunā antaraṅgaṁ dhāraṇādhyānasamādhisamākhyaṁ sādhanatrayaṁ tasyaivābhidhīyate । bahiraṅgāntaraṅgatvabhedādeva hi bahiraṅgasādhanavyākhyānenaiva pādaḥ parisamāpitaḥ । saṁhatyakāritvācca sādhanatrayasya pṛthagvacanam । bahiraṅgasādhanābhidhānānantaraparyupasthāpitāntaraṅgasādhanapratipādanena pādasambandho vyākhyātaḥ । asmiṁśca pāde vibhūtayaḥ prādhānyena pradarśyanta iti ca pṛthak(ktvādā)pādārambhaḥ । etadeva hi samākhyālābhe kāraṇamavādiṣma ॥
[dhāraṇā vaktavyā ।] pratyāhārānantaraṁ kramopanītasānnidhānā dhāraṇā abhidhānīyā । [deśabandhacittasya dhāraṇā ।] deśabandhanaṁ [deśabandhaḥ ।] kasya ? [cittasya ॥]
svayameva ca sarvaṁ vyācaṣṭe – [nābhicakre] nābhipradeśaścakramiva । sarve (vāyava)avayavāstatra cakrībhūtā iti nābhicakram । [hṛdayaṁ puṇḍarīkākāram । mūrdhajyotiṣi ।] mūrdhanāḍīdvāraṁ prabhāsvaratvājyotirityākhyāyate । [nāsikāgre jihvāgre ityevamādiṣu deśeṣu bāhyeṣu ca viṣayeṣu] candrādityādiṣu cittaṁ badhyate ॥
tasya [cittasya] ityevamadiṣvapracalitarūpeṇa yā [vṛttiḥ] sādhāraṇetyucyate । [vṛttimātreṇeti ।] taddeśapratyayamātreṇa vikṣepaśūnyatayā vartata iti ॥ 1 ॥
tatra pratyayaikatānatā dhyānam ॥ 2 ॥
tasmindeśe dhyeyālambanasya pratyayasyaikatānatā sadṛśaḥ pravāhaḥ prattyayāntareṇāparāmṛṣṭo dhyānam ॥ 2 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra pratyayaikatānatā dhyānam । tasmin deśe] dhāraṇāvṛttiviṣaye nābhicakrādau । [dhyeyālambanasya] dhyeyo deśādiḥ, tadālambanasya । [pratyayasya [ekatānatā] sadṛśapravāhaḥ,] tulyapratyayānāṁ pravāha ekākāraḥ pratyayasantānaḥ [pratyayāntareṇa] vijātīyena [aparāmṛṣṭaḥ] anvakīrṇaḥ । tat [dhyānam ॥]
dhāraṇā tu tasminneva dhyeye tadavasthasyaiva cittasya tadviṣayavikalpitaiḥ pratyayāntaraiḥ parāmṛṣṭā'pi । yathā sūrye dhāryamāṇasya tadgataparimaṇḍalatīvrataradīdhititvādipratyayeṣvapi dhāraṇaiva । vṛttimātreṇa tatraiva vartamānatvāccittasya । dhyānaṁ punaḥ na tu tathā । bhinnajātīyapratyayāntarāparāmṛṣṭaikapratyayapravāha eva hi dhyānam ॥ 2 ॥
tadevārthamātranirbhāsaṁ svarūpaśūnyamiva samādhiḥ ॥ 3 ॥
dhyānameva dhyeyākāranirbhāsaṁ pratyayātmakena svarūpeṇa śūnyamiva yadā bhavati dhyeyasvabhāvāveśāttadā samādhirityucyate ॥ 3 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadevāthaimātranirbhāsaṁ svarūpaśūnyamiva samādhiḥ । tadeva dhyānaṁ] tulyapratyaya pravāharūpaṁ svāmekapratyayasantānatāmiva hitvā [dhyeyākāranirbhāsaṁ] dhyeyākāravadavabhāsate । [pratyayātmakena] svena grahaṇātmanā [svarūpeṇa śūnyamiva ।] yathā sphaṭikadravyamupadhānāvabhāsaṁ svarūpaśūnyamiva । [yadā bhavati dhyeyasvabhāvāveśāt] kāraṇāt cittasya, [tadā] tadeva dhyānaṁ [samādhirityucyate ॥]
nanu ca yogaḥ samādhirityaṅgī pūrvamuktaḥ । ihāṅgo yogasya samādhirityākhyāyate । kaḥ punaratrāṅgāṅginorbheda iti ? ucyate – yogaḥ samādhiriti cittasthitiviśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ । iha tu pratyayasantānasyaiva dhyeyasvabhāvāveśāt dhyeyākāratvamaṅgamiti viśeṣaḥ ॥ 3 ॥
trayamekatra saṁyamaḥ ॥ 4 ॥
tadetaddhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayamekatra saṁyama। ekaviṣayāṇi trīṇi sādhanāni saṁyama ityucyate। tadasya trayasya tāntrikī paribhāṣā saṁyama iti ॥ 4 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadetaddhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayaṁ] yadvyākhyātaṁ tat [ekatra] ekasmin deśe pariniṣpannaṁ sat [saṁyama] ityuvyate । tadāha – [ekaviṣayāṇi trīṇi sādhanāni saṁyama ityucte । tadasya trayasya] itthaṁkrameṇābhiniṣpannasya [tāntrikī] tantraprayojanā [paribhāṣā ।] jijñāsitārthasākṣādapādanāya yatra yatra saṁyamaḥ śrūyate jetavyajayāya vā, , tatra tatra trayametat praveditavyamityevamarthametasya trayetyāsmin śāstre paribhāṣeyaṁ [saṁyama] iti ॥
vakṣyati ca - ’ [pariṇāmatrayasaṁyamādatītānāgatajñānam ‘, ‘sthūlasvarūpasūkṣmānvayārthavattvasaṁyamādbhūtajayaḥ’ iti ca ॥ 4 ॥]
tajjayātprajñālokaḥ ॥ 5 ॥
tasya saṁyamasya jayātsasamādhiprajñāyā bhavatyāloko yathā yathā saṁyamaḥ sthirapado bhavati tathā tathā samādhiprajñā viśāradī bhavati ॥ 5 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tajjayāt prajñā''lokaḥ । tasya saṁyamasya jayāt] sthiratvāpādanāt abhīpsitārthābhivyañjanasamarthaḥ pradīpālokadeśīyaḥ [samādhiprajñāyā bhavatyālokaḥ ।]
[yathā yathā saṁyamaḥ sthirapado bhavati, tathā tathā samādhiprajñā sthirapadī bhavati ।] yena samādhiprajñā''lekena vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādivastunirbhāsanasamarthena yoginaḥ karatalakalitamivābhimatamarthamavalokayanti ॥ 5 ॥
tasya bhūmiṣu viniyogaḥ ॥ 6 ॥

tasya saṁyamasya jitabhūmeryā'nantarā bhūmistatra viniyogaḥ। na hyajitādharabhūmiranantarabhūmiṁ vilaṅghyaprāntabhūmiṣu saṁyamaṁ labhate। tadabhāvācca kutastasya prajñālokaḥ। īśvaraprasādājjitottarabhūmikasya ca nādharabhūmiṣu paracittajñānādiṣu saṁyamo yuktaḥ। kasmāt, tadarthasyānyata evāvagatatvāt। bhūmerasyā iyamanantarā bhūmirityatra yoga evopādhyāyaḥ। katham। evaṁ hyuktam – yogena yogo jñātavyo yogo yogātpravartate। yo'pramattastu yogena sa yoge ramate ciram ॥ iti ॥ 6 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tasya bhūmiṣu viniyogaḥ । tasya saṁyamasya bhūmiṣu] bāhyādhyātmikeṣu dhyānālambanabhūtāsu vakṣyamāṇāsu pariṇāmatrayādiṣu [viniyogaḥ] prayegaḥ kartavyaḥ । ।
tadbhūmijayasākṣātprayojanārthinā [tasya saṁyamasya, jitabhūmeḥ] jitāyā bhūmeḥ, yatra bhūmai yoginaḥ saṁyatāyāṁ saṁyamo labdhaḥ, tasyā jitāyā bhūmeḥ [anantarā yā bhūmistatra] saṁyamasya pūrvabhūmijayānantaraṁ [viniyogaḥ] karaṇīyaḥ । ।
tadyathā – pṛthivyādīnāṁ sthūlasvarūpasūkṣamānvayārthavattvabhūmiṣu krameṇa jetavyāsu , sthūlāyāṁ bhūmau saṁyamaṁ kṛtvā, tajayānantaraṁ svarūpa evānantare saṁyamo viniyojanīyaḥ ’ । nānantaraṁ svarūpaṁ vyatilaṅghaya sūkṣmādibhūmiṣu saṁvidadhīta ॥
kasmādevam ? [na hyajitādharabhūmiranantarāṁ bhūmiṁ vilaṅghaya prāntabhūmiṣu] uparitanīṣu bhūmiṣu [saṁyamaṁ labhate ॥]
yadi cānantarāṁ bhūmimajitvā prāntabhūmiṣu saṁyamaṁ viniyuṅkṣeta, tameva saṁyamaṁ na labhate । tataśca tadalābha eva doṣaḥ । [tadalābhācca] saṁyamābhāvācca [kutastatra] seyamaviṣaye prāntabhūmāvityarthaḥ । [prajñā''lokaḥ ।] nimittābhāvāt । na hyasati tailavartijvalanābhisannipāte pradīpālokaḥ ॥
[jitottarabhūmikasya] jitottarātmādibhūmikasya yoginaḥ [nādharabhūmiṣu paracittajñānādiṣu saṁyamo yuktaḥ । kasmāt? tadarthasya] ātmādeḥ uttarabhūmerapakṛṣṭaparacitajñānādibhūmivaiparītyena [anyathaivādhigatatvāt ।] paracittajñānādibhiḥ saṁkīrṇaṁ asamadhigatavivekātmakatvāt । tatra hi jitottarabhūmiseyamasya parakīyacitālambanatve sekīrṇacittākāratā yogicittasyāpi syāditi na yuktaḥ । tatrātmāderathaisyānyathaiva viviktatayā'dhigatatvāt ॥
anyeṣāṁ vyākhyānam – [arthasya] paracittajñānādeḥ । [anyathaivādhigatatvāt] ātmādyuttarabhūmisamadhigamanenaiva adharaparacittajñānādibhūmerarthasya adhigatatvāt iti ॥
asmin pakṣe ‘adharabhūmiṣu saṁyamo'narthaka' iti vaditavyamabhaviṣyat, na *na yuktaḥ' iti । ‘na yukta' ityetadasamīcīnamiva dṛśyate ॥
[bhūmerasyā iyamanantarā bhūmiḥ] iyamanantaraṁ jayanīyeti kathamavabhotsyata ityāha – [tatra yoga evopādhyāya । yogaḥ] pūrvabhūmau saṁyamalābhaḥ । tenaivānantaryamavagamyate ।
[katham ? evaṁ hyuktam – yogena yogo jñātavyaḥ ।] pūrvasaṁyamalābhena yogena anantaro yogaviṣayaḥ prajñānīyaḥ । sa ca [yogaḥ saṁyamaḥ, yogāt] eva pūrvasaṁyamalābādeva [pravartate] vivicyate ॥
yathaiva januṣā andhakasya sopānapaṅktatimārurukṣataḥ prathamasopānapratilabdhapadapadasparśapratyayenānantarasopānajñānamupaploṣyate [tathā yogo yogāt pravartate ॥]
yata evaṁ tasmāt sa itthaṁ jānan [apramattastu] yogī [yogena] yuktaḥ san [yogeṣu] yogaiśvaryaphaleṣu [ramate, ciram iti ॥ 6 ॥]
trayamantaraṅgaṁ pūrvebhyaḥ ॥ 7 ॥
tadetaddhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayamantaraṅgaṁ saṁprajñātasya samādheḥ pūrvebhyo yamādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ sādhanebhya iti ॥ 7 ॥

vivaraṇam
[trayamantaraṅgaṁ pūrvebhyaḥ । dhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayam antaraṅgaṁ pūrvebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ sādhanebhyaḥ yamādibhyaḥ samprajñātasya] yogasya । tatrāntaraṅgagrahaṇaṁ pūrvasādhanāsampattāvapyatra traye ādaraḥ karaṇīya ityevamartham ॥
vināpi hi yamādisādhanapañcatayasampādanena janmāntaravihitasaṁskārāveśavaśādeva videhaprakṛtilayānāmiva dhāraṇāditrayasampatyā yoga upakalpyate । dhāraṇāditrayeṇa vinā na yogaḥ saṁbhavati kasyacit । tabdyāpāranairantarya saṁvādātmakatvāṅddhāraṇāditrayasya । yogasya cittasampattirūpatvāt ॥
yadā tu jñānavairāgyasampatiḥ, tadā na kiṁcidanyaddhāraṇādyapyapekṣyate । tathā ca maṅkipiṅgalāprabhṛtīnāmanuśrūyate vairāgyādeva samastasiddhiḥ । tathā coktam – [‘sthānāsanavidhānāni ‘] iti pūrvatra ślokadvayam ॥ 7 ॥
tadapi bahiraṅgaṁ nirbījasya ॥ 8 ॥
tadapyantaraṅgaṁ sādhanatrayaṁ nirbījasya yogasya bahiraṅgaṁ bhavati। kasmāt, tadabhāve bhāvāditi ॥ 8 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadapi bahiraṅgaṁ nirbījasya । tadapi etat antaraṅgamapi] sabījasya yogasya, [bahiraṅgaṁ bhavati nirbījasya yogasya । kasmāt ? tadabhāve bhāvāt ।] tasya sabījāntaraṅgasādhanatrayasyābhāve'pi puruṣasattvaviśeṣāpekṣayā nirbījayogasya bhāvāt bahiraṅgatvam ॥
