yasya punaratītamanāgataṁ ca lakṣaṇaṁ svarūpeṇa nāsti, tasya dharmāṇāmadhvabhedo na prāpnoti । katham ? na hi tasya ghaṭo bhaviṣyannatīto vā vidyate । na hi kapālāni piṇḍo vā ghaṭaḥ । ityekasya vartamānasyaivādhvanaḥ. samaye trayāṇāmadhvanāṁ dharmatvena samāgamaḥ syāt । ataśca vartamāna eva ghaṭo'tīto'nāgata iti cocyeta piṇḍakapālayoraghaṭatvāt mṛdi ca ghaṭasyābhāvādbhaviṣyati ghaṭo'tīto ghaṭa iti ca piṇḍakapāle nirucyeyātām । tathā ca vivakṣato gairapyaśva iti syādadho'pi gai.auriti ॥
athocyeta, ghaṭasya pragabhāvapradhvaṁsābhāvāvatītānāgatatvenābhidhīyete iti । tato'pyeṣa pāpīyānabhyupagamaḥ । tatra yuktamapi gauraśva iti vastutvādetayoḥ । na tviha vastuvācinā śabdena ghaṭo'tīto'nāgata iti cābhāvasyābhidhānaṁ yujyate sa[tya]tvavādinām ॥
nāpi niyama upapadyate । ghaṭenaiva vyapadiśyate, ghaṭo'tīto ghaṭe bhaviṣyatīti ca । na punaḥ kulālādibhirapadiśyate kulālādayo'tītā bhaviṣyanti veti ॥
atha ghaṭasyaiva tatrānupalabhyamānatvāditi cet-na-hastiśārdūlādīnāmapi tatrānupalambhe vyapadeśaprasaṅgāt । athopalabdhapūrvasyaiva vyapadeśa iti cet-na- ghaṭakriyādiṣvapi prasaṅgāt ॥
atha ghaṭasya tena kriyādyabhāva iti cet-na-abhāvasya sambandhaviśeṣānupapatteḥ । na hi samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ prāptilakṣaṇo vā sambandho bhāvābhāvayoravakalpate । yenāsau ghaṭasya abhāvo na punaḥ kriyādīnām । anyatarasambandhe ca abhāvasya vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ । atha vastveveti cet, siddhastarhi bhaviṣyannatītaśca padārthaḥ ॥
athopacārāt siddhakapālāvasthā avayavā bhaviṣyati ghaṭo bhūto ghaṭa iti cāpadiśyeran sambandhāt, tadyathā-annaṁ prāṇā iti, atrāpi yathā kulālacakradaṇḍasūtrādiṣu ghaṭo nāsti, tathā piṇḍakapāleṣvapīti tadabhāvaviśeṣe ca kapāleṣu ghaṭe'tīta iti vyapadeśo na kulālādiṣviti niyamānupapattiḥ ॥
na cāpi vidyamānānāṁ sādhanānāṁ ghaṭādiniṣpādināmapyavidyamānairutpādyairghaṭādibhiḥ sambandha upapadyate । na cāsati sambandhe ghaṭotpādanābhiprāyeṇa kārakapravṛttiḥ ॥
athāyutasiddhaḥ samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho janyānāṁ kāraṇānāṁ ca na pratiṣidhyata iti cet-na-yutasiddhāyutasiddhatvasya samānakālabhāvināṁ vastūnāṁ darśanāt । na bhāvābhāvayoḥ kvacidapi yutasiddhatvamayutāsiddhatvaṁ vā dṛśyate ॥
tasmājjanyajanakānāmapi sambandhābhyupagamādvidyamānatvameveti, utpatteḥ prāgūrdhvaṁ ca vidyate kāryam, vastvantarasambandhāt, prasiddhaghaṭādivat । upalapsyamānatvādupalabdhatvācca, apavarakasthaghaṭadivat । uddiśya kartrā prāpyatvāt, deśāntaravat । tathā kartṛvyāpāraprāpyatvācceti ॥
kiṁ ca, na laukikā atītānāgataśabdābhyāṁ gaganakamalinavidavidyamānamarthaṁ pratiyanti pratipādayanti vā । tasmādatītamanāgataṁ ca svarūpato vidyata eva । [nābhūtvā bhāvastrayāṇāmadhvanām ।] kiṁ tarhi ? vidyamānānāmevābhivyaktiḥ ॥
tasmādvyaktirūpeṇa vāsanānāmatyantāvinivṛttiḥ । guṇarūpeṇa tu satīnāmapi kāryāsamarthatvānna kaivalyābhāvadoṣaḥ । nāpi siddhāntavirodhaḥ ॥ 12 ॥
te vyaktasūkṣmā guṇātmānaḥ ॥ 13 ॥

te khalvamī tryadhvāno dharmā vartamānā vyaktātmāno'tītānāgatāḥ sūkṣmātmānaḥ ṣaḍviśeṣarūpāḥ। sarvamidaṁ guṇānāṁ saṁniveśaviśeṣamātramiti paramārthato guṇātmānaḥ। tathā ca śāstrānuśāsanam – guṇānāṁ paramaṁ rūpaṁ na dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati। yattu dṛṣṭipathaṁ prāptaṁ tanmāyeva sutucchakam ॥ iti ॥ 13 ॥

vivaraṇam
atītānāgatavartamānadharmā: kena punā rūpeṇa santīti tatpratipādanārthamāha- [te vyaktasūkṣmā guṇātmānaḥ । te khalvamī tryadhvānaḥ] atītānāgatavartamānādhvatrayopārūḍhāḥ [dharmāḥ vartamānāḥ] vartamānalakṣaṇopārūḍhāḥ [vyaktātmānaḥ] lokapratyayaviṣayībhūtasvabhāvāḥ । [atītānāgatāḥ sūkṣmātmānaḥ] lokapratyayaviṣayabhāvamaprāptāḥ [ṣaḍaviśeṣasvarūpāḥ] asmitādisvabhāvāḥ । tataśca vyaktātmānaḥ ṣoḍaśavikārāḥ kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇāḥ ॥
[sarvamidam] adhyātmikaṁ kāryakāraṇarūpaṁ vyaktātmakaṁ, yacca sūkṣmamaviśeṣalakṣaṇamasmitādi, yacca liṅgamātraṁ sūkṣmatvāviśeṣat, [sarvamidaṁ] jagat [guṇānāṁ] sattvarajastamasāṁ prakhyāpravṛttisthitiśīlānāṁ [sanniveśaviśeṣamātramiti paramārthato guṇātmānaḥ] guṇasvabhāvāḥ ॥
[tathā ca śāstrānuśāsanam-guṇānāṁ paramaṁ rūpaṁ] svaṁ paramārtharūpamanapāyopajanātmakamekaikasya । tacca na [dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati ।] na dṛṣṭigocarībhavati । [yatu dṛṣṭipathaṁ prāptaṁ] guṇāparimardena viṣamabhāvakṛtasanniveśalakṣaṇaṁ, [tanmāyeva] na tu māyaiva, asāratvāttu māyāvaditi । [sutucchakam] atyalpamakadaśamātrapariṇāmatvāt sāmyāvasthānāṁ guṇānām ॥ 13 ॥
yadā tu sarve guṇāḥ kathamekaḥ śabda ekamindriyamiti –
pariṇāmaikatvādvastutattvam ॥ 14 ॥

prakhyākriyāsthitiśīlānāṁ guṇānāṁ grahaṇātmakānāṁ karaṇabhāvenaikaḥ pariṇāmaḥ śrotramindriyaṁ, grāhyātmakānāṁ śabdatanmātrabhāvenaikaḥ pariṇāmaḥ śabdo viṣaya iti, śabdādīnāṁ mūrtisamānajātīyānāmekaḥ pariṇāmaḥ pṛthivīparamāṇustanmātrāvayavasteṣāṁ caikaḥ pariṇāmaḥ pṛthivī gaurvṛkṣaḥ parvata ityevamādirbhūtāntareṣvapi snehauṣṇyapraṇāmitvāvakāśadānānyupādāya sāmānyamekavikārārambhaḥ samādheyaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[yadā sarve guṇāḥ] pṛthivyādayaḥ, tadā [kathamekaḥ śabdaḥ] śaṅkhādijanitaḥ । [ekamindriyaṁ] śrotrādikamityekabuddhyālambanatvaṁ bhavet । na khalu bhavitavyam । triguṇatvena hi kāraṇena traya iti pratyayaḥ syāt । evamindriyāṇāṁ ca pratyekaṁ tritvam । tathā ca niyamo na prāpnoti । na hi grāhyatvamekasyaiva śabdasya, grāhakatvaṁ caikasya śrotrasya, iti niyama upakalpate । tathā sparśādiṣu, tvagindriyādiṣu ca yojyam । niyamaśca dṛśyate । [kāraṇaṁ] tatra vacanīyamityāha- [pariṇāmaikatvādvastutatvam ॥]
[prakhyāpravṛttisthitiśīlānāṁ guṇānāṁ grahaṇātmakānāṁ] satvaprādhānyāt bodhātmanāmasmitāsaṁsthānānāṁ [karaṇabhāvenaikaḥ pariṇāmaḥ śrotrendriyam ।] yathā viruddhānāṁ tailavartitejasāṁ pradīpaḥ । tathā tvagādīndriyeṣu puruṣārthetikaraṇīye prayuktānāmekaikamindriyaṁ pariṇāma iti yojyam ॥
tathā [grāhyātmakānāṁ] guṇānāṁ tamaḥpradhānānāṁ [śabdabhāvenaikaḥ pariṇāmaḥ śabdo viṣayaḥ ।] tathā [śabdādīnāṁ mūrtisamānajātīyānāṁ] samānām [ekaḥ] gandha [tanmātrāvayavaḥ pariṇāmaḥ pṛthivīparamāṇuḥ । teṣāṁ] paramāṇūnām [ekaḥ pariṇāmaḥ pṛthivī gaurvṛkṣaḥ parvata ityevamādiḥ ॥]
[bhūtāntareṣvapi] yojyam । śabdasparśarūparasānāṁ snehasamānajātīyānām [ekaḥ pariṇāmaḥ rasatanmātrāvayavaḥ jalaparamāṇuḥ । teṣāṁ paramāṇūnāmekaḥ pariṇāme jalam] ॥
śabdasparśarūpāṇāmuṣṇatvasamānajātīyānāmekaḥ pariṇāmo rūpatanmātrāvayavaḥ tejaḥparamāṇuḥ । teṣāṁ paramāṇūnāmekaḥ pariṇāmo vahniḥ salilendhano dāruśakaladīpanaśca ॥
tathā śabdasparśayoḥ praṇāmitvasamānajātīyayoḥ sparśatanmātrāvayavaḥ vāyuparamāṇurekaḥ pariṇāmaḥ । teṣāṁ paramāṇūnāmekaḥ pariṇāmaḥ vāyuḥ sapta marudgaṇāśca ॥
tathā śabdatanmātrāvayavānāmanāvṛtatvasamānajātīyānameka: pariṇāma ākāśaḥ । ityevamuktena mārgeṇa [snehauṣṇyapraṇāmitvādyupādāya sāmānyūmekavikārārambhaḥ samādheyaḥ] yojyaḥ । tasmādbahūnāmapyekapariṇāmitvādekaviṣayatvaṁ, grāhyagrahaṇaniyamaśca sarvamupapadyate ॥

nāstyartho vijñānavisahacaraḥ, asti tu jñānamarthavisahacaraṁ svapnādau kalpitamityanayā diśā ye vastusvarūpamapahnuvate jñānaparikalpanāmātraṁ vastu svapnaviṣayopamaṁ na paramārthato'stīti ya āhuste tatheti pratyupasthitamidaṁ svamāhātmyena vastu kathamapramāṇātmakena vikalpajñānabalena vastusvarūpamutsṛjya tadevāpalapantaḥ śraddheyavacanāḥ syuḥ ॥ 14 ॥

vivaraṇam
nanu ca nāsyevāsau ekapratyayaviṣayaḥ śabdādiḥ । etattu sarvaṁ vijñānaparijṛmbhitameva, vijñānabhāvabhāvitvāt । kathaṁ tadbhāvabhāvitvamityāha - [nāstyartho vijñānavisahacaraḥ] pṛthagvijñānādupalabdha: pṛthagbhāvī vā । [vijñānamarthavisahacaraṁ] pṛthaktvenopalabdha pṛthagbhāvi vā [asti ।] tasmādartho vijñānavyatirekeṇa nāstīti pratijānīmahe ॥
pramāṇamapyatra bhavati- vijñānavyatirekeṇa nāsti grāhyaṁ vastu, vijñānavyatirekeṇānupalabhyamānatvāt, vijñānasvarūpavat । bāhyārthaśūnyāni jāgradvijñānāni, vijñānatvāt, svapnasamayavijñānavat । vijñānaparikalpitā vā jāgradviṣayāḥ, viṣayatvāt, svapnaviṣayavat । vijñānaṁ vā viṣayāvyatireki, vijñānatvāt, svapnavijñānavaditi ॥
yadyevaṁ syāt kiṁ naśchinnaṁ syāt ? puruṣasya dṛśyaviyogāt kaivalyaṁ prastutaṁ na siddhaṁ syāt ॥
yathā upalabhyamānasya stambhāderabhāvaḥ evamupalabhyamānatvādvijñānasyāpyabhāvaḥ । tadabhāve ca liṅgābhāvādupalabdhurapyabhāvaḥ prāpnuyāditi, kasya kaivatyam ? kena dṛśyena viyogaḥ syāt ? kena samprayoge vā bandhaḥ pratijñāyeta ? bandhābhāve cābhyudayaniḥśrayasārthapravṛttiphalatā na prasajeyata ॥
kiṁ cānyat-vijñānavyatirekeṇārtho nāstīti buvatā vijñānamartha iti caikaḥ padārthe'bhyupagato bhavati, yathā-agniranala iti । evaṁ ca sati vijñānaṁ grāhyaṁ grāhakam, arthaḥ grāhyo grāhakaśceti nāmamātre vipratipattiḥ, na punarekasya grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ pratyākhyāyate । tathā ca sati puruṣasyāpi grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ prāptaḥ । tathā'pi vipramokṣānavaklṛptiḥ, ityevamādayo bhūyāṁso doṣāḥ prāpnuvanti ॥
tasmāt [amuyā diśā] anena nyāyābhāsabalena [ye vastusvarūpamapahnuvate jñānaparikalpanāmātraṁ vastu svapnaviṣayopamam, na tu paramārthato'stīti, te] svayaṁ [tatheti] abhyupagamya [svamāhātmyena pratyupasthitaṁ vastuṁ kathamapramāṇātmakena vikalpajñānabalena vastu svayamupagṛhya] abhyupagamya [tadeva] abhyupagataṁ [apalapantaḥ] idamityabhyupetya idaṁ nāstītyapahnuvānāḥ [śraddheyavacanāḥ syuḥ ।] na hi svānubhavapratyākhyāyinaḥ śraddhānīyavacanavistārā bhavitumarhanti ॥
tatra vijñānavyatirekeṇārtho nāstīti pratyakṣavirodhinī pratijñā । saṁvedanīkārakaṁ vijñānaṁ pratīyāmaḥ । pṛthubudhnādyākāramarthaṁ pratipadyemahi । grāhakaṁ ca vijñānamavabhāsakaṁ, avabhāsanīyaścārthaḥ । svalakṣaṇabhedenārthajñānayorupalabhyamānatvānnāvyatirekagandho'pi । tataśca vyatirekeṇānupalabhyamānatvādityasiddho hetustava ॥
na ca jñānasyaiva pṛthubudhnādyākāratā । jñānasyaikasyāvabhāsyāvabhāsakatvānupapatteḥ pradīpasyeva kevalasya । bhinnayoḥ pradīpayoḥ prakāśyaprakāśakatvānupalambhādekasya ca svātmani prāptyasambhavāt, evaṁ jñānasya ॥
apicānaikāntikaśva buddhena pratipakṣavādinā ca । na cāsau nāstīti śakyaṁ pratijñātuṁ, yaṁ prati sisādhayiṣasi, sa cettadvijñānavyatiriktaḥ, tathā ghaṭādirapi sidhyati ॥
svapnajñānamapi upalabdhārthaviṣayatvāt na nirālaṁbanam । pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣavirodho lokavirodhaśca । sarvaṁ jñānaṁ sālambanaṁ, jñānatvāt, prativādiduṣṭavākyajñānavat, svavākyaguṇajñānavacca । tataśca jñānatvādīnāṁ nirālaṁbanatvahetūnāmevamādibhiranaikāntikatā ॥ 14 ॥
kutaścaitadanyāyyam –
vastusāmye cittabhedāttayorvibhaktaḥ panthāḥ ॥ 15 ॥

bahucittālambanībhūtamekaṁ vastu sādhāraṇaṁ, tatkhalu naikacittaparikalpitaṁ nāpyanekacittaparikalpitaṁ kiṁtu svapratiṣṭham। kathaṁ, vastusāmye cittabhedāt। dharmāpekṣaṁ cittasya vastusāmye'pi sakhajñānaṁ bhavatyadharmāpekṣaṁ tata eva duḥkhajñānamavidyāpekṣaṁ tata eva mūḍhajñānaṁ samyagdarśanāpekṣaṁ tata eva mādhyasthyajñānamiti। kasya taccittena parikalpitam। na cānyacittaparikalpitenārthenānyasya cittoparāgo yuktaḥ। tasmādvastujñānayorgrāhyagrahaṇabhedabhinnayorvibhaktaḥ panthāḥ। nānayoḥ saṁkaragandho'pyastīti।

vivaraṇam
[kutacaitadanyāyyaṁ] gṛhyamāṇaṁ vastu nāstīti ? [vastusāmye cittebhadāttayorviviktaḥ panthāḥ । bahucittālambanībhūtaṁ] anekacittaviṣayībhūtaṁ [ekaṁ vastu] putrādikaṁ [sādhāraṇaṁ] samānam । [tat khalu] naikacittatantraṁ [bhavati ।] ekacittatantratvābhāvā [danekacittaparikalpitamapi na bhavati ॥]
[kintu svarūpapratiṣṭhaṁ] cittanirapekṣaṁ svatantratayā vyavasthitam । [katham ? vastusāmye] vastunaḥ putrāderekatve [cittabhedāt] ekasmin putrādiviṣaye viṣayiṇāṁ jñānānāmanekatvāt ॥
kathaṁ cittabheda ityāha- [dharmāpekṣaṁ cittasya vastusāmye'pi] yathā putrata eva mātāpitroḥ [sukhajñānaṁ bhavati ।] tata eva putrādeḥ [adharmāpekṣaṁ] ahitānāṁ [duḥkhajñānaṁ] upajaniṣyate ॥
[tasmodavāvidyāpekṣaṁ] kāmukānāṁ mūḍha़jñānam । [tata eva putrādeḥ samyagjñānopakṣaṁ] yogināṁ [mādhyasthyajñānaṁ] heyopādeyaśūnyamutpadyate । kauleyādīnāṁ tata eva lobhāpekṣayā bhakṣyajñānam । tata eva putrāderviraktasya kuṇapādijñānam ॥
yadi kasyaciccittena parikālpatamabhaviṣyat (na) anyacittaparikalpitenānyeṣāṁ cittamupārakṣyata । naitadyuktaṁ, atyantāsambaddhānāmadarśanāt । yadi cānyaparikalpitenāpyanyacittoparāgo'bhaviṣyat, tadā sarve'pi sarvaṁ samajñāsyanta । na cedaṁ dṛṣṭam । [tasmāt] na cittaparikalpitaṁ vastviti, [vastujñānayoḥ grāhyagrahaṇabhedādbhinnayorvivittaḥ panthāḥ । nānayoḥ saṅkaragandho'pyasti ॥]
sukhajñānālamvanībhūtaṁ putrādivastu na tajjñānaparikalpitam । tadviruddhānakacittotoparañjakatvāt, vādiprativadipratijñāguṇadoṣatadābhāsavat । vādiprativādiprabhṛtīnāmapi vijñānamātratve sādhyasādhanādivyavahāravilopaḥ syāt ॥
atha svavijñānavyatirekeṇa teṣāṁ jñānarūpāṇāmeva pṛthaktvamiti cet-astu । tadeva vastu jñānāntaraviṣayatvādarthantaraṁ siddham । sañjñāmātre vipratipattiḥ । viṣayiviṣayabhedastu na sādhyaḥ । tasmānnānayoḥ saṁkaragandho'pīti ॥

sāṁkhyapakṣe punarvastu triguṇaṁ calaṁ ca guṇavṛttamiti dharmādinimittāpekṣaṁ cittairabhisaṁbadhyate। nimittānurūpasya ca pratyayasyotpadyamānasya tena tenā''tmanā heturbhavati। kecidāhuḥ – jñānasahabhūrevārtho bhogyatvātsukhādivaditi। ta etayā dvārā sādhāraṇatvaṁ bādhamānāḥ pūrvottarakṣaṇeṣu vasturūpamevāpahnuvate ॥ 15 ॥

vivaraṇam
atha vastuni svarūpapratiṣṭhe'pi sukhādibhinnapratyayālambanatā na samīcīnarūpeti cet atrocyate – [vastu punastriguṇaṁ calaṁ guṇavṛttimiti dharmādinimittaṁ cāpekṣya cittaiḥ] sukhaduḥkhādibhedarūpeṇa [abhisaṁbadhyate] pariṇāmitvādanekaśaktitvācca ॥
dharmādi [nimittānurūpasya cotpadyamānasya pratyayasya tena tena] nimittena [ātmanā heturbhavati ।] satvātmanā dharmādinimittāpekṣaṁ putrādivastu sukhaheturbhavati । rajaātmanā tvadharmanimittāpekṣaṁ duḥkhaheturbhavati । tamaātmanā tvavidyāpekṣaṁ tadeva vastu mohaheturbhavati । sattāmātrātmanā samyagdarśanāpekṣaṁ tadeva mādhyasthyajñānaheturbhavati ॥
[kecidāhuḥ] eṣameva bauddhānāmanyatame bāhyamarthamabhyupagacchanta āhuḥ - [jñānasahabhūrevārthaḥ,] yathā vijñānaṁ pratikṣaṇaṁ dharmiśūnyaṁ utpadyate vinaśyati ca, tathā sahaiva jñānenārtho vijñāyate vinaśyati ca, [bhogyatvāt, sukhādivat ।] tadyathā-sukhaduḥkhādirūpaṁ bhogyaṁ vijñānasahotpattivināśamasādhāraṇam, evaṁ ghaṭādirartho'pi vijñānasamānasamayajanmavināśa eva, bhogyatvāditi ॥
te'pi tathaiva vijñānavādivat sādhāraṇatvaṁ anekasukhādicittālambanatvaṁ [bādhamānāḥ pūrvottarakṣaṇeṣu] svakīyavijñānotpatteḥ paurastyeṣu kṣaṇeṣu pāścātyeṣu ca vastu nāstīti [vastusvarūpamevāpahnuvate ॥]
tasmāt na hi vastunaḥ svarūpaṁ vijñānasahabhāvi, tadevedamiti pratyabhijñānāt । nācirajanmapralayaṁ tadevedamiti pratyabhijñāyeta, yathā vijñānam । na hi tadevādau me vijñānamiti bhavati । vastu punastadevedamiti pratyabhijñāyate । arthajñānayorekasamayabhavitve'pyeka[pariśeṣaḥ]viśeṣaḥ syāt ॥
nāpi sādṛśyāt pratyabhijñānam । grāhyagrāhakayoryugapadutpattivināśavatvāt । vyavasthite hi vastvantaradṛśye anyatatsadṛśavastudarśanena sādṛśyapratyayaḥ । evaṁ tatsadṛśaṁ vā drakṣyāmītyuttarābhilāṣaḥ । na hi tadaharniścitamaraṇasyāparedyurarthadarśanākāṁkṣā jāyate । nāpi matsadṛśa īkṣipyata ityabhilaṣati । na caivaṁ dṛṣṭam । sarvo hi svārthamīhate । bhinnasantatiṣvadarśanāt ॥
tasmādidānīṁtano'rthaḥ nedānīntanajñānasahabhūreveti, grāhyatvāt, atītārthavat । atīto vā nātītajñānasahanāśajanmā, grāhyatvāt, idānīntanārthavat । bhūtabhaviṣyajjñānagrāhyā arthā adhunā'pi santi, grāhyatvāt, adhunātanapratyayagrāhyavat ॥ idānīntanamapi vastu pūrvottarakṣaṇeṣu tathaiva ॥
atha sukhadu:khajñānādabhiranaikāntikamiti cet-na-atītānāgataṁ svarūpato'stīti sādhitatvāt । evaṁ ca sati sukhādīnāṁ ca svarūpeṇa sadbhāvāt sukhādivaditi sādhyasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ ॥
atha vartamānarūpaviśeṣeṇātītānāgatalakṣaṇayorarthasya sukhādivadabhāva iti cet, siddhasādhyatā । na hi kumārabhāva eva vṛddhatvaṁ vidyate ॥ 15 ॥
na caikacittatantraṁ vastu tadapramāṇakaṁ tadā kiṁ syāt ॥ 16 ॥

ekacittatantraṁ cedvastu syāttadā citte vyagre niruddhe vā'svarūpameva tenāparāmṛṣṭamanyasyāviṣayībhūtamapramāṇakamagṛhītasvabhāvakaṁ kenacittadānīṁ kiṁ tatsyāt। saṁbadhyamānaṁ ca punaścittena kuta utpadyeta। ye cāsyānupasthitābhāgāste cāsyana syurevaṁ nāsti pṛṣṭhamityudaramapi na gṛhyeta। tasmātsvatantro'rthaḥ sarvapuruṣasādhāraṇaḥ svatantrāṇi ca cittāni pratipuruṣaṁ pravartante। tayoḥ saṁbandhādupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya bhoga iti ॥ 16 ॥

vivaraṇam
itaśca cittatantratā vastuno nāvakalpate । ekacittatantraṁ vā vastu bhavedanekacittatantraṁ vā ? ekacittatantratve brūmaḥ – [na caikacittatantraṁ vastu tadapramāṇakaṁ tadā kiṁ syāt?] na tāvadekacittatantraṁ, [ekacittatantraṁ cedvastu syāt] yadicedamucyate, [taccitte] yaccittatantraṁ vastu tasmiṁścitte vyagre parāsakte [niruddhe vā] vinaṣṭe vā [tena] pramāṇacittena [aparāmṛṣṭaṁ] ca [anyasya cāviṣayībhūtaṁ] etacittantratayaiva, [tadā tat] vastu [apramāṇakamagṛhītasvabhāvaṁ] prāṇacittanirodhādeva [tadānīṁ kiṁ tat syāt ।] na hi kiṁcidapi syāt । vittapramāṇakaṁ tat tadabhāve na tena bhavitavyam ॥
nanu ca yathā tatpramāṇacittaṁ nirudhyate, tathaiva tadapi kṣaṇikatvānniruddhameva । kiṁ tatrābhidhānīyaṁ syāt । ucyate-na-vyavahāravilopānniyamānupapatteśca । agnirayaṁ māsprākṣīḥ, imaṁ gṛhāṇa, adaḥ pradehīti vyavahāro vilupyeta । ekacittasahakṣayatvādvastunaḥ ॥
tatsantatijamatyantasadṛśaṁ vyavahārapratipattaye bhavediti cet-atrāpi tatsantānādeva tatsamānenānyanānubhavanīyaṁ parapramāṇasya ca tadviṣayabhūtamiti ko niyacchet । na hi niyamaheturasti ॥
api ca ekacittatantratvādvyavahāravelāyāmanyata(na)redaṁpratyayaviṣayālambano nānyata(na)rapratyayo yujyate । na hi khalvapi vahucittatantraṁ vastu । tataśca gṛhāṇedaṁ prayacchada iti kathaṁ vyavaharemahi ॥
nāpyevaṁdarśanaśālinaḥ śiṣyācāryopadeśapradānādibhiranyonyaṁ vyavahareran । tasmānna caikacittatantraṁ vastu । pramāṇacittavināśe tadvyagrabhāve vā anavadhṛtasvabhāvavādvastuna: ॥
[saṁbadhyamānaṁ vā vastu punaścittena kuta utpadyeta ।] na kutaścidutpattirupapadyate tatsantānāditi hi pratyavocāma ॥
kiṁñca, [asya] vastunaḥ [anupasthitāḥ] ekasya pratyayasyāviṣayībhūtā[ye] [bhāgāste cāsya na syuḥ ।] eko hi vastubhāgo viṣayībhūtaścittatantro nānyaḥ iti । [nāsti pṛṣṭhamiti udaramapi] abhimukhībhūtaṁ [na syādeva ॥]
athāpi kākatalīyanyāyena bhūyāṁsi cittāni yugapadutpadyeran tadviṣayaṁ ca vastu tatsamānakālamunmajjatīti, tadetenaiva pṛṣṭhodarābhāvanidarśanena pratyākhyāye । nāpi kākatālīyavṛttāntenānādisamayādhīno vyavahārasāgara uttīryate । sarve ca vijñānadarśanaślāghiṣu doṣā ihāpi samānā eva ॥
[tasmāt] āha- [svatantro'rthaḥ sarvapuruṣasādhāraṇaḥ] yasminnavasthite samastalokavyavahāra upakalpiṣyate । [svatantrāṇi ca cittāni pratipuruṣaṁ pravartante । tayośca] arthacittayoḥ [sambandhādupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya bhogaḥ ।] tasmādbhoktā puruṣaḥ cittaṁ karaṇam artho viṣayaḥ karmabhūta ityeteṣāṁ bhoktṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṁ vivittaḥ panthāḥ ॥ 16 ॥
taduparāgāpekṣitvāccittasya vastu jñātājñātam ॥ 17 ॥
ayaskāntamaṇikalpā viṣayā ayaḥsadharmakaṁ cittamabhisaṁbandhyoparañjayanti। yena ca viṣayeṇoparaktaṁ cittaṁ sa viṣayo jñātastato'nyaḥ punarajñātaḥ। vastuno jñātājñātasvarūpatvātpariṇāmi cittam ॥ 17 ॥

vivaraṇam
kathaṁ cittatadviṣayayoḥ sambandhāt puruṣasya bhoga ityāha-yadvā, yasya cittavyatirekeṇa vastu nāsti, cittatantrameva vā vastu, tasya jñātājñātaviṣayatvamanupapannamityāha – [taduparāgāpekṣatvāccittasya vastu jñātājñātam । tena] viṣayeṇa [cittasyoparāgaḥ] taṁ prati [apekṣā] yasya [tat] [cittaṁ taduparāgāpekṣam,] tasya bhāvaḥ [taduparāgāpekṣatvaṁ] tasmāt [taduparāgāpekṣatvāccittasya vastu] jñātājñātam ॥
yena vastunā cittamuparajyate tat jñātaṁ, yena ca noparajyate tat [ajñātam ।] sa coparāgaścittapariṇāmāpekṣaḥ । indriyamārgeṇa cittaṁ hyākāreṇa pariṇamamānaṁ hi sambadhyate ॥
kiṁ punaścittapariṇāmanimitamityāha- [ayaskāntamaṇikalpā] ayaskāntasamānāḥ [viṣayāḥ, ayassadharmakaṁ cittam] -ayassadharmakatvaṁ ca viṣayasannidhāne vikriyata iti । viṣayāṇāmapyayaskāntamaṇikalpatvaṁ sannidhimātreṇa cittavikriyāpādanasāmarthyāt । ato viṣayā ātmākāreṇa pariṇataṁ [cittam abhisaṁbadhyoparañjayanti ॥]
[yena ca viṣayeṇoparaktaṁ cittaṁ] sa viṣayo jñātaḥ । [tato'nyaḥ('nye) punaḥ] anuparañjako (ka)viṣayaḥ(yā) [ajñātaḥ] (tāḥ) । tasmāt [vastuno jñātājñātasvarūpa] (viṣaya)tvāt [pariṇāmi cittam ।] atha punaścittatantra eva viṣayaścittameva vā viṣayaḥ, tasya vādinaḥ sarvaviṣayajñatvamaviṣayajñatvaṁ vā bhavet । ajñātasya cittasyābhāvāt । na cedaṁ dṛśyate । kiṁ tarhi ? jñātājñātaviṣayatvameva cittasya pratipadyāmahe । taccaitat sthirāvasthānānāṁ viṣayāṇāṁ prāpyabhāvādanyathā ca saṁbandhānavakalpanācittapariṇāmāpekṣameveti pariṇāmitvam ॥ 17 ॥
yasya tu tadeva cittaṁ viṣayastasya –
sadā jñātāścittavṛttayastatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvāt ॥ 18 ॥
yadi cittavatprabhurapi puruṣaḥ pariṇamettatastadviṣayāścittavṛttayaḥ śabdādiviṣayavajjñātājñātāḥ syuḥ। sadājñātatvaṁ tu manasastatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvamanumāpayati ॥ 18 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yasya] tu svāmino bhoktuḥ [tadeva] jñātājñātaviṣayaṁ [cittaṁ] vṛttirūpeṇa [viṣayaḥ] na hi niruddhavṛttinaścetaso viṣayatvamiti, [tasya] puruṣasya sadā [jñātāścittavṛttaya: [tatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvāt] ।] tāsāṁ pratyakṣatvāt sadā jñātaviṣayatvamaprasādhyam ॥
yadvā pratyakṣagamyāścittavṛttayaḥ, upalabdhatvena śabdaliṅgānapekṣaṁ smaryamāṇatvāt, pratyakṣopalabdhaghaṭavat । niścitarūpatvācca tathaiva । saṁśayāviṣayatvācca । yadi hi sadaivāpratyakṣāścittavṛttayaḥ, tā bāhyaviṣayavat saṁśayitā api kadācit kāścana bhaveyuḥ । na hi kāśvana kadācana saṁśayamārgasaṁpātinyo dṛṣṭāḥ ॥
api ca, bhavati hi kadācijjñātaḥ sannartho jñāta iti [pratīyamānaḥ] । cittavṛtipratyakṣāgrāhyatve [tat] nopapadyate । na ca phaladvāreṇānumātuṁ tatra śakyata । phalasyānavadhāraṇāt ॥
tasmāt saṁśayasya cāviṣayatvāt, pṛthak ca viṣayācittavṛttīnāṁ svarūpamātreṇaiva smaryamāṇatvāt, sarvadā sarvvāḥ pratyakṣāścittavṛttayaḥ । tathā pratipatturavabhāsakatvāt, karaṇatvāt, abhivyañjakatvācca, pradīpādivat । na tu cakṣurādibhiranaikāntikatvam । tatrāpi pratyakṣagrāhyatvāt । yathā pradīpādyālokiviśiṣṭā ghaṭādayo gṛhyante, tathā śrotrādisvālokaviśiṣṭā eva śabdādayo gṛhyante ॥
na ca vivicyāgrahaṇādapratyakṣatvamiti śakyaṁ vaktum । yathā pradīpayoḥ parasparavyatibhinnā raśmayaḥ, na cāsyāyaṁ raśmirasya cāyamiti vivicyate, na ca tāvatā teṣāmapratyakṣatvam, [evaṁ] ihāpi cakṣurādīnāṁ tulyajātīyabāhyālokādivyatiṣaṅgādvivicyāgrahaṇam । na ca tāvanmātreṇa teṣāmapratyakṣatvam । yo hi pratyakṣāvasīyamānacittavṛtyapalāpaṁ karoti, nūnamasāvātmānamapyapālapediti sarvopalabdheścittavṛtyadhīnatvāt rūpopalabdherivāloka(pratyāyakaṁ tattvam) pratyayādhīnatvam । tasmādāha- [sadā jñātāścittavṛttayaḥ puruṣasyeti ॥]
yaccaitat sadā jñātaviṣayatvam, [tatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmatvāt ।] nityopalabdhṛsvarūpaprayuktaṁ hi taditi । [yadi cittavat prabhurapi puruṣaḥ pariṇameta, tatastadviṣayāścittavṛttayaḥ cittasyeva śabdādiviṣayāḥ, jñātā ajñātā api syuḥ ॥]
yattu jñātājñātaṁ śabdādiviṣayajātaṁ, tat pariṇāminaścittasya pariṇāmāpekṣaṁ draṣṭavyam । tathaivendriyāṇāmapi pariṇāmāpekṣameva jñātājñātaviṣayatvaṁ dṛśyate । na ca tathā cittavṛttīnāmanyatamāsāmapi jñātatvamajñātatvaṁ ca । nityatastajjñātā eva cittavṛttayaḥ । tasmādyadvṛttirūpeṇa [sadā jñātatvaṁ manasaḥ tat prabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvamanumāpayati ॥]
apariṇāmī puruṣa iti pratijñā । sadā jñātaviṣayatvāditi hetuḥ । vaidharmyeṇa cittamindriyāṇi ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ । upalabdhuśca viṣayiṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt sadā jñātaviṣayatvapratiṣedhāya muktātmavaditi dṛṣṭānto nopapadyate । muktasyāviṣayitvāt ॥ 18 ॥
syādāśaṅkā cittameva svābhāsaṁ viṣayābhāsaṁ ca bhaviṣyatītyagnivat –
na tatsvābhāsaṁ dṛśyatvāt ॥ 19 ॥
yathetarāṇīndriyāṇi śabdādayaśca dṛśyatvānna svābhāsāni tathā mano'pi pratyetavyam।

vivaraṇam
[syādāśaṅkā-cittameva svābhāsaṁ viṣayābhāsaṁ ca bhaviṣyatīti ।] grāhyaṁ grāhakaṁ ceti । svasaṁviditākārā eva hi vṛttayaḥ । yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśayati ghaṭādīnātmānaṁ ca । kiṁ puruṣeṇa cittavṛttyupalambhinā cittavyatiriktena kalpiteneti ॥
atrocyate- [na tat svābhāsaṁ dṛśyatvāt । yathetarāṇīndriyāṇi] śre.ātrādīni viṣayāśca [śabdādayaḥ । na svābhāsāni] indriyāṇi । nāpi svābhāsāḥ śabdādayaḥ । [dṛśyatvāt । tathā mano'pi pratyetavyam ।] na svābhāsaṁ cittaṁ dṛśyatvāditi pratipattavyam ॥
nanu ca agnivadeva svābhāsatvaṁ viṣayābhāsatvaṁ ca bhavatu, yathaiva ghaṭādayaḥ prakāśyāḥ svarūpopalambhanārthamālokāntaramapekṣante, na tathā pradīpaḥ । yathā pradīpaḥ svābhāso viṣayābhāsaśca । tathā mano'pyavabhāsakatvādevaṁ bhavatu kimātmanā? na hi pradīpapratipattaye pradīpāntaramādadate laukikāḥ ॥
yadi copādīyaran anavasthaiva syāt । evaṁ vijñānasyāpi vyatiriktena grāhyatve tasya cānyena grahaṇaṁ tasya cānyenetyevaṁ prasajyata । kiṁ ca vijñānasyāvabhāsātmakatvāt grāhakasyāpyavabhāsarūpatvāt na parasparopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ । tadyathā pradīpayordvayoḥ । tasmāt kalpito'pi vijñānasya grahītā anarthaka iti, bhavatu jñānaṁ svābhāsaṁ parābhāsaṁ ceti ॥

na cāgniratra dṛṣṭāntaḥ। na hyagnirātmasvarūpamaprakāśaṁ prakāśayati। prakāśaścāyaṁ prakāśyaprakāśakasaṁyoge dṛṣṭaḥ। na ca svarūpamātre'sti saṁyogaḥ। kiṁ ca svābhāsaṁ cittamityagrāhyameva kasyaciditi śabdārthaḥ। tadyathā svātmapratiṣṭhamākāśaṁ na parapratiṣṭhamityarthaḥ। svabuddhipracārapratisaṁvedanātsattvānāṁ pravṛttirdṛśyate – kruddho'haṁ bhīto'hamamutra me rāgo'mutra me krodha iti। etatsvabuddheragrahaṇe na yuktamiti ॥ 19 ॥

vivaraṇam
atrocyate-tadetaddṛṣṭāntāpaśadāvaṣṭambhena sakalalokaprasiddhamārgopārohiṇa ātmano nirākaraṇamaśakyam । kasmāt? [na cāgniratra dṛṣṭantaḥ । na hyagnirātmasvarūpamaprakāśaṁ prakāśayati,] yadi cāgniraprakāśaḥ san ātmanaiva ghaṭādivat prākāśayiṣyata, tata upāpatsyata dṛṣṭāntaḥ । na tvevam । na hi kadācidagniraprakāśaḥ ॥
[prakāśaścāyam । sa ca prakāśyaprakāśakasaṁyoge dṛṣṭaḥ । na ca svarūpamātre'sti saṁyogaḥ ।] dvayerhi saṁyegaḥ । nāsati saṁyoge svarūpāvabhāsakratvam ॥
yadapyucyate-ghaṭādivat prakāśāntaraṁ nāgnirapekṣata iti । tat prakāśyarūpābhāvāt । na tu tasya ghaṭādivat prakāśyaṁ rūpamasti । na tāvatā vyatiriktāgrāhyatvam । cakṣuṣā tulyavyatiriktena gṛhyata eva ॥
prakāśyasya ghaṭāderavatamasatiraskārāya prakāśa upādāyiṣyate । na tvaprakāśyarūpatvāt । agnerālokāntarānākāṅkṣaṇaṁ tu bhavataivābhihitaṁ-dvayoḥ pradīpayornāsti parasparopakāra iti । yatra nāma bhede'pi dvayoḥ pradīpayornāstyaprakāśyarūpatvādanyonyopakāraḥ, kimuta asati bhede'tra prakāśāntaromeva nāpekṣate iti ॥
na tu vyatiriktagrāhyatvaṁ vyabhicarati, pradīpayordṛśyatvādghaṭādivat । etena vyatiriktagrāhyatvaṁ jñānasya dṛśyatvāt pradīpādivat siddhaṁ bhavati । pradīpādivacca jñānasya prakāśasvarūpatvāt karaṇāntarānapekṣāpi siddhā । tathā ca anavasthādoṣagandhī na vidyate ॥
yadapyucyate-jñānasyāvabhāsātmakatvāt tadgrāhakasyāpyavabhāsarūpatvāt na parasparopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ pradīpayoriva dvayoriti । nāsau doṣaḥ । cakṣuḥpradīpavadātmajñānayorjātyantaratvāt ॥
nanu cāhaṁpratyayena cittaṁ pratyayi gṛhyata iti viṣayaviṣāyitvamekasyaiva । naiṣa doṣaḥ । triguṇatvāccittasya । yattatra tamaḥpradhānaṁ cittaṁ tadanyayā satvātmikayā vṛttyā samālambyeta, hasteneva śarīraṁ kaṇḍūyamānam । tatrāpyupalabdhā viṣayī bhinna eva puruṣaḥ । etena jātyantaragrāhyagrāhakatvena niravayavatvena puruṣaśca svayameva grāhyaḥ grāhakaścetyetat pratyavocāma ॥
[kiṁ ca-svābhāsaṁ cittamiti] ucyamāne ca [agrāhyameva cittaṁ syāditi । evaṁ śabdārthaḥ ।] svābhāsamiti hyukte anyena nāvabhāsyate na gṛhyata ityarthaḥ । na tu svayamātmānaṁ gṛhṇātītyucyate । evamādiśabdaprayogeṣu śabdasya viparītārthatvam ॥
[tadyathā-svātmapratiṣṭhamākāśam, apratiṣṭhamiti] śabdārthaḥ । tathā svastho devadatta iti, nīroga ityarthaḥ, na tu svātmani sthita iti । tatra dṛśyatvāditi hetorasiddhimācakṣāṇasya pratyakṣavirodho lokavirodho vyavahāravilopaścetyāha - [svabuddhipracārapratisaṁvedanāt sattvānāṁ] prāṇināṁ [pravṛttirdṛśyate ॥]
[kruddho'haṁ bhīto'hamamutra me rāgo'mutra me krodha iti] svāṁ svāṁ buddhimevaṁ carantīṁ pratisaṁvedya dṛṣṭvā krodhalobhādiparihārāya vivekavatāṁ pravṛttirupalabhyate । tathā prasannaṁ me cittaṁ kaळ.uṣitaṁ mūḍhamiti ca । tat [etat svabuddheragrahaṇe, na yuktamiti ।] na hi niśāmya parispandinīṁ buddhiradṛyeti yuktaṁ vaktum ॥ 19 ॥
ekasamaye cobhayānavadhāraṇam ॥ 20 ॥
na caikasminkṣaṇe svapararūpāvadhāraṇaṁ yuktaṁ, kṣaṇikavādino yadbhavanaṁ saiva kriyā tadeva ca kārakamityabhyupagamaḥ ॥ 20 ॥

vivaraṇam
abhyupagamya vādo'yam-yadyapi svābhāsaṁ viṣayābhāsaṁ ca mano bhavatu । tatra dūṣaṇam [ekasamaye cobhayānavadhāraṇam ।] viṣayaparicchedakatve, nānākṣaṇatvādātmaparicchedo na yujyate । atha punarātmānamavadhārayati, na tadā viṣayābhimukhaṁ, svātmaparicchedakatve nānākṣaṇatvāt ॥
athobhayaparicchittirekaiveti cenna, niravayavatvāt paricchitteḥ । na hi niravayavāyāścittavṛtteḥ pradīpavadanekāvabhāsakatve yuktam । avayavabhadāttu pradīpasyānekaprakāśakatvaṁ saṁbhavati । na tu jñānasya sāvayavatvaṁ parairabhyupeyate ॥
kiṁ ca, jñānamekamekasmin kṣaṇe ubhayamavadhārayatīti cābhyupagame kriyākārakabhedaprasaṅgaḥ । yadubhayāvadhāraṇaṁ sā kriyā । yadavadhārayati tat kārakam । [na caikasmin kṣaṇe svaparo bhayāvadhāraṇaṁ kṣaṇavādino yuktam ।] kasmāt ? uktaṁ hi kṣaṇikatvasiddhaye [yadbhavanam] utpattiḥ [saiva kriyā tadeva ca kārakamityabhyupagamaḥ ।] kriyākārakabhede ca kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaḥ syāt । kārakeṇa hi kriyākṣaṇamavasthānīyam ॥ 20 ॥
syānmatiḥ svarasaniruddhaṁ cittaṁ cittāntareṇa samanantareṇa gṛhyata iti –
cittāntaradṛśye buddhibuddheratiprasaṅgaḥ smṛtisaṁkaraśca ॥ 21 ॥

atha cittaṁ ceccittāntareṇa gṛhyeta buddhibuddhiḥ kena gṛhyate, sā'pyanyayā sā'pyanyayetyatiprasaṅgaḥ। smṛtisaṁkaraśca, yāvanto buddhibuddhīnāmanubhavāstāvatyaḥ smṛtayaḥ prāpnuvanti। tatsaṁkarāccaikasmṛtyanavadhāraṇaṁ ca syādityevaṁ buddhipratisaṁvedinaṁ puruṣamapalapadbhirvaināśikaiḥ sarvamevā''kulīkṛtam। te tu bhoktṛsvarūpaṁ yatra kvacana kalpayanto na nyāyena saṁgacchante। kecittu sattvamātramapi parikalpyāsti sa sattvo ya etānpañca skandhānnikṣipyānyāṁśca pratisaṁdadhātītyuktvā tata eva punastrasyanti। tathā skandhānāṁ mahannirvedāya virāgāyānutpādāya praśāntaye gurorantike brahmacaryaṁ cariṣyāmītyuktvā sattvasya punaḥ sattvamevāpahnuvate। sāṁkhyayogādayastu pravādāḥ svaśabdena puruṣameva svāminaṁ cittasya bhoktāramupayantīti ॥ 21 ॥

vivaraṇam
[syānmatiḥ] kasyāpi- [svarasasanniruddhaṁ cittaṁ cittānteraṇa gṛhyate] iti bhāvena vinaṣṭaṁ bhaṅgurataraṁ cittaṁ [cittāntareṇa samanantareṇa] saṁjāyamānena [gṛhyata] iti, athāpi nityāvasthitapuruṣaparikalpanā nirarthikaiva । atrocyate— [cittāntaradṛśye buddhibuddheratiprasaṅgaḥ smṛtisaṅkaraśca ॥]
[yadi cittaṁ cittāntareṇa] svarasaniruddhaṁ paurastyaṁ pāścātyena jāyamānena samanantareṇa gṛheta, [buddhibuddhiḥ] ghaṭaviṣayā buddhiḥ buddhirucyate, tadviṣayā tu buddhibuddhiḥ, sā kena [gṛhyate] vyavasthitagrāhakābhāvāt । [sā'pyanyayā] grahītavyā [sā'pyanyathetyatiprasaṅgaḥ ॥]
na cāgṛhītāsu buddhibuddhiṣu saṁvyavahāro ghaṭate smṛtisaṁskārānupapatteḥ । tatraikajātīyānāmeva ghaṭabuddhibuddhīnāṁ dāśatayī mālā syādanavasthitā, na ghaṭabuddhiḥ । parisamāptau ca ghaṭabuddhibuddhīnāṁ asatyāṁ kathaṁ ghaṭadibuddhirupatiṣṭheta ॥
ayaṁ cāparo doṣaḥ [smṛtisaṁkaraśca] iti । buddhibuddhīnāṁ tatsaṁskārāṇāṁ caikarūpatvāt [smṛtisaṁkaraḥ] prāpnoti । [yāvanto buddhibuddhīnāmanubhavāstāvatyaḥ smṛtayaḥ] saṁkīrṇāḥ [prāpnuvanti । tatsaṅkarāt] smṛtisaṅkarāt [smṛtyanavadhāraṇe] iyamasyā buddheḥ smṛtirityanavadhārayantaḥ kathaṁ vyavaharemahi । tathā ca sarūpatvāt smṛtisaṁkaraḥ prāpnoti ॥
yāvanto buddhibuddhīnāṁ vidānāḥ svabuddhismṛtipūrvavyavahārāsambhavāt sarve saṁmohena saṅgacchemahi । yadi cānavasthāparijihāsayā kvacit buddhyantare samavatiṣṭhemahi, tameva [buddhipratisaṁvedinaṁ] buddhipratisaṁvedanaliṅgena spaṣṭataramapi [puruṣamapalapadbhirvaināśikairākulīkṛtaṁ jagaditi ॥]
nanu cālayavijñānakalpanayā'navasthādoṣaṁ pariharemahi । tathā cātmakalpanāmapalapemahītyevaṁ [te bhoktṛsvarūpaṁ yatra kvacana kalpayanto na nyāyena saṅgacchante ।] tasyāpyālayavijñānasya grāhyatvādanavasthitatvācābhihitasakaladoṣānuṣaṅgaḥ ॥
[kecit] vaināśikaviśeṣāḥ [sattvamātramapi] śabdāntereṇa [sattvamātraṁ] bhoktṛsvarūpaṁ [parikalpya asti sa sattvo ya etān pañca skandhān] rūpavedanāsaṁjñāsaṁskāravijñānalakṣaṇān [nikṣipya] parityajya [anyāṁśca] skandhān [pratisandadhāti] gṛhṇāti [ityuktvā tata eva] bhūtānāgataskandhapratisandhātrekasattvaparikalpanātaḥ [trasyanti ॥]
[tathā] teṣāmanyā viruddhakalpanā- [skandhānāṁ mahānirvedāya virāgāyānutpādāya praśāntaye gurorantike brahmacaryaṁ carāmī] tyuktvā [puna] stamevābhyugataṁ [satvasya sattva] (sādhyasādhanasambandha) [mapahnuvate ।] vijñānamātraṁ kṣaṇikaṁ śūnyaṁ ceti ātmānamapalapanti । (namabhisandadhīmahi । tadevaṁ) [sāṅkhyayogādayastu pravādāḥ । svaśabdena puruṣameva svāminaṁ cittasya bhoktāramabhyupayanti iti ॥ 21 ॥]
katham –
citerapratisaṁkramāyāstadākārāpattau svabuddhisaṁvedanam ॥ 22 ॥

apariṇāminī hi bhoktṛśaktirapratisaṁkramā ca pariṇāminyarthe pratisaṁkrānteva tadvṛttimanupatati। tasyāśca prāptacaitanyopagrahasvarūpāyā buddhivṛtteranukārimātratayā vuddhivṛttyaviśiṣṭā hi jñānavṛttirākhyāyate। tathā coktam – na pātālaṁ na ca vivaraṁ girīṇāṁ naivāndhakāraṁ kukṣayo nodadhīnām। guhā yasyāṁ nihitaṁ brahma śāśvataṁ buddhivṛttimaviśiṣṭāṁ kavayo vedayante ॥ iti ॥ 22 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kathaṁ] bhoktāraṁ svaśabdenaivābhyupayanti ? yataḥ [citerapratisaṁkramāyāstadākārāpattau] satyāṁ [svabuddhisaṁvedanaṁ] bhavati । [citiḥ] caitanyaṁ puruṣa ityarthaḥ । sā cāpariṇāmitvāt [apratisaṁkramā] । tasyāḥ [apratisaṁkramāyāḥ] api satyāściteḥ [tadākārāpattiḥ ।] taditi prakṛtaṁ cittaṁ pratyāmnāyate tasyākārāpattistadākārāpattiḥ । tasyāścite [stadākārāpattau] satyāṁ [svabuddhisaṁvedanaṁ] bhavati । svasya bauddhasya pratyayasyopalabdhirbhavati । tadarthameva hi sā buddhiḥ śabdādipratyayarūpeṇa pariṇamate ॥
tadetat pratipādayati(pratītya)- [apariṇāminī hi bhoktṛśaktiḥ] dṛkśaktiḥ yathāvyākhyātā । [apratisaṁkramā ca] satī [pariṇāminyarthe] bauddhapratyaye [pratisaṁkrānteva] pratyayiviṣayatvāt [tadvṛttimanupatantīvānupatantī] draṣṭṛtvādupalabhamānā । bauddhaḥ pratyayo jāyamāna eva tasyāḥ karmatāmāpadyate । taṁ bauddhaṁ pratyayaṁ vṛttimanupatantyupalabhamānā bhoktṛśaktiḥ ॥
[tasyāśca prāptacaitanyopagraha[sva]rūpāyāḥ] prāptaṁ caitanyopagraharūpaṁ puruṣopagraharūpaṁ yayā buddhivṛtyā samāsāditapāvakopagraharūpataptalohapiṇḍavat dṛśikarmatvādeva [anukāramātratayā,] buddhivṛttisārūpyamātratayā । [buddhivṛtyaviśiṣṭā jñavṛttiriti ।] jña evopalabdhireva vṛttiriti [ākhyāyate । ‘vṛttisārūpyamitaratra’] iti hi vyākhyātam । tathā [“pratyayāviśeṣo bhogaḥ”] iti prakhyāpitam ॥
bhoktṛbhogyabhede ca sati cittākārāpattirūpapadyate । na cāsati vyatirikte bhoktari cittasyaiva dṛṣṭṛdṛśyobhayābhāsatvamakasmādupakalpate । tasmāt suṣṭhūcyate- [‘sāṅkhyayogādaya eva puruṣaṁ svaśabdenābhyupayanti’] iti । anye tu śabdāntareṇopayanto'pi tata eva bibhyati ॥
[tathā cottam] -buddhivṛtyanukāramātratayā buddhāveva jñavṛttirupalabhyate, nānyatreti । [na pātālaṁ no vivaraṁ girīṇāṁ naivāndhakāraḥ kukṣayo nodadhīnām ,] evamādīni [na guhā । yasyāṁ] guhāyāṁ [nihitaṁ brahma śāścataṁ sā guhā,] na pātāळ.ādīni । kasyāṁ punarguhāyāṁ nihitamityāha-buddhāveva guhāyāṁ [vṛttim] ātmākhyāṁ brahmākhyām [aviśiṣṭām] apṛthagbhūtāṁ buddhivṛtyaviśiṣṭāṁ [vedayante] vivekinaḥ [॥ 22 ॥]
ataścaitadabhyupagamyate –
draṣṭṛdṛśyoparaktaṁ cittaṁ sarvārtham ॥ 23 ॥

mano hi mantavyenārthenoparaktaṁ, tatsvayaṁ ca viṣayatvādviṣayiṇā puruṣeṇā''tmīyayā vṛttyā'bhisaṁbaddhaṁ, tadetaccittameva draṣṭṛdṛśyoparaktaṁ viṣayaviṣayinirbhāsaṁ cetanācetanasvarūpāpannaṁ viṣayātmakamapyaviṣayātmakamivācetanaṁ cetanamiva sphaṭikamaṇikalpaṁ sarvārthamityucyate।

vivaraṇam
kāmāt punaḥ kāraṇāt puruṣasya cettākārāpattiḥ । tasyāṁ vā satyāṁ svabuddhisaṁvedanam । kuto vaināśikānāṁ cittameva grāhyaṁ grāhakaṁ ceti bhrāntirityāha - [draṣṭṛdṛśyoparaktaṁ cittu sarvārtham । draṣṭā] puruṣo [dṛśyaṁ] śabdādi tābhyām [uparaktaṁ cittaṁ sarvārthaṁ] puruṣasya bhogāpavargārthaṁ bhavati । [mano'bhimantavyenārthena] ayaskāntamaṇideśīyena viṣayeṇa [uparaktaṁ svayaṁ ca viṣayatvāt puruṣasya viṣayiṇā puruṣeṇa] sannihitena [ātmīyayā vṛttyā] mānasena pratyayena viṣayatayā [abhisambaddham ॥]
[tadetaccittam] ātmavṛttidvāreṇa puruṣeṇa sambandhāddraṣṭuḥ svarūpoparaktaṁ śabdādinā ca mantavyenoparaktamiti [draṣṭṛdṛśyoparaktaṁ cittameva] na puruṣaḥ । [draṣṭṛdṛśyoparaktam] ityasya vyākhyānaṁ karoti- [viṣayaviṣayinirbhāsaṁ cetanācetanasvarūpāpannam ॥]
kathaṁ punaḥ svayamacetanaṁ sacetanasvarūpāpannamiti ? naiṣa doṣaḥ--puruṣeṇa nityasannidhānācetanamiva । tadevāvivekibhiścetanamityucyate । na tathā viṣayāḥ । nityamacetanātmakā hi te । svatastu cittamacetanameveti [cetanācetanasvarūpāpannaṁ] ityucyate ॥
[viṣayātmakamiva] śabdādisvarūpamātramiva cetyartha: । [acetanaṁ cetanāmiva] puruṣasvarūpāpannamiva cetyarthaḥ । [sphaṭikamāṇikalpaṁ] yathā sphaṭikamaṇiralaktakādisannidhau tadākāratāṁ bibharti, tathaiva tat [sarvārthaṁ] cittam [ucyate ॥]

tadanena cittasārūpyeṇa bhrāntāḥ kecittadeva cetanamityāhuḥ। apare cittamātramevedaṁ sarvaṁ nāsti khalvayaṁ gavādirghaṭādiśca sakāraṇo loka iti। anukampanīyāste। kasmāt, asti hi teṣāṁ bhrāntibījaṁ sarvarūpākāranirbhāsaṁ cittamiti। samādhiprajñāyāṁ prajñeyo'rthaḥ pratibimbībhūtastasyā''lambanībhūtatvādanyaḥ। sa cedarthaścittamātraṁ syātkathaṁ prajñayaiva prajñārūpamavadhāryeta। tasmātpratibimbībhūto'rthaḥ prajñāyāṁ yenāvadhāryate sa puruṣa iti। evaṁ grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyasvarūpacittabhedāttrayamapyetajjātitaḥ pravibhajante te samyagdarśinastairadhigataḥ puruṣaḥ ॥ 23 ॥

vivaraṇam
tasmāt [anena cittasārūpyeṇa bhrāntāḥ kecit ।] etattu cittasārūpyaṁ vaiśeṣikāṇāṁ pramohakāraṇam । vaiśeṣikādayastu cittasārūpyamāhendrajālavyāmohitacetasaḥ [tadeva] cittaṁ [cetanamityāhuḥ ।] katham ? yasmānmanaḥpuruṣasaṁyogajaṁ caitanye guṇaḥ ucchedanīya iti manyante । vaināśikebhyastvayaṁ viśeṣaḥ-sthiramekaṁ dharmiṇamicchantīti ॥
[apare] bauddhāḥ [cittamātramevedaṁ sarvam , nāsti gavādirghaṭādiśca svākāreṇa] viśiṣṭaḥ sarveṣāṁ pratyayasya sādhāraṇo [lokaḥ] iti svānubhavamapyapalapanti । [te] evaṁ bhrāntāḥ sukumāratarabuddhayo vaināśikā [anukampanīyāḥ ॥]
[kasmāt ? asti hi teṣāṁ bhrāntibījaṁ sarvarūpākāranirbhāsaṁ cittamiti ।] sanimittā hi teṣāṁ bhrāntiḥ na lokāyatikānāṁ śūnyavādināmiva nirbījā । kevalajagadvañcanārthapravṛttatvāttu naiteṣvanukampā kartavyā । tasmādyuktamuktaṁ teṣāṁ varākāṇāṁ sabījabhrāntacetasāmanukampanīyamiti ॥
ke punarabhrāntā ityāha- [samādhiprajñāyāmiti ।] samādhiprajñāgrahaṇamabhrāntacittagrahaṇārtham । vikṣiptacetaso hi bhrāntāḥ । [samādhiprajñāyām] abhrāntāyāṁ viśuddhāyāṁ vivekavatyāṁ prasannagambhīratarāyāṁ [prajñeyo'rthaḥ pratibimbībhūtaḥ] nirmaladarpaṇamaṇḍala iva [tasyāṁ] samādhiprajñāyāṁ karaṇabhūtāyām [alambanībhūtatvādanyaḥ] prajñātaḥ sakāśājjātisvarūpakriyādibhiranyaḥ ॥
[sa cet] anyaḥ [cittamāttraṁ syāt kathaṁ prajñayaiva prajñārūpamavadhāryeta ।] svātmani kriyāvirodhāt na hi kathañcidavadhāryeta । [tasmāt] prajñāyāḥ anyo'sāvarthaḥ saḥ, yasyāṁ [prajñāyāṁ pratibimbībhūto'rtho yenāvadhāryete] saḥ tasyāḥ prajñāyā ālambanībhūtācārthadanyaḥ kartṛkārakabhūtaḥ । [sa puruṣaḥ ॥]
[ityevaṁ ye grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyasvarūpabhedāt] kartṛkaraṇakarmabhedopapatteḥ, nahi niravayavamekamevaikāsmin kṣaṇe vastu kartṛ ca karma ca bhavati, tato ye [trayamapyetat jātitaḥ pravibhajante, te samyagdarśinaḥ tairadhigataḥ puruṣaḥ,] prāpta ityarthaḥ । sāmarthyāttu jñāta iti gamyate [॥ 23 ॥]
kutaśca –
tadasaṁkhyeyavāsanābhiścitramapi parārthaṁ saṁhatyakāritvāt ॥ 24 ॥

tadetaccittamasaṁkhyeyābhirvāsanābhireva citrīkṛtamapi parārthaṁ parasya bhogāpavargārthaṁ na svārthaṁ saṁhatyakāritvādgṛhavat। saṁhatyakāriṇā cittena na svārthena bhavitavyaṁ, na sukhacittaṁ sukhārthaṁ na jñānaṁ jñānārthamubhayamapyetatparārtham। yaśca bhogenāpavargeṇa cārthenārthavānpuruṣaḥ sa eva paro na paraḥ sāmānyamātram। yattu kiṁcitparaṁ sāmānyamātraṁ svarūpeṇodāharedvaināśikastatsarvaṁ saṁhatyakāritvātparārthameva syāt। yastvasau paro viśeṣaḥ sa na saṁhatyakārī puruṣa iti ॥ 24 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kutaśca] asti puruṣaścittavyatiriktaḥ ? pūrvaṁ cittasya dṛśyatvena vyatiriktapuruṣasiddhirāpāditā । tasyaiva tu cittasya saṁhatyakāritvenādhunā svāmisiddhyarthamāha – [tadasaṅkhyeyavāsanācitramapi parārtha saṁhatyakāritvāt ॥]
yadyapi [tadeva cittamasaṁkhyeyābhirvāsanābhiḥ] anādisamayābhiḥ [citrīkṛtaṁ] bhrāntikāraṇamuktaṁ, tathāpi [parārthaṁ parasya bhogārthameveti] pratijñāyate । [saṁhatyakāritvāt] kāryakaraṇaviṣayādivyāpārāpekṣamarthasādhakatvāt saṁhatyakāritvam, ataḥ [saṁhatyakāritvāt gṛhādivat] iti pārārthyaṁ cittasya । na hi kiṁcana loke saṁhatyakāri dṛṣṭaṁ svārtham ॥
tasmāt [saṁhatyakāriṇā, citena na svārthena bhāvitavyam । na hi sukhacittaṁ, sukhārthaṁ] sukhacittārthaṁ vā । [nāpi jñānacittaṁ jñānārthaṁ] vā jñānacittārthaṁ vā । kiṁ tarhi ? sukhacittaṁ jñānacittamapi etadubhayaṁ [parārtham ॥]
yaśca [bhogena] sukhācittena jñānacittena ca [apavargeṇārthenārthavān puruṣaḥ sa eva paraḥ । na parasāmānyamātraṁ] śarīramindriyāṇi viṣayā vā । nahi vaināśikaḥ sukhacittaṁ śarīrendriyaviṣayārthamicchati । tathā cecchannabhyupagataṁ virundhīta । vijñānasyaiva hi sukhāpavargābhyāmarthitvamabhimanyate । tasmāt ya eva śarīrendriyaviṣayavyatiriktaḥ puruṣo bhogāpavargābhyāmarthavānanyo vijñānādabhyupagamanīyaḥ ॥
yadi [yatkiñcic parasāmānyamātram udāharedvaināśikaḥ,] yadi tu vaināśikaḥ saṁhatyakāriṇāṁ gṛhādīnāṁ devadattādisaṁhataparārthatvamiti vyāmohādabhimanyamānaḥ kaṁcana viśiṣṭaṁ na paramicchet, evaṁ cenmanvīta, sa idaṁ vaktavyaḥ--yaḥ paraḥ śarīrendriyaviṣayatyayānāṁ sāmānyam, uta sarve eveti, kimeṣāmanyatamaḥ, kiṁ vā kaśvidevaitebhyo bhinnajātīya iti ॥
na tāvatsāmānyam । na hi bhogāpavargarthinārtha sāmānyavastuvaidrāśiko'bhyupaiti, svasamayavirodhāt । nāpi śarīrādīni samastāni bhogāpavargībhyāmarthīnīti vāñchati । vijñānasantatereva bhogāpavargārthitvābhimānāt ॥
na cāpi jñānasantatirityekaṁ vastu(santateḥ kṣaṇikatvam । ) na cāpi santānasyāvastutayā śaśaviṣāṇakalpasya bhogāpavargībhyāmarthitvam । nāpi śarīrendriyādīnāmanyatamatvamicchati । vijñānavyatiritānām ā.ātmayasamaye bhogāpavargārthitvānabhyupagamāt ॥
nāpi śarīrendriyāṇāṁ saṅghāto nāma vastuto bhavato vidyate, yena cittaṁ saṁhataparārthaṁ prārthayethāḥ । avastuno hi kathamarthitvam । nāpi śarirendriyādibhyo'nyaṁ saṁhatabhinnajātīyaṁ pratijānīṣe । yadi bhinnajātīrya bhogāpavargābhyāmarthavantamadṛṣṭaṁ parikalpayethāḥ, sa evāsmābhiruktaḥ para iti । tasya ca saṁhṛtatve paratvaṁ dṛṣṭānātmavajropakalpate । pariśeṣāttu asaṁhato bhogāpavargābhyāmarthī para iti ॥
kiṁ cānyat-saṁhataparārthaṁ cittamiti sādhayato'rthinaḥ saṁhatasyānyasyānupapatteḥ svārthameva cittamityuktaṁ bhavati । tathā ca sati bhavato dṛṣṭāntābhāvo'bhyupagamavirodhaśca । tathā manvānasyānyadvāce hṛdaye cānyadaniśamyakāritrva cāpatati । yena cakṣurādiparārthavasādhanena viruddhatādoṣaḥ pralyākhyāyi । teṣa vijñānaparārthatvamita cedvijñānasyāpi saṁhatatvāt parārthavaṁ prasādhitam । atha vijñānasyāpi kṣaṇikatvādarsahatatvamita cet । na-tattya vyatiriktadṛśyatvātū dharmamātrānabhyupagamācca kṣaṇikatvānabhyupagamācetyetadapi pratyavocāma ॥
tasmāducyate--- [yatkiṁcit parasāmānyamātraṁ svarūpeṇe.odāharedvaināśikaḥ sa sarvaḥ saṁhatyakāritvāt parārtha eva syāt ।] na devadattārdisaṁhatārthatvam । ubhābhyāmāvābhyāmanabhyupagamāt । tvamapi vijñānavyatirekeṇa nānyamabhyupaiṣi । vayamapi puruṣavyatirekeṇa nānyārthatvamabhivāñchāmaḥ । vijñānamātratvaṁ ca nopapadyata ityuktam । ato [yastvasau paro viśeṣaḥ sa na saṁhatyakārī puruṣaḥ] svārtha iti siddhaḥ । tasmādasti bhoktā tasya svārthasya svena dṛśyena parārthena yannimittaḥ saṁyogaḥ । tadviyogāt kaivalyamupakalpate [॥ 24 ॥]
viśeṣadarśina ātmabhāvabhāvanānivṛttiḥ ॥ 25 ॥

yathā prāvṛṣi tṛṇāṅkurasyodbhedena tadbījasattā'numīyate tathā mokṣamārgaśravaṇena yasya romaharṣāśrupātau dṛśyete tatrāpyasti viśeṣadarśanabījamapavargabhāgīyaṁ karmābhinirvartitamityanumīyate। tasyā''tmabhāvabhāvanā svābhāvikī pravartate। yasyābhāvādidamuktaṁ svabhāvaṁ muktvā doṣādyeṣāṁ pūrvapakṣe rucirbhavatyaruciśca nirṇaye bhavati। tatrā''tmabhāvabhāvanā ko'hamāsaṁ kathamahamāsaṁ kiṁsvididaṁ kathaṁsvididaṁ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ kathaṁ vā bhaviṣyāma iti। sā tu viśeṣadarśino nivartate। kutaḥ। cittasyaivaiṣa vicitraḥ pariṇāmaḥ, puruṣastvasatyāmavidyāyāṁ śuddhaścittadharmairaparāmṛṣṭa iti। tato'syā''tmabhāvabhāvanā kuśalasya nivartata iti ॥ 25 ॥

vivaraṇam
guṇapuruṣayogāsyāvidyā nimittamuttam । sā ca viśeṣadarśina ātmānaṁ vijijñāsamānasya vinivartate । tannivṛttai ca liṅgamāha- [viśeṣadarśina ātmabhāvabhāvanānivṛttiḥ ।] vyaktāvyaktasāmānyādviśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ asādhāraṇe.o [viśeṣaḥ ।] taṁ viśeṣaṁ vyaktāvyaktasāmānyāt pravivicya draṣṭuṁ śīlaṁ yasya sa [viśeṣadarśī ।] tasya [ātmabhāvabhāvanā nivartate ।] sā ca samyagdarśanābhimukhā kaivalyaprāpikarmanimittā ॥
kathaṁ punarātmabhāvabhāvanā asyāstīti vijñāyata ityāha - [yathā prāvṛṣi tṛṇasyāṅkurodbhedena] liṅgena [tadbījasaddhāvo'numīya(gamya)te, tathā mokṣamārgaśravaṇena yasya romaharṣāśrupāto dṛśyate, tatrāpyasti viśeṣadarśanabījamapavargabhāgīyaṁ karmābhinirvartitamiti] romaharṣāśrupātādīleṅgena [anumīyate ॥]
[tasya] viśeṣadarśina: [ātmabhāvabhāvanā] kaivalyabhāgīyakarmanimittā [svābhāvikī] janmāntarakarmanimittā ihajanmāparigrahasthairyakāraṇā vā । sā hyācāryopadeśānapekṣā [svābhāvikī pravartate । tasya] karmaṇastādṛśasya [abhāvāt idamuktam - svabhāvadoṣāt] aśuddhakarmayogāt [eṣāṁ pūrvapakṣe] samyagdarśanatadupāyaviparyaye [rucirbhavati, aruciśva nirṇaye] samyagdarśane ॥
[tatrātmabhāvabhāvanā] kā punarityāha--- [ko'hamāsaṁ, kathamahamāsaṁ, kiṁsvi.ādada, kathaṁsvididaṁ, ke bhaviṣyāma:, kathaṁ bhaviṣyāmaḥ,] iti । [sā tu viśeṣadarśino nivartate ।] yadviṣayā hi jijñāsā, tasminnadhigate tadviṣayā jijñāsā vinivartate । kutaḥ etadavam ? yataḥ [cittasyaivaiṣaḥ] ke bhaviṣyāma ityādiḥ [citraḥ pariṇāmaḥ] na puruṣasya । [puruṣastvasatyāmavidyāyāṁ śuddhaścittadharmairaparāmṛṣṭa iti ।] yasmādevamata evaṁ viśeṣadarśinaḥ [tasyātmabhāvabhāvanā kuśalasya nivataite ॥ 25 ॥]
tadā vivekanimnaṁ kaivalyaprāgbhāraṁ cittam ॥ 26 ॥
tadānīṁ yadasya cittaṁ viṣayaprāgbhāramajñānanimnamāsīttadasyānyathā bhavati kaivalyaprāgbhāraṁ vivekajajñānanimnamiti ॥ 26 ॥

vivaraṇam
yadā ca viśeṣadarśanamudapādi, [tadā vivekanimnaṁ kaivalyaprāgbhāraṁ cittam । yadasya cittaṁ viṣayanimnaṁ] viṣayapravaṇam [ajñānaprāgbhāram] ajñānaniṣṭhaṁ saṁsārābhimukham [āsīt , tadasya] viśeṣadarśinaḥ [tadānīmanyathā bhavati, kaivalyaprāgbhāraṁ vivekanimnam] iti pratisrotovṛttijñāyate [॥ 26 ॥]
tacchidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇi saṁskārebhyaḥ ॥ 27 ॥
pratyayavivekanimnasya sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātimātrapravāhiṇaścittasya tacchidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇyasmīti vā mameti vā jānāmīti vā na jānāmīti vā। kutaḥ, kṣīyamāṇabījebhyaḥ pūrvasaṁskārebhya iti ॥ 27 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tacchidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇi saṁskārebhyaḥ । vivekanimnasya] uttarottaravivekapravaṇacetasaḥ [puruṣasya] jñāninaḥ [anyatākhyātipravāhādhirohiṇaḥ] sattvapuruṣānyatāsrotaḥplāvinaḥ [cittasya tacchidreṣu] vivekapratyayapravāhāntarāleṣu [pratyayāntarāṇi] viparyayalakṣaṇāni [asmīti vā mameti vā । kutaḥ] tāni bhavantītyāha-- [kṣīyamāṇakleśādibījasya] cittasya [pūrvepacitaviparītasaṁskārebhyaḥ] pratyayāntarāṇi jāyante ॥ 27 ॥
hānameṣāṁ kleśavaduktam ॥ 28 ॥

yathā kleśā dagdhabījabhāvā na prarohasamarthā bhavanti tathā jñānāgninā dagdhabījabhāvaḥ pūrvasaṁskāro na pratyayaprasūrbhavati। jñānasaṁskārāstu cittādhikārasamāptimanuśerata iti na cintyante ॥ 28 ॥

vivaraṇam
[hānameṣāṁ kleśavaduktam । yathā kleśā dagdhabījabhāvā na prarohasamarthā bhavanti] iti [te pratiprasavaheyāḥ sūkṣmāḥ] ityatroktam, [evaṁ jñānāgnidagdhabījabhāvā:] asmi mametyādipratyayasaṁskārā na prarohasamarthā bhavanti । dagdhaśālibījavat [pūrvasaṁskāro na pratyayaprasūrbhavatītyarthaḥ ॥]
jñānasaṁskārāstu kathamapratipakṣāḥ santaścittamadhikāre na(vija)yojayiṣyantīti ? te tu [samyagdarśanasaṁskārāścitādhikāraparisamāptimanuśerate ।] sahaivāśrayeṇāvasitaprayojanena cittena pralīyante । na punaścittamadhikārapravaṇaṁ kurvanti । adhikārahetoravidyāyāḥ pratipakṣatvājjñānasya । tatra niṣphalatvāt [na cintyante ।] na hi svayaṁ patataḥ patanaheturanveṣaṇīyaḥ ॥ 28 ॥
prasaṁkhyāne'pyakusīdasya sarvathā vivekakhyāterdharmameghaḥ samādhiḥ ॥ 29 ॥

yadā'yaṁ brāhmaṇaḥ prasaṁkhyāne'pyakusīdastato'pi na kiṁcitprārthayate। tatrāpi viraktasya sarvathā vivekakhyātireva bhavatīti saṁskārabījakṣayānnāspa pratyayāntarāṇyutpadyante। tadā'sya dharmamegho nāma samādhirbhavati ॥ 29 ॥

vivaraṇam
vivekakhyātipravaṇāntaḥkaraṇasya brāhmaṇasya prasaṁkhyāne'pyakusīdasya [sarvathāvivekakhyāterdharmameghaḥ samādhiḥ ।] sa yadā ayaṁ brāhmaṇaḥ prasaṁkhyāne vivekadarśanaśīlate'pyakusīdaḥ avṛddhiko bhavati, [tato'pi] prasaṁkhyānaprasādaviśeṣādadhikaṁ na [kiṁcit prārthayate ।] apiśabdāṁt prasaṁkhyāne'pi na prārthanā । tatrāpi prasaṁkhyāne [viraktaḥ । sarvathā] sarveṇa prakāreṇa vivekakhyātiryasya sa [sarvathāvivekakhyātireva bhavati ॥]
[kleśasaṁskārabījakṣayāt nāsya] śarīrādau śūnyaveśmanīva asmi mameti vā jñānaprasādamātraikāyatanasya [pratyayāntarāṇyutpadyante । tadā'sya] brāhmaṇasya [sarvathāvivekakhyāte: dharmamegho nāma samādhirbhavati ।] kaivalyākhyaṁ paraṁ dharmaṁ varṣatīti [dharmameghaḥ] iti saṁjñā [॥ 29 ॥]
tataḥ kleśakarmanivṛttiḥ ॥ 30 ॥

tallābhādavidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ samūlakāṣaṁ kaṣitā bhavanti। kuśalākuśalāśca karmāśayāḥ samūlaghātaṁ hatā bhavanti।kleśakarmanivṛttau jīvanneva vidvānvimukto bhavati। kasmāt, yasmādviparyayo bhavasya kāraṇam। na hi kṣīṇaviparyayaḥ kaścitkenacitkvacijjāto dṛśyata iti ॥ 30 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tataḥ kleśakarmanivṛttiḥ । tasya] dharmameghanāmnaḥ samādheḥ samyagdarśanapākābhirūpasya [ [lābhāt] ] bhāvāt [avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ samūlakāṣaṁ kaṣitāḥ] vāsanābhiḥ saha samastāḥ pralīnāḥ [bhavanti] । [kuśalākuśalāśca karmāśayāḥ samūlaghātaṁ hatā bhavanti ।] mūlaiḥ kleśaiḥ sahocchinnā bhavanti ॥
[kleśakarmanivṛtauṁ jīvanneva vidvān mukto bhavati । kasmāt] evama ? yato [viparyayaḥ] mithyājñānaṁ [bhavasya] janmanaḥ [kāraṇam । na hi kṣīṇaviparyayaḥ kaścit kacijjāto dṛśyate ॥ 30 ॥]
tadā sarvāvaraṇamalāpetasya jñānasyā''nantyājjñeyamalpam ॥ 31 ॥

sarvaiḥ kleśakarmāvaraṇairvimuktasya jñānasyā''nantyaṁ bhavati। āvarakeṇa tamasā'bhibhūtamāvṛtamanantaṁ jñānasattvaṁ kvacideva rajasā pravartitamuddhāṭitaṁ grahaṇasamarthaṁ bhavati। tatra yadā sarvairāvaraṇamalairapagataṁ bhavati tadā bhavatyasyā''nantyam। jñānasyā''nantyājjñeyamalpaṁ saṁpadyate। yathā''kāśe khadyotaḥ। yatredayuktam – andho maṇimavidhyattamanaṅgulirāvayat। agrīvastaṁ pratyamuñcattamajihvo'bhyapūjayat ॥ iti ॥ 31 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadā sarvāvaraṇamalāpetasya jñānasyā''nantyāt jñeyamalpam ।] tadā dharmameghasamādhisamaye, [sarvaiḥ kleśakarmāvaraṇaiḥ] rajastamojanmabhiḥ [vimuktasya, jñānasya] sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātimātrasya bhavatyā [nantyam ।] tat kathamiti ? [tamasā(na)'bhibhūtamanantaṁ jñānasattvaṁ,] tasya tiraskṛtarajomalasyānantasya nistaraṅgamahodadhideśīyasya nirahitasyāvikriyasya kathaṁ tadgrahaṇasāmarthyamityāha- [kvacidrajasā pravartitaṁ] cittasattvam [udghāṭitaṁ] vāyuneva mahāpayodamaṇḍalamāhataṁ sūcitaṁ [grahaṇasamarthaṁ bhavati ।] svataḥ sattvasyāpravartanāt rajaso hi pravṛttisāmarthyamiti ॥
[tadā'sya] cittasya [bhavatyānantyam,] aśeṣajñeyaviṣayatvamambaratalamadhyavartino jaladharānarodhanirgatasya raveriva । tasya [jñānasyānanyāt] aśeṣaviṣayatvāt [jñeyamalpaṁ sampadyate । yathā ākāśe khadyota:] iti । yathā ākāśāpekṣayā khadyoto na kiṁcidevametajjñānābhisamīkṣayā jñeya na kiṁciditi ॥
paramātmajñānāvasthāyāmaśeṣaviparyayatirodhāne sarvapuruṣārthaśūnyatā cetyetatpradaraśanārthamudāharaṇamāha - yatredamuktam - andho maṇimavindat (dhyat) tamanaṅgulirāvayat । agrīvaḥ (taṁ) pratyamuñcat tamajihve'bhyapūjayat iti । yathā andhādīnāṁ maṇīvedhādikamasambhavadapi viparyayeṇāndho maṇimavidhyaditi vyavahriyate, tathā jñānajñeyasaṁvyavahāro'pi viparyayāvasthāyāmeva । viparyayābhāve tu sarvapuruṣārthaśūnyā eva guṇāḥ sampadyanta iti ॥ 31 ॥
tataḥ kṛtārthānāṁ pariṇāmakramasamāptirguṇānām ॥ 32 ॥
tasya dharmameghasyodayātkṛtārthānāṁ guṇānāṁ pariṇāmakramaḥ parisamāpyate। na hi kṛtabhogāpavargāḥ parisamāptakramāḥ kṣaṇamapyavasthātumutsahante ॥ 32 ॥

vivaraṇam
tataḥ dharmameghasamādhisamudayāt kṛtārthāścittaguṇāssampadyante । cittādhīnatvācca kāryakaraṇārambhiṇo'pi sattvādayaḥ kṛtārthā bhavanti । samastasya puruṣārthasya kṛtatvāt । eṣāṁ kṛtārthānāṁ guṇānāṁ janmamaraṇapra(bhāva)vāharūpaḥ pariṇāmakramaḥ parisamāpyate । na hi kṛtabhogāpavargārthāḥ kṣaṇamapi prayojanābhāvāt avasthātumutsahante ॥ 32 ॥
atha ko'yaṁ kramo nāmeti –
kṣaṇapratiyogī pariṇāmāparāntanirgrāhyaḥ kramaḥ ॥ 33 ॥
kṣaṇānantaryātmā pariṇāmasyāparāntenāvasānena gṛhyate kramaḥ। na hyananubhūtakramakṣaṇā purāṇatā vastrasyānte bhavati। nityeṣu ca kramo dṛṣṭaḥ।

vivaraṇam
pariṇāmakramaparisāmāptirityuktam । atha ko'yaṁ guṇakramo nāma yasya parisamāptirupavarṇitā? tasyāyamadhigamopāya ucyate - kṣaṇapratiyogī pariṇāmāparāntanigrārhyaḥ kramaḥ । kṣaṇaṁ prati yujyata iti kṣaṇāpratiyogī ।
[kṣaṇānantaryātmā] kṣaṇasyānantaratā kṣaṇānantaryaṁ tadātmā tatsvabhāvaḥ । kṣaṇānantaryameva [‘kṣaṇatatkramayoḥ’] iti vyākhyātam ॥
kiṁ punarasya grahaṇe liṅgamityāha— [pariṇāmasyāparāntena] vināśāvasthārūpaṇa [avasānena] liṅgena [nigṛhyate saḥ kramaḥ ।] kathamaparāntena nirgrahaṇamiti ? ucyate-- [na hyānanubhūtakramā] kramamanavalambamānā kṣaṇe [kṣaṇe purāṇatā vastrasyānte] vināśakāle bhavati iti । na hi kadācidbhūtamātrasyaiva vastrasya purāṇatā dṛśyate । tasmāt purāṇatābhivyaktiliṅgenābhyūhyate--yeneyaṁ purāṇatā vasrasyābhivyaktimupasaṁprāpitā sa kramaḥ ॥
tatra yadi labdhāvasānatvamalabdhāvasānatvaṁ ca kramasya syāt, tato yuktaṁ [kṛtārthānāṁ pariṇāmakramaparisamāsiguṇānāmū] iti vaktum । taca labdhalabdhāva sānatvaṁ kramasya niṣyānityatve ghaṭate । tatrānityeṣu vastrādiṣu krame dṛṣṭra:, na tu nityeṣu । tataśca guṇānāṁ nityānāṁ pariṇāmakramaparisamāptirayuktā syādityāśaṅkamāna āha- [niyeṣu ca kramo dṛṣṭaḥ ।]

dvayī ceyaṁ nityatā kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatā ca। tatra kūṭasthanityatā puruṣasya। pariṇāminityatā guṇānām। yasminpariṇamyamāne tattvaṁ na vihanyate tannityam। ubhayasya ca tattvānabhighātānnityatvam। tatra guṇadharmeṣu buddhyādiṣu pariṇāmāparāntanirgrāhyaḥ kramo labdhaparyavasāno nityeṣu dharmiṣu guṇeṣvalabdhaparyavasānaḥ। kūṭasthanityeṣu svarūpamātrapratiṣṭheṣu muktapuruṣeṣu svarūpāstitā krameṇaivānubhūyata iti tatrāpyalabdhaparyavasānaḥ śabdapṛṣṭhenāstikriyāmupādāya kalpita iti।

vivaraṇam
kiṁ sarvatra ? netyāha- [dvivigheyaṁ nityatā, pariṇāmanityatā guṇānāṁ, kūṭasthānityatā puruṣasyeti ॥]
nanu pariṇāmināṁ guṇānāṁ kathaṁ nityatā syāditi bravīti--- [yasmin pariṇamamāne tattvaṁ na vihanyate ।] yasya yadrūpaṁ pramāṇenopalabdhaṁ, tasya tat tattvam । tadyasmin na vihanyate na vyabhicarati, tadapi nityam । guṇānāmapi sukhadu:khamohātmatā prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlatā ca tatvaṁ na vihanyate । tasmādete'pa pariṇāmanityāḥ । ubhayatra ca guṇapuruṣeṣu [tattvasyāvighātānnityatvam ।] tato guṇeṣvapi nityeṣu pariṇāmo dṛṣṭa iti labdhālabdhaparyavasāntvaṁ sthitam ॥
[tatra guṇadharmeṣu mahadādiṣu pariṇāmāparāntanirgrāhyaḥ kramo labdhaparyavasānaḥ] śarīrādiṣviva । [nityeṣu tu] guṇeṣu dharmiṣvalabdhaparyavasānaḥ nityatvādeṣām । [kūṭasthanileṣu svarūpamātrapratiṣṭheṣu muktapuruṣeṣu svarūpāstitā krameṇaivānubhūyate ।] tena muktapuruṣeṣvasannapyanubhavadvāreṇa, [śabdapṛṣṭhenāstikriyāmupādāya vikalpitaḥ] iti alabdhaparyavasāna eva । paramārthataḥ । puruṣaṣvapāraṇāmitvānnāsti krama ityarthaḥ ॥
athāsya saṁsārasya sthityā gatyā ca guṇeṣu vartamānasyāsti kramasamāptirna veti। avacanīyametat। katham। asti praśna ekāntavacanīyaḥ sarvo jāto mariṣyatīti। oṁ bho iti।

vivaraṇam
[athāsya sasārasya sthityā] pradhānarūpeṇa, gatyā vikārātmanā, dvaya ca guṇātmakamiti [guṇeṣu ca vartamānasya asti kramaparisamāptiḥ na veti ? avacanīyametat ।] astyevetyavadhāraṇaṁ na śakyaṁ kartum । nāpi nāstyeveti । kiṁ tu vibhajya, kasyacidasti kasyāpi nāstīti vacanīyameva ॥
[katham ? asti praśna ekāntavacanīyaḥ] apravibhajyāpi । yathā [sarvo jāto mariṣyati] ajñānī [iti ।] nanu jñānavānapi mariṣyatyeva । ucyate – ajñasya hi maraṇamityabhimānaḥ, na jñāninaḥ । tathā coktam – [mithyaitadāhurmriyatīti mūḍhāḥ] iti ॥

atha sarvo mṛtvā janiṣyata iti। vibhajyavacanīyametat। pratyuditakhyātiḥ kṣīṇatṛṣṇaḥ kuśalo na janiṣyata itarastu janiṣyate। tathā manuṣyajātiḥ śreyasī na vā śreyasītyevaṁ paripṛṣṭe vibhajya vacanīyaḥ praśnaḥ paśūnadhikṛtya śreyasī devānṛṣīṁścādhikṛtya neti। ayaṁ tvavacanīyaḥ praśnaḥ saṁsāro'yamantavānathānanta iti। kuśalasyāsti saṁsārakramasamāptirnetarasyeti anyatarāvadhāraṇe doṣaḥ।tasmādvyākarīya evāyaṁ praśna iti ॥ 33 ॥

vivaraṇam
[atha sarvo mṛtvā janiṣyata iti ? vibhajya vacanīyametat] ekāntānupapatteḥ । katham ? [pratyuditakhyātiḥ kṣīṇatṛṣṇaḥ kuśalo na janiṣyate, itaraḥ] ajñaḥ [janiṣyate ॥]
[tathā manuṣyajātiḥ śreyasī] eva [naiva vetyavacanīyaḥ praśnaḥ ।] pravibhajya tu vacanīya eva । katham ? [paśūnuddiśya śreyasī] bhavati । [devānṛṣīṁścādhikṛtya na] śreyasī bhavati ॥
[ayaṁ tvavacanaya eva] apravibhajya sāmānyena [praśnaḥ] --yathā [saṁsāro'yamantavāneveti ananta eveti vā ।] bandhamokṣānupapatteḥ । pravibhajya tu vacanīya eva । yathā kuśalasyāsti [saṁsāracakraparisamāptirnetarasyeti ॥]
[anyatarāvadhāraṇe doṣaḥ ।] saṁsāro'ntavānevānanta eveti vānyatarāvadhāraṇe doṣaḥ । [tasmādavyākaraṇīya evāyaṁ] sāmānyenāpravibhajya [praśnaḥ] , yathā – [sarvo mṛtvā janiṣyate] iti, evaṁ [manuṣyajātiḥ śreyasyeveti] ca । tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṁ [kṛtārthānāṁ pariṇāmakramaparisamāsiguṁṇānāmiti] viśeṣaṇam [॥ 33 ॥]
guṇādhikārakramasamāptau kaivalyamuktaṁ tatsvarūpamavadhāryate –
puruṣārthaśūnyānāṁ guṇānāṁ pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyaṁ svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktiriti ॥ 34 ॥

kṛtabhogāpavargāṇāṁ puruṣārthaśūnyānāṁ yaḥ pratiprasavaḥ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṁ guṇānāṁ tatkaivalyaṁ, svarūpapratiṣṭhā punarbuddhisattvānabhisaṁbandhātpuruṣasya citiśaktireva kevalā, tasyāḥ sadā tathaivāvasthānaṁ kaivalyamiti ॥ 34 ॥

vivaraṇam
[guṇādhikāraparisamāptau kaivalyamuktam । tatsvarūpamavadhāryate ।] kaivalyaṁ prati vipratipatteḥ । keṣāñcidvijñānasantānasyātyantopaśamaḥ kaivalyam । keṣāñcittu navānāmātmaguṇānāṁ buddhīcchādveṣaprayatnasukhaduḥkhadharmādharmasaṁskārāṇāmucchedenācetanasya dravyamātrasya puruṣasyāvasthānam । keṣāñcidīśvarasyāyujyam । keṣāñcit sarvajñatvādīśvaratulyadharmatvaprāptiḥ kaivalyamiti bhinnā matiḥ ॥
ihāpi vipratipattipraṇodāya kaivalyasvarūpamavadhāryate – [puruṣārthaśūnyānāṁ guṇānāṁ yaḥ pratiprasavaḥ] pratisaṁsargaḥ svakāraṇe pratyastamaya ityarthaḥ, [kāryakaraṇātmakatayā pariṇatānām] , tat [kaivalyaṁ] puruṣasya kevalatvaṁ guṇairamiśrībhāva ityarthaḥ ॥
[svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśakti] riti । [buddhisattvānabhisaṁbandhinī yā puruṣasya citiśaktiḥ] amiśrā [kevalā tasyāḥ sadā tathaiva avasthānaṁ kevalāyāḥ] bhāvaḥ kaivalyam ॥
nanu kaivalyasyaikatve kathaṁ vikalpaḥ? kriyāyāṁ hi vikalpo na tu vastuni । vastusvarūpasya bhedānupapatteḥ । kaivalyamapi vastu, kathaṁ tadvikalpyata iti । naiṣa doṣaḥ । nimittanaimittikayoḥ prabhedopapatteḥ । nimittanaimittikabhede.opacarito'pi vikalpe na vastusvarūpabhedakṛtaḥ । yā tu guṇānāṁ pariṇāmitā puruṣasya vimiśratā vṛttisarūpatā, sā kāryakaraṇātmakānāṁ puruṣārthaśūnyānāṁ guṇānāṁ pratisaṁsargānnimittādapagacchatīti nimittageva pratiprasavākhyaṁ kaivalyaśabdenopacaritaṁ pūrvam ॥
dvitīyaṁ tu guṇapratiprasavanimittabhāvi yat svarūpāvasthānaṁ puruṣasya guṇairamiśritatayā, tat kaivalyamiti viśeṣaḥ । guṇapuruṣāntarasvarūpatattvanirdhāraṇena tantrāntarīyatatvasvarūpanirākaraṇena ca kaivalyāntarāṇi niveditavyāni ॥
tatroṅkāro maṅgalārthaḥ prayuktaḥ paraṁmaśvaranāmāṅkitamastakatayā tantrapracayārthaṁ śāntyarthaṁ vā vedāraṇyakavaditi om iti ॥
oṅkāro yasya vaktā samacarata phalaiḥ karma yasmādaśeṣaṁ niṣkarmakळ.eśapāko ghaṭayati sakalaṁ yaḥ phalena kriyāṇām । īśānāmīśvaro yaḥ sthitibhavanidhanaprakriyāṇāṁ vidhātā dhyāyannaḥ śuklimānaṁ vyapanudatu tarāṁ kṛṣṇimānaṁ sa kṛṣṇaḥ ॥
yātrākṛtastrijagatāṁ yadacintyaśakti- leśān daśāhureha mīnamukhāvatārān । kleśodbhavatrividhatāpaparamparārtā: taṁ nāganāthaśāyanaṁ śaraṇaṁ vrajāmaḥ ॥
phaṇarataughavadyoti [ pṛthivī ] dyunabhodiśe । yogīndrāya phaṇīndrāya tatpatañjalaye namaḥ ॥
yogena cittasya padena vācāṁ malaṁ śarīrasya tu vaidyakena । yo'pākarottaṁ pravaraṁ munīnāṁ patanaliṁ prāñjalirānato'smi ॥
sa jayati patañjalimuniḥ yena śreyo'rthisārthasasyānām । vihito harṣastāpatritayahṛtā dharmamedhena ॥
yastatāna bhavamārgalaṅghināṁ kleśakarmamayadharmanuttaye । dharmameghamukhayogatoyadam [rta patañjalimṛrṣiṁ praṇato'smi] ॥
vadanāhitapūrṇacandrakaṁ gurumīśānamabhūtibhūṣaṇam । praṇamāmbhujaṅgasaṅgrahaṁ bhagavatpādamapūrvaśaṅkaram ॥ 34 ॥
